During a break at an inn, Yuna decided to try out one of the spheres she found from an enemy. She places it on her grid, and sees a "GTS" appear. She uses an Ability Spehere to activate it.

She begins to look around outside, but suddenly sees her surroundings change. She looks to see just sky for as long as she can see. She looks down, and she is shocked. She's become a giant!

"What the heck?" Tidus wonders, while looking up to see what it is. He keeps looking, and looking, until he sees it leads to a leg. Which leads to a body, which leads to...Yuna!?

He takes a few steps back, and trips and falls on the ground He hears an incredibly loud voice

"What the? What happened to me? Tidus? Rikku? Wakka?"

Tidus gets up, and starts to yell towards the giant Yuna.

"Yuna! Its me, Tidus! Down here!"

11111111.content:
"Yuna! Down here!"

Yuna looks down to see a tiny little figure by her feet. She looks a little closer, and notices its Tidus!

"Oh, Tidus! I've become gigantic!"
"Well, duh"

Yuna then places her finger on the ground, and Tidus climbs onto her pink painted fingernail. Yuna raises the finger to her face.

"Tidus, what can we do to make me normal?"
11111111.title: Yuna sees Tidus

111111111.content:
"We'll have to visit the witch Glenda", he suggests to her. She can barely hear him, but when she figures out what he said, a shiver runs down her huge back. Tidus nearly falls off her finger.
"Sorry", she tells him. "But the thought of visiting Glenda terrifies me".
Tidus laughed. "Yuna, look at yourself. How can you tell me that visiting Glenda scares you when she's not even the size of your thumb?"
"I guess. When shall we leave?"
"Right away. It won't take us that long to get there because you're so huge now".
So Yuna and Tidus set off for Glenda's home in the mountains. It was very cold and Tidus nestled himself carefully inside Yuna's hand. As more and more time passed Yuna grew more and more disatisfied with her current situation. If she stayed this size, it meant she could never again be with Tidus, or hug him, or kiss him. A big tear rolled down her cheek and saturated Tidus.
"Hey", he said. "What's the matter?"
"Nothing", she said. "But what if Glenda can't help me? What the hell am I supposed to do then?"
"Of course Glenda can help you", he comforted her. "She's the most powerful witch in the entire county."
Yuna felt a bit better at these comforting words, and soon they arrived at Glenda's lair.
"Glenda..." Yuna called in her booming voice.
111111111.title: The Quest for the Witch

During a break from their quest to defeat Sin, they stayed at the in at Luca. During this time Lulu wanted to look around her room, due to the fact that she doesn't want to do what the others are doing. During her search she found a tomb that teaches a black magic spell that cannot be learned on the grid.

"Whats this?" said Lulu with awe.

As she inspects the front of the tomb she finds the title.

"M...Macro, must be a spell." says Lulu to herself.

She opens the tomb to see how to learn it. The tomb reads "Macro is a spell that increases an objects height thus increasing strength based on the magic power of the caster. Needed to learn this spell: Mega-Ether, 4 Magic Spheres, 1 Black Magic Sphere, and 10 Ability Spheres and place them in the socket in the back of this tomb."

Luckily for Lulu she had all the ingredients to learn this new spell. She placed the items in the back of the book, then the book levitated and blasted Lulu with a green beam, and without hesitation shouted the spell name.

"Macro." yells Lulu.

Suddenly a green aura surrounded Lulu and everything went dark. As Lulu regained the ability to see, she noticed that she was no longer in her room, she was outside. When she looked down she noticed that the inn was as big as her big toe and the people where as big as ants compared to her and she had a choice to make...

1121.content:
Amy Rose was in Station Square one day. She was feeling quite happy, as her boxercising was getting better by the day.

"Now to go back to my apartment," she thought. "I can get on with my boxercising afterwards. Oh, Sonic! When he sees my figure, he'll love me for sure!"

As she closed the door to her apartment and looked around, she noticed a sparkle on the carpet. She recognised the shape and size as a Power Ring, but the only thing different about it was that it was glowing pink, not gold.

"That's strange," she thought, standing over it. "Power Rings are Sonic's main source of energy. They also help him to stay in his Super form. The colour of the rings matches his Super form's colour..." She pondered about it for a minute. She was distracted when the phone rang.

"Hello?"
"Hi, can I speak to Amy, please?"
"Speaking."
"Hi, Amy! This is Rouge."

Amy stiffened. She had a grudge against Rouge, and the two didn't get along well.
"What do you want?"
"Hey, what's the tone of voice for, little lady? Anyway, I phoned you to see if you have one of those."
"What's 'one of those'?
"I'm talking about the miscoloured Power Rings, of course! You know what they are?
"I-"
"Of course you do. I'm sorry." Rouge's voice, as usual, was giving nothing away. Amy couldn't tell if she was lying or not.
"Anyway, I found one lying in my room as well! It's purple."
"Mine's pink!"
"Tails' is orange."
"Tails got one?!"
"Yep, and Knuckles. His was red."
"What are they? Are they harmless?"
"They appear to be normal. I picked up my ring, and it's not doing anything wierd. What about yours?"
"I haven't picked it up yet."
"Why don't you take it to Club Rouge? I'd love to hear about it."
There was a click, and Rouge hung up.
Amy sighed. "Guess I'd better go."
She walked over to the ring, and bent over to pick it up. As her hands closed around it, there was a zap! and the ring disappeared.


Amy stood there for a second, and then walked over to the phone. She dialed Club Rouge.

"Hello sugar?"
"This is Amy. I picked my ring up and-"
But Amy was interrupted by Rouge laughing. "I can't believe you fell for it!" Rouge said. Then there was a click, and Rouge hung up.

"She lied! And what's going to happen to me?"

Half an hour passed, and nothing happened. She went on with her boxercising, and after she finished, there was a knock at the door. Cream had come to visit.

"Hi Amy. How's your training going?"
"Not too bad, thanks. I have to tell you something, though..."
Amy told Cream about the mysterious ring, and the trick Rouge had played on her.
"It doesn't look like anything's happening," Cream said, in her small, high-pitched voice. But, just then...
1121.title: A pink ring?

choices: "This invention will make your clothes grow with you."
His invention had broken, therefore Amy was still growing
11211.content:
Cream was telling Amy about the new flower rings she had made with her mom. Amy listened politely throughout Cream's explanation. Cream was prone to crying at small things, like if the TV wasn't working. Amy was always careful to not upset Cream when she was around.

But it suddenly dawned on Cream that Amy's clothes were looking quite tight on her. "That's strange," Cream thought. "I thought her clothes were loose when I first came."
"Is there anything wrong?" Amy said. Cream was starting to look scared.
"Erm...no," Cream said untruthfully. She was eying Amy's dress, which was slowly getting smaller on her. "Er, how's your workout going?"
"You asked me that already."
"How much weight have you lost this week?"
"I'm almost at my target weight! Isn't it marvelous?"
"Then why do your clothes look so tight on you?"
Amy looked down, and gasped with shock. Cream was telling the truth.
"What did I eat last night?" Amy cried.
"Erm, you're not gaining weight, Amy," Cream said quietly. "You're getting bigger."
"Bigger? As in, a giant?"
"Yeah."

There was a silence. Amy was starting to feel uncomfortable, mostly because her dress was hurting her since she was quite big now.

After a moment of silence Amy asked, "How big am I?"
"I'd say about...8 feet."
"How will I be able to keep decent in front of Sonic?" Amy said.
"Hang on, I've got an idea." Cream dialed Tails, and in no time at all Tails was standing in Amy's room.
"Okay Amy, I can't stop you growing for the time being, but I have one invention that will help..."

Knuckles places the master emerald in front of Amy while Shadow and Silver both pull out a chaos emerald and start to channel some kind of energy around themselves which is then redirected at Amy.
1121111111.title: Good news and bad news and the ugly news

11211111111.content:

"I'm still big!" Amy yelled

After about a minute Amy started to feel wierd.

As the group below was silent, the moment was broken when all of the sudden-

"NOO! I'm growing again!"
She could watch as the five below was getting farther and farther away for about 5 minutes until her head touched to ceiling again..... while sitting down still.
"This can't be happening...." Amy cried as she covered her eyes.

Shadow then turned around and pulled out his chaos emerald, closing his eyes the emerald started glowing then a moment later.
11211111111.title: Did it work?

As for the others they all just point to Amy.
Before Sonic has a chance to turn around to see, he is grabbed by Amy.

Amy then squeezes Sonic against her and starts crying again, Sonic on the otherhand is buried in the fabric of her dress.

Then...

Then Rouge, having heard that with her naturally greater sense of hearing (she's a bat), says, "Eggman? What are you doing here?"

The only way we can undo the effects is with the power of the Chaos Emeralds."

112111111111221.title: "Those two female furballs have gotten huge!"

"I can help you look for them." Eggman suggests

"See this? This was the ring to reverse the effects on myself when I used the ring to see if it worked, the exact opposite wavelengths are in this one so I know this one will work. Now hand over the emeralds and start talking doctor."

After about five minutes of talking Eggman is dropped back down to the group. With 3 emeralds in her hand (She had one already) Rogue puts them in her pocket and pulls out the ring again.

They collided again the container hit the ceiling the ring fell out of it and landed on...
1121111111112211.title: Eggman learn to be quiet

Amy and Rogue both started to shake and watch as world around them got smaller. Amy was growing about twice as fast as Rogue.

"Great, so now the whiney brat is bigger than me!" Rogue yells.

At the end of the growing Rogue stands up at about 35 feet tall. About 10 feet taller then before. Amy on the other hand, her growth was longer and faster due to 2 rings. She stood at a whopping 64 feet tall, roughly a 40 foot increase, her growth had sped up, Rogue's head was above her waist while the others weren't standing taller then the sole of her shoe.

Amy was just wide eyed, her friends looked like ants to her and Rogue a little kid, speaking of which she grabbed her shook her untill the emeralds fell out and then with all her might she tossed Rogue out of the base, she didn't go far since they heard her fall not to far from the base.

"Amy I can't quite put my finger on it but I think...."

Sonic, Shadow, and Silver goto Cream's and everyone splits up

"Oh my... Amy you're getting bigger by the minute"! Sonic yelled.

1121111111112211112.title: Find the Chaos emeralds...again...................

With that she doved back into the water to shore.

1121111111112211112211.content:
"Ta-da! One my self!" Knuckles finished as he pulled out an emerald (Don't ask me where, they pull stuff out of nowhere all the time)

"Alright! So that just leaves two mored!"

"By the way, where's everyone else?"

Just as he said that a flash of light appeared and Sonic Silver and Shadow were standing there, along with an uncounsious Rouge (who was still 35 feet tall)

Then in the distance he saw the tornado along with eggman's flying egg-car. (Think STH from Xbox again)

Tails and Eggman hopped out with each of them holding emeralds (tails having 3)

Amy took the other Emeralds and walked up the shrine. Knuckles still at high alert, wtched over eggman.

"Well here goes..." She said aloud.

She closes her eyes. "I wonder...." She thought

Finally she makes her wish. "I wish that Rogue was back to her normal size, and that I could control my own." She said to herself

Finally, the emeralds glew brighter and shot a beam fo light at Amy and Rogue. When it was over, they saw Rogue shrinking back to normal.

"Let's see if it worked" Amy said to herself again.

She closed her eyes agin and imagined being her normal height, sure enough she shrank back to normal.

"It worked!" Amy yelled.

Sonic ran right up to her and hugged her. "Amy, thank goodness you're back to normal..."

"Oh sonic..." she said back while she hugged him.

1121111111112211112211.title: One step closer.... or are we done?

choices: In the middle of the night
11211111111122111122111.content:
(Word from writer of this chapter: I kinda screwed since i forgot about knuckles being there from the beggining so let's say that he got knocked out by rogue and forgot everything)

Anyway.....

After the group went the seperate ways, Amy came home to a nice cleaned up house.

"Wow, she even fixed the doorframe."

Walking towards the kitchen she decided to test out her new power some more. She looks on top of the fridge which was twice her size and saw a Sonic plush toy she had made

"Let's play 'Giant Girlfriend' my little Sonic." she said to the doll.

"Good thing this is a king size." She said before falling asleep
11211111111122111122111.title: Home again

112111111111221111221111.content:
Around 1 O' clock in the Morning Amy woke with a shock, she looked around, she thought she heard someone, getting out of bed she realised she was still 7 ft. tall. Shrinking down a couple of feet she went into the kitchen and she realised

she left the window open and that the wind knocked over a bottle of juice she was storing. Putting the bottle away she looked outside and saw Sonic's House in the distance, she needed to know- did he love her? was he running away to

hide his feelings? or just to keep her away from his battles with eggman?

"I can't take it anymore, it's time to find out, with a little dream trickery."

Walking outside her apartment at her normal height so she wouldn't cause panic if anyone was awake she ran out to the ciity limits and then right next to Sonic's house. Growing to 10 ft. Tall she looked into the House and saw Sonic lying

down on his bed with an unfinished chili dog on his nightstand.

"This is one dream that you won't wake up from in time to avoid disaster Sonic."

Concentrating even more she grew back too her final height of 70 ft which Sonic was oh so familiar with.

Reaching in carefully with her finger and thumb she grabbed Sonic who curled up into a ball.

"He must be dreaming hard"

with Sonic in hand, Amy walked slowly out towards the beach as to not wake him or anyone else with her footsteps.

In Sonic's mind he was imagining a World where eveything is at peace, so at peace right now that to him, Amy's fingers he thought were clouds picking him up to see the green world below him, until.......

"Sonic........"

Sonic (in his dream) came out of his trance and looked around, then he heared his name again, this time he realised it was Amy. "Sonic..... wake up! I need you!"

With that Sonic sprang up and looked around, he felt the cold night wind rushing past hi, and he saw the Ocean out in front of him.

"Amy?"

"Sonic..."

Sonic turned around and his face went blank.

"A-Amy- y-you're still h-huge!"

Amy in order to convince Sonic that he was still dreaming, spoke in a drawn out voice

"You said you wouldn't leave me when I am like this, look at me, you're off relaxing while I am left alone..."

To spook Sonic even more Amy started to grow and grow to make Sonic think that she was still under the effects from before.

"Amy, I said I wouldn't leave you, but I..."

"But what Sonic?" Amy said as she hit the 90 ft mark. "You were lying to me?" "Sonic if you really do care for me in this state, ask me this- do you actually care for me- no, do you love me?!"

Sonic was at a lost for words, Amy was getting bigger and bigger in size, he wasn't able to see the beach below so he thought that Amy was standing in the middle of the Ocean, he was too shocked to ask himself if he was still at his normal size.

Amy on the other hand knew she was getting to him, "cmon tell me" she thought. With that she started to grow even faster hitting not the 150 ft mark- double of what she started with.

"I-I...." Sonic stammered.

"You what Sonic?" Amy said bringing him up to her gigantic face.

"I- LOVE YOU! OK? I DO, BUT I'M TOO AFRAID TO ADMIT IT! BUT PLEASE, I CAN'T SEE YOU GO IN THIS MATTER! NO MATTER HOW YOU ARE I LOVE YOU, EVEN AS A GIANT!"

Sonic then lept off her hand and was heading for her nose

"That's all I needed to know" Amy thought.

With that she shrank as quickly as she could. "Amy?!" Sonic screamed.

As he fell she could see tears falling from his eyes.

With that she shrank to 70ft tall grabbed Sonic quickly then bumped him on his head, which put him back to sleep.

"Now to just tie up some loose ends."

Amy walked back to Sonic's house at 10ft tall holding Sonic against her chest. Putting him back in his bed she left the window open and unhooked the picture frame of him and the entire gang, and placed it next to his head, making it look like it fell on him.

Amy saw Sonic starting to wake up so she quickly grew to 20ft and ran off, not caring if anyone saw her.

"AAHHH!" Sonic screamed. Looking around he was in bed and next to him the frame, "ugh- my head, damn picture" Sonic grabbed the picture and looked at it- primarily at Amy, "tomarrow I need to tell her." Sonic said as he went back to sleep.
112111111111221111221111.title: Wakey Wakey....

1121111111112211112211111.content:
At Amy's apartment she was looking foward to see Sonic again, she finally knows the truth.

"Sonic, you are mine, after all this time...." she said with a smile.

Even though she was happy as she ever was before, it was true she was mad he didn't tell her earlier on his terms, but she quickly put that aside.

"Hmmm if I know Sonic, he'll come to me after that little scare, so I'll go about my normal daily routine and just wait for him."

Amy was normally patient so she would have no problem waiting.

Meanwhile at Tails' workshop.

"Hey you know I'm shy."

"Yeah yeah, well anyway, Rouge has her agent privileges suspended for trying to take control of the world and yadda yadda yadda, and now she's in government jail."

"You mean just with Rouge right? You told me yourself you liked having a Giant Amy."

"True."

"To tell you the truth, if I could've kept Amy taller, I would, for some reason... she...."

"R-right. Ahem* You think it would be better when you are hugging or kissing?"

"Better- and yeah, more of an 'experience'..."

"Well what are you standing around for? Go tell her!"

"Alright! Man I've never been told to hurry befor-"

"GOO!!!" Tails yelled.

With that Sonic bolted out the door.

"Hmmmm- taller Amy huh?"

Writer jumps into the story and smacks Tails on the face.*

"Oof! Right right we don't want to have a cliche."

"Yeah no 'Villain comes back' scenarios ok?"

"Gotcha, by the way when is-"

"Hey shhh don't let the reader's know what I have planned- lemme just tell you in the break room."

"Get me a cup of coffee I just need to check my wardrobe."

"Hey camera crew! You're suppose to be following Sonic not us! You little-"

Buzz* SHRRRRRRRRRR*

Back to Sonic now with Knuckles.

"So then I told Mario- huh? 'Bout time you guys got here!" Sonic says.

"Just go wiith it" says the writer.

"Man I hate these 4th wall breaking sketches" Knuckles added

"Hey watch it I'm still here."

"Sorry."

"ACTION!"

"So Knux that's the story."

"Wait weren't you suppose to start at-"

Punch*

"Oof! I mean... FINALLY!"

"I had a feeling you were going to say that."

"Look stop talking to me and just go find her! she's probrobly shopping or something right now!"

"Right- cya!"

zooms off*

"...and cut"

"Man, I need some water."

Walks away.

"Hey you idiots! Switch to camera 3!"

BZZZZZZZ* click*
1121111111112211112211111.title: Time to tell

11211111111122111122111111.content:
"i have to do this no matter how much i'm afraid....i have to tell her" says sonic to himself thinking over recent events.

"finally finally" thinks Amy

Sonic runs towards amy's house at full speed ready to tell her the truth........

"AMY!" yells sonic as he zooms in "amy i have to tell you something

"what is it sonic" says amy "well i've finally decided to tell you that......i....Love you" says sonic

112211.content:
" Note that this a possible ending to the story "

Rouge looked out over her star gleamed kingdom. She sat cross leg resting after ending the existence of another kingdom, and coming to rest on her old, lifeless home. She opened a single eye, now at her old height, surveying her once prosperous home. No children ran through the streets with expressions of glee on their face, no parents watched them with the eyes of a hawk, no, they all had met there final resting place under her foot, rear, or inside of her stomach. But a good portion had fled to the twilight cage ( see Sonic chronicles for details ). Who would think this whole thing had begone with her in the biggest depression of her life, due to her low success rate of jewel capture. Then one night, it all changed. She began to think back to that day, in which the fate of the universe was sealed.

Three days earlier...

Rouge turned and tossed under her decorated sheets, dreaming of how she had been failing so many attempts at theft. Unown to her, a small meteor fell free form towards the surface of the planet. Specifically towards the very complex that Rouge was currently calling her secret hideout. As the space rock entered earths gravitational pull, the rocky outer-coating broke of like the shell of an egg. It opened up to show a green slime that pulsed every second with a bluish tint that made it light up like a Christmas light. Many onlookers, including the many commanders of G.U.N, saw the object, and suspecting it to be a u.f.o, hoped in there cars and drove of to see the object. Soon the slime came to a crashing yet silent halt on the window frame of Rouge's room. Acting like it possessed a mind of it's own, it crawled through the crack in Rouges window, and made its way up onto her bed. It then broke of into three pieces and melted into Rouges skin, each one targeting a different organ. One went towards her stomach, and attached itself to said organ, making the stomach expandable and able to digest anything. The second and largest melted into her brain, changing her thoughts on life. And the final dissolved itself onto her heart, at that one point, making her virtually invulnerable to everything except love, and her new never ending appetite. She quickly arose from her bed, and said to herself.

" Man, this girl's got a need to feed ", as she walked towards the fridge and began zombishly ( I INVENTED A NEW WORD!!!!!!!!!!! XD ), devouring every object in the fridge, finally ending with the fridge itself. She was shocked for herself for a moment, and thought she would have to grow to lose all that weight, which ironically, it did, although the bloat disappeared all on its own. This soon escorted an evil grin showing up on her face, showing that the slime was doing its job. Within a single minute she had devoured every single object in the room, all without awaking anybody else, or gaining a single pound, except for the ones she gained from growing. She layed down a went through what had just occurred. She could now eat whatever she wanted, and not gain weight, but instead grow, and now that she had just eaten all that fernacher, she was on the verge of a huge growth spurt.

Outside...

A crowd of thirty or so gun soldier and the entire population of night folk stood outside, watching a team of twelve detectives searched the area. A scream erupted from the crowd as Rouge grew to the size of the building, and finally proceeded to devour the building. As many men woman and children pleaded for help, there crys fell on deaf ears, as soon the entire building was submerged in her bodily acids. She then grew again to the height of the building plus her own, plus everything that was inside. After rubbing her stomach from the taste of the skyscraper, she looked down the crowd of speech less soldiers. As she turned, stepping on the detectives around her feet, the residents all fled. Rouge however sat down, and pulled in the crowd, shoving every last man and women into her mouth, missing one small boy. As she swallowed the thousands of people, feeling them clamber down, and meeting their dooms, giving her a period to grow. She reached out and picked her teeth with a news helicopter, swallowing it afterwords. She then yawned and layed her 400 ft giantess body onto the pavement, crushing the child with her ass.

Where to now?

11411.content:
Sakura panted at the sight beneath her feet. Her rival Karin Kanzuki, was down beneath her feet, along with the rest of the park. She had become enormous! By her estimates, she was now at least 200 feet tall!

But how? The last thing she remembered was drinking a soda, waiting for Karin to arrive for their match. This was extremely strange.

Ignoring the screaming Karin for the moment, Sakura began to try and think exactly where this would have happened.

Last week, she had finally returned from Thailand to start her new semester. During that incident, she remembered teaming with the Muay Thai champion Sagat and the American Ken Masters to save her sensei Ryu from the hands of the sinister M. Bison. No, nothing unusual there, except for the disappointment at Ryu retreating into training to overcome something he called the "Satsu no Hado". She never even got that match he promised her!

Then she flew home with her other "sensei" Dan Hibiki. So what if the guy didn't know a thing about martial arts? He took Sakura all over the world, or at least he did until last week.

"If my student is going to be here, then I'll just set up a Saiyuki-dojo in town here!

"That's really not necessary, Hibiki-sensei..."

"Yeah it is! And I'll even get to sell this cola I found!"

"Cola?"

"Yeah, Saiyuki energy cola! Straight from Thailand! Some guy named Birdie sold it to me."

And then, about an hour ago, while waiting for Karin, she drank a can of Dan's cola...from Thailand...where Bison and his drug empire was...

"DAN HIBIKI!"
11411.title: Rewind

choices: She doesn't find Dan, but she finds...
114112.content:
Standing to her full height, Sakura was preparing to head over to "sensei's" dojo and crush it into a billion pieces, which really wouldn't be too different from all the other times she and Dan sparred. But then she remembered the minute screaming form of Karin below her. She deserved an explanation, even if it wasn't exactly something she'd swallow.

*********************************************************

"And that's how I got big."

"You're joking, right? Cola coming from a crime syndicate sold by your idiot-sensei?"

Sakura sweatdropped. "Well, I am big, aren't I?"

"Very," replied Karin. "But what makes you so sure it was this Saiyko crud that did it?"

Sitting down in the park with a large THUMP as she landed, Sakura moved into a position to better explain.

"I drank it, and a bit spilled onto my clothes. I figured any other way, I wouldn't, y'know..."

"Have clothes?"

"Right."

"So I suppose this means our match is postponed."

"Well, we could fight, but it wouldn't exactly be fair..." laughed Sakura.

Sighing, Karin relented. "OK, fine. You're off the hook for now Girlzilla. But the second we're the same size, I'm going to defeat you and prove the superiority of the Kanzuki clan! But I'm tagging along."

"WHAT?!"

"I have to make sure that you don't try anything. Besides, for all I know this was part of some weird experiment so you wouldn't have to fight."

Sighing, Sakura stood back up and extended her hand, allowing Karin to climb into it. "OK, climb aboard."

Karin mounted Sakura's enormous hand as she raised it to her shoulder. With Karin in tow, Sakura marched off towards the Saiyuki dojo, and towards the clueless Dan Hibiki.
114112.title: Tagging along, with a catch...

choices: Sakura listens to Dan's reasoning.  Big is good

1141121.content:
Not too far away from Sakura's high school, renovation of an old, beat up store was taking place. Dan Hibiki, in his trademark pink gi and his brown hair back in a ponytail, was on a ladder painting the new sign for what he hoped to be his newest branch of Saiyuki-dojos. In addition, he was hoping it would be a place for him to sell Saiyuki energy cola.

"Yahoo! I knew Master Gouken said I would never amount to anything, but this'll show the guy! Now, where is that pupil of mine?"

As if to answer his question, an ominous rumble shook the street, and sent him, along with the ladder, falling to the ground. When he looked up, he saw an enormous sneaker right in front of him. Looking further up, he saw a massive feminine leg, toned through what looked like a lot of exercise. And a bit further up was her skirt, giving him a direct view of...

"SENSEI!"

Standing up, he noticed the face that the enormous body belonged to.

"Uh, well if it isn't my star pupil, hehehe. I had no ideas kids in Japan grew so fast."

"THEY DON'T!" shouted Sakura, the sheer force of her voice knocking him to the ground. "Your Saiyako-crud soda made me a giant!"

"Really? That wasn't on the label..."

Up until this point, Sakura had always found Dan dimwitted, but she could never bring herself to outright hate the guy. But this was a completely different story.

With extremely little effort, Sakura picked the diminutive martial artist up between her fingers, lifting her up to her face.

"OK, give me one good reason why I should't give you a harder beating than usual..."

Dan was sweating bullets as Sakura angrily looked at her. He knew he was done for, unless he said something quickly.

"Hey, aren't you a lot stronger this way?"

"Huh?" Both Sakura and Karin looked at Dan with a surprised look as he continued.

"I mean, come on! At that size, what could hurt you? Not another martial artist, I'll tell you that much!"

114112121.content:
Dan held his head. He thought for sure his double kick would bruise Sakura, but her kick knocked him right into a wall!

Then he thought that his signature Gadoken fireball would hurt her. No, it didn't travel very far, but it did hurt when it connected!

Unfortunately for Dan, he was picked up by the head between two of Sakura's fingers, negating any chance to get close enough to attack.

"S...Sakura, come on! What's the problem?"

"What's the problem? It's bad enough I'm huge, but you were about to sell this crap to the whole city!"

"But didn't you want to be stronger?"

"Yeah, but not like this! I mean, I was already making progress with normal training. Karin can't even touch me now..."

From atop Sakura's shoulder, Karin pouted.

"Sorry..."

"No, go on. Tell the world how great you are..."

Sakura sighed, but then turned her attention back to Dan.

"What would have done if you made the entire city huge?"

"That's obvious isn't it? I'd find the guy who sold me the cola, get an antidote, and charge him for it."

With a distinct nonchalant approach, Sakura threw Dan through the roof of his Sayiko dojo, leaving a huge hole in it and knocking him out.

"I don't know how I got involved with him..."

"Now what?" asked Karin.

"Well, your family is rich. Can't they help me get back to normal?"

"Oh ho, and why should I help you?"

Grinning, Sakura replied, "Because you'll never defeat a giantess in a fight."

Karin nodded. "Alright, you win this round. But the second that you're tiny, I'm going to show you who the strongest is!"

1141121212.content:
Four hours later...

Dan finally awoke from being thrown through the roof of his own dojo. He was pretty sure his arm was broken. He was also sure Sakura wouldn't be coming back for at least a few days.

"Well, so much for my grand opening. Guess I should head to the (huff) hospital."

Although the pain did convince him that his arm was broken, Dan wasn't entirely convinced that it was his cola that made Sakura huge. There had to be some other explanation, like food poisoning, or communism.

Taking a small bag filled with cans of Saikyo cola, Dan stood up and began to walk the two blocks to the hospital. Not only would he save money on a cab, he might make a little cash and prove his innocence.

And just as Dan predicted, someone did buy his 25 cent cola. But whom?

11411212122112.content:
At first, Mai was stunned. The attention, the rapid shift in scale, and the flashing of cameras did little except confuse her.

Followed by the confusion was a brief assessment of her situation. She was 200 feet tall, in the middle of a city. While Mai was never what one would call modest, the attention was surprising even to her.

Then the surprise gave way to a rather mischevious realization. At this size, she could do whatever she wanted to the area around her. If one of those little perverts tried anything too dirty, she could flick him away. If anyone tried to fight her normally, they'd be no match for her. And if her boyfriend Andy Bogard tried to distance himself from her again, well, she'd make sure he was hers, forever...

Looking down at the miniscule people, Mai laughed, relishing her newfound power over the world.

The Bogard twins are standing in line at a register...

"So... youre FINALLY gonna go through with this little date with Mai, eh bro?" Andy's twin brother, asks him.

Andy grabs a boquet of roses and a bottle of champaign and waits in line, "Ive been avoiding her for TOO long! Maybe it's time I finally stop running... and just let her catch me!" he says with a smile.

He puts his stuff down on the register and the cashier scans them, "So.. going on a date eh?"

"That's right...uh..." Andy reads the guys nametag, "..Aerodeth! Im looking forward to an awesome night if you know what I mean!"

The cashier just smiles, "Well... wish you the best of luck! Have fun!" After paying the cashier, Andy waves goodbye and steps out... the cashier just scratches the ankh tattoo on his cheek and smiles, "Man... is he gonna FREEEEAAAAK!!"

Meanwhile, Andy walks out and takes a deep breath, "..Well... here goes nothing!" As he heads off... a humongous foot stops him in his tracks!!! Andy's jaw drops as he looks up.... that foot belongs to a HUUUUUUUUUUGGGGEEEE friend of his... MAI!!!

1141121212211222.content:
The normally calm, stoic Andy Bogard began trembling like a rock caught in an earthquake as he looked into the air.

"Oh, is that for me?" asked Mai as she looked down at the half-empty bottle of champagne and boquet of flowers Andy held.

"Uh...uh, yeah! Yeah! I wanted to get you something nice! You know, so...uh..."

Smiling down at her tiny boyfriend, Mai picked up the boquet and champange bottle between two massive fingers, grinning at her awestruck boyfriend.

"Oh, how sweet!" she exclaimed, putting the flowers behind her ear and the champange bottle snugly between her breasts. "Well, shall we get started?"

Every brain cell in Andy's body came up with the same message, "RUN". Unfortunately, his body didn't react to his brain. He couldn't run. He couldn't even call his brother for help. All he could do was stammer out something that sounded similar to "Ok."

"Good!" With a firm grip, Mai's powerful hand picked up the tiny Bogard, lifting him higher and higher into the air. All Andy saw was a quickly moving blur before he was bought up to the gleaming face of his master's daughter/love interest. Her rosy lips moved flawlessly as she announced her intentions.

"Oh, we're gonna have fun!"

114112121221122221.content:
Sakura was going to go with Karin and get an antidote. Really, she was.

But when she saw yet another giantess walking the streets in clothing most people couldn't possibly look good in, her interest was piqued. Casually, the 200 foot tall schoolgirl strolled over to where Mai was, despite Karin's objections.

"Oh, you mean my dear Andy?" the woman replied. Opening her hand, the woman revealed a handsome blond-haired man, looking up at Sakura with a mixture of shock and amazement.

The high school girl couldn't help but be surprised. "Wow! He's so cute at that size!"

"I know!" replied Mai. "But, I hope you'll understand if I say you can't touch."

Andy sighed a breath of relief in Mai's hand. Dealing with one giant girl would be a lot easier than dealing with two.

"Then again, he did have a brother that looked OK. He'd be perfect for you!"

Andy gulpled, all too knowledgable of who Mai was talking about.

"You think so?" asked Sakura.

"Sure! Last time I saw him he was by a supermarket three blocks from here. Tell you what, you go pick him up, and we'll all have a bit of fun."

Sakura nodded, and ran off. "Thanks!"

"Nice girl," remarked Mai as she watched Sakura run off. "Now, Andy, where were we?"

Andy didn't reply.

"Aww...youre not him?" Sakura says with a frown, "But I've been told he was here a while ago..."

Terry continues, "Uh...um... yes.. he WAS here! But he um... had to go somewhere.. uh... last time I saw him... he was headed for uh...Canada!" He better hope to god she's THAT stupid!

"Canada, eh? Thanks man!" Heh! She is! And with that, she heads off... nearly trampling all the cars in the parking lot!

Terry breathes a sigh of relief! Dan nudges his shoulder, "Heh! Good one, Ken!"

"Um... didnt any o'yall just see a gigantic girl come stomping through here a minute ago?"

The two turn their heads to see.... a blonde guy in black... black pants, black sunglasses, black jacket with no shirt, and wearing a black hat atop his head! ...JOHNNY!!!! From the game, 'Guilty Gear'!! Yet ANOTHER rival fighting game!

Dan immediately bows to him, "Good day, sir! I am Dan Hibiki and this is my friend, Ken Iforgothislastname!"

"TERRY BOGARD!" Terry shouts! Johnny puts his hand to his hat as a sort of greeting, "Howdy! Whatcha been up to?"

Dan sighs, "We are on a quest to save the world from a pair of evil gigantic women that dare threaten it! We need help, dear stranger! Can you please help us on our quest?"

Johnny removes his shades and stares at Dan, "...gigantic women? Count me in! C'mon guys! Allow me to take ya'll for a ride my fancy airship... the Jellyfish!"

Terry sighs, "We appreciate it, sir!"

Dan takes the opportunity of selling his damn tainted drink, "You must be thirsty wearing that sweaty suit all the time... would you be interested in purchasing a can of my patented 'Saikyo Cola'? Only 25 cents a can!"

Johhny just raises an eyebrow... "..Nah, Im watching ma carbs... but Dizzy might want some!"
1141121212211222211.title: Yet ANOTHER Crossover!

11411212122112222111.content:
"And that's the story."

"Well I'll be. Sounds more like a case for a marriage counselor than a bounty hunter! Don't know why pinkie is so scared of them. I don't suppose your bro and the girl ever sat down and spoke about it."

"Nope," replied Terry. "My brother isn't exactly the type that's open with his emotions, you know what I mean." Johnny replied with a simple nod, looking on at both Terry and Dan.

The spacious deck of the Jellyfish, Johnny's private ship, swayed in a sea dock despite the fact that it was meant for air travel. Then again, the ship was probably the least bizzare thing either of them had seen today. Sure the ship could fly. Sure Johnny was the only man on board. It was still getting a good breeze.

"Well I'll tell you what, I could help you guys out, but I really don't see what going in guns blazing is gonna do other than create a whole load of crap and dead bodies and other...ugh."

"Last thing I need is ANOTHER lawsuit," replied Dan. "Well, at least Sakura's out of the way."

"How long before you she realizes we were lying?" asked Terry.

"Eh, beats me."

The three continued to discuss the basics of what they hoped would eventually free Andy from Mai's clutches, when Dan noticed someone approaching him.

"Johnny, you didn't tell anyone what you planned on doing. Who are these two?"

"Oh, Dizzy, right, how forgetful of me. This is Dan and Terry. We're currently planning to rescue Terry's brother from an unimaginable creature."

"Sounds scary."

"Like you wouldn't believe," muttered Terry.
11411212122112222111.title: Avoiding ANOTHER lawsuit

choices: ...hey... IS IT true what they say??!!
114112121221122221112.content:
--Meanwhile on the date with Mai and Andy--

Good news... the date seems to go pretty well! Andy is being friendly and affectionate to his gigantic girlfriend, and Mai is being gentle and kind to her tiny boyfriend! Everything is JUUUUSSTTT fine...

Currently, the two sit next to eachother in a fancy restaurant.. of course there are LOTS of stares and shivers in terror of a humongous woman sitting down on her knees trying to avoid hitting her head on the ceiling!! God only knows how she got inside there in the first place!!

Anyway... a waiter with an obviously bad French accent and a familiar ankh tattoo on his face walks up to them.
"How may ah take yah ordear?"
Andy just looks at him strangely, "..Hey.. werent you that same guy from the supermarket?!"

The waiter just smiles, "I vas fi'ered, ofter le millionaire lottery-ticket weener throtened to sue le store! Now vut would you like to dine on tonight?"

Andy looks through his menu guide, "I'll uh.. have a filet mignon.. 10oz... Medium-well... with a baked potato."

Waiter writes on a sheet of paper, "Excellent... now wut about YOU madmoiselle?"
Mai just shakes her head, "Nothing for me, thanks! I allready brought my dinner!"

"Very waul.... your odairs are coming up!" and with that, the waiter walks out.... Andy just stares up at Mai, "So... hows it like being big?"

"AWESOME!!" she says with a grin! That huge grin of hers only creeped Andy out even more... so he decided to change the subject, "Uh... hey, you said you allready brought your dinner... where is it?"

"Right here!" she reaches downbetween her breasts and pulls out a HUUUUUUUUUGGGGGEEE bottle of Saki!! Andy's jaw drops at the sight of it!! He tries to stop his shivering by holding onto his plate...

Mai twists the top off of the bottle and takes a BIG swig of it!!! After a nice long chug, she wipes her lips with her arm, "AAAHHH...." then brings her head down almost an inch away from Andy's!!!

She grins at him, "Say.... is it true what they about white guys???"

After hearing those words, he grips his plate so tight it shatters into pieces!!!
114112121221122221112.title: Date with Destiny!!

choices: Terry goes to beat Dan's head in
No time for that, Andy needs to be saved from Mai's clutches!
1141121212211222211121.content:
"Wait, wait wait! THAT'S YOUR PLAN?!"

Terry couldn't believe his ears. Dan, grinning like an idiot, nodded at every detail while trying to sell Johnny's crewmate some of that soda.

"Look, I've seen a lot of weird plans, but you really think that sneaking Andy away from her is going to work?"

"Well, it's obvious that she won't pay attention to us unless your bro is out of the picture. So we move in, sneak Andy out, and the rest is just yours truly talking some sense into the woman."

"You don't know Mai obviously," replied Terry. "Common sense doesn't apply to her where Andy is concerned. She'll smash the whole city!"

"And you've never seen the master at work with the ladies," smugly replied Johnny. "I'll calm her down. All we need to do is find her, get Andy out, and I'll do the rest. Isn't that right Dizzy?"

"Hmm?"

Turning around, Terry and Johnny saw the young girl drinking something from a pink cola can. Dan couldn't help but grin.

"Told you I could sell it."

"No you didn't," replied an obviously annoyed Terry. Standing up from the table, he prepared to walk up to the young girl to see exactly what is was Dan sold her, only to find himself even with her waist.

"Well I'll be," replied a confused Johnny. "What did Danny boy put in there?"

Terry groaned, putting two and two together. "You need to get off this ship."

"Why?" asked the young girl, confused at Terry's sudden orders.

"Because if you stay here, you won't fit. And we'll all die."

"That's a pretty good reason."
1141121212211222211121.title: That's your plan?!

choices: Dan just continues to flirt with Undine...
11411212122112222111212.content:
--Meanwhile with Sakura--

She heads off in the direction that she believes leads to Canada... but just then she stops in her tracks and thinks to herself, "..WAIT A MINUTE!!!!"

--Back with our heroes--

"Great..... JUUUSSTTT great!!" Terry flips out at Dan while a humongous Dizzy is just staring down at them, "Why in the hell did you just do that??!!!"

Dan starts to blush, "Uh... cuz I got bills to pay?"
Terry tries DESPERATELY not to put his fist through Dan's face, while Johnny tries to comfort Dizzy, "Now dont you worry ya prettly lil head about this, my lady! I promise ya, we will find a cure!"

Dizzy doesnt look worried at all.. in fact.. she's smiling! "Actually, I dont mind this new me at all! In fact, I feel so... LIBERATED!! Perhaps with my new body, I can rule this planet and watch over it... YEAH! I'll ensure peace all over the world!!!"

Johnny just smiles, "Ya got some nice ambitions there!"

However, Dizzy's black wing changes into it's Grim Reaper form: Necro and speaks, "NO! HUMANS WILL NEVER SEE REASON FOR PEACE! THEY MUST ALL BE DESTROYED!!" Dizzy's white wing changes into it's beautiful blueish maiden form: Undine and says, "AWWW, MUST ALL OF THEM DIE? CAN WE AT LEAST SPARE THE TINY ONE IN PINK? I THINK HE'S KINDA CUTE!"

Dan just kisses Undine's humongous finger that's pointing at him and says, "It is more than a pleasure to meet such a lovely goddess of beauty like yourself, ma'am!"

Necro glares at him while Undine just blushes and giggles.... then pulls out a tiny piece of paper with her phone number on it and hands it to Dan, "CALL ME, LITTLE ONE!"

Dan just grins, runs a hand through his hair, and slips the paper down his Gi! Necro growls, "GRRRR... YOU CALL HER YOU DIE, PINKIE!!!!"

Meanwhile, Terry just whispers to Johnny, "So... got any more bright ideas in that head of yours?"

Johnny whispers back, "Well.... dere might be one good one in here.... we gotta fine... THE WISE MAN!"
11411212122112222111212.title: Looking for love in all the wrong places!

choices: They're able to get to the address without an issue
They run into a certain schoolgirl on the way
114112121221122221112121.content:
An unusual air of silence overtook the room as Johnny mentioned "The wise man." Even Undrine and Dan stopped their fliritng to pay attention. Terry however, was unimpressed.

"Well, it can't be any less ridiculous than everything else that's happened."

"Yeah, now the only problem is actually finding the bastard," replied Johnny. "He might be hanging around the city, or he might be hundreds of miles from this place."

"That really narrows it down," groaned Terry.

"Yeah, well I don't see you coming up with any good ideas, Mr. big shot hero. I know that whatever was in that crap Danny boy was selling, he'll know how to fix."

"Fine, whatever. Just give me his address so I can find him and end this crap."

Nodding, Johnny took out a piece of paper and wrote down an address on it.

"Here you go. Downtown. Apartment by the buisness district. He doesn't like to stay in any one place for too long, so I'd hurry."

Walking out towards, the city, Terry grabbed Dan's ear, dragging him forward.

"OW! Ken, what are ya doin?"

"You're coming with me. I don't trust you without being supervised."

"Hey! Wait! I was..."

"Save it!" shouted Terry as he walked off. Dizzy could only look on confused.

"Dan's friend needs to calm down. He's way too high-strung."

"Don't I know it," replied Johnny.
114112121221122221112121.title: The elusive man

choices: How will ANY of them get out of this mess?!
1141121212211222211121212.content:
--Parts Unknown--
Birdie: Ok, I convinced Pinky to sell the tainted formula.. now what?
???: Has he gotten others to drink it?
Birdie: Uh.. yeah! Some school girl, a woman with huge knockers, and some chick with wings...
???: Very good... the formula should take effect inside its hosts in 3....2....1...

--Meanwhile with Terry and Pinky--
Terry reads the address on the little paper, "Ok... it shouldnt be far from here.. Dan, you packed a map? ....Dan?"
He turns his head and sees Dan talking on a cell-phone! "Hiya Undine... it's me, Danny boy! So... whatcha wearing?"

Terry grits his teeth and swipes Dan's phone, "Uh, Dan cant come to the phone right now. He's come down with a bad case of crabs!" *BEEP!*

"HEY!!" Dan yells, "I was in the middle of a very important call!!"
"We need to be concentrating on finding this wise guy so we can save Andy, now-"
*THHHUUUUUUUDDDDD!!!*

Uh oh... that was a LOUD foot stomp.. coming from a certain giant school girl... standing RIGHT in front of our little heroes!!

Terry's jaw drops,"...Oh...." so does Dan's, "...snap!"

Sakura just stares down at them... with eerie dilated pupils, "...CANADA, EH????!!!!!"

--Meanwhile at with Andy's date--

Andy seems to be enjoyed his steak, and Mai seems to be enjoying her Saki! Everything's going along smoothly.... just then, Mai flinched!

"Hmm..." Andy looked up at her, "Mai? Are you ok?"

She looks down, "..Huh? ...OH! Yeah, Im fine, dont worry! Now, where were we.... AAHHH!!" She flinched again!

Andy starts getting concerned, "Mai, is something wrong?" ...Just then.. Mai looks down at Andy with eerie dilated pupils... and grins wickedly! With a swipe of her hand, she sends the table flying!! Hundreds of people scream and run!

"Mai!! What's gotten into you?" Andy asked her. She just grinned at Andy, "...CLOTHES...OFF!"
"Uh...what?"
"CLOTHES OFF!!! NOW!!!"

Andy jumps back, "WHAT?!! Are you kidding?! At YOUR size? In front of all these people?! Mai, cut that out right no-"

Mai just glared at him, "..DID I NOT JUST GIVE YOU AN ORDER??!!" She slams her fist to the ground... BARELY missing Andy! All the customer's run out of the restaraunt screaming..."NOW TAKE THEM OFF!!"

Andy just shakes in terror and starts removing his suit, "Y..y..y..yes ma'am!"
1141121212211222211121212.title: Nasty Taste... Nastier side-effect!

choices: What terror does Sakura have in store?
Someone saves Terry before she can act
11411212122112222111212121.content:
Both Dan and Terry were at a loss for words as they faced the rather annoyed Sakura. Neither of them knew what to expect from the giant schoolgirl, only that it wouldn't be pretty.

"Dan, you talk to her."

"WHAT?! Why me? I have somewhere to go later!"

"Well, you're her master, or ex-master, right? She probably respects you."

The fear on Dan Hibiki's face quickly turned into a smug grin. "Yeah, you're right! She respects me! She'll definetely listen to what I have to say!"

"No go calm her down!"

Dan moved forward, but after only three steps, Sakura's gigantic foot landed directly in front of him, throwing his body to the side with a powerful shockwave, the noise ripping through Terry's ears. With no hesistation, Sakura turned her attention to Terry.

"Well?"

Terry was speechless. "Look, about the Canada thing, it was a joke! I mean, you didn't find it funny?"

Sakura just looked on at him with the same odd look. "OK, maybe you didn't. Come on. There's gotta be a way I can make it up to you."

In a flash, Sakura's hand moved towards Terry, grabbing him and positioning Terry right next to her face.

"You want to make it up to me? OK."
11411212122112222111212121.title: Making it up?

114112121221122221112121212.content:
That wicked grin on Sakura's face tells Terry something BAD in in store for him...

Just then, *POOF!* he disappears!

***

"Hey... WAKE THE HELL UP! This is no damn inn!!"
"uUugghh...." Terry slowly wakes up to the sound of a gruff, Russian accent yelling at him! ...That's when he notices a man staring down at him...

A slightly tall man with long black hair and black pupils, wearing some kind of dark-tribal robe and
a black garb covering his mouth.
"Huh? Who are you?" Terry asked him. The man just tsks at him, "Tsk! Who am I?! Im the man that just saved you from becoming possibly the first human vibrator or something just as gross... UUGGGHHH!!"

Terry looks around at where he's at... "...uh... where am I?"

The man just rolls his eyes, "Let's see... a gypsy tent... a crystal ball... religious symbols hanging from the ceiling... candles in a certain order... and a host with an accent... hmmm.. AH! YOURE AT TACO BELL!!! ..and I can tell you where you can stick your chalupa.."
Terry gets REALLY sick of this guy's sour attitude, "Look sir! Im not here to put up with your crap! Im just looking for some wise man to help me save my brother and quite possibly the planet from some creepy giant women..."

The man just smiles, "Ah.. dont tell me... Terry Bogard.. your brother, Andy is at the mercy of an obsessive woman, Mai Shiranui, that crushes on him and has turned gigantic because of some guy in pink that sold her a drink tainted by the foulest waters..."

Terry just stares at him shocked, "Whoa whoa whoa WHOA! How did you know all that?!!!"
He continues to grin, "I am that wise man, you towheaded moron! Uranus the Wise at your service!" he bows to Terry!

Terry sighs, "..Great.."
Uranus continues, "...Hmm.. I see this drink that your pink-wearing wussy friend sells is made of the cursed water of a lake that is the home of a very wicked deity plotting revenge for her imprisonment..."

"...REALLY now??" Terry hangs on to every word, "Go on.."

"Sorry," Uranus stops, "But the 30 second free trial is up. To hear the full reading, it will cost you!"
"How much?"
"40 bucks."
Terry checks his pockets... but nothings in them. "Sorry, I aint got any money..."

Uranus thinks, "Hmm... well.. there is an ALTERNATIVE to paying me.." and smiles a bit.
"Uh... what kind of alternative," Terry asks out of curiosity.
114112121221122221112121212.title: Uranus the Wise Man (or Wise-Ass!)

1141121212211222211121212121.content:
"Well, what do I have to do?"

The man laughed at Terry's outburst, but finally replied. "You must go get me something. You see, a few months ago, I was...relieved of a very important item by a few idiots who thought it was worth something. I need you to return it."

"And then you'll tell me how to save my brother?"

"That depends on the condition the item is in. If you really screw up, I might just leave you with the overly horny schoolgirl."

"You wouldn't!" shouted a livid Terry.

"Tsk, tsk, tsk, tsk. You should know better than to speak to your elders that way, young man."

"Alright, where do I go?"

Before Terry could recieve a response, his vision began to blur, and he found himself in front of a large building in what looked to be the outskirts of the city."

"Well, this looks promising," he mumbled to himself.
1141121212211222211121212121.title: The quest....

choices: What the hell?! This aint it!!!
11411212122112222111212121211.content:
Terry has a bad feeling for what's in store for him inside this building... but it's either this or it's 'Miniture Sex-Ed 101' for a certain gigantic student!

However, just when he's about to go step in... someone else steps out! A darkish figure...

A creepy guy in odd clothing... grey skin, long black hair, reddish eyes, wearing what looks for suitable for a goth chick, carrying a big-ass red scythe, and a crow resting on his right shoulder (Testament... another character of the 'Guity Gear' series)

Both him and Terry lock eyes for a moment... until Testament just says unemotionally, "Whatever youre looking for, it's still in there... I didnt touch it." amd just walks off...

Terry turns his head and wonders, "Who was that guy?" He just shakes his head and steps inside the building... unaware of the horrors that lie inside!

Dead bodies were all over the place!!! Internal organs were ripped out their bodies!! Hell, even one person was strangled to death with their own intestine!! The walls were covered in blood... some walls have phrases written in the victims' blood like "Death to the Human Oppressors" and "Long Live Goddess Myria"!! ...Goddess Myria??!! Who in the hell could THAT be?!

Terry looks to the ground... and finds what looks to be a black hexagon-shaped artifact with a strange symbol on each side... something in his head told him that THIS was the item Uranus was talking about... the second Terry grabbed it, he disappeared in a cloud of smoke yet again!

***

Terry reappears back at the wise man's humble abode... he told Uranus what he saw.. but he didnt seem all that interested.

"Yes yes that's terrible and all," Uranus says unphazed, "They didnt deserve to die et cetra et cetra, now did you find my item or not?!"

"You mean THIS?" Terry pulls the artifact out of his pocket and shows it to him...
11411212122112222111212121211.title: Encounter with the Dark One

choices: Terry makes him get to the "stop the giants" part.
114112121221122221112121212111.content:
"Ah yes," replied the old man as he looked at the object, "the part of my sign for the store that was taken out."

"WHAT?!"

"If it makes you feel better", replies Uranus, "it's also a charm that wards off evil spirits so I can work here in peace."

"Seriously?"

"Seriously. Now, what did you want help with again?"

Sighing, Terry answered. "My brother. Big trouble because his girlfriend grew humongous and is probably going to do something horrible to him."

"Well, if it makes you feel better, it will only enhance her feelings regarding a close aquaintance."

Terry's eyes grew wide. "Crap! I gotta do something!"

Uranus didn't move as he stared at the panic strikcen Bogard.

"That won't help," he calmly replied. "You have no idea what you're facing."

"Then tell me how to!"

"Well, first I must explain exactly what it is you face."

"No time for that! Tell me how to shrink those girls NOW!"
114112121221122221112121212111.title: Must there be an explanation?

choices: Andy's crying like a girl by now!!!
1141121212211222211121212121111.content:
Uranus just stares at Terry with an unphazed expression and snaps his fingers... and in a split second Terry disappears...

***

...and reappears in Giant Sakura's grip!!! She smiles down at him with a wicked grin and dilated pupils, "Oh goody... my little toy is back!! Now we can resume having fun!!!"

Terry just lets out a bloodcurtling scream! ...then disappears again! "Aww... not again," Sakura sighs in disappointment.

***

"AAAAAHHH-huh?" Terry's back in Uranus's lair! "Now sit down, shut up, AND LISTEN!!" the man shouts!

"Ok ok! FINE!"

Uranus waves his hand over his crystal ball, "I see an evil presence biding it's time... each day that passes it grows stronger... the tainted river that imprisons it's blood shall soon be consumed... those that drink of it's blood become poisoned... when the entire river is drained and consumed by humans.. IT will be free!!"

Terry starts to wonder... could IT have anything to do with that creepy she-male he met back at that building a while ago???? And this 'Myria' person?!!!

"Who? What will be free?" Terry asks.

Uranus just leaves him in suspence, "Perhaps later. Right now, we must focus on saving your brother! Not to mention the pink wuss and the seductive cowboy!"
"Johnny and Dan?"
"Yeah that's them!" the man answers, "I see they now have problems of their own... you, Mr. Bogard, are all they can depend on to save them!"

"Ok, but first I gotta save Andy!" Terry demands, "Where is he?! Is he ok?! Did Mai uh... hurt him in any way?"

Uranus just grins and looks into his crystal ball, "Let us find out, shall we?"

And so they saw...
1141121212211222211121212121111.title: Gazing into his ball...

11411212122112222111212121211112.content:
The world spun around Terry once more, giving him slight nausea. When he could see clearly again, Terry found himself inside a rather fancy restaurant.

Or rather, what was left of it. Tables and chairs were cracked into splinters and thrown in every direction. Any sign of human activity was now gone.

Except for the screaming blonde in the corner, and the naked 200 foot tall woman looming above him. The blonde's face wore a look of dread, as if he was facing an event that he was completely unready for.

"Please, Mai! Look, can't we talk this over?"

The giantess shook her head. "Andy, you made me wait way too long. And now I'm gonna get everything that you owe me."

"Couldn't it wait until, I dunno, you were normal size?" begged Andy, holding back tears.

"Actually," replied Mai, "I think it'll be more fun this way, little man."

Terry had to keep his jaw from hitting the floor. Quickly, he turned to Uranus.

"Do something!"

"Do something?" replied the old man, feigning ignorance. "Oh, you mean stop the girl from turning your brother into her pleasure-toy.

"YES!"

"Well, I don't know, it seems like he has stood her up for way too long. Maybe he does need his eyes opened."

"What are you talking about?!" yelled Terry. "Help him!"
11411212122112222111212121211112.title: Making her wait too long

114112121221122221112121212111121.content:
Uranus sighs, "Ok, fine. Just be thankful you've caught me on a VERY generous day!" He looks over and sees a humongous nearly-empty bottle of Saki lying in a corner of the room. "I have a poison with me that'll put her to sleep for a few hours. I need you to distract her while I slip it in her drink!"

"Ok! Got it!" Terry slowly steps up to the giant Mai staring down at Andy. Although he might be just as terrified as his brother right now (fat chance!) he just cant stand to watch his little bro suffer! Unlike some OTHER older brothers out there, HE'S one of the good ones!

Terry shouts, "HEY MAI!!!!!!" Mai turns her head at Terry. Andy turns his head to him and smiles in relief, "Terry! What are you doing here?"
Terry smiles, "Oh, I uh... I just came to congradulate the two newly-weds!" Andy's smile drops, "uh...excuse me?"

Terr just continues, "Oh yeah! Um... uh... what kind of a brother-in-law would I be if I never showed up to pay a visit to my favorite sister-in-law? I umm.. wanted to be there to see Andy propose right in front of my eyes!"

Mai smiles and looks down at Andy, "Wow... is this TRUE?!!! YOURE REALLY GONNA..." He was determined to shout HELL NO, but after seeing Terry wink at him, he decided to play along, "Uh... YEP! I was just about to propose.. you know.. uh.. before you uh..."

"YES!!! I KNEW IT!!! I KNEW YOU WERE GOING TO SOONER OR LATER!!!!!" Mai jumps up and down in joy.. causing minor earthquakes to erupt! Terry looks through the corner of his eye and sees Uranus remove his garb and hack some strange black stuff into the giant Saki bottle!
The old man then mouths, 'NOW!'.

"Uh... I propose a toast!" Terry grabs an open bottle of shampagne off the floor and raises it in salute, "To a happy wedding, an even happier honeymoon, and to years of... uh... happiness!"

Mai grabs her Saki bottle and raises it salute as well.. and takes a sip of it........... *THUD!!!* "Zzzzzzzzzzzz..."

Andy breathes a sigh of relief! "Terry!!! I knew you'd come to save me!"
"Yeah, I couldnt have done it without..... uh.." Terry looks around. Uranus isnt there! "Hey, where is he?"

"No time for that now!" Andy grabs Terry's arm, "We gotta get outta here before she wakes up!" And so they haul ass out of the restaurant.. only to see an almost completely trampled city outside! Buildings destroyed, cars flattened, riots break out, fires everywhere... great... now who made THIS mess?!!!
114112121221122221112121212111121.title: Halleluey....Halala...Honolulu...uh... YAY!!

1141121212211222211121212121111211.content:
The Bogards could only look on dumbfounded at the chaos that had emerged outside. Andy's expression was one of horror and revulsuion, while Terry's was more one of annoyance.

"If I had know this crap was gonna happen, I wouldn't have gotten up."

"Well," replied Andy, still recovering from his horror earlier, "what did this?"

"Either Godzilla decided to show up, or..."

"You're a bad toy, you know that? You can't just run off when I want to play."

The voice made Terry want to hit something. "THAT."

"That?" asked a confused Andy. "What's 'that?'"

"A monster that makes Mai look like, I dunno..."

"Blue Mary?" joked Andy.

"NO! Something really evil and sick!"

"Like?"

Another tremendous thud shook the two, sending them to the ground. When they looked up, they saw that rather annoyed form of Sakura, looking down at Terry with glee.

"There you are! Now we can play!"

"THAT'S your monster?!" asked a slightly annoyed Andy.

"I won't tell if you don't!"

"Well, what do we do?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211.title: Well, she wasn't gonna wait all day.

choices: Um... Johnny's standing right behind you!
11411212122112222111212121211112111.content:
"Oh yeah..heh.. DUH!" Andy slaps his head and the Bogard brothers run like hell!! Terry manages to successfully jump out of the way whenever Sakura tries to grab him!

After about ten minutes of trying to outrun the giant school-girl, they manage to find a tight-squeeze to hide-out in an electronic store! People seem to be just shopping as if theyre unaware of what's happening! Meanwhile outside the window, Sakura passes right by it.... Terry is safe... for now.

He takes off his cap and wipes the sweat off his forehead, "Oh man... where is that old fart when you need him?!"

"Old fart?" Andy looks at him strange, "What are you talking about, Terr?"

Before he could answer, the TVs wind up showing a news broadcast:

"We interrupt UPN's made-for-tv movie entitled: 'OH NO YOU DIDNT!!' to bring you a special news report! The number of giant sightings has increased to 3 now! First a gigantic school-girl named Sakura Kasugano, a humongous woman in skimpy red clothing that doesnt cover enough bounciness named Mai Shiranui, and now an unfamiliar woman with black and white wings, a long black tail, and eerie red eyes..."

....DIZZY! "Oh crap! Turn it up!" Terry an employee!

The broadcast continues, "Little to no information is confirmed about this new colossal terror, except that she is void of all compassion toward the lives of innocent civilians. In a recent report, she has threatened to set the entire city ablaze unless her little 'Johnny-Wohnny' is returned to her... so please, Mr Johnny-Wohnny. If youre out there, PLEASE give yourself up for the sake of the city. Surely this enormous terror will show you of all people mercy..."

Terry's jaw drops after watching... it looks like him and his brother arent the ONLY ones that have to worry about giant stalkers! All because a moron in a pink suit tried selling cursed soda...

Andy just laughs and nudges Terry's arm, "Heh... Yikes.. and I thought I had problems! Man, it must SUCK to be that Johnny guy right now, huh?"
11411212122112222111212121211112111.title: Sucks to be the blonde cowboy, huh?

choices: Everyone sits down calmly and tries to think of a plan
Unfortunately, someone finds their hiding spot first
114112121221122221112121212111121111.content:
"Yeah? Well at least I'm not scared of normal sized women!"

Turning around, the two noticed "Johnny-Wohnny" panting and wheezing as if he had just ran a marathon. The look on his face spelled out the horror he had just endured.

"Let me guess," began Andy, "giant stalker, no care for collateral damage."

"Somethin like that kid. You're Terry's bro?"

"Yeah. Andy Bogard."

"Well, what do we do now?" asked Terry, looking out the window of the store.

"See what else is on?" asked Andy.

"How about we find out how to shrink them down before they level the city!" interrupted Johnny. "No way in hell am I facing Dizzy when she's like that!"

Sitting in an office chair being sold in the store, Terry began to think over the situation.

"The old man ran off on me. I don't know when or if he's coming back."

"What old man?" asked Andy.

"Crap, you mean we're on our own?" asked Johnny.

Terry replied with a nod. "Just the three of us..."

"And three giant women that won't take no for an answer," finished Andy.

"Please tell me you have some good news," sighed Johnny.
114112121221122221112121212111121111.title: 3 guys, 3 stalkers

1141121212211222211121212121111211112.content:
"There is!" Terry explains, "That weirdo in pink aint with us!"

"Weirdo in pink? Old man that ran off on you?" Andy starts to get more and more suspicious, "Damnit, Terry! Is there something going on I aint aware of??!!"

Of course, before Terry or Johnny could answer... they started to feel huge vibrations in the ground! The customers start running around in terror!! That could bring it up to one conclusion! Giantess... but which one?

"OH JOHNNY-WOHNNY.... WHERE ARE YOU?????"

Johnny looks up at the ceiling, "Oh good lord, that's her! Man, what Im gonna do that pinky bastard that done this to my Dizzy!!!"

Andy just starts getting impatient, "ALLRIGHT! THAT'S IT!! WILL SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAIN TO ME WHAT'S GOING ON??!!!"

*RRRRRIIIIPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* Dizzy seems to be tearing the roof right off the store!! "Um.. if she asks, I aint here!" Johnny tells the Bogards while he hides in the magazine rack!

She manages to tear the whole roof off!! The first thing she sees is Terry and a guy like Terry only wearing different clothing!
Dizzy just stares down at Terry with eerie dilated pupils.... "Oh... youre Johnny's friend! You havent seen him around, have you?"

Then Undine stares at Terry with a concerned look on her face, "UM... AND WHILE YOURE AT IT, IS MY BELOVED DANNY WITH YOU? I KNOW OF A CURE FOR HIS AWFUL CRABS!"

Terry shakes his head, "Uh... sorry ma'am. Dan's not with us!" Undine sighs in dissapointment, "AWWW..."

Dizzy just taps her foot in impatience, "Whatever. Have you seen Johnny or not?!"

Terry thinks for a second... then answers, "As a matter of fact, I have seen him!"
Johnny overhears this and whispers to himself, "What the hell's he up to?"

Dizzy then smiles, "REALLY? WHERE?!!!!"

Terry's answer:
1141121212211222211121212121111211112.title: Johnny-Be-Good

choices: We try disguises to throw them off
11411212122112222111212121211112111122.content:
"Canada?"

"Yeah! I think I saw Dan heading there too!"

Both Dizzy and Undine swooned for a few seconds before running off, not even bothering to reply. From behind the magazine rack, Johnny let out a loud sigh.

"You pulled my ass out of the fire there kid!"

"Yeah, well don't think we're home free yet," replied Terry sternly. "That'll give us half-an-hour at most, less if she runs into Dan."

Andy could only shake his head, while Johnny, reaching for a pack of pens and a notebook by the magazine rack, began to hastily jot something down. Terry couldn't help but be confused at the sight.

"What are you doing?" he asked.

"Trying to get a general idea of the situation so far," Johnny replied as he showed the brothers his work. Doodles of the people they had run into so far, all on a relative scale, were placed around the paper.

"OK, so this is us," Johnny began, pointing to three drawings that somewhat resembled the Bogards and himself, give or take an extra three feet for Andy's hair.

"Yeah?"

"And this is what we're dealing with," he continued, pointing to three drawings that resembles superdeformed versions of Mai, Sakura, and Dizzy.

"This is all because of an idiot with pink hair. And our only hope of solving the problem, the old man, has ran off to do who knows what."

"And you have a solution?" asked Andy.

"As a matter of fact, I have two. The girls are looking for the three of us, right? And each girl only goes nuts when they see their target. So we have to hide ourselves from view."

"How do we do that?" asked Terry. "Hiding forever doesn't work."
11411212122112222111212121211112111122.title: The excuse that keeps on giving

114112121221122221112121212111121111221.content:
"Well, we can put on some disguises to throw em off, giving us some time to haul ass out the city!"

"Allright, sounds good!" Andy agrees, "I think I remember seeing a little costume store near here while we were running for our lives!"
Terry gets out of the office chair, "Then what are we waiting for?! LET'S GO!!" The Bogards rush out of the store... but Johnny sneaks back to the magazine rack and grabs a Playboy out of the rack! He slips it under his black jacket and slowly steps out of the store whistling...

It was only a short walk later that they reached the store "Dress-2-Success". Unlike the buildings around it, It didnt seem to be trampled on or torn apart by angry giants... not YET anyway!

The moment they step in, the store clerk greets them, "Welcome to Dress-2-Success, the city's #1 costume outlet around! ...mainly because the others were destroyed, but that just goes to show you that even evil giants like our store!"

Terry steps up to the counter, "Yeah uh... we need to buy some real good disguises.. 3 of them! What do you have that would be suitable enough to fool gigantic obsessive women and buy you enough time to take a plane out of the country?!!!!"

The clerk looks him in the eyes, "Well that all depends... how much you got to spend?"

Terry emptys his pockets... nothing's in them! Andy pulls out a 5... a quarter... 3 pennies... and half-stick of 'JuicyFruit'. Johnny sighs... and lays the Playboy down on the table!! "What will THAT get us??!!"

The clerk snickers to himself and says, "Heh... well... it just so happens we do have exactly 3 suits that are suitable for your price range!!"

He reaches under the counter and pulls them out!
114112121221122221112121212111121111221.title: It never pays to be cheap

choices: The three get to the airport
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
About 15 minutes later, the three walked out of the costume store groaning.

"Well, it was better than nothing," began Terry, looking on at the cop outfit he was wearing.

"Better than nothing?!" an angry Johnny yelled back. The biker outfit he was clad in made him look like a slob, with the holes in the jacket exposing his chest.

Andy didn't look anywhere near as concerned as the others, walking around in the Indian costume like it was normal to him, an action that caused Johnny and Terry to look at him oddly.

"So, what do we do?"

"Get to the airport," replied Johnny. "Taking the May Ship is out of the question, Dizzy will recognize it. But she won't recognize a 737 leaving the city."

"Well, no one's gonna recognize these outfits," replied a confident Andy. He was about to sing when Terry covered his mouth.

"We DON'T want to attract any attention, rememeber?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Avoiding the YMCA joke

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
-Back at the store-
The clerk just grins... then snaps his fingers... *POOF*!! URANUS!!
"Heheheh.... god, heroes get stupider each and every year!"

-With the three..-

The three managed to reach the airport with no trouble from the three giant obsessees looking for them! Although they were stopped a few times by huge Village People fans asking for their autograph... and where the OTHER members are! Terry simply answered their question with, "They're in Canada!"

FINALLY when they reached the airport, they talk to the girl at the reception desk, "Escuse me, my lady" Johnny talks to her.

"OH WOW!!" she gets excited at his site, "THE BIKER FROM THE VILLAGE PEOPLE IS TALKING TO ME!!! WAIT'LL I TELL MY MOM ABOUT THIS!!!"

"Uh..yeah yeah.. that's me! Now um... we need to book a quick flight outside the US. Ya'll got any open slots?"

The receptionist runs it through the computer, "Well.. we have plenty of empty seats for planes leaving to Canada-"

"NO!!!" Terry, Andy, and Johnny jump!! "Uh... what else is open?"

The receptionist runs it through the computer again, "Hmm... all we have are a few empty seats for just two different locations."

"Uh...what are they?" Andy asks her in curiosity.

"Well, there's one plane headed for a 'Hello Kitty' factory in Japan.. and another going to a wine-bottling plantation in France..."

"Japan sounds nice this time of year," Andy says, "We could stay with an old friend of mine! Uh... Galford I think his name is!"

"I dont know.." Terry disagrees, "I had an old girlfriend over in France... I know her address! Charlotte can help us out!"

Johnny just thinks about this for a moment... he IS the deciding vote after all!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Leaving on a Jet-Plane...

choices: Something gives the plane a little turbulence!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"We're heading to France!" loudly proclaimed Johnny.

"OK, but why?"

"Well, it's darn simple my boy. First, France is the home of love, wine, and free dating. Japan is the home of packed city-streets, nerds, and sake. And I like wine a lot more than sake. You know why they call it sake?" he asked Andy.

"Why?"

"Because it tastes like it was rung from your socks."

Terry chuckled slightly at the joke, while Andy got the tickets.

"Freedom, here we come! I can't help but feel guil..."

"Don't finish that thought!" interrupted Johnny as he covered Andy's mouth. "The last thing we need is to be jinxed and stuck here!"

"You act like we're gonna get caught," replied Terry.

"You can never be too sure."

*******************************************************

The three boarded the plane without incident. The stewardesses pretended not to recongize the Village People, instead choosing to briefly take a photo while handing them the customary peanuts, and for Johnny, a double shot of vodka.

"Freedom!"

Andy, who was the most relaxed boarding the plane, couldn't help but look outside with a sense of dread. "I dunno, it seems too easy."

"TOO EASY?!" yelled Terry. "Obviously you weren't paying attention."

"Let's just hope we get out of here on time, alright?" interrupted Johnny.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Le geteway!

choices: "EVERYONE! WERE ON A FLIGHT TO HELL!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Just then, the flight attendant appears... the attendant is a big, built, black, buff guy with a yellow mohawk (Yep... Birdie!) He steps up front to speak to the rest of the passengers in a thick Brit accent:

"OY! Dis here's ya seat-belt. Put it 'round ya waist or ya gonna be smashing ya brains out like porridge when we crash! When the red blinker that nix's a cigarette shows, it means DONT SMOKE! We dont like to inhale ya pussed-up air! Plus, the seats' are totally flammable! Light a match and ya arse is served on a smore! Lastly, in the risk of aqua events, better pray to God we dont find sharks! If ya 'ave any questions... too bad! Enjoy the flight!" The attendant then walks off...

Terry OBVIOUSLY doesnt like this flight! "Uh... guys? Did you find anything shady about that flight attendant? ....guys?"

Johnny is apparently too busy signing autographs for people that thinks he's THE original Biker while Andy is too busy singing out-loud Phil Collin's 'In the Air Tonight' playing in his headset!

Terry just shakes his head and tries to calm down, "Eh, it's probably nothing... Maybe a quick nap will calm me down.." But before he could take a nap... the intercomm goes off... and a familiar voice comes out of it:

*BEEP* "This is your captain speaking... we've just hit a bit of mild turbulence but not to worry... we'll be JUST fine..."
"OH!!! Master Testament! When this is over, are the humans gonna be burned alive or be ripped apart by man-eating sharks-"
