"SHHH!!!! Quiet!! They might hear you! Uh... AHEM! Anyway, like I was saying.. a bit of turbulence, but we're allright... we hope you enjoy your flight... and long live Goddess Myria!" *BEEP*

Terry's jaw dropped, "That voice... THAT VOICE!! Where did I hear that from???"

**Flashback**
"Whatever youre looking for, it's still there... I didnt touch it... touch it.. touch it... uch it.. it.."
****

"...THE CREEPY GUY WITH THE SCYTHE!!!!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Enjoy the ride...

choices: They don't notice, or don't care
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry grimaced. But at the same time, he knew that making a scene wouldn't do a lot except cause panic and make it that much more difficult to find out what was going on.

So while Andy and Johnny were both preoccupied, Terry slowly stood up and began walking towards the cockpit.

"Going somewhere mon?"

"Uh, yeah, the cockpit."

"No kiddies in the cockpit. Company policy."

"No," continued Terry, "it's urgent."

"The only thing dat'll be urgent is the help your face'll need if you don't sit down, boy."

Terry didn't reply with words. As soon as he was called "boy," he sent his fist directly into Birdie's face, knocking him down in the aisle, and causing him to laugh out loud.

"Oh, boy, you want a fight now? Well, you've got it."

Unfortunately for Terry, Andy and Johnny were too preocupied, along with most of the passengers, to notice the fight. With little room to manuever, Terry began attempting to block Birdie's heavy strikes, hoping, at the very least, to get someone's attention.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Not snakes, but just as bad...

choices: Terry starts to question Birdie at this point...
Terry starts to torture Birdie at this point!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
People start to gaze at the fight in shock! They gasp and shiver worrying about what's going on... at least until the intercomm goes off again:

*BEEP!*"This is your captain speaking once more! We hope you enjoyed our suprise feature of reenacting a play called um... 'Get me the hell off this plane before I kill somebody'!"
"Ye..yeah! Starring Keanu Reeves as Terry Bogard and Samuel L. Jackson as Birdie!"
"Dont ad-lib, Zio!"
"Sigh...yes Master Testament!" *BEEP!*

Terry flips out, "WHAT?! THIS AINT A PLA-UGH!!" He was interrupted by a fist in the stomach by Birdie! It knocked the wind out of him causing him to fall on the floor flinching!

Birdie cracks his knuckles and grins, "Im gonna pound ya head so hard, ya gonna have to unzip your pants to watch the telly, yank!"

*CRACK!* "AAAUUUGGGHH!!!" Birdie got a HARD kick to the back of the kneecaps!
"Never underestimate Saikyo... bitch!"

Terry gets up and sees the guy that just saved his life, "What the... DAN??!!" Dan smiles, "Need a hand, Ken?" Birdie gets up and growls, "GGRRR!! YOU TRAITOR!! Master Testament's gonna have ya arse on a platter!"

Birdie delivers a super fast fist to Dan's face, "EEK!!" but he screams like a girl and ducks in time! Birdie's fist goes through the wall... and gets stuck in the hole!!

"BLOODY HELL!!!!" he tries to pull his hand out... but it's too far stuck!!! Terry and Dan just smile at him, "Say... are you REALLY stuck?"

"Are you really stupid! O' course Im stuck!"

"Cool!" Dan smiles... and gives him a HARD kick in the butt! "OWWWW!!!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The Unlikely Hero (emphasize 'unlikely')

choices: The door's locked, and Dan can't get inside
The door's unlocked, but unfortunately for Dan...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
The passengers of the plane went back to what they were doing before, figuring what was about to happen next was "a boring talky part." Terry, not wanting to draw attention to himself, attempted to subtlely grab Birdie's head by his mowhawk, preparing to ask questions.

"Who are you working for?"

"Yo momma. And she said you've been shaming her."

Terry didn't reply with words. Instead, he pulled on Birdie's hair, until he replied.

"OW OW OW! OK! This weird guy, he's flying the plane!"

"Good, now we're getting somewhere. Who is he?"

"I don't know. He just paid me a lot. That's all!"

Terry groaned. Somehow, he knew that this weirdo was too smart to tell the hired muscle all the details. But going against someone who he had no idea how to face was suicide. That is...

"Dan?"

"Yeah?"

"Go to the cockpit. That's where the bad guy is."

Dan shook his head. "Nah, you go."

"But if you go, you'll be the hero. Everyone here will want to congratulate you!"

Dan smiled. The idea of being lauded as a hero was all he needed to get going. With a confident stroll, he headed towards the cockpit.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Not the brightest piercing in the crowd

choices: He tries to break free of his chains!!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Dan marches through the 1st Class room with his head held high! He flips the lever to the door to the cockpit and jumps in! "STOP VILE FIEND!!! ...huh?" Nobody is there... nobody is in the cockpit.. it was stuck on auto-pilot!
Dan scratches his head, "Huh? ..where is-OOF!" Just a then a pair of light-blueish fingers strike him in the back of the head knocking him out cold!

--????--

"Ugghh...." Dan slowly wakes up... when his vision clears, he finds himself in some black parallel uniform chained to an eerie satin-red king sized bed.. aside him is a creepy crow staring into his soul. The crow then transforms into a light-blueish nearly nude demonic woman with purple hair, purple eyes, yellow horns, and with purple stripes wrapped around parts of her body.

She grins at Dan, "Hi!"

"Uh...hi!" he smiles back, "is this one of my creepy-yet-strangely erotic fantasies come to life?"
She just answers, "Well, if your fantasies end with you getting your heart ripped out of your chest by a set of razor-sharp fingernails, then yes it is!"

"Step aside, Zio. This human's mine." A man appears from the darkness.. the black haired man with red eyes, carrying a big red scythe, wearing whatever the hell that thing is he's wearing...

Zio bows to him, "Yes, Master Testament." Dan stares up at him while slightly shivering. Normally he'd freak out demanding where he is, but not even HE is stupid enough is piss off a creepy man that could easily dice him to pieces and a demonic girl that'd probably eat those pieces!

"Dan Hibiki," the man says, "You have served our purpose well. You have created decent stepping stones to freeing our Goddess Myria and obliterating the human race once and for all!"

"W...WHAT??!!" Dan flips out, "B..But all I was trying to do was sell cola!!"
Testament smiles, "Foolish human. That tainted water infuses the host with Myria's blood.. the blood grows stronger as it is consumed within more and more human's bodies!! As each person drinks, the 'chains' that bind her loosen... only a few more people until..."

"..Oh my god.." Dan lowers his head in shame, "..I was just a tool to help a sadistic madman free an evil goddess and doom mankind... and I only got $.25 a can for it... DAMN IT ALL!!! WHY DIDNT I CHARGE MORE?!!!!"

Testament than gives him a menacing glare that shuts Dan the hell up! "You could have been spared our wrath... but you chose to side with the great Heroes of Fate.. and for that.. you must DIE!"

"W..WHAT?! Heroes of Fate? But I dont-"

Zio jumps up and down and excitment, "Oo! OOO! Can I kill him?! Please please PLEASE??!!!"

Testament grins, "Very well!" he points to Dan and shouts, "SEVENTH SIGN!" (Seventh Sign: Testament's Instant Kill. The victim is pushed onto a satin-red bed and Zio descends upon the victim. She then jams her fingernails into the victim's chest and rips out his/her heart. Nifty, huh?)

Zio grins wickedly at Dan and raises her hand pointed at his direction... with only seconds to react before an unfortunate end, Dan had to think of something? BUT WHAT?!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The Seventh Sign

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Back on the airplane, Terry was growing impatient. Dan should have been thrown back into the aisle a bloody mess by now. Something was wrong.

But he wasn't about to risk his neck over it. Sitting down, Terry began to read a magazine.

*********************************************************

"Well?"

Instinct kicked in. Normally, that instinct would tell the Saikyo master to attack. But when faced with a naked (If extremely creepy) woman, a different instinct kicked in.

"Now come on. Would you really want to rip my heart out? I can think of a lot of better uses for it."

Zio paused, albiet briefly. The sheer absurdity of Dan's actions intrigued her.

"I mean, would a beautiful, unique woman like yourself really want to hurt me? I haven't done anything to you. And you haven't seen my "true" potential.

"You talk sweet, but I'm still gonna rip your heart out."

"Crap."

*******************************************************

10 minutes had passed without any sign of Dan. Terry was growing increasingly impatient. It was bad enough that wanted to look.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Saikyo- Not good for talking

choices: The Allmighty Saikyo Master introduces himself!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry started worrying... about that little punk! He couldnt just abandom him at his time of need! After all, he DID save Terry's life earlier! He had a debt to repay!! ....either that or he was just bored.

"HANG ON DAN! IM COMING!" He shouted as he busted through the door to the cockpit...... only to find Dan just standing there smiling at him, "'Sup, Ken?"

"Oh god, youre alive?! ..uh I mean, thank god youre alive!" Terry looked over Dan's shoulder only to find the plane's stuck on auto-pilot with no pilots! "Hey, what happened?"

Dan told him what happened to him when he entered the cockpit, right up to when he was about to get his heart ripped out by some demonic chick!

"Holy crap!! We're in some serious trouble now! Uh.. how'd you escape anyway?"

"Im glad you asked," Dan grinned.........

***Dan's story***

After my irresistable charm of mine didnt work I had to think of another bright idea that would save my life... so as Zio's hand lunged at my chest, I quickly caught it with my mouth and bit down hard!! She let out a bloodcurdling scream while her other hand was squeezing one of the chains of my arms! She squeezed so tight, it broke, and my arm was free! I quickly used my free hand to pick the lock of the other chain!

After pushing the demoness off my clean and pure body, I quickly made a break for it! However, that creepy guy glared at me and chanted something..

Another big scythe appeared in his other hand! He tossed it at me at lighting speeds... it was only inches from my face until... a hand deflected it! A hand coming from a slightly tall black haired man with a black robe on. When the evil asked who he was, the man just grinned and said in a thick Russian accent, "I am the Walrus. Goo goo....ga choo!"

****

"W..wait a minute!" Terry stopped him in the middle of his story, "Slightly tall... long black hair.. black robe... thick Russian accent... URANUS!!"

Dan nodded his head, "And the next thing I knew, he snapped his finger and here I am right now!"

Just then, Andy steps in, "Terry, you allright in here? ...hey... who's he?" he points to Dan.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Danny's Odyssey

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"He's..."

Placing his hand in front of Terry's, Dan stood in front of him, striking a pose with his arm stretched out and his fist clenched.

"I," began Dan with emphasis on the single letter, "am the undisputed master of the Saikyo style, the one and only Dan Hibiki, martial arts master supreme!"

Dan stood still, holding his pose for nearly 30 seconds before Andy replied.

"You're the one that sold Mai that cola and drove her nuts!"

Dan nodded. "That was a failed buisness venture, one which..."

"I'M GOING TO KILL YOU!"

Wasting no time, Dan began running down the aisle in an attempt to avoid Andy. Terry groaned.

"He deserves it, y'know," Johnny remarked.

"Yeah, I guess."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Pointing fingers

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
After a while of Dan running for his life, the intercomm voice FINALLY goes off again! But this time.. in a familiar, smartass, Russian voice:

"This is captain speaking. I see London, I see France... no wait, all I see is France because we have arrived. Now get the hell out of my plane before I level the tower of Piza with it!!!"

Andy stops in his tracks and glares at Dan, "This aint over!" and walks out of the plane.. Dan just mocks him from behind, "Dis aint over!" "WHAT WAS THAT?!" "..nothing.."

And so our brave tow-headed heroes and one moron in pink have arrived in the great country of France! Unknown to them... there was a man waiting at the airport for a certain 'Saikyo-Master' to show up! The man had short blonde hair, blue eyes, wearing a blue ninja-suit, and a cute little wolf-dog following him!

The second Dan stepped out of the plane, HE rushed him! "THERE YOU ARE, CON-ARTIST!!!" He drew his blade and pointed it at Dan's throat! "Uh...d..d..do I know you?"

"KNOW ME?! You sold a can of your tainted piss-water to my girlfriend!!! Isnt that right, Poppy?"
Woof! Grrr....Grrrr....

Andy recognizes said angry guy and his dog, "Hey Galford!!" The guy raises his hand to greet Andy, "'Sup, Andy? Long time no see!"

Terry steps up to them, "Uh.. you two know eachother?"
"Oh yeah!" Andy smiles, "We're from rival dojos! We used to spar with eachother all the time! Remember the time that blue-haired pretty boy hit on your girl and Poppy snuck up from behind bit him in the ass?"
WOOF! Pant...pant...pant...
"Ah yeah!" Galford laughs, "Good times! Say... how's Mai?"
Andy just shudders, "Dont ask... how's Nakoruru?"

Galford just grits his teeth, "Great until THIS con-artist sold her a cursed soda!!" he points to Dan! "I had to flee my own country because of that man!! Thanks to him, there's a gigantic insane girl on the opposite side of the world hunting me down!! For what... even I dont wanna think about..."
...whimper...whimper...

Dan just smiles and laughs, "...Heheh! Oh yeah, NOW I remember! That was the girl with the bird, right?"

Johnny puts his hand to his face and shakes his head, "Damnit, if your ruin this fancy wine-country vacation for me, so help me god..."

Galford just looks to his dog and points at Dan, "Poppy! ...sic...pink....crotch!"

Dan's smile quickly drops, "Uh oh!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: A boy and his dog... and a VENDETTA!!

choices: It was a natural earthquake...false alarm
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Dan gasped and began running around the airport, with Poppy and Galford in hot pursuit. Johnny and the Bogards looked on, shocked by just how easily Dan was able to make people want to kill him. All three of them were resisting the urge to go pound some sense into Dan when a powerful earthquake shook the airport.

"What the hell's going on now?" asked Andy.

"Don't ask me!" replied Johnny. "I don't think Danny boy's been to France before, has he?"

"I haven't!" Dan yelled as he jumped off a table in the food court in a desperate attempt to avoid Poppy's bites."

Andy gulped. "You know what this means, right?"

Johnny nodded. "You have to go outside and see what's happening."

"WHAT?! Why me?"

"Because," Johnny calmly replied, "Dan's preoccupied, and you haven't really done a lot since you joined up! Now hurry! Go! Hâte!"

Andy gulped, but went outside to see what was happening, prepared for the worst.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: A craze that's spreading way too fast!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy, rightfully scared out of his mind, stepped outside worrying about what lies in store for him.. he just better hope Mai didnt catch up to him!

He shudders as he slowly steps outside..... hmm... no giantesses anywhere! Andy looks all around, but still noone! Looks like it was just an ordinary earthquake after all! "Whew," he breathes a sigh of relief... however when he turns around... a certain creepy guy is appears before him! A certain creepy guy... with a scythe and a crow!!

"What the?! Who are you?!" Andy asks the man. Testament just grins at him...

--Meanwhile with the others--

Terry and Johnny start chatting with Galford while Dan hides under a table while Poppy is growling at him!

"Heheheh... so he STILL hasnt committed to Mai yet?"

"Fraid not," Terry tells him, "And it hasnt gotten any better after Danny-boy over there sold her his tainted cola!"
"Yeah, speaking of which," Galford starts worrying about Andy, "uh, Andy's been outside for a while. Shouldnt we check up on him?"

"Nah.." Johnny shakes his head, "he gonna be FINE! Dont worry!"

*SQUUAAKKK!!! SQUAAAKKK!!!* Just then, a hawk flies into the food court and lands on their table! Poppy rushes up to the bird, and Dan runs up to his crew!

"Hey, isnt that the same that other girl had-"

"SSHHHH!!!" Galford covers his mouth, "Dont...spook it!"

Terry asks, "Why? What's-"

"SSHHH!!!" Galford shushes him too and whispers, "That's Mamahaha! Nakoruru's bird! If HE is here... that means SHE is nearby!!"

"Aw crap.." Johnny whispers back, "Is she ANOTHER one that grew from Dan's cola?!"

"Hey, she said she was thirsty and wanted something to drink!" Dan whispered in protest, "It's not MY fault I was in the wrong place at the wrong time!"

"Both of you, shut up!" Galford whispered, "If you spook the bird, it's gonna start screaming and give away our hiding spot!!"

They locked eyes with the hawk for a few moments... they dare not move or run because even the slightest of moment would cause it to freak out and start screaming! The hawk just hopped around staring at them while constantly tilting it's head... it's like it might have found who it's looking for, but is entirely sure!

Finally, moments later, the crew starts whispering to the hawk, "Go on....shoo....go away....scat....shoo!"

Even Poppy whispered, woof....bark....grrr...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Bird's the word

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"SQUAK! SQUAK SQUAK!"

"Kill the bird! Johnny shouted.

"Do you have any idea how pissed off Nakoruru will be if I kill her pet?" Galford replied.

"Well then hide us! You're a big shot ninja!"

Hurriedly reaching into his belt, Galford pulled out several circular spheres, throwing them at the ground.

"A ninja can never have too many smoke bombs," he quipped. "Now hurry!"

"You don't have to tell me twice!" Terry shouted.

*********************************************************

Andy clenched his fists, assuming a fighting pose at the oddly dressed man in front of him.

"What do you want?"

"Ah yes," the man quipped, "as if I would tell you what my plans were. I don't have time to deal with accessories. Now move."

Andy shook his head, causing Testament to swing his scythe directly at him!

"Then you will die!"

Andy gulped, but quickly regained his composure, moving in close and landing a solid kick to the man's head. However, he was unphased, swinging his scythe forward.

*******************************************************

After about 5 minutes of running, Galford, Terry, Dan, and Johnny, along with Poppy, had all made it outside in their desperate attempt to avoid Nakoruru. Unfortunately, just as they thought they were safe, the sound of squaking could be heard.

"The bird!" Dan shouted.

"Worse, than that," Galford gulped as he pointed upward, "LOOK!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The birds, bees, and big ladies...

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Johnny recognizes the creepy guy with a scythe, "TESTAMENT?! What the hell's he doing here?"

Galford points, "And he's got Andy!" Terry nearly jumps, "WHAT?! ANDY???!!"

Andy looks down from the balconey, "Huh..Terry?" but while he was distracted, Testament grabbed him by the neck and pointed the scythe at his throat!

"STAY BACK!!" Testament shouts, "Take one step closer and I slit his throat!"

Since he knows him the most, Johnny tries to speak with him, "Testament! Let the boy go! What do ya hope to accomplish?"

"What do I hope? WHAT DO I HOPE???!!! I hope to rid this world of your pathetic kind!! You do absolutely nothing but plague this world! Much green lands and much life... destroyed at the hands of mankind! Goddess Myria will annihilate this plague and the green land will grow once more..."

Johnny took off his hat and scratched his head, "B..but havent I proved to you now and then that not ALL of us are bad?! I mean, Dizzy-"

"Dizzy has gotten too goddamn soft!" Testament roared, "I dont even know what she sees in you.... HUMAN!"

"ALLRIGHT, YOU GOTHIC SHE-MALE, THAT'S ENOUGH!" Terry cracks his knuckles, "You've been a pain in my ass for TOO long! Why dont you let Andy go and the two of us can settle this like men?!"

Testament just tilts his head and laughs, "Heheheheh...HAHAHAHAHAHA!!! No.. I got a better idea for the so-called 'Warriors of Fate'! Try and find my little hiding spot... if you cant find it in less than 72 hours.." he grips Andy's neck even tighter so he cant breathe, "You'll be seeing your brother again... IN HELL!!!" and with a snap of his fingers, they disappear into the shadows!!

"ANDY!!!!!! Aw damnit!" Terry punches a wall! Johnny taps his shoulder, "Dont worry, man! We gonna find him!"

"Uh...g...guys..." Dan's a little busy pointing out a window while shivering, "I uh... believe that's ninja-boy's girlfriend, is it not?"

They look out to see a tiny little hawk return to the humongous shoulder of a giant black haired girl with a red bow in her hair and wearing a red & white Ainu clothing.. Nakoruru!!!

Her voice nearly shakes the building, "WHAT'S THAT, MAMAHAHA? YOU'VE FOUND SOMETHING IN THIS TINY COMPLEX? SHOULD WE CHECK IT OUT?"

Galford just stares for a few seconds... then looks to his dog, "Poppy....run!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Silhouette

choices: Andy's run into a rather large problem
What about the others in France?
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy felt sick as he saw the French airport melt away into nothingness, replaced by an alleyway in a rotted city.

"Where....are we?"

"Newark," replied a voice in back of him. Andy recongized it almost immediately, making sure to dodge the scythe blow he knew was sure to follow.

"Why am I here?"

"The pieces are being gathered together," Testament droned, "and I couldn't allow you to escape. I plan to bring all who were tied into my little web right here for the finale, and the end of the humans."

"You planned on escaping?"

"I win whether or not your friends find me. At least here, my boy, I can keep an eye on you."

"You think I'm gonna lose to a psycho like you?" Andy yelled. "Take this! SHADOW COMET PUNCH!"

Testament smiled, and vanished, leaving Andy's fist to punch a nearby trashcan.

"Damn you!"

Trying to grasp hold of the situation, the warrior had little time to get his bearings as he looked up at a dreadful sight.

"Oh Andy! There you are!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The dark place

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Nakoruru just shrugs, "Sigh... this place obviously doesnt appreciate the beauty of nature! Look at it! They destroyed the forests and lands of our animal brethern to create such environmentally poluting cities!!" She then turns her head and sees a huge wine-bottling factory, "I cant believe this!! They taint precious life-giving fruit like grapes and soil them with alcohol?! I WILL NOT STAND FOR THIS!!!"
She lifts the huge factory over her head with her bare hands and tosses it a mile away!!!

The gang saw what happened and dropped their jaws! Galford just blushed and said, "Uh... did I forget to mention Nakoruru was a huge nature fanatic?" Johnny just feel to the ground and started to tear up, "N.. No.. th...the wine!! THE PRECIOUS PRECIOUS WINE!!! NOOOOOO o o o ooo... *SOB!*"

Luckily, Poppy appeared to Johnny carrying a wine bottle in his mouth. He generously dropped in front of Johnny. Johnny wiped his eyes and hugged the dog, "*Sniff!* Aw.. your the greatest, pup!!"
...Arf?

"Allright guys..." Terry says to his gang, "We need to get to the bottom of this mess! We only have 3 days to figure out where my brother is!! And with more and more giants popping up everything (thanks to Mr. Pink!) it's gonna get a hell of a lot tougher!"

Galford then thinks, "Yeah... and just what did that other guy mean by 'Warriors of Fate'?"
Johnny gets up and puts his wine bottle away, "Just how we gonna get outta this place with the GreenPeace Army of One after us??!!"
Dan just thinks to himself, "Man... I wonder what Undine's doing right now..."

*CCCRRRRAAAASSSSSHHHHH!!!!!*

A gigantic hand breaks through the huge glass window behind Terry and snags him right off the ground!!! The gang screams "TTEEEERRRRRYYYYY!!!" and "KKKEEEEEEENNNNN!!!"

Terry screams off the top of his lungs and this giant hand pulls him closer and closer to the giantess it belongs to... NAKORURU?!
She looks down at him with a pair of huge and eerily dilated pupils.... until she finally speaks, "OH! Im so sorry, I thought you were my little friend, Galford!"

*SQQQUUUAAAAKKK!!!!* Nakoruru listens to her hawk squaking! "What's that, Mamahaha? He knows where our friend is? Um.. excuse me! Can you please tell me where he is? He's a blonde guy in a ninja suit with a dog following him.."

"Uh...Y..YEAH!!" Terry shouts to her.. and decides to give her the lie that has YET to fail! "He said he was heading for Canada! So if you hurry now-" BUT...

*SSQQQUUUAAAKKK!!!* Nakoruru frowns after hearing what her bird said! "WHAT?! HE'S LYING?!! How DARE you try to trick me like that!!! You have a lot of nerve! Tell me where Galford is! And I want the TRUTH!!"

Aw crap... about damn time his little trick would blow up in his face! ...He tried thinking of another good excuse to give the angry giantess to save his new friend! "Oh...um...he's well....uh...."

Nakoruru gets tired of his stalling, "Sigh... FINE! THIS will make you talk!!!" she shouted... and she grabbed Terry by just his leg.... and dangled the poor guy over her open mouth!!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Not nice to fool Mother Nature!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"He's right there! I'm sorry! Just don't eat me!"

Terry didn't care. He wasn't about to be eaten alive by Nakoruru in the name of a sparring partner.

The towering girl carelessly threw Terry to the side and reached for Galford, not giving him a chance to do anything except yell "Traitor!" at the top of his lungs. Landing on the grass with a thud, Terry quickly sprung to his feet and began running towards the airport. Dan and Johnny followed.

"Where are we headin now?" Johnny asked as he ran.

"We need to find the psycho and Andy!"

"But what about..."

"Who cares?!" Terry yelled as he continued to run. "I'm sick and tired of all the crap that's happened today! Now my brother's gone, and God knows how many more lovesick giants are running around!"

Dan shook his head. "Got me. I didn't do my inventory..."

"Shut up!"

At that moment, Dan stopped and faced Terry.

"What, you want to start something pinko?"

"Look at you!" Dan yelled, his voice taking on an authoritarian tone. "Just because a few things happened..."

"That were your fault," Johnny added, although Dan continued right over the protest.

"Doesn't mean you can just give up! Now your friend is about to suffer a horrible fate unless we go and do something!"

After thinking about it for a few moments
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Sellout

choices: Better hope he can break free!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
A moment of silence passes... for a moment, Dan feels like he finally talked some sense into Ken.... unfortunately, Terry just glares at him.

"That's...IT!" he shouts, "I HAD IT UP TO HERE WITH YOU!!!!" and in a second, he swings his fist directly toward Dan's face!!!!! Dan had no time to get out of the way in time... he could only close his eyes hope it wont as bad as usual............

HMM??! Dan didnt feel a thing! In fact, the fist never came in contact with his 'irresistable' face! He opens his eyes to see what happened...
Another hand's in the way... it seems someone blocked the fist just in time! The man that saved Dan was none other than... the wise man himself: URANUS!!!

He has a pretty strong grip for an old man! He's squeezing so tight, he's almost breaking bone! Uranus just raises an eyebrow at Terry and asks, "...Is there a problem, gentlemen?"

--Meanwhile with Andy--

It wasnt Mai he met... it was MUCH worse!! A humongous naga-girl with long blonde hair, blue lizard eyes, huge fangs, and a snake tongue and tail! He met this girl once... in a NIGHTMARE!!

He looked up at her and nearly wet himself! "B...B.. BERNADET THE NAGA???!!!!" She smiled at him, "Oh good! You remember! ...Surely you also remember... the PROMISE you made to me?"
His nightmare... he was hunted down by a giant naga by the name of Bernadet. No matter how far Andy ran, she caught up to him, and snagged him! But while he was dangling over her open mouth... he flirted with her! He even promised to MARRY her if she didnt eat him!

Andy starts shaking his head,"No way... this cant be happening!!" Bernadet closed her arms and glared at him, "In exchange for not eating you, you promised to marry me! You woke up before you lived up to your promise!!!!"

"C'MON! THAT WAS JUST A BAD DREAM I HAD YEARS AGO! YOU CANT HOLD ME UP TO THAT!"

"Oh...but she WIIIIIIIIIILL!!" shrieked the Deathjester the man-eating clown from his childhood nightmare, "You must NEVER make a promise you cant Keeeeeeeepppp...!!!"

"Yup-YUP!!" shouted Mort, the big buff blue devil in Andy's old teenager nightmare, "You made ya bed... now ya gonna lie in it...." he then flexes his muscles and grins, "IN-DEED!"

Andy couldnt believe what was happening! Did Testament make all his nightmares come true just to toy with him??! Those were just a FEW of his old nightmares too! ...Lord knows what else he'll meet again!!

"Listen uh..Bernadet," he tries to explain, "Im sorry, but I cant keep that promise... Im allready seeing someone else!"

After hearing that, Bernadet shined an evil eye on Andy, "..Youre not gonna live up to your end of the bargain? FINE!!"

Deathjester and Mort grabbed Andy so he wouldnt run away! The naga lowers her head at Andy and licks her lips, "...THEN NEITHER WILL I!!!!!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Mai's gonna HATE this...

choices: Try and reason with her somehow
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy knew what was going to happen next, but no way was he going to be forced to marry a disgusting slimy naga from an old nightmare!

With a great heave, Andy forced himself free from the naga's grip and began running as fast as he could down the streets. However, halfway, he found himself in a black void.

"I know you're out there freak! Why don't you come down here and fight me like a man!"

"That masculine posturing is a characteristic I find common in humans, but in no way does it mean I'm going to buy into it," replied the voice. "You're not going to escape the web I have wrought, and honestly, why would I sully my hands with you when your childhood dreams can do it for me?"

As the void dissapeared, Andy found all of the appartions in front of him. Not bothering to converse, he ran, hoping to get out of this city.

*********************************************************

"I'm waiting."

Terry's fury was replaced with an urge to get his hand out of the old man's grip. But he didn't have an eloquent answer to his question.

"Can you let me go?"

"Why are you going around hitting allies instead of tending to the problem at hand?" Uranus asked, not letting Terry's hand move.

"Because...Dan's caused more harm than good!"

"True," replied Uranus as he let Terry's hand go, continuing to talk as Terry rubbed his wrist and hand.

"However, Dan is still vital to what is happening. I think you're going to need his help before this is over."

"What?" Terry yelled.

"Listen pig-head, you're going to need all the help you can get, no matter how mentally retarded. Now as for your brother..."

"Where is he?"

Uranus shook his head. "I don't know exactly. I do know that he's somewhere in the Northeastern United States. But before you go..."

"What?" Johnny asked.

"You've got someone you need to save."

With a blinding flash, Uranus dissapeared, and Terry, Johnny, and Dan found themselves right in front of where Galford was being tormented. Terry knew what he had to do, whether he liked it or not.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: A hard man to pin down

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
The gang could not believe what they see the giant woman doing to their poor little ninja friend! Judging by the way things look (Nakoruru layed down on her back against a building blushing and moaning in satisfaction) Someone's having the time of their life!!!! They could hear her screams "YEEESSS!!! OH YESS!! DO NOT STOP!!! A LITTLE MORE!!! AAAAWWWWWWW!!!"

And they turned to see Poppy whimpering in a corner and poor little Galford...... RUBBING HER TOES??!! (A woman's TRUE g-spot!) Nevertheless, they had to save him!

Dan immediately comes up with an idea, "Guys... Ive come up with an idea!"
Terry just rolls his eyes, "Oh... THIS should be good."

"This will require all three of us! First we need someone to distract her..." Terry is immediately reluctant to take up THAT offer! ESPECIALLY after getting a nice view of the inside of her mouth earlier! Dan just pats his shoulder, "Dont worry! We understand! I'LL use my special talkative skills to distract you... you go get Galford... but, that Hawk of hers... HE'LL be a problem!

"Ya'll just leave that to ME!" Johnny grins wickedly and grabs a knife, fork, and some BBQ sauce!

And so, Dan rushes up to Nakoruru, "HEY!! EXCUSE ME!" She looks down and frowns at him, "Um... Im a little busy at the moment! What do you want?"

"Uh...I was um...wondering...uh... what do you think of... uh... global warming?" That immediately got her attention, "Oh! Im SOOOO glad you asked!" She talks for what seems to be an hour on how she feels on that raunchy subject while Dan just nods his head pretending to listen.

Meanwhile Johnny sneaks up from behind and snags her hawk! He quickly gags it so it cant start squawking!
Terry quickly taps Galford's shoulder and ushers him to follow!

"Oh...wow! That was amazing! I never really thought of it that way," Dan says to Nakoruru! "Oh man, look at the time! It was nice talking to you!" and quickly leaves! Luckily Nakoruru quickly falls asleep before noticing her boy-toy and bird are gone!

Galford breathes a sigh of relief and thanks the guys, "Oh man! Thanks a LOT! Me and Poppy owe you one!" Arf!! Pant pant pant "Say... where did you hide Mamahaha?"

Johnny just tries to look innocent and wipes off the BBQ sauce on his face! "...*Urp*! Uh... who's Mamahaha?" Galford is just left speechless for a few moments until finally....
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Dan saves the day AGAIN!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Galford couldn't believe what he heard, but the nearby feathers meant that he couldn't deny it.

"You ATE Mamahaha?!"

"Yeah, but hawk meat is too stringy. Needs lots of sauce."

"You do know what..."

"And that's why we need to go!" Terry interrupted as he headed towards the airport. "We'll take the first flight to New York City as quickly as possible!"

"But how long before the plane leaves?" Galford asked. "And...is Poppie allowed on the plane? I'm not leaving him in luggage."

"We'll check that out when we get there!" Johnny yelled, already inside the airport.

*********************************************************

Andy knew he was alone, but that didn't make it any more comforting as he hid in the dank New Jersey streets. There was no one to go to for help, no one he could contact, and no one that knew where he was besides that freak with the scythe.

"Oh Andy? Where are you? You should know it's not nice to break a promise!"

As tempting as it was for Andy to reply with about a million insults he had been saving for Mai, Andy kept his mouth shut. Yelling would only give away his position.

Moving silently through the alleyways, Andy decided that his best course of action would be to...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Morality vs. necessity

choices: Andy jumps out of the way in time!
Andy uses Geese's grab&toss against him!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
All he could do at the moment was hide and wait for help... if he tried to run and escape, it would only make him tired and easier for his Half-snake bride-to-be to catch him! He decides to take refuge behind a dark alley... good thing there no rats or bums or anything like that left in this city...

"...Whew!" Andy catches his breath, "God, I hope the others get here soon..."

"Well well... if it isnt one of Bogard's boys!"

Andy recognized that voice... he damn sure could NEVER forget that voice... the voice of that BASTARD that robbed him and his brother of a perfect childhood! Andy Bogard's worse nightmare of all!!

Andy turned his head to him... and growed... "....GRRRRR... GEESSE!!!!" Geese Howard. The blonde short-haired martial arts expert that murdered Andy's father!

Geese just laughed, "Heheheh... your father had that same exact look... you know... before I snapped his neck!!" At this point, Andy didnt give a damn about Bernadet! All that went through his mind... WAS REVENGE!!

He immediately charged at Geese, but he was too quick for him! Geese quickly dodged him and countered with a kick to the back of Andy's head! "AAUUGGHH!!" Andy screamed and turned to Geese.. "BISHOKEN!!!"

"REP-FOUKEN!!" their 'kens' collided and cancelled eachother out! Andy then bounced off a wall and tried to drop-kick Geese... but he did his most hated maneuver: He caught Andy in the air and tossed him over his shoulder!! When Andy hit the ground, Geese dropped a hard leg on top of his chest!!

Sadly, Andy was no match for Geese... after all, it was his BROTHER that killed him! After getting a couple of punches and kicks.. Andy got off the ground struggling to stay up!

Geese grinned, "..What a joke! It's no wonder Terry was the better brother!" Andy growled.. but couldnt really do a damn thing at this point!

Unbeknownst to him, Bernadet caught up to Andy! She slithered up to him, lowered her human-formed head right behind Andy and opened her mouth wide ready to snag the loser of this fight!

Geese slowly approached Andy and said, "Looks like Testament's gonna be a little disappointed! He wont get to kill BOTH the bastard sons!!!!"

And with that, he ran and jumped up in the air ready to deliver a drop-kick in Andy's direction....
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: We have a score to settle!

choices: He thinks Dan's full of crap...yet again
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy luckily saw the drop kick moving towards him from a mile away. It was approaching just slowly enough that with one quick dash, moved out of the way, allowing Geese to fall right into Bernadent's waiting mouth. Not even bothering to look back as he ran forward, Andy could hear the sickening crunch of bone being crushed.

"I don't have to take that from you. You're dead," Andy mumbled, smirking.

That brief elation was quickly dampened when he heard the slithering of a snake, without a doubt Bernadent coming for him. Worse still, his surroundings hadn't changed from the mix of buildings and empty streets that he had seen before. Any possible method of escape or contact with the outside world was cut off. No weapons either.

However, as he passed a few signs, an idea formed. Perhaps, he could kill that abomination. All it required was a bit of planning.

*********************************************************

"Come on, come on!" Terry yelled at no one in particular. "When is this flight gonna arive?"

The others could only stare as Terry became more agitated with each passing second. Dan, already scared of what he could do, decided to sit several rows behind Terry so as not to annoy him.

"Look," Johnny began, trying to calm the agitated Terry down. "It's not like we know where to look when we get there. We've gotta be smart about this crap. Be resonable. If you were a psycho Gear with a scythe, where would you take a hostage."

"Newark?" replied Dan suddenly.

"You mean Jersey? What the hell's in Jersey?"

"Nothing," Dan replied. "That's why he'd go there. To throw us off."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Directions

choices: And so they board the private jet...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry obviously doesnt like the jinxed pink wearing 'Suck-yo' expert, however he DOES make a good point! Even Galford agrees! "Yes, of course! Who would suspect he'd be waiting for us in the self-proclaimed "Loneliest Place in the World"?! Sure, Chino is a hell of a lot lonelier, but still!"

"The boyfriend of the giant girl with the finger-licking-good bird is right!" Johnny nods, "Such a desterted place WOULD be the perfect spot for a final showdown!"

Terry doesnt say anything... he just marches up to the big screen showing the number of flights available to Newark. Luckily, there's just ONE left and it's about to depart!

He rushes to the desk, "Um..listen! Id like to buy four tickets for the plane leaving to Newark, New Jersey!"

The guy at the desk just tells them, "Sorry. That plane is actually a private jet reserved for Sunaru Utherick, president of Utherick Industries!"

"Sigh... Then can we still get on that plane? We'll pay anything!!"

"You'll have to Mr. Utherick," the guy says.

"Ask me what?" a man in a black business suit appears. He is slightly tall, with long black pony-tail and a solid gold hair-band, and black shades on.

Terry looks to him and asks, "Um... are you Sunaru?"

"Who wants to know?" the guy asks.

"Im Terry Bogard. Listen! We need your help! A crazy madman is holding my brother hostage and if I dont get to New Jersey in less than 3 days.. he'll kill him!! Please sir! We need to use your plane!"

Sunaru doesnt even think for a second! He just says, "Ok, sure! Plenty of room for everybody! C'mon!"

The gang breathes a sigh of relief... except for Galford, because he's worried about his dog, "Um... Mr. Utherick. May I PLEASE bring my dog, Poppy along with us?"

Sunaru just smiles... and speaks in a familiar Russian accent, "...Sure! Just as long as he's not too busy humping the stewardess!!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The name shoulda allready given it away!

choices: Not so fast, Andy!  Something else is here to stop you!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
It took some time to set up, but soon, Andy had created a makeshift trap from stop signs and the building route that, with any luck, would end the nightmare he was facing. All he needed now was for that abominable...

"Andy, come on out!"

There she was.

"I'm over here bitch!" Andy yelled, waving one of the stop signs he severed in the air. Wasting no time, he chucked it at Bernadent, who quickly dodged.

"That was mean! You shouldn't attack your future wife like that!"

Andy didn't reply, but instead ran into a group of tightly grouped together buildings. Watching the slithering naga move behind him, Andy expertetly moved and weaved between the buildings until he heard Bernadent's cry.

"I...I'm stuck!"

Andy smiled. His trap had worked perfectly. Reaching for another of his makeshift roadsign spears, he began approaching the naga.

"Andy wait! What are you doing!"

"This," Andy smugly replied as he drove the spear right into the naga's heart. Then, to add insult to injury, he did so again and again with different spears until she stopped moving completely.

"OK, one insane love interest dead. Now, I can focus on getting out of here."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The trap

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Hmm..." Andy thinks, "AH! Maybe I phone my brother if I can find a payphone somewhere!!"

He tries looking around, trying hard not to stare at the giant dead half-snake woman in the middle of the street....but there isnt a payphone in sight! Nor is there a way out of the city!

"Aw... dammit!" he thinks to himself, "...well.. at least Im alone here..."

Just then... he notices a huge satin-red king sized bed in the middle of the street!

In the middle of the bed... is that damn crow! "Oh crap! It's that freak's crow!"

But that crow suddenly transforms into the lovely and eerie demoness Zio!! Andy could nothing but stare.. she isnt one of his nightmares! ...but she might be one of his scary-yet-strangely erottic fantasies come to life!

She lies on the bed with her hand raised to greet Andy, "Hiya cutie!"

"Oh, uh..um... Hi!"

Zio just grins at him, "You must be tired. Please.. lie down with me!" she taps the part of the bed aside her. "Uh... actually Id rather get going, so-"

Zio just raises her hand... and the dead snake-woman rises off of the ground! She slowly slithers toward Andy with her eyes rolled in the back of her head!!! All that races through Andy's mind is "Aw crap!"

Zio just frowns at him and shouts, "NOW LAY DOWN!!"

"Ok!" he quickly jumps on the bed and lays down! ...It's kinda difficult for him to get comfortable in such a lovely bed while an evil nearly naked demoness is breathing down his neck! And it didnt feel any better when Zio wrapped an icy cold arm around Andy's shoulder and started feeling his cheek with her hand!!

Her touch was unlike anything he's ever felt before! The touch made him shiver all over... it was like his soul was SLOWLY being sucked right out of him!

"....Comfy?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: God, Andy's irresistable!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Say, is there any booze on board?"

Utherick didn't reply, instead, leaving the answer to his personal pilot, Thomas. Instead, he went into the back room, as he usually did after a long meeting, and attempted to fall asleep.

For his guests, sleep was the last thing on their mind. Terry was looking out the window, wondering when he would finally reach Newark and his brother, Johnny was searching for every last drop of liquor, Galford was trying to keep Poppy in place, and Dan was attempting to forumlate a battle plan, to which no one was paying attention.

Seeing this, Dan attempted to try and drag Galford and Johnny away from their seats to pay attention to him.

"Look, we know who the problem is, pinkie. And Testamanet is a bit out of your leauge."

"Is not," Dan stubbornly replied. "Besides, aren't you forgetting something?"

"What?" Galford asked. Johnny sighed, knowing what it was.

"Oh, come on. Ain't no way those girls are gonna head all the way to Newark just to find us."

"Yeah," Galford replied. "They had no idea where we were going!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The flight from hell

choices: The plane feels a little turbulence...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
--Meanwhile in Canada--

Dizzy looked EVERYWHERE on the whole friggin country searching for Johnny... but still no luck!

"Hmm..." she thinks to herself, "If I didnt know any better, I believe Johnny's friend was lying to us!"

"*SNIFF!* SO...MY PINK-SPORTING LOVE IS NOT HERE?!!" Undine said with a tear in her eye. Necro growled, "GRRR!! THEY SHALL SUFFER FOR DISEAVING YOU, MY LADY!!!"

Just then, they see a humongous letter on top of a building.... "Hey, what's that?" Dizzy opens the letter and reads the note inside...

---Meanwhile back at that restaurant--

Mai FINALLY starts waking up! "Uggh....my head... how long was i out, Andy? ....Andy?" He's obviously not there! He ditched her yet again! "ARRRGGGHH!! AGAIN???!!!" But just then, she sees a gigantic letter on a table, "Huh? What's this?"

--Meanwhile back in France--

Nakoruru finally wakes up... "Ahhhh.. Galford? Shouldnt we start heading home now? ...Um... Galford?" He too is not there! "Galford?! ...hmm.. Mamahaha, did you see where he went?" She turns to where her bird is supposed to be... only to see a plate with chicken bones and excess BBQ sauce!!

Nakoruru's jaw drops! "THEY....THEY ATE MY HAWK???!!!! GRRRR.... NO ONE DOES THIS TO ME AND GETS AWAY WITH IT!!!!" But just aside her, is yet another humongous letter!! "What's this? Some kind of letter?"

--Meanwhile with Sakura--

Sakura has allready started reading HER letter... "Hmmm... 'If it is love you wish to see... find your heart in New Jersey'? Hmmm...."

--Back on the private jet--

"Yep! No idea!" Galford smiles!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The Reunion is yet to come!

choices: They're stuck.  On to New Jersey!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
On that happy note, the sound of the cockpit door clanging shut echoed throughout the plane. And at the same time, the television monitors on the seats crackled to life, revealing an all-too-familiar face.

"We interrupt your reguarly scheduled flight for a bit of turbulence!"

The plane began going into an immediate nosedive before any of the passengers could respond, sending the guys careening out of their seats and right into the wall.

"Heheheh. And that's just a preview of what's to come."

"Testament you maniac!" Johnny yelled. "What the hell do you want with us?"

"What do I want?" Testament chuckled through the monitor. "That's simple. All of you out of my way and out of my plans. So, to speed things up a bit..."

The camera quickly panned to a photo of Newark, New Jersey as Testament's voice continued "I'm bringing all the actors together for the grand finale! Long story short, I had one of my men take care of the usual Utherdeck pilot and hijack the plane!"

"Not on my watch!" Terry yelled as he prepared to punch a hole right in the cockpit door.

"Ah, but then, if you used your ki to bust open the door, what are the odds that you wouldn't at the same time blow open a hole in the plane and depressurize the entire plane! I'm sure that falling 70,000 feet to your deaths would be a wonderful way to go out. Now sit down, shut up, and have some of the wine!"

"What's in the wine?" Galford asked.

"A mild sedative. So when you wake up..."

The others could only stare as Johnny collapsed.

"AHEM! So when you wake up, you'll be ready for the final act of the show! We now return to your reguarly scheduled programming!"

The monitors fizzled out as Poppy took hold of a microphone placed on the floor.

"This was all a setup!" Dan exclaimed. "We have to do something!"

"Like what?" Galford asked. "That door's reinforced. If we use explosives, we'll do that depressurization thing!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Destination

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Sunaru stepped out of the bathroom and noticed his new crew looking so glum, "Uh...why so glum, everyone?"

"You didnt hear?!" Dan steps up to him, "It was... HIM! The man that kidnapped my partner's brother! He's hijacked the plane and now we're headed to Newark!"

Sunaru thrusts his arm and quietly lets out a "YES! ...uh...I mean...WHAT?! That is... horrible! No...NO! No, now how will I ever...uh... ship that.. stuff that I endorse?" Sunaru was obviously a bad actor!

Still he removes his glasses, wipes his black-pupiled eyes, and thinks to himself, "Well...Testa-I mean, this man is obviously looking for a fight! At this point, we might as well follow! I just hope...we'll be ok!"

Galford puts a hand on his shoulder and smiles, "Not to worry, Mr. Utherick! Youre safe in our hands! We will not let any harm come to the innocent!"

Sunaru smiles after hearing that, "I very much appreciate your help!" but mutters under his breath, "..do I look like I need a damn babysitter?!"

--Later at night--

The gang is fast asleep in their seats.. even Johnny was graciously put in his seat while he's out cold! The only one that's still awake is Johnny's seat-partner, Sunaru...

He quietly reads a book when he hears Johnny muttering, "Zzzz...hey baby....wanna be the member of the Mile-High Club?"
Sunaru just looks at him strangely... and his voice changes to that of his REAL identity, "What the... are you talking in your sleep?"

"ZZz...oh..that's a sexy thick-throat accent you got there!"

"WHAT THE HELL?!" Sunaru steps back in disgust while Johnny gets up and starts sleep-walking! "Zzz.. How's about adding a little 'cajun-flavor' in your lovely borsch?"

"Good lord, wake up! Wake up, damn cowboy!!"

Just then, Johnny pins Sunaru against a wall and grins at him while his eyes are closed, "Zz... this is ya...captain speaking... we're about to feel some... SEXY VIBRATIONS!!" he says seductively!

Sunaru just glares at him and clenches his fist!! ..His hand catches on fire as he shouts, "LET GO OF ME OR SO HELP ME GOD....!!!!!!!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: WWWWHHHOOOAAA, cowboy!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Attention all passengers, hehehehehe, we have arrived in Newark, New Jersey. I hope you all have a very pleasant experience! HAHAHAHAHAHA!"

The cackling from the intercom was just barely enough to wake Johnny from his slumber. As his eyes opened, he saw Utherick and asked "What are you doing?"

Utherick shoved him out of the way, looking at the window. The others, who had just awakened as well, looked outside.

"He's got henchmen out there, about 50," Dan began.

Terry looked outside. There was no one in sight.

"There's no one out there you idiot! What the hell were you talking about?"

"There's always a bunch of random henchmen in situations like these. Lots of big, ugly guys with clubs and knives, ready to kill."

Galford shook his head. "Knowing this weirdo, it's probably something a lot worse."

"Well, we'd better say hello," Terry replied. "You stay here Mr. Utherick. You'll be safe inside the plane."

Sunaru groaned, mimicking Terry behind his back.

"On 3," Johnny began, "I'll open the door, and we give whatever's out there hell. 1, 2...3!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Landing party...

choices: How is the gang holding up?!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
After the shout of 3, Johnny rammed the door as hard as possible! It broke open.... but after just a millisecond of seeing who's really behind that door, Johnny jumped out of the way of the door!

He then looked to Dan and said, "Uh....Dan... it's for you!"

Dan stepped up to the door... and smiled at who he saw!!

"UNDINE!!!!" he opened his arms to her!
"DANNY!!!!!"

--Meanwhile, with Andy--

Morning over there came.. Andy slowly woke up... and realized the bed he was sleeping on is gone! So is Zio!

"Whoa..." he gets up and scratches his head, "That was weird!" He turns his head and jumps at the sight of the dead Bernadet laying so close to him!!

He shivers for a little bit but tells himself, "Dont worry... she's dead! Dont worry... she's dead!"

However, Bernadet's head starts shaking a little bit! Andy jumps out of the way and looks in terror of what's about to happen!

There's a lump in her throat heading upwards toward her mouth... the lump reaches the inside of her cheek... and her jaws open wide as this certain lump escapes her! This lump... is Birdie!!! Soaked in blood and saliva!

"Oh...thank you god...!!!" Birdie sighs in relief, "Im finally out of that snake-bitches gullet!"

Andy rushes to him, "Oh my god! Are you allright?!"

Birdie wipes some excess saliva off his face, "Whew.. that freaky bastard with a scythe.. spouted some dribble 'bout how I screwed up for the last time! Next thing I knew, da guy tossed me off a building..."

"What happened after that?" Andy asked.

Birdie catches his breathe and points to the giant corpse, "THAT thing caught me at the bottom! and... UGGGHH!! I was stuck in there for hours!!"

Birdie then notices a couple of spears jabbed into her chest, "Whoa... who did THAT?!"

"Uh... that would be me!" Andy smiles!

Birdie gives him a thumbs up, "Smashing job ya did!"

Andy just blushes, "Eh... it was nothing... really!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Free as a Birdie!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
What was outside wasn't the random nameless henchmen Dan promised. And for everyone but Dan, it was a hell of a lot worse.

"Undine! I missed you baby!"

"Danny? Where were you? I had heard about your horrible crabs..."

"Crabs? Don't have those?"

"Wonderful!"

Next to the winged creature were all the other girls the guys had done their best to elude, knock out, or avoid during their journey to Jersey. Mai, Sakura, Nakoruku, and Dizzy were all looking at the plane, waiting for the boys to emerge.

Terry was doing all he could to stop himself from puking as he looked on from the plane.

"We're screwed!" Johnny yelled. "I can't face them!"

Galford, along with Poppy, were panting as well. Although they were silent, their expressions spoke volumes.

"Dammit!" Terry thought. "Well, there's only one thing we can do."

"And that is?" Galford asked.

"Hide!"

Johnny shook his head. "Maybe we can sneak out."

"Sneak out?" Galford asked.

"Yeah. There's gotta be a hatch or something we can slip out from. If we find it, we can get out of here and avoid the girls," he continued, already looking around for a hatch. "Dan's happy out there, so he won't mind being left alone."

"Good point," Terry replied. "OK, everyone look for a hatch!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Stuck in the plane

choices: It looks like it's up to Andy and Birdie...
Who else is gonna save our heroes? Sunaru?
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"There aint one," Sunaru tells Terry as he sips a glass of wine.
"What?! Why not?!" Terry asks him.

"There was an over-budget. I had to make cutbacks somewhere."

"Sigh..fine. Is there an emergengy exit somewhere on this plane?"

"There USED to," Sunaru corrects him, "But they were too expensive, so I had to make more cuts."

Galford's jaw drops, "THERE... THERE ISNT AN EMERGENCY EXIT ON THIS PLACE?! Arent those supposed to be mandatory?!" RAWRF!!

"Come ta think of it," Johnny thinks, "There aint no seatbelts eitha!"

"You'd be suprised how much money you save cutting those uncomfortable 'holier than thou' straps that go around your waist!" Utherick grins!

Terry even starts tapping the windows, "These aint even double-layered! One window just covered with plastic-wrap!"

"Hey!" Utherick points to him, "Theyre about 4 cents a wrap when you buy 'em in bulk! Who NEEDS double-layer?!"

What a shame... their ride's a cheap-ass! And if you thought THAT was painful...

Johnny tries to relax by grabbing himself a bottle of wine and gulping.... but something's... STRANGE about it! He immediately spits it out! "...What the hell?! What kind of piss-water is THIS?!"

"Ah! You must be talking about the Kool-Aid Brand Imitation Wine! 4 out of 5 drunken hicks cant tell the difference!"

Johnny's jaw drops, "Lord have mercy, we've been on a ride with Satan!!!"

*RRRRRRRRRIIIIIPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Just then, the plane rips in half! ...And a few certain smiling giantesses with eerie dilated pupils are all our heroes can see!

The gang just stares up at them in shock (Not Dan, he's too busy being held in Undine's passionate embrace!)

Utherick looks up at them in shock... but then thinks to himself... and breathes a sigh of relief! "Whew! Good thing I popped for that extra 'Overly Horny Giantess With Eerie Dilated Pupils' coverage!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The richer you are, the cheaper you are!

choices: Wait, is that...Terry?  Crap!  We have to save them!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy and Birdie, once enemies by circumstance, were now reluctant allies in the dark wasteland known as Newark, New Jersey. There was still no one in sight, and except for the smell of dead naga, nothing notable about their location.

"Dis is just great," Birdie moaned in his thick British accent. "First Shadaloo goes under and I'm working for a wackjob, and now I'm stuck in nowhersville with a bunch of monsters!"

Andy was still focused on his goal even as Birdie whined. "We need to find a way out of here."

"What the hell are we supposed to do? Call a friggin taxi?! Or maybe hitch a ride?"

"I've looked all over for about 20 blocks. There's no sign of phones, or vehicles, or life."

"I KNOW DAT!"

The two of them continued to walk for a bit longer, when finally, a clue emerged. Unfortunately, it wasn't the clue they wanted to see.

Four gigantic women were crowded around a small plane, including, much to Andy's dismay, the all-too-familar form of Mai!

"Oh, crap."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The long, lonely road

choices: They aint got no money! ALTERNATIVE!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Uh.. you joshin me?!" Birdie looks at Andy strange! "How we gonna do that?!"

--Meanwhile back on the plane--

Our heroes try their damndest to hide from their giant lovers...with minimal success since the plane's practically a flying wreck... well... HALF a flying wreck now!

Sunaru still continues to sip his fake wine... but then pauses for a moment and gasps... he drops his glass and it shatters to pieces!

"The...Heroes of Fate... they are all here now!!" Sunaru then snaps a finger and disappears....

--Back with Andy and Birdie--

"HEY!!! I said how we gonna do that??!!!"

Andy thinks, "I...Im not sure... but we cant just leave Terry and the other guys hanging!! ...Mai or no Mai, Ive gotta do something!"

"Then perhaps I can be of some help!!"
Sunaru appears out of nowhere and tears off his disguise revealing that he's really.... yep.... URANUS!

Birdie politely asked the man, "Who da hell are you?"

"Not important," Uranus answers, "Ive come here to offer my assistance... I know of a solution to rescue your friends from their gigantical oppressors and help put a stop to the Goddess Rebirth!"

Andy just shrugs, "Well.. guess we'll need all the help we can get! How we gonna save them?"

Uranus just looks back at the giants... and grins, "Im afraid this solution... is not for free! If you value their lives... it will cost you!"

Andy growls, "GRRaarrgghh! DAMNIT!! Allright fine! How much?!"

"....Forty bucks."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: You always get your wwwaaaayyy!

choices: No, they have a better plan
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"OK, here's your money", Andy grumbled as he handed two twenty-dollar bills to Uranus. "Now, how do we save them?"

From his jacket, Uranus pulled out two bottles filled with a blue dust, handing one to Andy and the other to Birdie. "This is a special dust. All you need to do is get it by the girls, and it will begin...the cleansing."

"Cleansing?"

Uranus pointed at the girls, continuing. "This dust will remove the tainted water from their bodies, shrinking them back to normal size, and reforming the gate around...her."

"So how do we get it on em?" Birdie asked.

"The cononction must be inhaled to have maximum effect. That means you will need to approach them and force them to inhale the concotion."

Handing his bottle to Birdie, Andy began running off. "Yeah, you can handle that!"

"Oh no ya don't!" Birdie shouted as he grabbed Andy with one of his chains. "You're helpin!"

"You could probably use him as bait," Uranus added. "The girl in the skimpy red outfit wants a piece of him real bad."

"WHAT?!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Money doesn't go as far as it used to.

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Birdie grips Andy's arm tightly thinking to himself while Andy tries commiting 'Coyote Ugly'! (biting off his own arm!)

"Hmm...dat so? Weeellll..." Birdie then looks at Andy with a wicked grin, "Allright, towhead! Youre up!" Birdie then lets go of his arm!

"What?...What do you mean ME?!" Andy growls! Uranus hands him a bottle, "Simple. You need to get her to come to you! But not to worry! When she has grabbed you and brought your to her face, simply sprinkle some in her nostril cavities and she will be out like a light while the dust works its way inside her and destroys the poison! It's just THAT simple!"

Andy just stared for a couple of seconds, "Uh... ok." He slowly walks up toward the gigantic Mai shivering more and more and he steps closer to her..

He gulps... then shouts, "HEY!!! MAI!!! GUESS WHO!!!"

"Hmm?" Mai turns her head... and looks down with a HUGE smile on her face! "ANDY!! YOURE BACK!!!!" In a heartbeat, she grabs him tightly and picks him up!!

Andy sighs, "..here goes nothing!" he pours some dust out of the bottle and into his hand and tosses it up Mai's nostrils!!
"HUH?!" Mai puts her hand to her face... her pupils shrink down to normal size... and so does the rest of her body! Andy quickly breaks free of the shrinking grip and lands gently on the ground! Mai on the other hand feels a little woozy, "Whhoooaaa... Andy... I dont feel so good..." *THUD!* "Zzzzz...."

It looks like the dust worked! Andy gently picks up Mai and sets her down on a parkbench! "Sleep easy Mai... cuz that's the closest youre ever gonna get to sleeping with me!"

Birdie does the little thrust with his arm and hollers, "YESS!!!!" Uranus grins, "Yep yep yep... but there are still others! We have to act fast!!"

Who's next?
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: They've still got a LOONNG way to go!

choices: She ignores it and focuses on Terry.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
The choice was obvious as Andy looked up at the girls. There was pinkie, Steve McQueen wannabee, random ninja, and his brother. Duty already decided who needed to be saved.

"I need a distraction."

"Wuzzat?" Birdie asked, feigning ignorance.

"I need you to get the schoolgirl's attention. While you're doing that, I'm going to give her some of the knock out dust."

"How am I supposed to do that?"

"You'll think of something!" Andy shouted as he ran off to hide behind a concrete building.

Birdie looked on with a feeling of dread building up. He didn't know how to get her attention, she was too busy trying to peel the other Bogard's clothes off. His chain would probably amount to an insect bite to her. Quite frankily, he was stumped.

So with no other alternative, Birdie jumped onto Sakura's foot and started hitting it with his broken chain, hoping to draw blood.

"Hey! Bitch! Down here!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Brother in need

choices: Someone needs to pry him off Birdie!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
That did it! Sakura damn sure heard the person that called her a bitch! She looked down at him with an angry glare that made Birdie wanna wet himself! She grabbed him right off the ground and held him TIGHT!

"...WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY?!" she roared!

Meanwhile Andy entered the building and starting climbing up stairway after stairway until finally he reached the rooftop! Sakura's head was just in reach! So as stealthly as possible, he poured the magic dust in his hand slowly stepped toward her..

"I SAID, WHAT DID YOU SAY??!!!" she asked Birdie once again!

"Uh..um...I said...uh... 'Hey... I wish I had...beer'! Yup! Dat's what I said!" ...sadly Sakura did not believe him!

Luckily Andy jumped on her shoulder and shouted, "HEY BITCH! Over HERE!" When Sakura turned her head, he blew the dust in her face! She dropped little Terry and Birdie... luckily Uranus put two king-sized beds on the ground to break their fall! Her pupils shrunk back to normal size and so did her body!

When she regained her normal size again, she started getting dizzy, "...Uggghh...night night..." *THUD!* "Zzzzz..."

The Bogard brothers gave eachother a hug! "Aw, bro, it's good to see you again!" "Oh man.. I thought that bastard killed you!"

"Ugghh! Will you cut that mushy crap out?! Youre supposed to be guys!" Uranus said in disgust!

Terry did a double take when he saw him, "URANUS?!! YOURE here too?!"
Andy smiles, "Oh yeah... that guy helped me save you! Oh.. HIM too!"

Birdie slowly stepped to him and smiled nervously, "Uh....g'day!"

Terry's nostrils flared at the sight of him! "YOU!!!!!" He jumped on Birdie and started choking him!!! "YOURE ONE OF THAT CRAZY FREAK'S GOONS!! I'm gonna KILL ya!!"

Birdie started to cut short of breath! "AUGH...UGH!!!...Elp....me!!!"

Andy tries to pry him off, "HEY! Terry! Cut it out! He's one of us!!"
Uranus just stares and tries not to laugh! "YES!... THAT'S how guys are supposed to act!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Another one bites the dust!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry wouldn't let go of Birdie's neck no matter what hs brother did to pry him off. Finally, in a fit of annoyance, Uranus grabbed Terry by the ear and began yanking on it.

"Ow ow ow!"

"Let him go," Uranus snorted, "or else I rip it off!" Not wanting to become another Van Gogh, Terry immediately obliged.

"What have I told you idiots a thousand times?" Uranus shouted with the tone of an enraged schoolteacher. "If you're going to conquer this threat, you have to work together! That means not trying to kill each other!"

Terry nodded his head in shame as Birdie laughed. But he was quickly slapped on the head by Uranus, forcing him to refocus on the task at hand.

"Now, the girls?"

"Right!" Andy exclaimed. "We need to get them to breathe this dust!"

"Then get to it!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Back to work!

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Birdie gets up off the ground and notices his bottle's cracked! It must have broke when Terry tackled him! "HEY! MA THING'S BROKE!"
Uranus sighs and pulls another bottle out of his pocket, "Do NOT make me regret stopping Terry from choking you to death!"

*YOINK!*

Just then, a crow snatches the bottle right out of Uranus's hand! "What the hell?!" The crow flies away and lands on the shoulder of that creepy Gear-bastard... TESTAMENT!!

"YOU!!" Terry yells to him in sheer fury! Testament grins and grabs the bottle, "Oh, Im sorry... did you need this?" ....and smashes it in his hand! "...OOPSIE DAISY!" Terry at this point wants to charge at him, but Uranus puts his arm in front of him, "Concentrate on the task at hand!"

"You heard your daddy, Bogard!" Testament mocks him, "...Oh wait! That's not your daddy! Geese killed HIM!"

Andy tries to restraint Terry as well, "C'mon, man! Dont let him get to you!" But Testament just replies, "Hey Andy! I heard what you did to your ex-fiancee... however... what makes you think I cant... BRING HER BACK??!!"
Andy's pupils minimize, "...What?...What do you mean?"

"With a wave of my hand, I can remove those spears from her broken heart, heal her wounds, and reunite the serpent-girl with her one true love!"
Andy's jaw drops from hearing that, "....WE GOTTA KILL THIS GUY!!!" But Uranus tries to stop him! "Dammi man, he's screwing with your head! Suck it up!"
"Whoa whoa wait a minute!" Terry says, "..Serpent-girl? ..uh.. you mean Bernadet? That chick in your nightmare that was the reason you had to sleep in my room for about a week?"

Birdie and Uranus snicker a bit at what he said causing Andy to start turning red, "You...you promise you wouldnt tell!!!"
"OY! He-she's gettin away!!" Birdie points at Testament just simply walking away from the group!

"Forget him!" Uranus demands, "We need to rescue the other Heroes of Fate!"
"B..but didnt you hear what he said?!" Andy said hysterically!
"Yes yes, poor you and all that mess! Now c'mon!"

"AHEM!!" Terry interrupts, "We're dealing with obessive horny giants here! Id WAY rather take my chances with the freak and his bird!!"

"Yeah!" Andy agrees, "Do you have ANY idea what it's like being chased down an incredibly obsessive giant girl that is mostly after you for very evil and scary intentions?!"
Uranus pauses... he says nothing. He just turns his head and a flashback...

---
Uranus is imprisoned in a tiny little birdcage in the hand of a gigantic eerie woman... with grey skin, long blue hair, shining blue-eyes, with an odd tattooed symbol on her cheek! She smiles at Uranus while he continues to rattle his cage!

???: Heheheh... silly little man. Is it not comfy in your new home?

Uranus: Grrrr!! Damn... damn... DAMN woman! I swear to all that is holy... you will PAY for what you've done!!!!! ARRRRRRGGGGGHHHHH!!!!!!
---

"...Yes. Yes I do."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Should I stay or should I go?

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Testament flew off, laughing at the bewildered heroes. Although Andy was more than ready to give chase, he held his ground, and instead, looked at the sand on the ground, trying to gather it.

"Is this enough?"

"Only for one of the girls," Uranus replied. "And any more bottles will be twenty dollars a piece."

"But I don't have that kind of money!" Andy protested.

"Too bad. No money, no antidote."

Andy shouted "Cheapass!" while running off towards the nearest target. Content to let Johnny sweat in Dizzy's overprotective grip, he made a beeline for Galford and Nakoruru. Terry, not wanting to leave his brother alone, gave chase.

"Uh...what do I do?" Birdie asked, looking on.

"For the moment, try and gather up all the dust you have. That or $20 cash."

*******************************************************

"You're mean Galford! First you let poor, poor Mamahaha get eaten, and then you run away from me! Well, just for that, you're going to have to really make me feel good!"

"It wasn't my fault! I SWEAR!" Galford protested, but to no avail. Luckily, before Nakoruru could begin her torture, he noticed the Bogard brothers thankfully heading right for him.

"HELP!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Picking up the pieces

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Seeing as though Nakoruru was allready focused on her tiny little friend, she was unable to notice Terry and Andy plotting Galford's escape from her grasp.
"Hey Andy!" Terry turned his head to him, "How 'bout a lift?" and squatted on the ground. Andy stood as far back as he could.... then ran towards Terry.... and jumped on his shoulders!

"ALLEY-OOP!" Andy was launched up into the air and high enough to land on Nakoruru's hine leg!

"What the?" Nakoruru felt something grab on to her hip, she looked down and saw Andy grabbing a hold of her! When she picked him and asked, "What are you doing?" Andy simply replied, "THIS!" and blew dust in her face!!

Her pupils minimized and she started walking dizzy... Andy climbed to her other hand and was able to pry Galford out as she shrunk back to normal! When she finally reached normal size, she fell into Galford's arms! "G...Galford? ...w...what happened?"

"Eh, just a bad dream!" he smiled at her, "Now c'mon! You need your rest!" He set her gently down on a parkbench.
"Ok! That's another one!" Terry smiled in relief! "Uh.. Birdie? Did you gather up enough dust for one more?"
"Yep! Gave it to Uranus, I did!"
"*SSSSSSSNNNNNIIIIIFFFFFF!!!* ...OoooOhhhhHHh... gave what to me now?" Oh crap! ...That cheap bastard just snorted it!!!

"WHAT IN THE HELL?!" Birdie snapped at him, "WE NEEDED THAT!!" "Oh, my apologies!" Uranus smiled, "Id be happy to give you another... for the low low price of $20!"

"No way! NO WAY!!" Terry growled! "That dust was supposed to be for Dizzy! YOU just OD'd it! We demand a free one!"
But the old man just snickered, "Heh...free? FREE?! Oh Im afraid not, my tow-headed friends! Buyer beware!"

Terry, Andy, and Birdie planned on rushing the guy, but Galford just stepped up to him calmly, "Sir.. I suggest you give us a free bottle, or I will have to resort to drastic measures!"
"Oh lordy... not drastic measures..." he said sarcastically, "PSSTT! Need I remind you I can kill all your asses with barely a fingernail?"

"I warned you.." Galford then pulls out an eerie necklace with a shining blue glow! Uranus's eyes widen at seeing it, "Oh god... that's... HER necklace! No...NO!! GET HER AWAY FROM ME!! GET AWAY!!!" He starts to imagine that gigantic woman from his old flashback smiling down at him!

***
????: Hello, Uranus! (she smiled at him while holding a little 'Uranus' doll in her hands!) It's been such a long while since we played...
Uranus: Chronos!! You...You cant be here! I killed you LONG ago!! YOURE SUPPOSED TO BE DEAD!!!
Chronos:Are you ready to play our favorite game?
Uranus: Oh... God no!! NOT CAT & MOUSE!!! I HATE CAT & MOUSE!!!
(With a snap of her fingers, she grows catears, sharp claws, cat fangs, and a tail!)
Chronos: MEEEEEOOOOOOWWWWWW!!! (She arches her back and gets ready to pounce on the poor tiny man....)
Uranus: STOP!!!! I DONT WANNA PLAY!!! I DONT WANNA PLAY!!! AAAAAAGGGGHHHHHHHH-
***

"AAAAAAAA-huh?" Uranus snaps out of it! It was all just an old ninja-illusion technique!

"NOW..." Galford smiles, "I'll ask you again... may we PLEASE have the extra bottle now?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: THAT'LL teach that wise-ass!

choices: That's the end of the giants, now for Testament!
Testament has another obstacle to face our heroes
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"OK OK fine!" Uranus yelled, pulling out another vial of dust. "Take it, just stop it with the crazy illusions!"

Galford took the dust as soon as it was handed to him. "Thank you. Now, one girl left."

"What happens after that?" Andy asked. Uranus didn't reply.

Terry seemed unconcerned. "Ah, he's just sore we scared him to death. Now, let's get to work."

Andy nodded. "Right. Crazy winged girl needs antidote. Galford, you give it to her, the rest of us will distract her."

"Will do."

The group got to work almost immediately, having refined the shrink technique to an art. Birdie whipped Dizzy's feet, causing her to look down at the gangster, while Terry yelled something at Undine and Necro, forcing their attention off. Finally, Galford slipped in, and with the practice honed from his ninjistu training, slipped Dizzy the antidote. Then the group watched as Dizzy shrunk down and released Johnny.

"Too easy," Galford boasted.

"Yeah, yeah," Johnny scoffed, looking at his jacket. "Why did you wait to do me last?"

"It wasn't your fault," replied Andy. "Just...pinkie."

"Yeah, but he enjoyed it."

"Well, now what?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Discount

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
It seemed like the easiest question in the world for Terry, "...We find Testament!!"
As for Dan, he's practically kneeling down near his love Undine nearly sobbing, "SNIFF! Undine?! UNDINE! Speak to me!!!"

"Im allright, Danny dear!" Undine woke up and smiled, "the antidote only affected Ms Dizzy!"

Dan's smiled brightly! "UNDINE!!!" the two of them hugged... embraced... kissed... felt eachother... the rest of the gang didnt know whether to go "AWWWWW" or "UGGGHH"!

"Aww... such lovely romance between a grotesque human and a freakadelic tramp's right wing makes me sick to my 12 stomachs!"

That freak appeared out of nowhere! Testament!
"Testament..." Terry stepped up to him and grinned, "You've lost! There are no more weird giantesses at your disposal!"
