But Testament just brought his head back and laughed, "Hehehehe....HAHAHAHAHAHA! THEM?! No... they were just there to give you a hellova hard time! I dont need THEM to restore my lady!"

"What are you talking about?!" Uranus stepped up to him, "We've taken out the poison from the tainted soda from their bodies! Your goddess CANT be restored!"

Testament just turned to Undine and said, "You wanna tell them... or should I?!"
"Undine?" Dan looked at her, "...What is he talking about?"
She just lowered her head in shame, "I... I... I own half of Saikyo Cola Industries.... I helped endorse the tainted soda..."

"You WHAT?!"

"That's right lover boy!" Testament added, "Thanks to her, Saikyo Cola has become a well-known brand name! We have sold millions worldwide! All over the world, moronic humans are drinking this stuff, tainting their bodies, destroying their insides, sacrificing their well-being... for the sake of Myria!! And I couldnt have done it without your girlfriend!"

"Is...is this true?" Dan asked her, "Did you really help to wipe out my kind?!"
Undine started to break into tears, "..Im sorry! I thought I could finally make something of myself! Not just always be thought of as some useless appendage of some super being! I... I just wanted to be my own person!"

Dan shed a tear, "I cant believe this... you did something so horrible... just to make a name of yourself?! I even aided this horrible process..."
"I know, but-"
"And the worst part of all... IVE YET TO GET MY CUT!! I only got a measly quarter a can, while you sat high and mighty up in your executive office!! How is THAT for fair?!"
"Dan...."
"Dont talk to me," Dan walked away from her, trying to hide his tears. Undine put her hands to her face and started sobbing.

Necro just stared and thought to himself, "...I need a drink..."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: What's love got to do with it?!

choices: Uranus has a plan, but it'll cost them
Someone else has a plan, but will it work?
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry gasped. First, at Dan's little show, but then, at the reprocussions of what he just heard.

"You do realize what would happen if that stuff had the same effect on everyone else that it did on the girls, right?"

"Look bro, I'm pretty sure Blue Mary didn't drink it. And if she did."

"You IDIOT!" Terry yelled. "This goes way beyond giant horny girlfriends! This is an epidemic! There could be...thousands of giant girls, millions!"

"Well I'm not telling," Testament cackled.

"Come down here and fight!" Andy yelled. "You coward!" Testament merely chuckled.

"Like I said before, boy, I'm not vunerable to my manhood being attacked by stupid mortals. If you have a problem with it, too bad!" And with that, Testament vanished once more.

Birdie's thoughts were only slightly more positive. "We're boned, huh?"

"Oh yeah," Galford replied.

"Now now," Uranus reassured them, "we can't despair because of this epidemic! What we need...is a plan!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: But that means...

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Ya'll got a plan in mind?" Johnny asked him.

"Um...I MIGHT," Uranus says with a devious grin, "But unfortunately, I cant think of it right now... however, $40 might help refresh my memory!"

Galford just says, "I dont have $40, but I do have something just as good..." and he pulls out a certain necklace...

"OH WAIT!!! I uh... just remembered the plan all of a sudden!!!" Uranus shouts.
"Well?! What is it?!" Andy asks.

And so Uranus tells them, "As of now, it'd be impossible to cure EVERY single person tainted by the cursed soda. So, I figured... it's best we let Myria become reawakened..."

"WHAT?! ARE YOU KID-"

"HEAR ME OUT!" Uranus interrupts, "We could confront her in a final battle!! If we manage to destroy her, we can still save the human race before she annihilates them!!"

"Would we stand a chance against her?" Birdie asks. "Unfortunately we dont," the old man answers, "However, Ive heard tale of an ancient jewel that can bestow incredible power to the wearer that just might tip the battle in our favor: The Oberon Ruby!"

Dan, still depressed and heartbroken, just mutters, "Fine, whatever..."

Uranus continues, "The bad news is... I have no idea where this Ruby is. And worst news, Testament's close follower, Zio, does!! Question is, which one of you will try to persuade the likes of HER?!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: The Oberon Ruby

choices: Uranus is wrong.  Now, as for Andy and Zio...
Uranus is right.  The giant lady problem has only started!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Everyone looked at Andy as soon as Uranus finished his speech about the ruby. The stares lasted for a minute until Andy replied.

"Oh you can all just go to hell!"

"Do it Andy!" Uranus yelled. "You're the only one here with the phermones to get it done."

"But..."

"No 'buts' boy, unless it the one you're slappin!"

Andy looked on glumly, then wandered into the dark, lonely city in an attempt to pin down Zio. The others just looked on, unsure of what to say. Everyone except Birdie, anyway.

"Eh, let im go. He'll be alright. Boy has a lot of experience with girls, right?"

"Not really," Terry replied. "I can't help but wonder whether or not this was a good idea."

Galford nodded. "It was either your brother seduces the demon, or we go outside the city and face several thousand giant women."

"We don't know that!" Terry yelled. "For all we know, they could just be sick, being used as vessels to help bring about this grand ressurection thingy."

"It is possible," Uranus replied. "Then again, Testament might just be amassing a group of more giant love interests to tear you all apart! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Everyone looked dumbfounded at Uranus until he replied "It's possible."
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Andy- no luck with women

choices: A wooden stake and bottle of holy water!
A boquet of flowers and box of chocolates!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Feeling like he said something REALLY stupid, Uranus pulled out a bottle of amnesia power and blew it in everyone's faces! Due to loss of memory, the conversation started over..

"...I can't help but wonder whether or not this was a good idea," Terry says once again.
Galford nodded. "It was either your brother seduces the demon, or we go outside the city and face several thousand giant women."
"We don't know that!" Terry yelled. "For all we know, they could just be sick, being used as vessels to help bring about this grand ressurection thingy."

"Uh.....could be," Uranus agrees trying not to embarass himself like earlier!

---Meanwhile with Andy---

And so, the brave Andy Bogard continued down the abandoned streets of Newark. To avoid going through paranoia, he constantly tells himself, "C'mon! Ive killed Bernadet, cured Mai, and saved my brother and his friends... Zio wont be much of a problem!! It's for the ruby! It's for the ruby!"

But then he stopped to think... he was not armed well enough to face a demoness. If he was going to 'persuade' her to talk, he is gonna need to be well.... EQUIPPED!

Luckily he stopped in front of a Walmart. And since no one was inside, he could just swipe whatever he needed and not have to pay!

"...Here goes nothing," he bit his lip and walked in... and grabbed...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Preparing yourself...

choices: Nice going Andy!  She's dead and hasn't told you!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy busted down the doors to the store, and quickly went inside. Once there, he found exactly what he needed to face the demoness, a vial of holy water and several wooden stakes. Hurriedly, he left the store. He was sick of waiting, sick of all the crap. He was going to end this right now.

Sure enough, Zio arrived, looking at him eagerly.

"Well well AGH!"

Andy didn't waste any time. He put one stake right in her heart, and another on each of her wings, pinning them to each other to prevent her from flying away. And for the final touch, he dropped the entire bottle of holy water on her face, watching as it burned her.

"AGH!"

"Shut up!" Andy yelled annoyed as he reached to grab Zio. "Now, I'm going to ask you some questions, and you DAMN well better answer them! Got it!?"

Zio nodded, her face showing signs of agony.

"Now, the Oberon Ruby. Where is it?!"

Zio muttered "don't know." This only provoked Andy to drive another stake into her heart.

"WHERE IS IT?!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Getting to the damn point

choices: He'll figure it out sooner or later...
" Why does my shadow look so big and girly?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Uh...um....uh..."

Tired of Zio's stalling, Andy pulls out one last stake, brings it to her face, and gives her fair warning, "TELL ME OR YOURE LOSING YOUR VIRGINITY TO IT!!!" Zio without a doubt knows what he's talking about! Which is why she immediately screams, "OK! OK!! I...gave it to a girl to guard it!! She's wearing it like an earring?"

"WHO?! Who'd you give it to?!!"

Zio thinks hard, "I...I dont know her name! She's a young friend of Johnny! Uh... a girl with brunnette hair who wears an orange pirate's cap and dress!! That's all I know! I SWEAR!!!"

Andy stares her in the eyes... "Thanks." Not only that, but he is actually very compassionate enough to gentle pull the stakes back out of Zio's wings and chest as carefully as possible! He even pulls out a bottle of rubbing alcohol and hands it to her. But before anything sentimental would happen, Andy then says, "...now SCRAM!"

Zio lets out a relieved sigh, transforms back into a crow and limps away!

-----

The gang all saw that little event happen through Uranus's crystal ball!! Their jaws dropped after seeing Andy's resort to making Zio talk!! ...except for Dan, he doesnt really show any ounce of emotion other than depression...

Uranus's head turned to Terry and said, "...Your brother is a freak!"
"Wait a minute!" Johnny speaks up, "That girl that the demon chick mentioned... THAT'S GOTTA BE MAY!!!"

Terry sighs, "God... Dan did you-"

"NO, I DIDNT SELL ANY MORE OF THAT DAMN SODA!!!" Dan's nostrils flared and he roared his answer!

The gang just slowly backs away from him...
-----

Andy tries to find his way back to his gang... but unfortunately he got lost!

"DAMMIT! I KNEW this was gonna happen!" he mumbles to himself! "Ok, just need to retrace steps... I took a right at that wrecked Pinto, headed straight passed that dead naga in the road, turned left after that stop sign with the words 'in the name of love' graffittied on it, then stopped and busted into a Walmart.... then headed south near a humongous anchor..."

Andy looks at the gigantic anchor in the middle of the road and thinks back, "...Wait a sec! I dont remember seeing that giant anchor there before!!"

Unknown to him, there's a orange boot about a few inches behind Andy!!!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: That damn ruby better be worth it!

choices: Andy runs like a little girl!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"Why does my shadow look so big and girly?"

Andy saw the shadow in back of him, but rage and other factors had blinded him to the obvious truth. All he saw in front of him was an annoyance on top of a dozen other annoyances. So he began stepping on the shadow, to no effect.

"What the hell?! WHAT THE HELL!?" the furious Andy shouted as he continued stomping his foot into the ground. "Why is it that every single weird thing is happening today? What did I possibly do to deserve it?"

After about two minutes of stomping, Andy grew tired and began walking away, but not before noticing the anchor again. That anchor, so out of place, in the middle of nowhere. How it infuriated him. It begged to be hit, and punched, and kicked.

"YOU KNOW, YOU SHOULDN'T HIT THINGS THAT AREN'T YOURS."

"Like I care!" Andy paid the voice no mind as he continued to pound on the anchor, his fists and feet doing little more than chipping off bits of metal.

"YES, BUT WHAT IF THE OWNER COMES BACK FOR IT?"

"Then I'll kick their ass too," Andy replied almost immediately.

"WILL YOU NOW? YOU SHOULD TURN AROUND."

Ready to attack this new annoyance, Andy turned around, but his anger quickly dissapeared when he saw the presence in front of him, a 200 foot tall girl with an oversized hat, picking up the anchor like it was nothing.

"SO, WHAT WERE YOU GOING TO DO TO ME?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Andy- With 35% more anger and 50% less common sens

choices: Andy tries to 'sweet-talk' May for the Ruby!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy was on a roll... his intrepidness knew no bounds! No one could stop him! But the second he saw the gigantic pirate girl grinning at him smugly, his manly attitude reduced to paste! Bye bye, Hefty, Hello Wimpy!

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!!" he screamed off the top of his lungs and started running like a little girl!

"OH HO NO YOU DONT!!" May giggled as she grabbed tiny little Andy and picked him off the ground! She stared at him for a few minutes... then looked down at her anchor, "Aw, look! It's all scratched up, thanks to you!!!"

Andy replied, but due to absolute fear, all that would come out of his mouth was gibberish, "AH beluga da efinibah la chubin midu rigi peleyidididiya fella buh!"

May just ignores his gutless pleading, she just sighs, "Johnny gave me that as a birthday present!" she even swoons to herself, "Sigh.... Johnny... I wish he were here right now..."

Andy could not believe his ears, "B b buh TOMMY?!" That girl! SHE must be Johnny's young friend that has the Oberon Ruby on her! However he's in no position to ask her for that Ruby!

"Say...." May looks down at Andy with an eerie smile, "You look a lot like Johnny!! You know, without the pony-tail!"

....Although Andy is a little terrified of May... an idea comes to mind!! He bites his lip, tries to shake off that spineless attitude, and goes for it!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: New Improved Andy-Now with 0% Spine!!

choices: He leads May right to Johnny!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy saw his objective right in front of him, but had no way to get it. At least, not with the normal methods. Therefore, it was time for an alternate form of persuasion.

"Look, don't feel bad. I'm pretty sure Johnny is looking for you too."

May sniffled slightly, looking down at Andy with decidedly less anger than before. "You think so?"

"Erm...yes of course!" he shouts. "I know he's missing you! But..."

May's eyes widened. "You know where Johnny is?!"

"Well, yeah. I..."

Andy couldn't finish his sentence as May began squeezing him tightly. "Please, please tell me where he is!"

"He's busy!" Andy yelled. May let him go upon hearing this, much to his relief.

"What's he doing?"

"Well, it's a long story, and I really don't have the time right now."

"Oh come on! Can't you help me find Johnny?"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: A way with words?

choices: "SUCKER!!!" Andy runs off with the Ruby!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy thinks for a bit... and an idea comes to mind! Perhaps he could make some kind of deal...

"Uh... I'll tell you what," Andy says, "That earring of yours... Johnny needs it."

"What? This thing?" May points to the Oberon Ruby, "I was told to guard it. What's it for anyway? And why does Johnny need it?"

Andy explains, "Long story short, Johnny is in serious trouble! He is trying to stop an evil being from destroying the world... and that earring of yours will seriously come in handy!"

"Uh... it will?"

"Yep!" Andy smiles, "That is necessary to save the world! Can I take it so that I may bring it to Johnny?"

"Not so fast!" May stops him, "Im not giving anybody anything until I see Johnny! Where is he?!"

"Uh....ummmm....." Andy thinks for a good excuse.... here it comes! "I'll tell you what! If you hand me the earring, I will gladly take you to Johnny!"

May thinks for a while, "Hmm.... uh... you promise?"

"I promise!" Andy tells her.

And with that, May releases the grip on Andy, plucks the Ruby from her ear and hands it to him! "There ya go! Now take me to Johnny!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Who says the art of negotiation is dead?

choices: OK, they have the Oberon ruby, what now?
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Andy's first thought was to run away. Yet, he didn't. His mind flashed back to all the prior events of the day, namely that every time he ran away from a woman, things just became worse.

"Just follow me. I'll lead you right to him."

"OK!"

*********************************************************

The group had been getting extremely bored waiting for Andy to return. With no way out and the plane ripped in two, Birdie began looking around for an alternative means of transport in case they needed to make a quick getaway. The others just stood around, bored out of their minds.

That all changed when Andy began walking up with a thundering boom following him.

"Uh, bro, what's that?"

"Well, I found the Oberon Ruby. And I found her as well."

Johnny gulped as he looked up at the face, a face filled with pure joy.

"Johnny! I missed you! Andy was right, you were here!"

Johnny had no time to react as May picked him up and reached for him, putting him in a tight embrace. Completely unprepared, Johnny knew that Andy was behind this.

"You asshole!"

Andy paid him no mind, showing the Oberon Ruby to Uranus.

"Good, good! You found it! Now we can begin with our plan!"
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: A lesson learned, to Johnny's dismay

choices: Testament appears... with some BAD news!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
Terry, getting awfully tired of the little adventure he's been forced to be a part of finally asked the quesion, "Ok, we finally got the damn Ruby! Now what about this plan youre talking about?"

"...Huh? ...OH! Oh uh... yes... yes the plan! Of course..." Uranus responses as if he seems quite unsure of himself.

But Galford just points up at May, "But uh... what about Johnny? Shouldnt we uh..."

But Birdie just blows him off, "Eh, girl aint hurting him, is she?" Johnny just lets out a disappointed sigh as May's nuzzling against him!

Dan sadly still hasnt snapped out of the heartbreak stage... he shows no interest in their mission anymore. It seems the carefree happy-go-luck Dan we all know and love is dead... dead, rotting, and dug up by graverobbers that come to steal his watch!

Birdie, kinda acting like the big-brother of the group just pats Dan's shoulder and says, "Chin up, lad."

You know, a while has passed since Terry asked Uranus the question, and he STILL didnt answer it! So Terry asked once more, "Hey Uranus! What about the plan? What do we do now?"

The old man just stares with a worried look on his face, "I...dont know."

"What?"

"I have absolutely no clue what to do next!! I dont even know how to use the damn Ruby! I... I... am out of ideas..."

And if you thought THAT was painful...
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Plan? What plan?

choices: Actually, you see that over there?  That's Myria!
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
The ruby, without any warning, suddenly split into multiple pieces, each one glowing a dull red. No one was really sure of what to make of it.

"Is that good or bad?" Galford asked. Uranus didn't reply.

"Let's see," Andy began as he looked on at the pieces of the ruby. "There's 6 pieces here. One for me, one for Terry, one for Galford, one for Birdie, one for Johnny, and one for Dan."

Dan didn't reply when his name was called, instead still sitting down and looking at the ground with no expression on his face but remorse. Birdie tried to avoid laughing.

"Just cuz you look like that Ryu guy doesn't mean you fight like him ya know." Dan didn't even reply to that.

"I am officially confused," Galford interrupted. "What does this mean? What's coming here for us?"

"How about...YOU FRIGGIN HELP ME!" yelled Johnny, still in May's tight grip. The others ignored him, leaving the pirate alone with his crewmate.

Terry seemed the most relaxed. "All we can do is wait, I guess."

"Wait? For what?" Andy asked.
1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.title: Picking up the pieces...

1141121212211222211121212121111211112212.content:
"For your untimely deaths!" shouts a familiar evil voice! Just then, the sky becomes incredibly brighter than usual!! It's as if another Sun magically appeared... and it pretty much did! A huge sphere of bright light emerged from the clouds!!

"W..What is that?" Terry points up to it. Uranus just lowers his head in shame and mutters to himself, "Damnit... we're too late!"

To make matters worse, a whole swarm of crows gather up together on the ground and transform into a black shadow... that shadow... turns into Testament!!
"That bright light," he grins, "is Myria!! BEHOLD OUR GODDESS IN ALL HER GLORY!!!!"

"Pst! THAT'S her?" Johnny points up it, "That big light up there is her? What's she gonna do? Hurt our eyes to death?" However May just grips Johnny tightly worried for his sake!

"Oh that. She hasnt assumed her truel immortal form yet!" Testament answers, "She is finally unbinded by the tainted river! All that remains to make her complete... is a SACRIFICE!!!"

"Uh...a sacrifice?" Andy asks.

"Yes..." Testament grips his scythe, "a LIVING sacrifice!!" The gang allready knows what he's talking about! To give Myria her full power, someone has to die! They get ready to defend themselves... but Testament goes after the one that isnt... DAN!!

Despite the little mishaps from earlier, the gang still worries for Dan's sake!! "LET HIM GO!!!" Terry screams!

Testament just points the scythe at Dan's throat, "He has served us well! It should be an honor for him to end his services this way!"
"C'mon guys! We gotta help him!" Galford calls out to his team! Ruff!!

Unfortunately, Dan just raises his hand to stop them and just says in an unemotional tone, "...Go ahead. Make it quick."
Testament just smiles at him, "Heheh! I admire your courage, human! Not afraid to embrace death unlike the rest of your pathetic kind!!"

Dan raises his head back as Testament brings his scythe back about to slice out his throat!...
"...OW!!!" Just then, a big sharp icicle shot Testament in the back! He turns his head to see who shot him...

Dan is suprised at who he sees, "...UNDINE?!!"
Undine glares at Testament and steps toward him while dragging Dizzy's unconscious body behind her! "TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF MY DANNY!!!!!!"

"Please! Take my life instead! For what I've done I deserve to die!"

It only took Testament two seconds to reply to that. Raising his scythe into the air, he prepared to draw it down, when another scythe blocked the blow.

"Don't I get a say in this?!" interrupted the undead form of Necro.

"Actually," replied Testament as he drew his scythe forward for another blow, "NO!"

Despite the fact that Necro was attached to an unconscious body, he moved forward as quickly as he could to parry and block Testament's attacks. Unfortunately, just as he saw an opening, Undine attempted to shove him aside!

11411212122221.content:
Walking the streets of Tokyo, ignoring the pain from his various bruises, Dan continued to look for someone to sell his cola to. Alas, people would rather buy their drinks from vending machines than a guy in a pink gi.

When all hope seemed lost, he noticed a small crowd. Like a moth to the flame, he approached, and noticed who was attracting the attention.

"Hey! Isn't she that idol from the TV?"

"Yeah!" replied a nearby passerby. "Athena Asamiya! She's signing autographs before her concert tonight!"

The man wasn't lying. Athena, in a bright red dress which seemed to illuminate light, was signing autographs and accepting gifts from the crowd of fans.

And it was then that Dan got his idea. If he gave Athena Saikyo cola, and she liked it, he'd have a celebrity endorsement, and be able to disprove Sakura's claims that it turned people into giants! After all, who are people going to believe, a schoolgirl or a pop idol?

Shoving his way through the crowd, Dan quickly made his way to the front.

"Ms. Asamiya!"

Looking towards Dan, the pop idol replied "Yes?" It was then that Dan held out the cola can.

"I was wondering if you were thirsty..."

"Actually, I am. Thanks!"

Dan couldn't believe his luck as Athena drank down the cola. He was ready to begin celebrating when the crowd gasped, looking at their idol.

"What's going on?"

"I don't know! It looks like...she's growing!"

As Dan turned around, he realized the people weren't lying. Athena, much to her own shock and the shock of the people around her, was getting bigger and bigger. Stunned, he could only watch as she continued to grow.

And somewhere in the back of his mind, he planned to apologize to Sakura. If he survived this.

1152111.content:
Leon was on his way to rescuing Ashley. He just got done battling it out with a gigante, so he was pretty much used to bigger things out to kick his ass, but something else was in store for him.

Salazzar and Saddler have staged a fake rescue for Leon, dousing Ashley in a cloud of chemicals before sending her into a lightly guarded room. Her clothes and jewelry would grow along with her, as well as a tracking device in her sock.

The plan was simple: Have a big Ashley for Leon to deal with, and while he is distracted they can go along with their operation to spread their little parasites all over Europe, maybe even the world! This wasn't the original plan, but evil geniuses should always have a plan B.

Leon has no way of knowing this as he nears the room. He blasts a few guys down with his trusty boomstick before kicking down a door.

"This seems a little easy...they must have something in mind" Leon says into his radio thingy.

"Whatever it is, we can't risk Ashley getting harmed. Find her, and check the room for any explosives they might have planted" Hunnigan says.

"Hmmm....bomb their hostage to get rid of me? Not likely, but I'll check it out" Leon remarks as he walks further through the building.

Truth be told, bombs would have been effective in taking out Leon, but if word got out they he and Ashley were killed, the president would order tactical strikes and get the U.N. involved, so that was out of the question.

The growth though, was brilliant. Leon soon made it to Ashley's holding cell. It'll be a slow growth, but it will be a hell of a ride.

1152222221122121.content:
Sabrina was growing bored in Saffron City. Not many trainers were coming to face her, and the ones that did fell easily to her Psychic Pokemon.

It was an average morning, and she was extremely bored on this day. She got up and showered, dressed, etc., and went out for some breakfast. She posted a "Be Back Soon" sign on the gym and went down the street to a coffee shop. She pushed the door in and was greeted by some people who were sitting down. She walked over to a seat by the counter and ordered a regular. As she sipped her coffee, she couldn't help but overhear what two women were talking about behind her.

"So he really cheated on you?" asked one.

"Yes..." she replied, trying to hold back the tears.

"I can't believe this... what a scumbag. You know what, Jen? I hope that something bad happens to him."

"What are you talking about Amy?"

"You know... something bad. Just desserts? I mean, just think about it! He thinks that women are just tools or something, so what if someone could get back at him? Like, say, a female? That'd show him, huh!" Amy laughed. Sabrina took a sip, interested in their problem. She concentrated on one of them and read their thoughts, finding out where the guy lived and his name. All that she needed to do. Sabrina continued to slowly drink her coffee, while listening to them talk.

"Hmm," she said, thinking it over. "You know, I kinda agree with her. He likes to make women feel small and insecure... when I bet he's small on the inside. Probably just a little scarred guy on the inside". Jen started feeling much better.

"Yeah... like a little bug. You could just step on him, right! Come on, Jen, lets go out and have some fun. Forget about that guy!" And so, the two of them left the shop.

Sabrina knew that they weren't going to Zack's house. So she would. Obviously, this guy deserved to be punished. And talk of bugs? It reminded Sabrina that she could shrink people. So... she would go and teach this guy a lesson. She payed her bill and walked out of the shop. No one at the gym. So, she went off to pay Zack a visit. It wasn't far from her current location, just about two blocks away. She quickly got there and saw a guy in the front lawn. She grinned as she approached closer, until she was standing about ten feet away from him. "Hello, are you Zack?" She asked.

"Yeah... I think I know you. You run the gym, or something?"

"Guilty as charged. Speaking of guilty, you're coming with me."

"Umm... I don't really intend to go anywhere, miss. What are you talking about."

"Oh," her eyes started glowing, "We're going to have some fun!" She started chuckling as Zack started to shrink before her eyes, ending at a very small size. She could sense that the experience had knocked him out. She walked over to him, and outstretched her hand...

...

Zach awoke in a bed that was quite large for him. He was maybe half the size of it, probably less. He groaned while he began to get out of the bed. It was then that he noticed that the bed felt weird. Not like a normal bed. He got up and went looking out the window. No one in site. He went down the stairs and had to jump to reach the door handle. All the time, he was wondering just what the hell was going on. His question was soon answered, because it sounded like an earthquake was coming. He ran out of the house and into the middle of the street. Something still seemed odd to him. He looked behind him just in time to see some large object above him. He gazed for a moment, and he could've sworn that it was the sole of a boot.

Suddenly the object went past him and landed behind him with a large thud, and there was another object like it in front of him. Suddenly it came to him. He looked at the pinkish boot and a chill went down his spine. He slowly looked up, the boots going up to the knees. Then the upper leg. He continued up past her chest, looking into Sabrina's eyes. "Well, well, well". Sabrina repositioned herself so that he was just in front of her feet. "Do you now understand just what you're in?"

Zach understood. He was in Sabrina's little play town, standing in front of her gigantic form, and no way to stop her. He couldn't think of what to say to her, so he just looked at her with fear creeping into his stare. "Yes, you should be afraid, little one. I know all about what you did. What you've done." She began to pace around, making it very uneasy for Zach. "You see, I don't take well to people like you. It's like your girlfriend... or shall I say, ex-girlfriend, said. You're just a little bug, literally." She casually stepped on plastic person. The entire thing disappeared under her with a snapping sound. "So you see," she began to grind on the figure, "I'm in control". She stepped off the figure, and Zach could clearly see that the plastic person was crushed flat. "Sure, you can't exactly be arrested for what you've done, but I've got my own way of taking care of you."

"No!" he yelled up at her. "Someone will find me, and save me from the likes of you!"

Sabrina laughed at him. "Really? I take that as a threat. Maybe I should just crush you before you can do anything, huh?" She lifted her foot over him.

"No, no, no! Wait, I didn't mean it!" He tried to back away, but her foot was too low by now. He was forced down to the ground.

"Lick the sole of my boot. Now." She lowered her foot enough so that he had a small amount of room to crawl. Zach licked and licked, hoping that this would spare him from such a humiliating death. These were her normal everyday boots, so there was all sorts of dirt and debris stuck on and in them. He kept this up for what seemed like forever, when he was stopped by her moving her foot back next to the other. "Very good. You are quite an obedient insect. Now, get on your knees and worship me."

"What? Wor-"

"I said NOW!" stamping her foot. Zach fell to his knees and worshiped her. "Call me Goddess Sabrina.". He called her Goddess Sabrina. "Beg for your life. Say, 'Please don't crush me,' over and over." He did as she said. She smirked at his tiny form, begging for his life. After a minute, he started to slow down. Displeased, Sabrina inched her foot closer to him and made twisting motions. Zach caught a glimpse of this, and went faster than before. Sabrina's smirk came back. She made him do this for another minute, before telling him to stop. He did so, and looked up at her face.

"Wh...what now, Goddess Sabrina?"

"What now, he asks? I'll tell you what, you get your just desserts. She put her hands on her hips. It's something you really deserve, my little ant." She slowly raised her foot up into the air. "You're the first lowlife to have the honor of becoming a little smushed stain on the sole of my boot." Her foot was raised all the way to where her knee would be. He fell onto his face. "Turn over." He didn't respond. "Always gotta be the hard way with you." She used her powers to force him on his back. "Now look up, take a good look at this sole." She put her hand on the toe area, and slowly went down the sole. "A maggot like you doesn't deserve to even see my bare foot. But you're lucky enough to meet your end under my foot anyway. You've been a good little slave, but next time I'm definitely going to have to have more. It's just not as fun having one slave. Goodbye, bug!" She stomped forward, putting all her weight and strength into her leg. The last thing Zach saw, was indeed, the sole of her boot, which he just had the pleasure of cleaning with his tongue. The force and speed of Sabrina's stomp ended everything that was Zach. She brought her hands down to her sides and looked forward. She gave her foot a few powerful twists, before walking away. Looking behind her, she could see that there was a trail of bloody bootprints that she was leaving. She smiled, and thought "I think I'll leave all that there." She looked one more time at Zach, now nothing more than a small, liquid stain.

"I think three at a time for the next one," she thought. She went the rest of the day with no interruptions. She decided to take a vacation and close the gym for a week. Of course, she would be spending most of that time with torturing and crushing people that she felt did wrong.

Lulu casts a suspicious eye at Rikku who seems to be fidgeting nervously. 'Something is definately up with her.' Lulu thinks as she walks along the side of the table, sliding her hand on its edge as she moves. Rikku watches Lulu's hand and hopes that Yuna is nowhere nearby.

"Umm, eh heheh... Did you need anything, Lulu?" Rikku manages to get out, hoping to get Lulu on her way.

"Hmmm.. not really. But do I really need a reason to be here? Or is it that you don't want me around?" Lulu continues her piercing glare at Rikku.

"Ah! Umm.. No no! I don't mean that.. emm.. I just thought you were here for something!" Rikku glances around looking for Yuna. She spots her just on the other side of the fruit bowl, which Lulu's hand is sliding towards! Not only that, she's nearing the chair that Rikku placed Tidus near!

Tidus seeing Lulu nearing him decides to make a run for it away from the chair. As he starts away, the quakes from Lulu's steps knock him down and he is unable to stand back up. He looks up only to see her towering above him only a few feet away. Lulu takes only a few more steps and Tidus disappears underneath Lulu's robe.

During this time, Yuna waves frantically at Rikku to save her from being discovered. Rikku decides to gamble and reaches out to grab Yuna, and does. Though she glances to Lulu who is watching her like a hawk. Rikku lets out a nervous giggle at Lulu and reaches with the same hand Yuna is in to grab a piece of fruit from the bowl, and with quick thinking, hiding Yuna in the bowl. As she makes the switch, Yuna for the apple in the bowl, it dawns on Rikku that the apple she now holds in her hand was the only piece of fruit in the bowl! Rikku cringes at the fatal mistake. Sure enough, Lulu was looking into the bowl as Rikku took the apple and noticed the summoner that replaced it. Lulu shoots an angry glare at Rikku.

"Rikku! What have you done to Yuna!?" Lulu shouts. Rikku fidgets at the remark.

"Well umm.. It just...kinda happened?" Rikku shows a pouting face.

"Its ok, she's trying to he-" Yuna is cut off as Lulu snatches her up into a closed palm.

"Rikku, you can't be trusted with her anymore! I don't know what happened but I just know its your fault. And I certainly can't trust you to fix this, so i'll do it myself!" Lulu storms out, ignoring Rikku's plea to calm down and stay.

Rikku sighs and starts to look for Tidus...
12111111221.title: Lulu Discovers Rikku's Blunder

121111112211.content:
Rikku walks over to where she left Tidus, her booted feet nearly crushing him as she made her way over and past him. Rikku gets on her hands and knees looking for Tidus who makes his way to where Rikku is looking.

"Ah, there you are!" Rikku says as she eyes Tidus.

"You almost stepped on me just a moment ago! You really need to be more careful!" Tidus shouts back.

"Oh did I?" Rikku grins, knowing she had almost stepped on him. "Well, accidents do happen."

"Accidents happen? This is no time to be kidding around!" Tidus replies. "My life is on the line here."

Rikku picks Tidus up with 2 fingers around the waist and licks her lips slightly, strange thoughts going through her head.

"I really think we should go catch up to Lulu." Tidus says.
121111112211.title: Business Or Pleasure?

1211111122112.content:
"Well, she's not gonna listen to me right now. And she certainly won't listen to you either.. I say we just let her cool down and realize i'm the only one who can fix things." Rikku grins at Tidus. "She'll be back."

Tidus groans. "I guess you're right, but still.. I'm worried about Yuna."

Rikku licks her lips once more. "We should have some fun while we wait." Rikku sets Tidus on the floor near her feet and stands up tall.

Tidus looks up at the would-be Goddess towering before him. "Umm... Rikku?"

"RAWR! Fear the power of the mighty Rikku-zilla!" She stomps a booted foot right next to him.
1211111122112.title: Fun With Rikku?

choices: They go find Lulu and Yuna.
Rikku attempts to fix the machine. (Again)
12111111221121.content:
"You have to be kidding me?" Tidus said as he ran away from Rikku's gigantic boots. Rikku chased him across the room pretending to try to step on him each and every step.

"You can't escape me." Rikku said trying to sound as menacing as she could. When Tidus reached the bed he ran underneath it. Rikku then bent over and extended her arm under the bed and began to try to grab Tidus.

Tidus almost was out of Rikku's reach when one of her fingers knocked him off balance causing him to fall over. Rikku proceeded to grab Tidus and pull him from underneath the bed, giggling the entire time while doing so.

"I win!" Rikku said poking Tidus in the face with her pinkie finger. Tidus just crossed his arms and began to pout.

"Are you going to help fix me or not?" Tidus said still with his arms crossed. Rikku just laughed at his expression.

"Don't be so sour I was just having a little fun." She said placing him in her palm. "We'll find a way to reverse this as soon as possible. I'll try and fix the machine first, but I wanna make sure Yunie's okay to." Rikku said pondering what to do next.
12111111221121.title: Playing Around.

121111112211211.content:
"I think we better look for Lulu. I want to make sure Yunie is ok." says Rikku, looking down at the tiny figure in her palm.

"Didn't you just say you'd fix the machine first? Not that i'm not worried about Yuna too but.. I wanna be normal again!" Tidus yells, jumping up and down. Rikku grins at him.

"Oh I know, but maybe we should look first." Rikku says, still grinning.

"I'm starting to think you like me like this!" Tidus says, standing defiant.

"Maybe I do." Rikku giggles as she pokes Tidus, knocking him over into her palm. Before he has a chance to react to it, he finds himself clutched in her fist moving swiftly, and then all of the sudden falling into something soft. Rikku had deposited him into the pouch strapped to her right leg and closed him in. She pats him through the pouch and can't help but giggle at the situation.

Tidus rocks back and forth inside the pouch, and although he wants to, he's nowhere near tall enough to peek out of the top of the pouch. So instead, all he can do is sit and think. Think about Lulu and Yuna, think about getting back to normal, and think about Rikku's comment. 'Maybe I do.'

A little bit later, the pouch opens and she pulls him out.
121111112211211.title: Searching For Lulu

1211111122112111.content:
Rikku sets Tidus on her palm and points to Lulu who is sitting on a bench.

"There she is." Rikku says.

"Ok, so now what do we do?" Tidus replies.

"Well.. She's probably more angry at me than you, so maybe you should go." Rikku explains.

"Are you nuts!" Tidus jumps. "If she saw me scurrying across the ground to her, she'd probably squish me like a bug. She has a natural dislike for me, with you its just that you made a mistake."

"Oh come on, she's not going to see you. Besides, it'd be easy to climb her too with all those belts and buckles and such on her robe." Rikku says giggling thinking of Tidus climbing Lulu. "Either way though, I don't see Yunie with her. Do you think she stashed her somewhere?"

"Yeah, you'd think Lulu would be scolding her." Tidus ponders. "Besides, there wouldn't be many places for Lulu to stash her excep... Erm.. Nevermind." Tidus cuts himself off while blushing.

Rikku giggles and pokes him. "Oh I know where you'd like her to stash you."

"Cut it out!" Tidus yells back, embarassed.

"Oh shush you. But hey, here's some incentive. If you go, when you get back.. Maybe sometime i'll think about doing that for you myself." Rikku grins and winks at Tidus who turns away blushing completely red.

"Err.. Heh.. Well, thats if I were to survive." Tidus straightens himself up. "Besides, its still safer for you to go. At least you can explain the situation better."

Rikku sighs. "Well, one of us has to go."

Cloud watched the clouds pass by. He rested his head on a object behind him. The air was foul, and hard to breath. He only hoped that the cave would tilt or a head would pop out from the top of the cave. He crossed his arms, unsure how he got there. Last thng he remembered was walking towards his friends house then getting his by a teleport spell and sent into the dark, sticky, cave. The only exit was at a giant hole at the top.
"Hm... hey... I hear voices! Down here! Help! HELP! Help?" Cloud stopped yelling for help when a pritty face that seemmed the size of a planet, popped into view. The white cloth was getting closer and he had to hurry, it was like a walk through the mud's of a swamp. It smelt of old gym socks and dead cat with a new smell entering his nostrils as he made it to the front of the shoe. "I'm going to die in someone's shoe, I don't know who this person is, but at least they are wearing new socks." He awkwardly giggled as the sock was finally at the end of the shoe shoving poor Cloud against the edge of the shoe.
As the woman walked Cloud had more and more pressure put onto him and he was stuck to the edge of his prison. How would he get out of here, he wasn't losing any air, but it was hurting his body and making him wet from the sweat that was starting to form. He then remembered he had his sword on his back, but it was a painful reach away.
Should Cloud try and reach his sword or should he stay put and wait until she stops moving to act.

12121122.content:
In any other situation Cloud would've reached for his sword but alas he couldn't. For apparently no reason this girl's toes were grinding against the tip of her shoe...against Cloud. The sweaty odorous sock rubbed itself all over the hero's miniscule body, as if mocking him. He had no choice but to wait until she finished walking.

Obviously this girl, who Cloud still had yet to know or didn't remember held no idea of the situation within her shoe, to her all she felt was really comfortable for some reason.

Gritting his teeth Cloud placed his arm against the girl's toes, attempting to push them away long enough for him to grab his blade. At first it seemed to work, the massive digits began to pull back, but this was merely a misunderstanding. Before Cloud could sucessfully reach his blade they once again flew upon him, this time actually managing to somehow pin him beneath the big toe.

In his situation Cloud banged his fist against the damp insole, "Damn, these things are more annoying than monsters!"

Apparently giving up, young Cloud began to rest, utilizing the chance to try to figure out who the girl was. Although he got a look at her he only saw her eyes, hair color, and forehead; not exactly the kind of things needed to identify someone.

Trying to come up with mental images of who it could be Cloud soon realized who his captor was, although he simply couldn't believe it.

Hinata was busy practising fighting by herself in her families dojo. She takes a break, when she notices a scroll on the wall of the dojo.

'Hyuuga family techniques'

Hinata decided that one of her fellow Hyuuga members might be able to help her. However, after two steps, oh yes she found one, but it was Neji. Hinata decided that this was her chance to exact revenge. She quickly reached down and grabbed Neji. She then held him to her face.

"Hinata!? What the-"

"Shut-up! Your in my world now, and you have no permission to speak!"

"......"

"You disgraced me! You beat me like a helpless dog right in front of Naruto! And for that you must pay!"

"Wait, it was just a fight! I had no choice but to-" His words were cut off by Hinata's constricting hand.

"You broke my heart. You made me look like a fool right in front of the person I love, and for that you must die!

Hinata had no mercy. She moved him up to her lips, catching his head in between them. She licked his face, humiliating Neji. "good-bye my brother." Hinata slowly opened her mouth, revealing her throat to Neji.

"Wait...you can't be serious...stop, please...no...Wait! Stop! Please don't eat me! Noooo!!" Neji was screaming at the thought of going down his own sister's throat.

Neji's screams fell on deaf ears as Hinata set him on her toungue. He looked around at all the pearly-white teeth in her mouth. Then he set his eyes on where he knew he was headed, her throat. Hinata slowly closed her mouth, Neji watching as she sealed his fate. Then Hinata rolled her tongue to the right, causing Neji to fall onto her molars. With byakugan, Neji saw Hinata's teeth coming down on him. He dodged it just in time before the tooth slammed into the other molars.

His fight was for nothing however as he slipped on the sticky saliva. Hinata slammed her tougue to the roof of her mouth, crushing Neji. He heard some of his bones crack. Then Hinata, quite aroused by his little struggle, decided to end it.

Neji was exhausted, some of his bones were shattered, and his pride was lost. Hinata giggled and tilted her head back. She swallowed him with the greatest of ease. She felt him slide down her throat, and into her stomach.

"Aaaah...tasty."
131211.title: End of Hinata's Fued.

choices: What's Kiba thinking as he's walking home
What's Shino thinking as he's walking home
1312112.content:
(Note: Neji and Hinata aren't siblings. She called him 'brother' because they were members of the same clan. They are cousins.)

Hinata was excited. She had killed one of her worst enemies, the person who was always setting limits and lowering the bar for her, like her father did. The person who didn't fight honorably and fairly, but mercilessly played mind games with her during their fight was now slowly enduring the horror of digestion. She smiled at the thought of that being the fate of someone so wicked. Neji always talked about how she was destined for failure, and would always be one, but in that moment, as Neji was struggling in her mouth, she was dominant. It was why she didn't devour him straight away. She wanted that feeling of dominance to last.

"Hmm.." she thought "P-Perhaps I shouldn't get help now. Maybe I could wait a little while longer.. Or a bit longer than that..". A smile grew on her face. Hinata was a kind person, though. Neji was one of her worst enemies, and that's why she ended his life. She wouldn't go out looking for people to kill and destroying buildings. She could use her size, strength, and the doubling of her Chakra by hundreds to protect her friends and help people.

It seemed she was more confident, as well. It was because of her size compared to everyone else's. She was walking towards the village. People stopped and just looked in awe. Some scurried away. Some had gone to the academy with her and knew that she wasn't a malicious person, but stood in awe, wondering how she got like that. Others were frozen in fear.

Hinata crouched and looked at a group of about 5 who were standing, all with their eyes wide in shock. "U-Um..Hi.." she said, smiling at the group. Three of the guys in the group just couldn't move or speak. Though, one raised a shaking arm and waved. The other responded "H..Hello" they said in an uneasy, but accepting voice. They could see by her gentle smile, her expression, and her tone that she wasn't planning to harm them.

The one who had waved stepped up. "How..How did you change sizes?" They had seen her before. They didn't know much about her, except that she was the Hyuuga heiress. "I.. I was j-just training and suddenly.. I tried out some..some type.. It was a j-jutsu..I didn't r-really mean to do it.." she said, giggling. She found it funny because she was a bit frightened at first, but now she liked the state she was in, and planned on staying. "What jutsu?!" the guy shouted, intrigued. "I.. d-don't.. I don't really remember it.." She said. The guy looked disappointed, but still amazed.

They weren't as frightened now, and they approached her. She lowered her hand and let them come on. She brought them up to her shoulder. She didn't know these people at all, but the one thing that was bothering her was how people would treat her when she was like this. Would she be feared? She was a bit shy of these people, less so than if they were equal in size, but she was still a bit shy, but she really wanted to show the villagers that she wasn't there to go on a violent conquest, so she set them on her left shoulder. "I can see the entire village!" one of the previously silent ones exclaimed. Hinata giggled shyly and nodded. The two strands of hair that hung down blew gently in the wind, brushing against the group.

Others were watching when she had let this group on, and they were relieved. Some thought that she was going to destroy the village. Seeing her and the villagers hanging out in peace was a nice sight. Most of the watchers were now watching from their homes, with their doors locked, in their basements, looking from the windows.

The village's main areas where most people were now involved a huge crowd in one area, wanting to see her, hoping she meant no harm.. Someone had ran back and told the others what they had seen. Naruto was still asleep. Shino and Kiba were hanging around the training area, waiting for her. They had no idea that anything was going on.

Hinata decided she would meet her friends at the training ground, where they had been waiting quite impatiently. Well, Kiba at least. He was shocked that Hinata wasn't around. She was usually the first one on the scene. Shino silently nodded as Kiba asked him questions, occasionally leaving a comment.

After a nice talk with the people she had met, she headed for the training ground. The crowd would have to wait. When she arrived, she saw both Shino and Kiba waiting. They sensed someone and turned around. Kiba leaped back in utter shock, landing on the ground with his mouth hanging open as he looked at her, his eyes wide. Shino himself jumped of surprise and had a confused and shocked expression on his face. For once, he was surprised.

They both looked up at her. They knew better than the villagers that she wasn't going to harm them. Shino regained his poker face and adjusted his glasses. "..Hinata..H-" about to ask how she had changed sizes, Shino was interrupted by Kiba shouting at the top of his voice "WHAT'S GOING ON, HINATA!?"

She explained everything. How she had been training, tried a jutsu that made her grow to this size, how she ate Neji, how she met villagers on the way, and how she had seen a crowd growing in the village. She also explained to him that she didn't think it was reversible.

"You mean.. You will be in this form for the remainder of your life?" said Shino, concerned.

"Y-yes.." Hinata said, looking down. There were downsides, but she knew that her team would trust her. They were comrades and friends who had been teaching each other and going off on missions for years.

Though, Kiba was still a bit horrified.

"You ATE Neji?!"

"U-Um..Umm.." Hinata stuttered. She had to give them details about eating Neji, Kiba really wanted to know about this, and as she told them about it, how she tortured him, showing her dominance by toying with him before she swallowed him, crushing him with her tongue, letting him struggle..

By the end of that, Kiba's eyes were wide, and he was standing behind Shino, as if using him as a shield if she decided to do the same to them. Shino saw the hurt look in her eyes. She didn't want them to be afraid of her. She wanted them to understand, even if everyone else in the village didn't, she thought she could count on them to understand. Shino gave Kiba a hard shove and spoke "I'm sure Kiba means no harm. Shock, is all." he said, sounding very much like Hinata. She could see that Shino understood.

13512.title: Lily or Black Magician Girl

135122.content:
It was a partly sunny morning at Seto Kaiba's public Dueling arena. For the third time in three months, he had challenged Yugi Moto to a game of Duel Monsters in an attempt to reclaim his title as the best duelist in the world. The only problem was that Yugi was simply a better player than he was.

So Kaiba began to scheme. Using a combination of technical ingenuity and some technology "borrowed" from his other archrival Pegasus, Kaiba rigged the dueling arena so that with the press of a button, a monster under Yugi's control would go haywire and attack him. Kaiba would then grin and chalk it up to some new card, claiming victory. Kaiba didn't fully understand the technology that Pegasus had, but he assumed that it was mostly harmless.

So when he was losing to Yugi 1700-800 in the last moments of the duel, Kaiba readied his trap. Facing both Yugi and his two monsters, the Mystic Elf and Dark Magician Girl, he laughed.

"This time Yugi, you're not going to defeat me!"

"And why not Kaiba?"

"Simple! My new card, Brain Scramble!" Grinning to himself, Kaiba pressed a button he had hidden on his side of the dueling arena. However, instead of the predicted action of Yugi's Dark Magician Girl attacking the Mystic Elf, the dueling arena gave off an odd buzzing noise.

Then all the other monsters besides the Dark Magician Girl dissapeared as visible bolts of static erupted from the gaming grid. Everyone, including Kaiba was confused.

"Nice card," commented Jou (Joey in the English dub) in the background.

"Kaiba! What sort of weapon have you used?" asked Yugi. Kaiba could only shake his head.

"A damn good one."

Then three things happened. The first was that the figure of the Dark Magician Girl began to expand, becoming larger and larger. As this was happening, her skin, made of holograms and fancy optical illusions, took a distinct form that was indisinguisable from real human skin. The fact that her incredibily large boots crushed the dueling table was proof that somehow, she had become real.

The third was that Kaiba swore never to use anything he didn't understand again. Somewhere he could just see Pegasus laughing at him.

Finally, the static bolts ceased, the smoke faded, and the form of a 200 foot tall flesh-and-blood Dark Magician Girl filled the room, with Yugi looking on in shock. Grinning, the giantess turned to her former owner and looked down upon him.
135122.title: A scheme gone horribly wrong...

choices: Kaiba tries to lie his way out of the situation
He runs, leaving Yugi and friends with the gigantic DMG
1351222.content:
For a brief second, Kaiba felt a sense of relief. Despite the oddity of the what just happened, it did seem that the giantess Dark Magician Girl would attack Yugi, technically resulting in a victory for him.

Yugi on the other hand, felt nothing besides shock. The Dark Magician Girl was one of his favorite cards, and here she, not it, was, towering above him with a playful smirk on her face, looking exactly like the hologram did.

Yugi's friends all looked on at the giantess with a sense of dread. Where did she come from and what would she do to Yugi?

The questions were all quickly answered as the Dark Magician Girl reached down and picked up Yugi from the ground. The crowd gasped, while Seto Kaiba simply grinned. But nothing could have prepared them for what happened next.

Still smiling, the Dark Magician Girl hugged Yugi right to her ample bosom as if he was a plush toy.

"Yugi-kun!" exclaimed the Dark Magician Girl as she continued to hug Yugi. "You look so cute tiny!"

Although his words were muffled by the Dark Magician Girl's enormous breasts at first, the now normal Yugi was eventually able to say "You know my name?" This caused the Dark Magician Girl to giggle.

"Of course I know your name silly! All those times we fought in duels together..."

"You..."

"Yup! But now I'm real!" With another slight squeal, she hugged Yugi again.

"But why are you so big?"

"Oh, that? Whatever made me real must have made me a lot bigger too. It's OK though," she added with a grin. "I like being this size..."

Still giggling, she put the diminutive form of Yugi on the floor as she turned to face Kaiba. The champion duelist couldn't help but gulp in fear.

"That was a mean trick you were trying to pull, trying to use a circuit board to force me to attack Yugi!" Her smile gone, the Dark Magician Girl stepped towards Kaiba, her enormous boot landing in front of him. The normally stoic Kaiba was shaking with fear.

13512221.content:
Staring at the enormous blue boot in front of him, Kaiba began pondering his options. He was losing a duel in front of a small crowd of onlookers, at his own facility, in front of a massive blond haired woman who thought his archrival Yugi was the cutest thing she'd ever seen. And somehow, it was his doing.

He could run. But Kaiba knew that if he did that, he would never hear the end of the taunts of running away from a girl, no matter her size.

He could apolo...wait, apologize?! Yugi was there! Like hell he was going to confess cheating.

So only one option remained. Lie.

"Look, I know this looks awkward, but I didn't..."

"Didn't what?" asked the Dark Magician Girl.

"I didn't cheat in the game. What happened was that I used a brand new card and it maulfuncitioned."

"Really? What card?"

"Brain scramble!" quickly replied Kaiba. "It was supposed to make you, well, the game you attack Yugi. They're must have been some faulty wiring or something! That's the only reason I can think of!"

The Dark Magician Girl nodded and paused for a brief second, fumbling around with the magician's staff that somehow suddenly appeared in her hands. After about half a minute, she faced Kaiba, the staff dissapearing from her hands.

"You're lying."

Kaiba shook his head. "No I'm not!"

"Yes you are. I know what was going on in the game. I can tell if someone was cheating, and you, Seto Kaiba, are a little cheater!"

Shaking his head, Kaiba began walking away. "Hah! You have no proof! Now I believe it's safe to say I won the match, so I'll be going now."

The Dark Magician Girl didn't respond, but instead pointed her finger at Kaiba. Instantly, he was binded by several ropes which formed around his body.

"What, how did you do that?"

"Magician Girl, remember? As in, I can do magic. Not to mention being bigger has made me a lot more powerful."

"What?"

"If I have 2000 attack at normal size, at over 40 times my normal size, I'm 40 times more powerful. I suppose I should thank you, cheater..."

"I AM NOT A CHEATER!"

The nearby crowd could only watch as the giantess Dark Magician Girl used two fingers to pick up Kaiba by the ropes that bound him.

"You are a cheater! You got tired of losing, so you cheated to hurt my Yugi-kun!"

"So what are you gonna do about it, Dark Magician Girl?"

Her playful grin returning to her face, the Dark Magician Girl hung Kaiba on a girder near the roof of his monstrous dome, a roof that was even higher up than the giantess was.

"You're going to stay there and think about what you've done," she replied, sticking her tounge out at Kaiba.

Ignoring Kaiba's ranting and screaming, along with the crowd's gasping, the Dark Magician Girl turned down to Yugi, bending over him with one knee on the ground.

"Not bad, huh?"

Yugi was speechless at the entire spectacle. When the giantess picked him up again, he still had nothing to say.

His feelings were a completely different matter. This seemed too good to be true. The size difference didn't really matter since well, Yugi was used to looking up at people. But giant Duel Monster girls don't just turn real, do they?

"Well, what did you think?"

"I'm...yours?"

"Yup! You're all mine!" Pausing to hug Yugi once more, she then pointed her hand near a wall. Promptly the wall disintegrated, leaving an opening big enough for her to easily walk through.

"Where are you going?"

"I want to see the city! Meet your friends! Explore this new world! Oh, and Yugi?"

"Yes?"

"My name is Mana. Dark Magician Girl sounds so impersonal."

With a slightly lovestruck look in his eyes, Yugi nodded.

"Sure thing, Mana."

So, who's viewpoint do we take?
