"Oh, right, the size thing. Just show me where the food is and I'll take care of the rest."

"You can make the food your scale?"

"That's easy Yugi-kun! I can do a lot more too!"

Yugi breathed a sigh of relief as he pointed out a fast food resturant nearby that he went to frequently with Jou and the others. However, before they could arrive, they were interrupted by...
13512221211.title: Touring the city

135122212112.content:
Mana continued to walk down the street towards the resturant, following Yugi's direction, however when she was finally able to see it, a small line of police cars blocked her way.

"Excuse me Miss, you are disturbing the peace. Stand down at once, and release your hostage!"

While Yugi began to look on with a sense of worry, Mana took a rather annoyed tone.

"Hostage? You think I'm trying to hurt my Yugi-kun? I'm just walking around! Is there a law against being big?"

"There's no law," replied one of the police officers, "but..."

"Then move! I want to go eat!"

"We can't do that! Surrender or else!"

Flinging some loose hairstrands back, Mana stood to her full height and defiantely said "Make me."

The cops held their positions at first, but the second Mana took her first step towards their cars, they fled in terror. Smirking, Mana stepped on a police car for good measure, completely obliterating it.

"Mana!" shouted a shocked Yugi. "Why did you..."

"I didn't hurt them, did I?"

"Would you have?"

Mana quickly shook her head. "I just wanted to teach them a lesson. When a girl has somewhere to get to, little people shouldn't get in her way."

"Well you scared me half to death. Mana, you should be more careful."

"OK, fine, you little worrywart. I won't scare the police."

Yugi still sighed as Mana finally made it to the resturant. Placing Yugi on the floor, she sat down on an empty area of the street and began waiting.

"Get me something big, OK?" Yugi couldn't help but laugh at the irony.

About 10 minutes later, Yugi returned with two of the biggest hamburgers the resturant sold, plus fries and a drink. He was about to bring them to Mana when a voice called to him...
135122212112.title: Giant blonde 1, cops zip

choices: Mana tells her story in peace
1351222121121.content:
"Yugi! Thank God you're OK!"

Turning around, Yugi saw Anzu, Jou, and Honda with looks of worry on their faces. However Jou's worry soon turned to annoyance when he noticed the food in Yugi's hands.

"You've gotta be kidding me! We were worried you were kidnapped by the 200 foot bimbo and you're just getting burgers!"

"Look, it's not what it seems. I was..."

"You were in horrible danger!" interrupted Honda. "I saw that giant...big breasted...long legged..."

"Stop drooling Honda!"

"Sorry Anzu. But the point is that big bimbo had us worried?"

From out of nowhere, a booming voice replied "Who's a bimbo?" Turning, Yugi and the others noticed the not-too-pleased face of the giant Dark Magician Girl. Honda and Jou cowered in fear, Anzu reeled in worry, but Yugi simply stepped forward.

"Mana, I got you the food you wanted!"

Smiling, the giantess grabbed the comparitevley tiny bag of food and focused on it. In seconds, the food was enlarged to Mana's size, who happily began to eat it.

"This is really good! Uh, Yugi-kun?"

"Yes?"

"Who are those people? Were they the ones that called me a bimbo?"

"Well, actually...they're my friends."

For the next 30 seconds, the three stood still while Mana observed them, not uttering a word. Finally, however, Mana broke the silence, picking the three up in her hand.

"So you're Yugi's friends! I've wanted to meet you for a while now!"

"So you're not gonna hurt us?" asked Honda.

"Hurt you? No way! I wouldn't hurt a friend of my Yugi-kun!"

"You're...Yugi-kun?" asked Anzu. "Look, I think we deserve an explanation.

"About?"

"About a 200 foot tall Duel Monster suddenly appearing, and why you like Yugi so much."

"Uh, Anzu, I don't think you need to..."

"It's OK Yugi-kun," interrupted Mana. "I don't mind talking about myself, especially if it means your friends won't be scared of me."

"So?" asked Jou.

"Get some food from the resturant. We can discuss it over a nice meal."
1351222121121.title: Confusion and meetings

13512221211212.content:
And so, after everyone had gotten some food and sat down, Mana began to tell her long story of where she came from, how she arrived in Japan, and exactly why she was so fond of Yugi.

Or rather, she was ABOUT to tell her long story of where she came from, how she arrived, etc, etc, had a loud beeping noise appeared, interrupting her.

Turning around, they noticed a large tank plowing through the city streets, with Seto Kaiba on top of it.

"What is Kaiba doing?" asked Anzu. Yugi just shook his head as the tank stopped and Kaiba pulled out a bullhorn.

"Yugi! There you are! You and the giant bimbo aren't going to escape this time!"

Yugi could only stand and stare at Kaiba, who looked dead serious as the cannon turrent was aimed at the equally confused Mana.

"You're not serious, right?"

"Damn right I'm serious! That huge bitch humiliated me! Now it's payback time!"

"Where did you get a tank?!"

"Kaiba-corp security. No one's gonna cry if I kill a giant monster."

What Kaiba didn't realize was that Mana had already stood to her feet, and had her staff pointed right at the tank. The others quickly moved out of the way before she began to approach it.

"You just don't learn, do you?"

Kaiba didn't respond, but instead, the tank turrent fired at Mana. The others all gasped at the sight while Kaiba snickered.

However, despite the small explosion, Mana appeared unharmed physically. Emotionally however was another story, as she appeared furious.

"You actually shot me! You little jerk! Now I'm going to teach you a lesson!"
13512221211212.title: Kaiba and excess

135122212112122.content:
Kaiba grimaced as he waited for Mana to attack him. The automatic reloading system was finished, and another shell was ready to fire. However, if he fired too soon, she would simply dodge, or it wouldn't do enough damage. So he waited, and finally, after a short perioid of time, he found the right angle and pressed the trigger.

Except nothing happened. Lifting the hatch, Kaiba began looking outside, only to see he was no longer in a tank, but on top of a bright red stone.

And Mana's hand was approaching it, the giantess giggling excitedly.

"MMMM, candy!"

The blood drained from Kaiba's face as he stumbled off of the stone. Watching in horror, he observed what was once his private battle tank being thrown into the giantesses mouth and being sucked on, as she looked down at him mischeviously.

"That was tasty. Got any more?"

Any normal person would have thrown in the towel and ran for their lives by now. But Kaiba was far, far too proud to surrender to what appeared to be a gigantic cosplayer. He began to run towards, Mana, but was stopped shortly after when he fell into a large crater. Yugi and the others couldn't help but laugh.

"You little..."

"From here, you're the one that looks little." Wasting no time, Mana picked Kaiba up by his jacket and held him in front of her face.

"OK, you little cheater. I'm going to give you two choices. You can get out of here and stop being annoying..."

"Or else what?" angrily fumed Kaiba.

Mana didn't respond, but instead put her free finger on Kaiba's legs. Instantly, they turned to gold, frozen in place.

"I'll turn you into my new necklace. I'm sure Yugi would find it cute."
135122212112122.title: Kaiba's humiliation

choices: Mana is able to tell her origin in peace
1351222121121221.content:
That made no sense. Sure his legs couldn't move, and they took on a gold color, but no one can just turn humans into metal. Then again, this girl wasn't exactly normal, now was she?

"A necklace?!"

"The center of a brand new necklace." Pausing for a minute, she looked away from Kaiba, staring into the sky starry-eyed. "Yugi-kun will love it!"

From the ground, Yugi and the others were observing the rather odd battle, with each of them having differnet thoughts on the fighting.

"Is she really that powerful?" asked Anzu.

"She's doing this for me? Should I flattered?" asked Yugi.

"Is Kaiba really that stupid?" asked Joey.

"Damn she's got nice legs," drooled Honda.

In any event, the four could only look on while Kaiba began contemplating his options. Defiance, surrender, and a really hasty denial of everything among them. Unfortunately, logic dictated that he had only one real option.

"Look, don't so something that you'll regret. I'm sure you don't need me to make your neckalce."

"And I'm sure you didn't need to attack me with a tank!"

"I'm sorry! Just let me go, and we'll call it even, OK?"

Mana shrugged, putting him down. Almost immediately Kaiba ran, not bothering to notice his legs were back to normal. Yugi and the others could only look on as Mana sat down again.

"Sorry about that, where was I?"

Anzu quickly reminded her. "Your origin?"

"Oh, right. Well..."
1351222121121221.title: The only obvious choice

choices: It's late, so everyone's going to turn in.
The night is young, and something is going on around town...
13512221211212211.content:
"Let me see where to begin. Well, first off, I need you all to promise you won't laugh, since some of the details may be a bit unbelivable."

With a collective nod from Yugi's friends, Mana cleared her throat and began.

"OK, how do I put this? Well, I'm not from your world, obviously."

"Obviously," agreed Anzu.

"The world I come from is parallel to this one, a world of constant strife and battle, where ancient royailty would use our spirits to conduct the Yami or Shadow Games. I remember the two realms were once connected, but they were sealed away a long time ago. Until recently."

"Duel Monsters?"

"When Pegasus repackaged the ancient games for the Pokemon generation, he reawakend the world of strife. We were given a glimpse into your world, and learned about things, but for the most part, did what we did best. Fight each other."

"You don't seem mindless to me," interrupted Jou. "You knew about tanks and according to Yugi, TV."

"Well, not all Duel Monsters are mindless. Occasionaly, a powerful soul finds its way into our realm and bonds with an otherwise souless monster. Even what that happens, most of the time all Duel Monsters know or want to know is fighting. They're happy."

"And you weren't?" asked Honda.

"Well, I was at first. But then I glimpsed into this world, and saw my Yugi-kun. I don't know why, but I felt attached to him in a way I never felt, or maybe I did in a past life. It was confusing. All I knew was that I had to leave this world."

"Normally this isn't possible. The mortal relam is draining to the usually souless Duel Monsters, and the one gateway is guarded by two incredibly powerful monsters, the Envoys. But then, when you were dueling Kaiba, he used something. It was supposed to make me attack your monsters, but instead it ripped open a hole between the two worlds. I still don't know how exactly."

"OK, this is all well and good," interrupted Anzu, "but it still doesn't explain why you're so huge!"

"I was getting to that!" replied Mana. "Anyway, I was caught in this opening, but for some reason, there was a tremendous amount of energy there as well. Energy which fed me, and made me grow."

"Why grow?"

"Power in the Duel Monsters realmn is represented by size. When someone is powered up, they get bigger. As you can, I'm really, really powerful."

"But what about the whole Duel Monsters weaking here thing?" asked Honda.

"The soul feeds on this realm the same way the Duel Monsters feed on the negative energy of the other realm. Instead of getting weaker, I'm getting stronger instead. That's not bad, right?"

"And that's how you arrived?" asked Yugi.

"For the most part yes." Turning to a nearby bush, she added, "Although I bet that the city's reporters won't belive that!"

From out of the bush, a few reporters and photographers emerged, shaking their heads.

"OK, tell the press that I'm a big tourist attraction, here to captialize on the popularity of Duel Monsters. K?"

Nodding, they all ran off. Yugi and his friends looked up as Mana as she turned to them.

"So, are you still mad at me?"

"Not really," began Honda.

Yugi's expression didn't seem to change throughout the story. "Mana, I was never mad at you. You just need to get used to this world."

The others agreed, with Mana smiling on at them.

"Well I'm just glad to hear that you all like me! Group hug!"

Before anyone could say otherwise, Mana scooped up the four of them and hugged them to her bosom, making sure Yugi was the closest to it.
13512221211212211.title: The unbelivable and not-so-unbelivable origin

choices: We see what Yugi and Mana are up to
Kaiba?  What happened since he ran off?
135122212112122111.content:
After putting everyone down, Mana began to look around the nearby area while Anzu looked at her watch. She didn't like what she saw.

"Oh great. It's 11 o' clock!"

"That late already?" asked Jou. Anzu nodded.

"I can't stay around here. I've got to get home."

"Same here," added Honda. "I'm exhausted as it is. All this running..."

Yugi began to walk up to his friends as they headed out, however he was quickly interrupted by a voice from behind.

"Uh, Yugi-kun?"

Turning around, Yugi and the others noticed Mana in front of them, kneeling in order to get a better look at them. From the look on her face, she seemed a bit embarassed about what she was going to say.

"Look, Yugi-kun. I was wondering, well..."

"Yeah?"

"I was wondering if it's possible, could you stay with me for just the night? I know about your grandpa, but I promise it'll be just for tonight."

Yugi could only stare when he heard this. All of Yugi's friends looked shocked as well. Although none of them were as shocked as when he replied.

"I'd love to." Smiling, Yugi walked over to Mana, as she happily picked him up off the ground.

"I'm still gonna meet you guys tommorow at the mall, right?" asked Yugi.

Jou simply replied "Sure thing."

**************************************************

A short while later, Anzu, Honda, and Jou were all walking home, trying to make sense of what they had just observed. Anzu seemed to be having the hardest time dealing with it.

"Did that seem weird to any of you?"

"Weird? Nah. Just, I dunno."

"Messed up?"

"That's it Honda. Messed up. I mean, it was one thing for her to blow a hole in the arena. But the tank into candy and Kaiba into gold tricks were a bit much."

"See what I mean? She was a ditz. A total ditz. If she wanted to, she could have blown Kaiba all the way from here to the moon."

"Nice legs though."

"Oh hell yeah."

Anzu shook her head as she got in front of the two. "That's nice and all, but what about Yugi? He seems absolutely..."

"In love?"

"Yeah. It doesn't seem right, that someone could fall in love so quickly..."

"Sounds like someone's jealous," smirked Jou.

"Am not!"

Before an argument could break out, Honda quickly interrupted the both of them.

"It may not even be love. For all we know, Yugi feels sorry for Mana. Or maybe he's just distracted by those boobs..."

"Pervert."
135122212112122111.title: That was trippy...

1351222121121221112.content:
On a Sunday morning, the average corporate executive would either be sleeping in bed, or out at some public area attempting to enjoy himself.

Seto Kaiba, however, was not a normal corporate executive. He was currently in the elevator of the Kaibacorp building, waiting patiently for it to reach the top floor.

The short version of the story was simple. After being humiliated by the giant Dark Magician Girl, Kaiba ran. A lot. Eventually he made it to a taxi, which drove him to a hotel, where he slept for the night, not bothering to make the trek back to his house.

While he was staring at the celing of the hotel suite, Kaiba was able to come up with one idea. Whatever technology Pegasus had tricked him with might also have the key to undoing whatever had happened.

With that thought, he entered the empty Kaibacorp building on a Sunday morning, and finally made his way to his office.

Except when he got there, he found someone sitting at his desk. The same desk where he kept a 9mm pistol in case of instrusion.

"Who the hell are you?"

Turning around, the figure revealed himself. It was a man in blue and gold armor, fumbling around with a elaborately decorated sword as large as he was. Kaiba recongized the costume as a Duel Monster- The Black Luster Soldier. From an opening in his jewel studded helmet, his greenish face could easily been seen as he moved his lips.

"Seto Kaiba I presume. We need to talk."
1351222121121221112.title: The visitor at the desk

choices: We focus on Yugi and Mana
13512221211212211122.content:
The appearance of the foreboding man filled Kaiba with dread for several reasons. 1- He was another Duel Monster, meaning either a big cosplay convention was going on or that device of Pegasus' had done more damage than first thought, and 2- He was at the office the entire time.

"You have done something that I have come here to correct..."

Kaiba began looking around for a weapon. Any weapon. There was a chair, several photos, and the katana sword he kept for decoration. Of course there was the gun, but where he stood, it would be impossible to get it.

"You have breached the plane between the realm of light and the realmn of darkness. Worse, you let one of the creatures into your world, where her mortal soul makes her grow more powerful by the minute..."

He was near the sword. If Kaiba went and grabbed it now, he could swing it quickly and fell the intruder in one strike. So he quickly grabbed the sword, unsheathed it, and struck him.

Only to see the top edge of the blade break.

"I am talking! If you will not listen, then I will make you listen!"

Drawing his sword, the Black Luster Soldier attacked Kaiba, who despite his two years in a fencing class, was no match for him in sheer power. The first blow shattered the blade completely. The second would have cleaved Kaiba in two had he not jumped out of the way towards the desk.

The desk. That's where the gun was. Wasting no time, Kaiba opened the drawer, pulled out the gun, and fired two shots.

But like the sword swing, his opponent wasn't felled.

"Your mortal weapons will not work on an Envoy! Now listen to me or die!"

To prove his point, a small flame engulfed the handgun, causing Kaiba to drop it and fall down onto the floor. Approaching him, the Black Luster Soldier sliced the desk in half, standing over Kaiba.

"Now listen very carefully to what I have to say. You are going to repeat the experiment you did with the machinery to bring an ally of mine into this world."

"How did you get here?"

"My partner and I are both Envoys. We are allowed to freely traverse the realms, however, this realmn weakens us slightly."

"And not the Dark Magician Girl?"

"Her soul is feeding her. It's making her stronger and stronger. However, it is far from too late to stop her. If you infuse my partner, the Chaos Emperor Dragon, with the same power you accidentaly gave the Dark Magician Girl, we can defeat her and return her to my world."

"And if I say no?"

"If I cannot return the Dark Magician Girl to our world, then I will make a new one, out of your soul. Imagine Kaiba. First your entire existence will be annhilated, along with anyone else in this buidling. Then, I will take energy from the destruction, and make a new Dark Magician Girl to replace the one here."

"I'll get to work."

"You have 12 hours. If the experiment isn't ready by then..."

"But the original arena was crushed! I can't do it so soon!"

"I don't care. 12 hours, or your head. Either one."
13512221211212211122.title: Like that's going to work...

135122212112122111222.content:
When one hears the phrase, "sleep with", contrary to what a Mr. Jackson would tell you, the ideas that immediately come to mind are dirty. This thought wasn't lost on Yugi as Mana carried him away, however it didn't come to mind until after he agreed to go with her.

However, they didn't go off to sleep right away. Midway through her stroll in the city, Mana came across the sound of loud music.

"What's going on here?"

Looking down from Mana's shoulder, Yugi immediately noticed they were downtown, by the club district. Combined with the fact that it was almost midnight, and it was no surprise that the nightclubs were full of life.

"I think we're by a bunch of nightclubs."

"Nightclubs? Never heard of those."

"Those are places where people go during the weekend to have parties and enjoy themselves. I think you're a bit big to fit in those buildings though..."

Mana shrugged her shoulders and bent over, ripping the roof of one of the buildings. Yugi winced.

"So?"

"You're gonna repair that, right?" asked Yugi.

"When the party's over, sure, why not?"

The people in the club, meanwhile, could only stare in awe at, what was according to the news, a gigantic tourist attraction. The women were staring at her sheer size, while the men were staring at more specific things.

Still, whether it was a combination of sheer curiosity, or maybe too much alcohol, the partygoers went out into the street where Mana began to observe them. Soon enough, more people filled the streets and began dancing.

"Wow! This looks like fun!"

Placing Yugi down in the middle of the crowd, Mana began to observe the dancers, and eventually, attempted to imitate them. While no one would mistake the giantess for an expert dancer, she did do rather well seeing as it was her first time.

In any case, three hours and several hundred cat calls later, the party had ended and Mana walked out of the city with a dazed Yugi in her palm.

"You're rather impuslive, aren't you?" asked Yugi.

"Is that a bad thing?"

"Well, not really, it's just..."

"You're the shy type?"

Yugi nodded. "And then I see you doing all this stuff, it doesn't really seem normal."

"It's not?"

"Well, for me it isn't normal, but you seem so carefree about it. I can't help but wonder if you see me as a pet, what with the 'Yugi-kun' and all."

"I just thought it sounded cute. How could I see you as a pet?"

"You're a lot bigger than me."

"So? Am I supposed to act some way because I'm bigger than you? Should I treat you like dirt or be horrified of myself? I just thought it made me more powerful."

"Maybe I'm just overthinking. It is late after all."

"You need sleep then. I'll take you somewhere where we can relax."
135122212112122111222.title: The dizzy night and dizzier morning

1351222121121221112222.content:
As the sun beat down on his face, Yugi finally awoke, finding himself in a grassy field. Looking around, he saw nothing around him but grass and a very large lake. Mana was nowhere to be found. Looking at his watch, he realized it was 12:20. Yugi never slept that late.

"Did I dream all that?"

<i>I don't believe, so</i>

"Yami, that WAS your Mana. I mean, the soul in the body, the way she acted..."

<i>Yes. She was. So, what did you think?</i>

"I have no idea what to think. Still, I like being with her. She's not like the others."

<i>How so?</i>

"Everyone else seems to want me for something. Mana's probably one of the few people that wants just me."

<i>Are you holding this against the others?</i>

"No, not really. I still like them, but it's nice to have someone who thinks you're the entire world. Speaking of which, where is she?"
1351222121121221112222.title: The morning, er, noon after.

13512221211212211122221.content:
suddenly yugi saw a massive shadow cast over him it didn't take long for him to figure out mana was behind him!
suddenly mana spoke "you know yugi i was thinking about what i said when you asked me if you were like a pet to me and i think i change my mind from now on you are my....
13512221211212211122221.title: Change of heart

135122212112122111222212.content:
From now on you are my slave yugi and u will refer to me as goddess or goddess mana
from now on you are expected to do any thing i ask of you if i need to sit down u will offer to be my cushion when my feet hurt you will rub them and you will worship me while doing these tasks now your first task will be...
135122212112122111222212.title: slave

choices: Go in the river you moron!  Do it!
You must resist temptation Yugi!  Stay out of the river!
13512221211212211122222.content:
Seeing as no one was in the immediate vicinity, Yugi stood up and began walking around. The area, wherever it was, was isolated, and probably far away from the city. There didn't seem to be anything around except grass, trees, and a mountain in the distance. As he continued his walk, he also noticed a large lake.

A lake full of bubbles where Yugi could make out the form of Mana washing herself, completely naked.

Now granted, Mana was submerged deep enough so that no one could see anything naughty, but the sight of an enormous giantess swinging her bare legs above the water as she washed them was enough to give anyone a nosebleed. And that included Yugi.

Hearing the sound of Yugi gasping, Mana turned around to see the champion duelist awake and doing his best to cover the blood.

"Yugi-kun! You're awake! Finally. I never saw anyone sleep so deeply..."

"You're..."

"Well, I didn't want to wake you, so I decided to look for somewhere to freshen up. Speaking of which, you look a bit dirty. Care to join me?"

"J...join you?"

"Sure! There's more than enough space."

Yugi began convulsing when he heard this. A million different feelings tore at him. Modesty, attraction, the thought of getting a giantess angry at him...
13512221211212211122222.title: The river

choices: So do we see how Yugi and Mana fare in the lake?
Or focus on another character in this story?
135122212112122111222221.content:
The feelings continued to swirl around Yugi on the inside, while on the outside, he maintained a rather professional appearance, looking as if he was pondering Mana's invitation with all the skill of a science professor.

That was little more than a sham, one perfected during countless duels so he wouldn't reveal a critical move with a misplaced gesture or exclamation.

In his mind, countless images flashed through Yugi's brain. One paticular instance came to mind, two weeks ago, when he was at an amusement park during his day off with the others.

The situation was simple enough. A new roller coaster had opened, and everyone had gone on it. Everyone except Yugi, who was scared of the sheer scale of the coaster. He didn't see the big deal in not going on until the end of the day, when he was walking home with Jou and the others.

"That kicked so much ass! Yugi, why were you so scared of it?"

"Well, it was..."

"You know Yugi," interrupted Honda. "Mr. Conservative. Honestly, you need to take a few risks."

"Risks? I've..."

"You only do stuff when you're forced to. Honda and I aren't gonna be around everywhere to get you off your butt. What then?"

"I don't need to be forced to do anything."

"True. Only stuff that's fun..."

**************************************************

As those words echoed through Yugi's mind, his body began to move automatically. He took off his jacket, and without hesistation jumped into the lake, with Mana looking on.

About five seconds later, Yugi began to finally settle down from his trance, and looked straight up, noticing Mana's titanic naked form in front of him as she relaxed. He only had one word to say at the sight before him.

"Wow."
135122212112122111222221.title: Yugi takes the plunge

choices: Yugi needed to see his friends at the mall
His grandpa was probably worried sick about him
1351222121121221112222211.content:
After the inital shock wore off, Yugi began to swim around the rather large, warm, bubble filled lake as Mana looked on. Her long hair, almost always concealed by the traditional Dark Magician Girl cap, was free from its constraints and hanging to her back. Her face wore the look of a content as her eyes were closed. Yugi, likewise, tried to relax, but he couldn't help but giggle at the sight in front of him.

"What's so funny?"

"It's just that, well, if you stood up, I'm pretty sure you'd give a lot of people a real good peep show, especially at that size."

This unexpected comment caused Mana to blush and sink into the lake for a few seconds. She hadn't accounted for her increased size giving nearby people a better view of her body.

But then it occured to her that they were in the middle of nowhere, and Yugi's own motivations for saying such a thing.

"Oh Yugi-kun you jealous little thing!" she squealed as she hugged Yugi to her exposed bosom. "You want me all for yourself don't you?"

Now it was Yugi's turn to blush, as he frantically attempted to escape Mana's embrace. When he did, Yugi found himself underwater, viewing the entirety of Mana's body.

From above, Mana could only see a small red spot in the water. Staring at it for a few seconds, she saw Yugi emerge, nose bleeding, and mouth gasping.

"Did you like what you saw?" Yugi nodded and quickly retreated to a side of the lake.

After a few minutes, Yugi began to relax in the lake, geniunely enjoying the warm water and the company of Mana, who insisted on washing him clean, which Yugi agreed to. This of course, led to another topic of confusion, Yugi's hair, As she began to wash it, Mana noticed the odd combination of black and blonde spikes was standing as firm as ever.

"What's in your hair?"

"It's the natural color and shape. Weird, I know. What's wrong? You don't like it?"

"Actually, I really like it. I've just never seen hair like that before."

"And I've never seen a giant up close before."

"Good point," she replied as she ran her finger through the spikes, laughing at their shape. Yugi couldn't help but chuckle as well.

"Yeah, my hair is kinda weird. But at least I'm not bald..."

Eventually, Yugi was cleaned, and despite his yearning to continue to stay in the river with Mana, he realized he had an appointment that needed to be attended to immediately.
1351222121121221112222211.title: Riverside follies

choices: They make it to the others without a problem
13512221211212211122222111.content:
"Mana, I just remembered something."

"What is it?"

"I promised the others I was going to meet them at the mall today. I told Anzu I would help her build her new deck?"

"Aww, do you really want to go? Wouldn't you rather stay with me?"

"I would, but I promised them that I'd go. So I'm gonna need to dry up. And you might..."

"What?"

"Want to put on some clothes."

Blushing for a second, Mana took Yugi and placed him dry land. She then raised herself from the river, but not before extending her hands and creating a thick fog around the area.

"No peeking!"

Yugi shrugged, as he wasn't the type to go peeking on girls changing their clothes. Were it Jou or Honda, it might be a different story, however.

Rather quickly, Yugi had finished putting his clothes back on, observing the fog vanish. Mana stood in the middle of where it once was, not wearing her traditional costume, but an outfit not unlike what the dancers at the club were wearing last night, a blusish middriff, black skirt, and long black shoes completed the picutre. With no hat, Mana's long hair flowed freely behind her shoulders.

"Well, ready to go?"

"How do we get there?"

"Same way I left. Walk!"

"You don't think it'll cause a problem?"

"Hey, I was able to walk around yesterday without a problem. Why should today be any different?"
13512221211212211122222111.title: Appointments

135122212112122111222221112.content:
Standing up, with Yugi squarely on her shoulder, Mana began to walk from the countryside setting into the urban areas. Her massive strides easily propelled them as quickly as a car could take them, and without any bumps from navigating the varying terrain.

However, on the outskirts of the city, the two encountered something they were hoping not to see again.

An avalanche of reporters in cars, helicopters, and on foot created a blockade in front of the city.

"It's the giantess! Sit down! I've got some questions!"

"Hey, she's not wearing her cosplay outfit!"

Yugi shook his head while Mana stared at the endless line of reporters.

"I stick out, huh?"

"Can't you do something? You know, shrink or turn invisible?"

Mana shook her head. "I never tried to hide myself. I didn't need to."

Yugi sweatdropped. "That means?"
135122212112122111222221112.title: Can't she get a little privacy?

choices: Mana disguises herself at human size
She makes Anzu grow to her size!
1351222121121221112222211121.content:
With a slight "Hmph" directed towards the blockade of papparazi, Mana lifted one collossal boot and simply stepped over them in one huge stride. Moving quickly, the group of reporters never had a hope of catching her.

"That was simple enough, don't you think?"

"You sure you could just ignore them?"

"Why not? If it's bad, I should ignore it, right?"

"I just didn't think it would be that simple..." replied Yugi with a sweatdrop.

The two continued their journey for another two minutes before finally reaching the mall, where Honda, Jou, and Anzu were looking on, bored as anything. Noticing the shadow above them,

"Well well. Look who finally showed up."

Hastily, Yugi began to apologize, but he was quickly cut off when Anzu spoke again.

"Oh don't worry Yugi, it's not your fault. Your ride isn't usually a papparazi manget."

Sighing, Mana stared down at the slightly peeved Anzu. "I thought I convinced you I wasn't bad."

Anzu sighed. "I don't think you're bad, it's just that..."

"I know," interrupted Mana. "Maybe you wouldn't find me so threatening if we saw eye-to-eye."
1351222121121221112222211121.title: Lateness

choices: Urgent matters are afoot at the Kaiba building
Anzu's going to mess with her new toys some more
13512221211212211122222111212.content:
Anzu wasn't sure what Mana meant by "seeing eye-to-eye," but she wasn't about to take any chances. Slowly, Anzu began backing up from the titaness, only to see her perspective quickly changing. Mana no longer towered over Anzu, but was at eye-level with her. Conversely, Anzu no longer felt scared of the Dark Magician Girl.

Then she looked down, and saw the mall, as well as her friends looking much smaller than before. Anzu couldn't help but gasp as she put two and two together.

"You made me a giant!"

"Giantess. A female giant," cheerfully replied Mana. "I don't look so scary now, do I?"

Anzu looked on, not sure what to make of the situation. Mana didn't look anywhere near as scary, but this...

Then she looked down at Jou and Honda, and the expression of shock turned to a mischevious grin.

"Uh, Yugi?"

"What?"

"Why is she looking at us like that?"

Before Yugi could answer, Anzu went and picked up the three of them in one hand. It was almost funny to pick two supposed thugs like Honda and Jououchi up like little toys. As she moved her newly enlarged body around, Anzu could only think of one thing to say.

"Who's legs are better now boys?"

Mana giggled while Honda and Jou both fumbled around for an answer. Yugi, who had missed the chatter about Mana's legs earlier, could only look on in confusion as the two began contradicting each other.

"Pretty cool huh?" asked Mana.

Anzu nodded. "A girl could get used to this."
13512221211212211122222111212.title: Anzu's a big girl now

135122212112122111222221112122.content:
"Who has the better legs?" asked Anzu again. Honda and Jououchi stammered. Yugi, not sure what to say, just stared. He knew Anzu wasn't going to hurt the three of them...probably.
"Okay...who has the better hug?" asked Anzu, as she hugged the three to her gigantic bosom. It was Yugi who was in the middle of Anzu's breasts. Luckily, Anzu's clothese had grew with her, otherwise Yugi might've bled to death with a nosebleed.
People in the mall were either running in panic, or staring at the two giantess's.
"Hmmm...." said Mana, who was looking around the mall. "I know what, Anzu, let's dress Yugi-Kun, Jououchi and Honda!"
"What a good idea!" said Anzu, who had spotted the clothing store that Mana was pointing at....
135122212112122111222221112122.title: Dress-up

1351222121121221112222211121222.content:
Yugi winced while Jou and Honda gulped. Sure enough, Mana was pointing at a women's clothing store that was quickly emptied when the people first took notice of the two giantesses.

Anzu looked on at the store with a combination of glee and mischef. "Oh, they'll look so adorable!"

"Are you serious?!" shouted Jou. "You're gonna dress us up like girls? I mean, Honda might like it..."

"WHAT?!"

"Oh shut up Mr. Beautification Club member!"

"That doesn't have anything to do with cross-dressing! If anyone deserves it, it's Yugi! He's small enough to pass for a girl anyway!"

"A girl?" angrily replied Yugi. "Where did that come from?"

"I'm not doing it!" replied Jou, dodging the question. That was before the girls turned to face their tiny boy-toys. Jououchi felt his confidence dwindle to almost zero as he saw the girls holding a wide variety of female clothing in each free hand.

Mana giggled as she approached them. "So, ready to play dress-up?"
1351222121121221112222211121222.title: Playing along?

choices: Jou is forced into a dress
13512221211212211122222111212222.content:
"No!" shouted Jououchi. "I won't do it"

"Spoilsport" said Anzu.

Mana grabbed Yugi and a polka-dotted dress. The dress looked like Barbie clothes compared to Mana. Yugi started to strip himself, but Mana stopped him.

"I get to undress you" said Mana. With one finger, Mana stripped Yugi's shirt, and with another finger she pulled Yugi's pants off. Yugi was now in his underwear. Yugi couldn't see what Anzu was doing with Honda and Jou. Mana looked at Yugi's tiny body.

"Hmmm...been a long time since I saw a man naked" said Mana, who giggled. This got Anzu's attention.

"Long time?" asked Anzu.

"5000 years to be exact" said Mana. "I just remembered that Yugi-kun looks like a Pharaoh that I used to know..."

"How can you be 5000 years old?!" asked Anzu.

"There's a fountain of youth in my world" said Mana. "All of the duel monsters are that old..didn't you know? And almost all of them have drank from the fountain of youth"

"You look like you're not a day over 30" said Anzu. Mana giggled.

"Thanks to the fountain, I've kept my good looks" said Mana. "now...to dress up my Yugi-kun"
13512221211212211122222111212222.title: Just remembered

choices: A giant Chaos Emperor Dragon emerges
Something goes wrong with the process
135122212112122111222221112122222.content:
Kaiba had been working furiously the entire day. After his nearly-fatal encounter with the Black Luster Soldier earlier in the day, he had been more than convinced that whatever threat the otherworldy Envoy promised would become a reality if he didn't finish.

Still, despite his worries, he had managed to prepare a dueling arena to the exact settings the arena from yesterday morning was at, only with the Chaos Emperor Dragon replacing the Dark Magician Girl.

As soon as the final switch was pulled, a familiar voice called out to him.

"I assume that you are finished?" Turning around, Kaiba saw the shining armor of the Black Luster Soldier. Standing up, he nodded.

"I am finished. The settings are exactly as they were this morning with your Dragon as the sole variance. A Mystic Elf and the Chaos Emperor Dragon on one side, and empty field with a trap card on the other, and the switch ready to be pulled."

"Then do it! Every second I waste dealing with you, her power grows!"

Nodding, Kaiba pulled the switch, waiting for the mechanism to activate.
135122212112122111222221112122222.title: The dragon from Hell

choices: The Black Luster soldier takes matters in his own hands
1351222121121221112222211121222222.content:
The arena shot out lightning bolts. Kaiba and the Black Luster soldier was almost hit by one. When the lightning show was over, a 200-foot-tall Mystic Elf was standing on the arena. She looked down to see Kaiba and the Envoy.

"Umm..." said Black Luster Soldier. "great work! Now we got two huge bitches to deal with!"

"It wasn't my fault!" yelled Kaiba. "I thought I was doing everything right"

The Mystic Elf looks around, blinking in confusion. The Mystic Elf looked REAL, like the Black Magician Girl had looked.

"Thanks" said the Mystic Elf. "I've wanted to play with you humans for a long time!"

"Do something!" snapped Kaiba to the Black Luster soldier, but he was gone.

"This just isn't my week..." said Kaiba weakly as the Mystic Elf bended to pick him up.
1351222121121221112222211121222222.title: Mystic Elf's turn

choices: Anzu and Mana think of a new game to play
The Mystical Elf is about to play with Kaiba
13512221211212211122222111212222221.content:
Back at the mall, the two girls had finally gone through the extra-long process of changing Yugi and Honda into women's clothing (who both found it extra-embarassing). Placing them down on the ground, Yugi and Honda looked at each other, wincing.

"I look like an idiot," moaned Honda as he saw the long summer dress he was in. "But at least it doesn't have polka dots."

Yugi grimaced as he stared down at his dress. "It's not this is any less less embarassing than what you're wearing.

Honda nodded, then motioned towards the girls. "Or what they're going to do to Jououchi."

Jou, meanwhile, was being held firm by Mana while Anzu had reached into the store and took out a schoolgirl uniform, complete with miniskirt. Not content to take no for an answer, the two girls grabbed him as soon as they finished dressing up Yugi and Honda.

"This isn't right! Let me go!"

"Oh, take it like a little man," replied Anzu as she removed his shirt and pants. Jououchi's cries and strugges were of no avial as Anzu finished placing him in the schoolgirl uniform.

"Oh, he looks so adorable!" exclaimed Mana. Anzu nodded as he put him on the ground next to the others.

"I swear, if I hear even one word..."

"Ah don't worry about it Sailor Jou," smirked Honda.

"Just do everyone a favor and keep that skirt up, OK?" added Yugi.

"Like polka-dots are any better," mumbled Jou.
13512221211212211122222111212222221.title: Embarassing, but not as embarassing as...

choices: What does Anzu has in mind?
The Mystic Elf plays with Kaiba
135122212112122111222221112122222211.content:
"Hmmm...not what should we do with our new dolls?" asked Anzu. Yugi, Honda and Jou looked at each other. None of them liked being called 'dolls' , but they weren't going to spoil the fun of the gigantic girls. Jou was having trouble keeping his miniskirt down.
"How do girls keep these things down?" asked a blushing Jou, as he adusted the miniskirt.
"I'm lucky I don't have a mini-skirt" muttered Yugi.
"Let's play 'house' with them!" said Mana. "My little Yugi can be my daughter, and Jou and Honda could be her friends"
"Never too young to play with dolls" said Anzu, and picked up Yugi. Yugi had a crush on Anzu...and hoped that Anzu didn't end up crushing him!
"I've got a better idea" said Anzu, as she was looking down at Yugi.
"What?" asked Mana.
Anzu whispered something in Mana's ear. Jou, Honda and Yugi was sure they weren't going to like what Anzu had in mind.
135122212112122111222221112122222211.title: A new game

1351222121121221112222211121222222111.content:
"Oooh, that's a good one!"

"I know. Aren't you glad I thought of it?"

The boys shuddered as they saw the two gigantic girls gossip over their fates. Whatver Anzu had come up with, they knew it wasn't going to be pretty.

After about two minutes, the two girls turned to their dolls, grinning.

"I don't like where this going," began Jou.

"Me neither," replied Honda.

"We decided what we're gonna do with you guys," interrupted Anzu.

"Yeah, Anzu had a great idea! Well, great for us anyway, hehe."

Although common sense dictated otherwise, Yugi went up and asked "What game?"

"Yugi are you crazy?!" interrupted Honda and Jou in unison.

"They were gonna do it anyway. Might as well get it over with."

"Well I'm glad you asked Yugi," began Anzu. "It's..."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111.title: Anzu's game

13512221211212211122222111212222221112.content:
"...a little game of hide-and-seek" said Anzu, smiling.

"Is that all?" asked Yugi. Anzu shook her head, grinning.

"If me or Mana finds one of you guys" said Anzu. "you'll be turned into candy and be eaten"

"WHAT?!" asked all three boys.

"Now, now...don't be like that" said Mana. "I'll cast a spell that allows Anzu and I to eat you, but you won't digest. How does that sound?"

"Do we have any choice?" asked Jou dryly.

Anzu and Mana shook thier heads, giggling.

"We'll give you 20 minutes to hide" said Mana. Suddenly, an egg timer appeared in Mana's hand.
"Hold on!" yelled Honda. "you can't..."
"You'd better hide" said Mana. And the egg timer started to go.
Anzu set Yugi back down on the floor.
"You can hide anywhere you want" said Mana as the three boys rush off to hide.
"Why are you giving them 20 minutes to hide?" asked Anzu.
"Well..I want to give them a LITTLE chance" said Mana. Then, two girls burst out laughing.

Yugi, Honda and Jou waited until they were out of sight of Mana and Anzu to talk.
"Okay...it might be better if we all split up" said Honda. Jou nodded.
"Yeah" said Yugi.
Honda, Jou and Yugi all went in different directions.
13512221211212211122222111212222221112.title: Hide and go eat

choices: The Elf tries to make the statue, and Kaiba fly
Anzu and Mana are busy looking for their little dolls
135122212112122111222221112122222211121.content:
As he was lifted into the air almost efortlessly, Seto Kaiba began cursing and muttering as the Mystical Elf examined him. He would almost had rathered taken his chances with the Envoy! At least he was human size.

"My very own little human," began the Mystical Elf as she stared at Kaiba. "There are so many things that I want to do with you."

"I'm not a toy!" shouted Kaiba, but the Mystical Elf covered his mouth. Between his bouts of screaming, Kaiba was just glad he was in the Kaibacorp theme park and there was enough room for the Elf to move around in. At the very least, he wouldn't have to pay for a new complex.

"But you're small like a toy! Oooh, and you even come with accessories!"

Kaiba blinked. "Accessories?" Looking on in horror, Kaiba saw as the Mystical Elf picked up a large statue of the Blue-Eyes White Dragon that he had placed near the entrance to greet visitors. To her, however, it was only a small toy.

Placing Kaiba on the dragon, the Mystic Elf began to move it every which way, making 'whoosh' noises and crashing it into valuable Kaibacorp equipment. Kaiba himself would have been furious if he wasn't so preoccupied with hanging on for dear life.

"Ooh, I wonder if this dragon can really fly? It has wings."

"Oh God..." muttered Kaiba.
135122212112122111222221112122222211121.title: Kaiba's really, really, really bad weekend

choices: The Mystical Elf finds a women's clothing store
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Back at the mall, Anzu and Mana were having a hard time looking for thier little dolls. The mall wasn't big enough for Anzu and Mana to walk in. So they had to look in windows....at least Anzu did. Mana had produced a special device that allows you to see through walls. The device looked like a spyglass. Mana made one for Anzu too. Mana also casted the spell that would allow for Anzu to eat people without digesting them.
Anzu had spotted Jou in a men's clothing store, trying on new clothes. This made Anzu giggle and showed Mana what he was doing.
"Are the 20 minutes up?" asked Anzu.
Mana looked at the egg timer.
"No..5 minutes left" said Mana.


Back at Kaibacorp, the Mystical Elf was examining the Blue Eyes White Dragon Statue. Kaiba was holding onto the statue for dear life.
"Fly, dragon!" cried the Mystical Elf, as she threw the statue across the room. Of course, the statue didn't fly. Kaiba was barely able to hold onto the statue as it fell towards the ground. The Mystical Elf caught the statue before it crashed on the ground.
"Phooey" said the Mystical Elf. "a dragon that doesn't fly"
"Let me go!" yelled Kaiba.
"But, I'm not done playing with you yet" said the Mystical Elf.
"I'm not a toy!" yelled Kaiba.
Mystical Elf put her huge finger on his mouth to silence him.
"My toys don't talk" said the Elf.
"MMMFFFHHH!" came the muffled cry of Kaiba.
"Let's see...." said the Mystical Elf. "I know what! I can dress you up like a doll!"
Kaiba paled.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Going from bad to worse

choices: She goes to the mall and runs into Mana and Anzu
She goes to another women's clothing store
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Inside the mall, unaware of the time limit or the fact that the girls were right above him, Jououchi was hastily changing out of his schoolgirl uniform and into something less embarassing and easier to maintain, a pair of shorts with a T-shirt.

"Psycho girls think just because they're 200 feet tall they can dress me up like a toy. They just can't do that! They need permission! Reasoning! I swear, they didn't go out of their way to embarass Yugi..."

Right above him, Mana and Anzu were viewing the entire conversation, with Anzu impatiently looking at Mana's egg timer. Finally, the timer rung, signlaing that the game had begun.

"You want to, or should I?" asked Anzu.

"You found him first. You grab him," replied Mana.

Suddenly, as the celing was destroyed by a giant hand reaching for him, Jou backed into a corner screaming. Not only had he been caught, he hadn't even put his pants on!

Gleefully, Anzu snatched Jououchi, clothes and all from the store, licking her lips.

"Oh come on! No fair!"

"20 minutes was plenty of time," remarked Mana as she pointed her finger at Jououchi.

Before he could say another word, Jououchi felt his skin changing. His form itself stayed the same as a humanoid, but his body and even his clothes turned a dark brown/black color. Anzu licked her lips at the sight.

"Mmm, chocolate Jou! My favorite!"

"Don't worry!" added Mana as Anzu threw him into her mouth. "My spell will protect you! You're in no real danger!"

That didn't comfort Jououchi one bit.

**************************************************

"Dress me up?!" shouted Kaiba in anger and confusion.

"I don't like your clothes," replied the Mystical Elf. "I'm gonna get you new ones."

Before Kaiba could protest, the Mystical Elf picked him up and carried him out of the Kaibaland arena, going through the large hole made by the Black Magician Girl earlier.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Time's up for Jououchi

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The Mystical Elf made her way down the street with Kaiba in her hand. The statue of the Blue-Eyes White Dragon was put back where it came from.
The Mystical Elf spotted a men's clothing store. Actually, it was a children's clothing store. To Kaiba's horror, the Mystical Elf ripped off the roof of the store and looked for the right clothes for her tiny doll.


****************************


Anzu hadn't chewed Jououchi when she threw him in her mouth. But she did roll the chocolate Jou around in her mouth, covering him in her salvia. After about two minutes of this, Anzu had swallowed the chocolate Jou. Jou felt himself being forced through a tight ring of muscle and entered a large chamber--her stomach. Jou landed with a slight squish. Anzu's stomach was pinkish and slimy. Greyish liquid was everywhere--stomach acid. Jou closed his eyes, waiting to be digested. But that didn't happen. Jou reopened his eyes to look around in the stomach. It was filled with stale air and smelled of pizza. Jou couldn't move, and he couldn't since he was turned into a chocolate version of himself. It was as if as he was a *real* bar of chocolate.
"Well...at least I'm not gonna die.." said Jou. But how was he going to get out?


Anzu rubbed her stomach. "Hmmm...delicious!"
Mana smiled and began to look for Yugi and Honda. She found Yugi hiding in a music store. She ripped the roof off above the music store. Yugi was still in the polka-dotted dress. Yugi looked up to see Mana looking down at him smiling. Before Yugi could move, Mana pointed at him and he turned into chocolate. Mana licked her lips and tossed the chocolate Yugi in her mouth. She rolled Yugi on her tongue and swallowed.
"Two down and one to go" said Anzu.
"Yum" said Mana, rubbing her belly.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Yummy Yugi

choices: Honda manages to elude his pursuers
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Kaiba shuddered. The Mystical Elf was reaching into the store and looking for the right pair of clothes to put on Kaiba. Finally, her face lighting up with glee, she grabbed a set of children's overalls, complete with undershirt.

"You cannot be serious."

"These clothes are way cuter than the ones you have on now!" she exclaimed. Wasting no time, the Elf removed all of Kaiba's clothes except for his boxers, and then began to put Kaiba in the overalls. Kaiba didn't know what was more embarassing, being stripped down by a giant female Duel Monster, or what he was wearing now.

"My new toy looks so cute now. Isn't this much better than your old outfit?"

Kaiba didn't respond, so the Mystical Elf picked him up and began walking back towards Kaibaland.

"OK little human, it's play time!"

**************************************************

Breathing heavily, Honda went deeper and deeper into the mall in order to avoid the gigantic pair of girls looking for him. While the others had hidden in stores (and Jou mumbled something about a new outfit) Honda had chosen to hide deep in the basement of the mall, next to several crates of items.

"They'll never find me here," smirked Honda, blissfully unaware of Mana's new gadget.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Rock-bottom

choices: What tortue does Mystical Elf has in store for Kaiba?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Mana and Anzu had spent the last 3 minutes searching for Honda. He had found a good hiding spot...but Mana's gadget would find him sooner or later. Indeed, it was Mana who found Honda in the corner of the basement. Mana waved her hand and there came a water hose. Anzu looked over at Mana.
"Honda's in the basement" said Mana. "so I'm going to flood the basement!" Anzu smiled.
Mana stuck one end of the water hose in a door of the mall and flooded the mall with gallons and gallons of water. It took 56 minutes exactly for Honda to come out of the mall, riding a wave of water. Mana grabbed Honda from the wave. Mana waved her hand over the mall, and it was restored. It was as if as nothing had happened to the mall. Mana changed Honda into chocolate and tossed him into her mouth and swallowed.
"You toys lose" laughed Anzu.


***********************

Kaiba would give *anything* for someone to save him from the huge Mystical Elf. Unluckily, no one came to Kaiba's rescue. He would give anything to vaporize on the spot.
"Well, what shall I do with my cute human?" asked the Mystical Elf, as she entered Kaibaland.
Kaiba said nothing. He was trying to hide in her huge hand. He wouldn't be seen in children's overalls! He would be the laughing stock of the dueling world!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Honda can't hide

choices: Do we see what new game they have in store?
Or focus on what the Mystic Elf is going to do to Kaiba?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Savoring the flavor of chocolate Honda in her mouth, Mana giggled and waited for a few minutes, while looking on at Anzu.

"And to think, you used to be scared of me."

"Well it's because you were so big," replied Anzu. "Speaking of," she asked as she looked over Mana's body, "is it just me or have we been getting bigger?"

Mana nodded. "We are, although not a lot. I told you that my soul was making me stronger instead of weaker. The stronger I get, the bigger I become."

"But why am I growing? I'm not a Duel Monster."

"No, but my size spell was set to make you my exact height. If I grow, so do you."

Anzu grinned, shaking her hips for a second. "So, you wanna play some more games with our little dollies?"

Mana smiled, and pointed her hand at the ground. Instantly, Yugi, Honda, and Jououchi appeared, no longer chocolate. Furthermore, both Yugi and Honda had been placed in their normal clothes, while Jououchi was stuck in the schoolgirl uniform.

"Oh, crap, not again," he muttered.

"That's what you get for losing the game," replied Anzu.

"Speaking of which, we wanna play more with you," added Mana, reaching to grab Yugi. Honda began looking around, while Jououchi began focusing on keeping his skirt down.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Out of the stomach and into the fire

choices: See what Anzu and Mana has in mind
See what Kaiba and Mystical Elf are up to
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Hmmm...what should we do now?" asked Anzu. Jou was blushing and muttering under his breath. Yugi had listened to what Mana was saying. She was continuing to grow, along with Anzu. How big would Mana get? Would she cover all the world with her...
"Let's play with cars" said Mana, as she reached for a race car. Anzu smiled and picked up a four-door car. Yugi, Honda and Jou exchanged glances...although, Jou was busy with his miniskirt.
"A car needs a driver" said Anzu, as she picked up Yugi and put him in the four-door car. Mana picked up Jou, allowing for Honda to see up the miniskirt. Honda quickly turned away.
"Thanks a lot, bud!" said Jou to Honda as he was put in the sports car by Mana. Honda was picked up by Anzu and put in the same car as Yugi.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Playing in cars with boys   (movie title rip-off)

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"We're gonna have a little race!" announced Mana. "The loser has to get lunch for everyone."

"And that's why I'm not gonna lose," replied Anzu as she readied her car.

Both girls grinned as they set up a few empty cars at the end of a half-mile stretch of highway. Then heading back towards the mall, they readied their cars. Luckily for the girls, their presence had caused most of the area for 3/4 of a mile to be evaccuated, so they wouldn't be bothered playing.

"Wait, so what's gonna happen?" asked Honda. Mana quickly replied.

"We're gonna push both cars and see which one hits the finish line first."

"Is that safe?"

Mana shrugged her shoulders as she readied her race car, with both Yugi and Honda in tow.

"Yugi, switch with me."

"Why?"

"That seat has an airbag. Those things are dangerous to short people. But I need it."

"We'll be fine. They're not gonna hurt us," confidently replied Yugi.

"No, they're not gonna hurt you. They think you're..." Honda's train of thought was quickly interrupted as the two girls began readying their cars. Anzu even made car noises for effect.

"They're gonna push us?"

"Guess so," replied Jou from the other car.

"Don't you start! I'm gonna have nightmares about that miniskirt for weeks!"

"Ready?" asked Mana. Anzu nodded.

"GO!"

As soon as Anzu said "go," both girls pushed their cars as hard as they could towards the finish line, the momentum charging them ahead at an incredible speed.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Drag race...of doom!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Both Anzu and Mana released thier cars both at the same time. The two cars zipped at break-neck speed. Honda looked at the speedometer. "120!" he yelled.
Anzu's car cross the finish line two seconds before Mana's car. When the two cars passed the finish line, Yugi slammed on the breaks. That didn't help. The two cars stopped just before running into a wall by Anzu and Mana.
"Ha!" said Honda. "we beat miniskirt boy!"
"Hey!" said Jou, coming out of the car. "you only beat me cause you got lucky!"
"Yeah...whatever" said Yugi.
"You have to get lunch for everyone" said Anzu.
"That should be easy" said Anzu. "Yugi-kun, would you get me some food and food for your friends?"
"Uhh...sure" said Yugi. "what do you wanna eat?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Fast and the Freaking loser

choices: Mana and Anzu want to go exploring after lunch
What about Kaiba and the Mystical Elf?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Pizza!" shouted everyone in unision.

"OK, OK. But the nearest pizza place that wasn't abandoned was three blocks from here."

"Oh don't worry about it," replied Mana as placed Yugi in her cleavage. "I'll give you a ride."

The others looked on as Mana and Yugi walked towards the pizza shop, with different thoughts going through their heads.

"They both enjoy that way too much," mused Honda.

Jou just laughed. "You mean it wasn't THAT obvious?"

****************************************************

Soon enough, Yugi and Mana had returned with two large pizzas and five large drinks, enlarged by Mana to their scale. While comftorable for the girls, the guys were overwhelmed by the giant slices and resiviors worth of soda. However, awe quickly subsided as they began eating their fill.

"The good thing about going out to eat with Mana," began Yugi, "is that you never have to worry about not having enough to eat."

"Yeah," replied Jou, who now sitting down, no longer had to worry about his miniskirt. "You just have to deal with all the other crap first."

"Eh, I dunno," replied Honda. "It was kinda fun."

"You're just saying that because the giant girls didn't make you wear a miniskirt. Uh, speaking of which?"

"Yes?" began Anzu between bites of pizza.

"You two look bigger than before. What's up with that?"

"We're still growing," replied Mana. "Something wrong with that?"

"Uh..." Jououchi was at a loss for words when he heard that.

"I know Yugi-kun likes the idea," teased Mana as she lifted Yugi into the air.

"Hey, you're embarassing me..."

The group managed to get a good laugh out of that, although the three boys had different levels of enthusiasm over the fact that Mana and Anzu were still growing. Jououchi clearly took it the worst of the group.

"I think I lost my appetite."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Lunchtime

choices: Anzu and Mana meet up with Mystical Elf
Mystical Elf has some fun with her 'toy'
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"After lunch, I wanna explore" said Mana. "I want to see the entire city"

"Good idea" said Anzu. "I want to see this city when I'm this big"

Honda, Jououchi and Yugi were eating thier food. Jououchi was sitting down, so he didn't have to worry about his miniskirt.

When lunch was over, Mana picked up Yugi and placed him in her ample clevage. Anzu picked up Honda and Jou and placed them in her clevage. The two gigantic girls started to walk away from the mall. People were either running away from the two giantess's. or they were staring open-mouthed.

"All the people look like little dolls!" said Mana.

"And the buildings look like dollhouses" said Anzu. As they walked down the street, the two girls were becoming bigger.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Walking in the city

choices: The three girls decide to play with all their dollies
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The two girls began walking around the city, with Mana ooohing and ahhing at every single thing Yugi and the tour guide didn't show her the day before. Yugi began pointing out all the little things that she did miss, so Mana wouldn't feel clueless. Lying back in Mana's ample cleavage, Yugi began to relax.

Things weren't nearly as comftorable with Anzu however. Enjoying her newfound scale and power, she began walking through the entire city, savoring every step and reaction from the crowd.

Jououchi and Honda were nowhere near as comftorable, however. In addition to the embarassment of being placed in the now gargantuan breasts of their classmate, Jououchi's skirt was riding up on him, and the snug position he was in made it difficult for him to move his legs around.

Eventually, the two girls managed to happen upon Kaibaland, which bought an odd view forward. Honda was the first to notice.

"Someone's in there. Someone big."

"We should take a look," replied Mana. Nodding, Anzu and Mana walked into the building with their friends in tow. But nothing could have prepared them for the sight in front of them.

A gigantic Mystical Elf was playing with a ridiculously dressed Kaiba like he was a doll, swinging him from wires near the rafters of the dome.

"Shizuka?"

"Wait a sec?" asked Anzu, "you know her!"

Turning around, the Mystical Elf happily exclaimed "Mana-chan!" and went forward to hug her. Yugi was rather snugly caught between both their chests.

"Who's your friend?" she asked.

"Oh, this is Anzu. She's from this world."

"Hi," began Anzu. "What are you doing?"

"Playing with my dolly. Isn't he cute?"

The sight of Seto Kaiba in clothes designed for children caused everyone to fall down with laughter. Even Jououchi laughed, completely ignoring that he had a miniskirt on.

Kaiba meanwhile was panicked. The Black Magician Girl had returned along with a gigantic version of one of Yugi's friends, and on top of that, it looked like they were all getting larger.

"So, you bought dollies too?" Shizuka asked. Mana and Anzu both nodded.

"Wanna play?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A new playmate?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"HOLD IT!" yelled a voice.

Everybody looked around and saw the Black Luster Soldier was on the ground.

"What do you want, Riga?" asked Mana.

"You can't go on like this" said Riga. "you two hsve to go back to our world...and shrink that girl back to normal size!"

"But we're having fun" said Shizuki.

"I don't care" said Riga.

"And why should we listen to you?" asked Mana. "you look like a doll too!"

"Help us!" yelled Kaiba, deseperate.

Mana picked up Riga.

"You can't spoil our fun" said Mana. "now, get lost before I eat you"

"Y-you wouldn't dare!" yelled Riga. "I'm an Envoy, you know!"

"I don't care" said Mana. "you're a party pooper"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Riga

choices: The attack worked!  The girls are down for the count.
The attack didn't work, and Mana sees new dolls, not Envoys
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The Black Luster Soldier, aka Riga, was not going to let any Duel Monster short of the Egyptian Gods tell him what to do. His voice raged, no longer calm and collected, but the voice of something not of this world.

"You dare defy me? I don't care how big you are, but NO ONE CHALLENGES THE ENVOYS AND LIVES!"

Suddenly vanishing out her hand, the Envoy appeared on the floor as another, larger (but still only 1/4th the size of the girls) form appeared. Mana recognized it instantly.

"The Chaos Emperor Dragon?"

"Correct. My attempts to fuse the Dragon with the same energies that made you huge failed, but we can still destroy you with our effect magic!"

Mana looked genuinely worried. Taking all the boys, she placed them by the ground. Concentrating, she shed the casual outfit she was wearing in favor of the Black Magician Girl outfit.

"Stay behind me."

"Enough!" shouted Riga. "Face the ultimate technique of the Envoys, combined field annhilation! This attack can fell all but the Egyptian Gods themselves, and that's only because I've never used it against them!"

Gathering all their energy, the two Envoys fired extremely large black beams at all the girls. Everyone braced themselves for the impact, although Kaiba was desperate enough to say "Take them out!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Envoy battle

choices: Punches him away before sending Mana and M. Elf back to S. Realm
Brings Yugi with them to the Shadow Realm
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The smoke cleared and Yugi and co. saw the three girls down. "No!" Yugi yelled running over to Mana. Mana groaned and opened one of her eyes, seeing him. She smiled as she moved her hand over to him. "Mana! Are you okay?!" Yugi asked. Mana just shook her head no as she rubbed the top of his head. "Yugi-kun...I...I can't move, even with my new power, that attack was too much. I feel myself losing power. Riga is going to take me and Shizuka back. Anzu is already almost back to normal. I need to apologize for everything me and Anzu did to you guys today. I told you yesterday that you weren't a pet, toy, or slave and that I love you, but I have been treating you like one all day. My height and not having to deal with the Envoys made me think I'm better than you all, I'm sorry," Mana explained.
Yugi shook his head and smiled. "It's okay Mana. Even if you did eat me...I still love you too and I won't let those two take you away from me!" Yugi yelled as he stood in front of Riga. Riga glared at him and said,"

choices: Mana gets new clothes for Riga

The two black rays hit Mana and Shizuki. After the smoke cleared, Mana and Shizuki still stood.

"Huh?!" asked Riga. "that was supposed to stop every monster!"

"Well, too bad" said Mana, smiling. "now we have new dolls!"

Riga and the Chaos Emperor Dragon sweatdropped.

Mana picked up Riga, Shizuki picked up the Chaos Emperor Dragon. "Hmm...my doll need new clothes" said Mana.
"I AM NOT A DOLL!" yelled Riga.
"Oh, be quiet" said Mana. "we're in charge now!"
Kaiba was trying to hide while Jou was laughing at the newly dressed Kaiba.
"I don't think they make clothes for dragons.." said Shizuki as she looked at the Chaos Emperor Dragon.
"Come on" said Anzu. "let's play with our new dolls"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The world is thier dollhouse

choices: Anzu catches them, and punishes them
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
While the two Envoys were ready to die of embarassment, the ever-resourseful Kaiba had hatched a scheme to escape. Sneaking behind equipment destroyed during Shizuki's play, he was going to run for the nearest exit. However, he couldn't just run straight for it, he'd be caught. So he began looking around, only to see someone walk up to him.

"What are you doing Kaiba?"

"Jou you idoit! Stay down!" Kaiba then turned to see Jououchi, only to attempt to hold in his laughter at the ridiculous outfit he was wearing.

"Like your outfit is any better."

"Look, I don't like you, and you don't like me, but if we work together, we can escape, and hopefully get new clothes."

"What do we do?"

"Run when all three are completely distracted."

"That's your brilliant plan?"

"Let's see you come up with a better one! Now watch!"

Sighing, Jou looked forward by where Anzu, Mana, and Shizuki were busy dressing up their new dolls. Mana had decided to put the Black Luster Soldier in a clown costume that was used by Kaibaland employees for birthday parties and large gatherings, while Shizuki was busy placing a large red bow, made of the tapestry, on the Dragon's neck. Honda and Yugi were laughing at every second of the sight, probably since they were normally dressed.

"Ready?"

"Yup."

"Run like hell!"

And the two took off like lightning towards the exit.

choices: Where does Jou and Kaiba go to?
See Yugi and Honda's new clothes
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jou and Kaiba managed to get away because the three girls were totally distracted. The Chaos Emperor Dragon was trying to take the bow off of it. Riga was struggling to get out of his new clothes. So, nobody knew that Kaiba and Jou had escaped.
Anzu and Mana were now slightly over 400 foot tall and were getting bigger slowly. Shizuki was growing too.

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Jououchi and Kaiba missing

choices: We go back to the girls and their boy-toys
How does Kaiba plan to go about his evil plan?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Running furiously through the streets, ignoring any passerbyes, Kaiba and Jououchi ran first and foremost, to a clothes store.

Ten minutes and one swipe of Kaiba's credit card later, the two were outside in clothes resembling their normal outfits.

"Well, we don't look like idiots. Now what?"

"You'd look like an idiot no matter what you wore."

"Ah, shut up Kaiba. We need to do something about those girls! They're out of control!"

"For once, I agree with your puny intellect. But as you've seen, a direct attack against them is impossible."

"So?"

"We fight them with a non-conventional weapon. The papparazi."

Jou began scratching his head. "Huh? You lost me."

Kaiba groaned indiginatly. "Look, if we manage to get the press on their asses that not only are two giant Duel Monster girls in the city, but they've grown a regular girl to their size, they'll be mobbed by the press until they can't breathe. They'll be forced to leave."

"What makes you so sure?"

"They've made me want to leave town a few times."

"So what am I supposed to do?"

"Stick with me, and try not to do anything stupid."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Plan C

choices: Anzu and Mana argue over Yugi
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The Chaos Emperor Dragon didn't know what 'glomping' was, or he'd recognize what the Mystical Elf was doing to him. The blue-skinned duel monster was cuddling the beast as a normal girl would cuddle a puppy, and while it was nice to be wanted, it was reigning havoc with his street cred.

"Release my comrade, or I'll-" The Black Luster Soldier was cut off as Mana squeezed him slightly tighter.

"Or you'll what? Bite my ankel?" she scoffed. "I'm going to enjoy finally putting you in your place, you jerk."

Anzu chuckled at the situation as she lifted Yugi. "Well, since she's busy, you and I can play a little 'house' on our own..."

Yugi blushed furiously. "Well, uh, gee...what do you mean?"

Honda sighed. "Yugi, you lucky punk..."

As Anzu's grin grew wider, however, a hand came on her shoulder. "Wait, hang on...why do you get to play with Yugi?" Mana asked.

"Well, you already have the Soldier boy, so I thought-"

"He's not worth Yugi," Mana replied, tossing the Envoy over her shoulder. "We at least should share Yugi."

The Soldier took this opportunity to run like a man possessed, away from the three giantesses. Mana either didn't notice or didn't care. Yugi was more important.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Envoy Escape

choices: The girls keep arguing over him
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Why you should play with him anyway?" asked Mana. Yugi sweatdropped. Sure, it was nice to be wanted, and to be the object of affection of not one, but two girls, but this was not what he had in mind.

"Like that's fair. You've been playing with Yugi ever since you showed up, and you haven't given anyone else a chance to play with him."

Mana pouted a bit. "That's a nice way to thank me for making you big. Come on, I wanna play with Yugi."

Honda, Shizuki, and the unwillingly domesticated Chaos Emperor Dragon could only look on as both girls continued to argue over who got to keep the spiky haired duelist for the moment. Neither girl was willing to back down, their imposing figures towering over Yugi's tiny form.

"Do you think we should say something?" asked Honda. Shizuki shook her head.

"I'm not really sure if they want to hear what anyone wants to say."

"Look, quit hogging him, OK?" asked Mana. "I'm not asking much."

"You've been playing with him all day. I just want a bit of time. Or are you worried he likes me more?"

"Likes you more?"

Yugi could only look on. He was half-tempted to intervine, but he wasn't sure if the girls would even bother to listen.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Two big girls, one tiny prize

choices: He FINALLY draws the right card!
...THAT'S NOT EVEN HIS DECK, IS IT?!!!!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
-Out of Character-

Aerodeth: For those of you who only know the names in the ENGLISH version of the cartoon, allow me to help...

-Back in the story-

Yugi COULD try to see reason with the two giantesses fighting over him... but let's face it.. who doesnt love being the center of attention?!
Besides, if Anzu (TeA) and Mana (Dark Magician Girl/Mana) start literally fighting with eachother, he should concern himself less on breaking up the argument and more on getting the hell out of their way!

Meanwhile, Honda (Tristan) and Chaos Emperor Dragon slowly and quietly sneak up to you.

"Psst!" Honda whispers, "We gotta run! If these two start pulling eachothers hair, they could wind up tearing apart the whole city!!"

C.E.D just nods in agreement.

Yugi thinks to himself... and gets an idea! "There's only one way out of this situation...." he slips his hand through his hair... and pulls out a deck! "Ive got to rely on the Heart of the Cards!"

Honda and C.E.D just stare at him weirdly, "Uh... Yug? How's that supposed to help us?"

Yugi closes his eyes and shuffles his deck, "There is ONE card in my deck that can help us... if I can draw it, we may be able to escape with our lives..."

He draws a card, "Here goes nothing....." and looks at it....

...

"...that aint it!" he tosses the card and pulls out another one, "That aint it either!" he tosses and pulls another, "Nope!" and another, "Still not it!" and another, "I didnt even know THAT card!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: What might happen in REAL LIFE!

"Yugi, is that even your deck?"

Yugi didn't reply. Instead, he looked down at the deck, and hit his head. Honda sighed.

"And here, for just a brief second, I thought you were over that damn game. That just maybe, you realized there was more to life than a card game. What happened to the old Yugi? The one that did other things?"

The one that burned that robber with the gun.

That was you, Yami!

Yeah, but you enjoyed it.

Yugi sighed, breathing heavily. "Well, in that case,"

"Yeah?"

"Agreed!"

Wasting no time, Yugi, Honda, and the Chaos Emperor Dragon ran out of the building, hoping to get as far away as possible
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A card game can't solve all your problems...
