And so the three hauled ass trying to escape the feuding giants! C.E.D. was even kind enough to offer Yugi and Honda a ride on his back... and so they flew... away into the night... or day... I dont remember...
While Anzu and Mana start pulling eachother's hair... They notice a certain tiny dragon flying away into the night (or day!)
Mana gasps, "Oh no!! Theyre trying to take my Yugi away!!!"
Anzu just glares at her, "YOUR Yugi???!!!" And continue to fight!!!

--Meanwhile with Kaiba and Jououchi (Joey)--

Jou and Kaiba look all over the city searching for paparazzi... but there isnt a single person to be found! ...It's as if... everyone just disappeared!

"Um... rich boy," Jou looks at Kaiba, "Where is everybody?"
"The hell should I know?" Kaiba replies, "They should be storming the place asking me for an interview by now!!"
Jou sighs, "Dis is just too weird... something strange is going on... strange and powerful!"

Kaiba just rolls his eyes, "Dont tell me youre still believing in that hocus-pocus magic fairy-tale crap about monsters coming to life! That, much like your brain, doesnt exist! It's all just a glitch in Kaiba programming!"
"OHHHH..." Jou smiles, "so in udder words, I get to sue YOU for all my pain and suffering!"
Kaiba just grins, "Heh... better get in line with the rest of them!"

"THERE YOU ARE, LITTLE TOY!!! HOW DARE YOU RUN OFF ON ME LIKE THAT!!"

Kaiba doesnt turn his head to see who that voice was, "Uh... Wheeler... please tell me that aint who I think it is!"
It is... his new gigantic brown-haired blueish skinned
owner.. Mystical Elf!! Kaiba looks up at her... she does not seem very happy! She frowns in anger at him with her arms at her hips!

"YOU KNOW BETTER THAN TO RUN OFF LIKE THAT!! BAD TOY! BAD!!"
Kaiba whispers to Jou, "Got any brilliant ideas, Wheeler?"
Jou just grins, "...Yep!" and kicks Kaiba in the back and ditches him! "Have fun with your toy, ma'am!" and runs off!

Kaiba growls, "Jou, Im gonna put you to sleep you traitorous dog!" However, he was quickly snatched off the ground by Mystical Elf!

He stutters while staring at that humongous frown of hers, "Um...uh... I uh... wasnt really running off, I was...um... getting some fresh air.. and-"

"SAVE IT!!" she tells him sternly, "YOURE A NAUGHTY TOY. AND NAUGHTY TOYS GET PUNISHED!!!!"

Kaiba tries to think of a quick solution for his predicament... well... since he IS Kaiba, one CERTAIN solution came in mind!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Couldnt have happened to a nicer guy!!

choices: She decides she'd rather play with Kaiba!

Kaiba knew struggling against the giant Mystic Elf's grip was an exercise in futility. That didn't stop him from trying anyway.

"Now, you naughty toy," continued the Elf, "you're coming with me."

Her statement set off alarm bells. Kaiba knew he'd be in trouble unless he did something, quick. Then again, everything that had happened so far today had led to more problems. It was Yugi's fault, him and his irresitable cuteness. Now thanks to him, there were 3 unstoppable giants, 2 of which were in love with him, and all 3 didn't think too highly of him...

"Oh, uh...about Kaiba..."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Sorry Kaiba. We hate you THAT much!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Oh, Kaiba? Yeah, he said he wanted peace and quiet away from the girls. Y'know, simple rich boy stuff."

"Well, that sounds like Kaiba," replied Yugi. Honda nodded, not bothering to question what happened.

"So, uh, now what?" Jou asked.

Yugi shook his head. The city was empty, save for the three of them, Kaiba, a few duel monsters, and a giant-sized Anzu. Other than that, the only thing that accompanied the night was a disturbing silence eminating through the streets and sidewalks.

"Anyone know where to go?"

A growl from the Chaos Emperor Dragon answered them. Having cast aside the bowtie the Mystic Elf attempted to put on him, the Dragon was attempting to assert its mascuilinity and dominance over the humans. Luckily for him, the Dragon's imposing form ensured that when he growled, the humans listened.

"What is it?" Yugi asked. The Dragon growled a few times in short bursts as a response.

"I think he knows where we should head next guys."

Jou looked on dumbfounded. Who did Yugi think he was talking to, Lassie?

"Well, I'm not arguing," replied Honda as he walked through the empty streets. Yugi and Jou nodded and began following the dragon.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Kaiba?  Who cares?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
C.E.D starts sniffing the ground... he turns his head at his followers and nudges his head in a certain direction!

C.E.D continues sniffing around as he leads the others through alleys and street corners... Honda and Jou start getting suspicious of the dragon, while Yugi pays no mind and simply does as told!

However, after a while of searching around, the crew starts at the sight of a humongous ray of light from the sky while hearing lots of screams of pain and terror! C.E.D stops in his tracks and growls at the gang as sort of a way to warn them! The screams continue!

"PLEASE DONT!! I DONT WANNA DIE!!"
"Shut up! Youre making her grow impatient!"
"NO!! DONT FEED ME TO HER!!!"
"Submit yourself to her and you will recieve everlasting peace!"
"I BEG YOU! DONT DO THIS!!!!"
"Oh great Horakhti, please accept these humble human offerings!"
"AAAHHHHH!!! NOOOOOO!!!!"
The gang could see hundreds of screaming people being sucked up in the ray of light in the sky!

"Horakhti?" Yugi heard a certain name being called out, "Why does that name sound familiar?!"

"We gotta go check it out!" Jou says!
"No! It's too dangerous!" Honda warns him!

"Yeah youre right... Yugi should check it out!" Jou starts pointing at Yugi!! "WHAT?! ME?!" Yugi shouts!

"You ARE supposed to be the hero after all!" Honda starts pointing at him! Hell, even Chaos Emperor Dragon points at him!

The poor little spikey haired was surrounded in people pointing at him! ...Even the ghost of the Pharoh was pointing at him!

"YAMI!!!" Yugi yells and puts his hands on his hips!

You heard them...HERO!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Stairway to Heaven? Or Highway to Hell?

choices: You will help me confront Horakhti
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Oh you all suck," Yugi moaned as he walked forward.

With absolutely no support, Yugi inched forward in order to view exactly what was happening. What he found made him gasp.

The light was obscuring several figures, all in varying shapes, but otherwise human size. They were tending to a small altar that the light from the sky shone upon, three steps leading up to a square table, decorated on all sides with the all-too-familiar symbol of the Eye.

What concerned Yugi the most were the people next to the altar. Every few seconds, one of the erethral figures would grab a person, hum a short prayer in what Yugi believed to be Egyptian, and then throw the person into the light, seemingly vanishing under the glow. He couldn't help but be sick at the sight.

"What do they want?"

"Souls," replied a voice in back of him. Turning, he saw the form of the Black Luster Soldier, pointing his sword down at his face. Yugi almost yelped, but the Envoy covered his mouth with his metallic gauntlet.

"Stay your voice, young one. I'm not here for you."

Yugi nodded, not wanting to argue with the Envoy's sword.

"I have no intent of letting the bridge between the light and dark worlds be breached by anything, but your friend the Dark Magician Girl have given powerful forces the opportunity to act."

"What does this have to do with me?" Yugi asked as the hand was finally removed from his mouth.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A plan in motion

choices: Looks like they got no choice...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"First things first," the soldier repled, "where is my comrade, Chaos Emperor Dragon?" Yugi thought about his "friends" and just shrugged, "He was too much of a chicken to come with me and face the danger!"

B.L.S just shakes his head in disappointment, "The coward.. anyway, it looks like it'll just be you and I."

"What can we do to stop this human-sacrificial thing?!"

"Well, we cant confront the Creator of Light as we are. Lord only knows what will await us beyond that light! So I have come up with the alternative: Find the one responsible for this chaos!"

"Mana?" Yugi asks. The Envoy shakes his head, "No... the one responsible for bringing her into this world! The CHEATER!!!"

The cheater? Could he talking about Kaiba?! Yugi thinks back at the last duel they had...

****
"This time Yugi, you're not going to defeat me!"
"And why not Kaiba?"
"Simple! My new card, Brain Scramble!"
**That's enough of that! I hate long flashbacks!**

"That is right, spikey-haired one!" the Envoy says, "He used a fake card in false hopes to defeat you in a duel he knew he could not win! But because of his cheating, the time-space continuim began to tear causing the real Dark Magician Girl to slip through time and come to life! After the tear, Mana started using her magic in a time period not of her own which caused the time-space continuim to go bezerk and cause duel monsters to spill out of time and into this world. While the time-space continuim tears and tears, the souls of mankind of this time period become endangered... as followers of the Creator of Light have slipped through the tears! With each soul they gather, she gets closer and closer to being released from her eternal sleep..."

After hearing that long and scary story, Yugi's jaw drops, "...All because Kaiba cheated in a card game?!"
The soldier explains, "As Duel Monsters' Rule #987 states: When you cheat, you not only cheat yourself, but you cheat the lives of all mankind!!"

Yugi sighs, "Allright fine... but what are we gonna do?"
The Envoy draws his blade, "We have to KILL SETO KAIBA!!"

"KILL SETO KAIBA???!!!!"

Sounds good to me!

"SHUT UP YAMI!!!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Long story short: NEVER CHEAT!!!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Isn't there something else we can do?" Yugi asked.

"The only other way would be to kill just about everything affected by the magic through the rift. And even then we'd have to eventually kill Kaiba. It started with him, and it will end with him."

Yugi grimaced. Kaiba wasn't a nice guy, but killing him?

Hey, he almost killed your grandpa, remember?.

Yugi nodded. Kaiba himself wasn't above murder, extortion, embezzlement, and other unsavory tactics to get what he wanted. Hell, the whole incident had...

Come on, you won't even be killing him. It'll be the Soldier that strikes the final blow.

"OK," Yugi glumly replied to the Envoy. "If we kill Kaiba, everything will return to normal?"

"Yes. The rifts will close and the Duel Monsters will be sent back where they came, and the magic shall leave. That means your girlfriend will shrink back to..."

"Anzu isn't my..."

"Whatever," replied the Envoy. "We must make haste. I can only hope the Dragon protects your friends while my buisness with Kaiba is settled, because I will be unable to aid them."

"You sound like you're looking forward to this," Yugi exclaimed as he ran through the streets.

"It is all I know," the Envoy responded as he ran after.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Accepting the inevitable

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yugi couldnt believe what he was about to do... or at least what he's about to let the Envoy do... KILL his biggest rival?! Kaiba IS a heartless insensitive bastard with no friends... but does he really deserve death??!!

Unfortunately, he didnt have much time to think about it... as he was stopped by more gigantic duel monsters... THREE OF THEM!

They women were birdlike with wings, talons, claws, and wore golden breastplates... one had red hair, one had blue hair, and the other had orange hair....

Yugi looked up at them and froze in fear, "W..w..wha...Ha..Harpy Lady Sisters??!!"

The red-head grinned at him, "Ooo.. look sisters! More yummy humans!!"

"Yay!!" the orange-haired one smiled, "Lady Horakhti didnt eat ALL of them! Im sure she wont mind if he take these for ourselves!"

The blue-haired one just sighed, "i just hope theyre any better than that little blonde girl wearing purple..."

Yugi's eyes minimized in shock, "M...MAI??!!!"

--Meanwhile with the COWARDS...--

Toyota, Jomama, and the Chaos Emperor Chicken waited around for about a half an hour for Yugi to come back...

"uh...guys," Honda says, "It's been about a half-hour and Yugi still hasnt come back! Shouldnt we go check on him?"

C.E.D nods in agreement...

But Jou just says, "Eh, Im sure he's fine! After all, he's been through worse on his own! Besides, since no one else is in this city, how 'bout instead, we go around town and start jacking stuff that aint nailed down?!"

C.E.D smiles and nods in agreement!

Honda disagrees, "C'mon! Yugi's our friend! We cant just ditch him like this!! Besides... the Pharoh promised to teach me all his secrets on picking up girls!!"

C.E.D. just shrugs in uncertainty.... what should they do?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Knowing who your friends are...

choices: Yugi and the Soldier are on their own
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Both Honda and the dragon stared at Jou for about a minute before he cracked under the pressure.

"Oh, I can't take it! I'll go help him!"

The others nodded, but only took two steps before a new dillema faced them.

"Where is Yugi anyway?"

The Chaos Emperor Dragon groaned slightly, then began sniffing the ground, hoping to pick up Yugi's scent. The two teens followed.

"You sure he knows what he's doing?" Jou asked, pointing at the dragon.

"I'm not gonna argue," Honda replied.

*********************************************************

Yugi didn't have time to process the fact that Mai was probably eaten alive by one of her favorite monsters. All he had time to do was scream.

"Do something!" he yelled to the Black Luster Soldier.

"Do something? I'm not powerful enough to battle giant-sized Duel Monsters! You saw that with Mana!"

"But aren't the Harpies weaker than her?"

"I've got a better idea Yugi, run!"

The two attempted to run, unfortunately, the Harpies were too quick. With a blindingly fast movement of the hand, the red-haired Harpy caught Yugi and the Soldier in each of her hands, looking down on them. The Envoy struggled, hoping to reach his sword, at least before he became a snack!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Damn conscience...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The red-head gripped Yugi and the Envoy tightly, "These ones are mine! I got dibs on them!"

"Aww...no fair!" the orange-hair pouted. "Why do YOU get to eat those two?!" the blue-haired asked.

"Because Im the oldest!" the red-head said smugly, "You two can have the next ones that come along!"

"HANG ON, YUGI! WE'RE COMING!!!"

Yugi smiled after hearing that voice, "GUYS!! YOURE HERE!!"

Yep... Honda, Jou, and C.E.D headed to their friend's aid! "Dont worry Yugi! We'll save ya!"

The Harpy Ladies, unfortunately, were VERY happy to see them! "Goody! More treats have come!"

Jou lead his troops to battle, "C'mon guys! Let's get 'em!!!" ....but Honda and C.E.D. just stared at him, "Uh... are you kidding?! What exactly can we do?!"

"Uh... improvise?"

Honda just looked at Jou, "Dude.. how am i gonna take on three giant bird-chicks?!" Jou looked at C.E.D, "Uh... what about YOU?"

Chaos Emperor Dragon just froze in place... apparently he wasnt really as brave as he led on!!

*SSSSWWWWIIIPPPEE!!!* Oh crap! The two remaining Harpies swiped up Honda and C.E.D! For some reason, only Jou was left standing!

The orange-haired stared at Honda and licked her lips, "Mmmm.. a nice meaty one!!" The blue-haired licked C.E.D.! "Hmmm...kinda salty, but not bad!!"

Yugi just lowered his head in shame... and so did Yami, Sigh... MY HERO!

It looks like it was all up to Jou to save his friends... he shivered a little.. but he thought of a plan...

"C'mon...C'mon!!" he thought to himself, "Assess the situation... let's see..." First he noticed the harpies were standing in front of a gas station... he also noticed one of the gas pumps had a leak... there was a cigarette on the ground... a propane tank standing in the middle of the road... a KFC around the corner... and he had a match in his pocket!

"Let's see... giant birds, gas station, pump leak, cigarette, propane tank, match, KFC........IDEA!!!"

That grin on Jou's face tells you he has an idea....
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: I see, I assess the situation!

choices: Harpies can't resist the Colonel's secret blend of herbs and spices
They'd rather snack on the humans
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jou noticed the items and front of him, and instinct kicked in. Hurridely, he ran to the KFC and began taking out as much chicken from the fryer as possible.

*********************************************************

"Do something!" Yugi shouted.

"Like what? Insult them? In case you haven't noticed..."

"Yeah I know...they're very big."

The Harpies were all too eager to have their meals. The interruption that came from below them was all the more annoying because of that fact.

"Hey! Harpies! Down here! You don't wanna eat them!"

Honda would have hit his head if he could reach it. Jou had laid out, in the street, enough fried chicken, buiscits, gravy, mashed potatoes, and corn to feed even the three Harpies.

"What the hell?"

"Well," Jou began, "humans taste nasty. No health benefit too. Wouldn't you rather have chicken smothered with a secret blend of herbs and spices?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Jou + gas + 18 herbs and spices = Oddity

choices: Meanwhile with Kaiba and his curious owner...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Hmmm..." The Harpy sisters had to think about this for a moment.... roasted chicken... or live human? Choices..
Jou then added, "Did I forget to mention that chicken is also low in carbs?" In a split second, the Harpies dropped their human snacks and dashed for the irresistably delicious low-carb meals!!

Finally free of their grasp, the gang just stared at Jou strangely... just what was he up to? Finally, Honda speaks, "Uh... Jou... you mind telling us what-"

Jou interrupted Honda by constantly pointing behind himself and mouthing the words, "GET...OVER HER...NOW!!!"

The gang understood what he was said and quickly ran over to him while the Harpies were distracted! Jou then turned to Yugi and whispered, "Hey Yug... can I see dat puzzle for a sec?"

"Uh... sure." he took off the puzzle wrapped around his neck and offered it to him. But Jou just striked the thing with his match and then shouted to the harpies, "HEY BIRD-CHICKS! WANNA KNOW HOW IT FEELS TO BE KENTUCKY-FRIED???!!!"

The second the ladies turned their heads, Jou threw the match.... time went slow as the match was flying into the air.... and landed right on the cigarette! The cigarette was too close to the leaky propane tank which caused it bust and send flaming parts of it flying... one huge flaming part landed RIGHT on the liquid from the leaky gas pump causing it to set on fire and head STRAIGHT toward the gas station....

The Harpy Sisters' pupils minimizer in terror of what's about to happen next.....

*KKKKKKKKKKKKKKAAAAAAAAAAAABBBBOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMMMM!!!!!**

Feathers and roasted chicken parts started raining from the sky!! The gang cheered Jou for his stupid-yet-amazingly-effective plan!! Chaos Emperor Dragon even tried catching a few of the raining pieces of chicken with his mouth!

The Envoy was even impressed, "Brilliant work, human! That was an excellent display of heroism had I ever seen it! It's a shame the PHAROH couldnt think of something as outstanding!"

In a heartbeat, the ghost of Yami to jump the soldier, but luckily little Yugi was holding him back! Jou just blushed, "Aw... it was nuttin, you guys! Now c'mon guys! We gotta go save the world!!"

Honda just shrugged, "Geez... who made HIM in charge?" but the Black Luster Soldier glared at him, "YOU WILL SHOW MASTER JOUOUCHI SOME RESPECT, HUMAN!!!" Honda just shivered and did what he was told, "Y..y..y.. yessir!"

Can I PLLLLEEEAASEEE, Yugi? ...Just this once-

"NO!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Hail to the king, baby!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The test of will between Anzu and Mana, at first a heated shouting match, soon spiraled into an out of control wrestling match, with each giantess pulling on each other's hair, slapping the other, and in general doing their best to take their opponent down. All the while, nearby buildings collapsed from their roughhousing, falling to the ground in the midst of their struggle. Until finally, about half an hour later, Anzu asked something.

"Why...are we fighting again?"

To which Mana replied "Yugi-kun. But..."

"He's gone," Anzu sighed. "You wanna call a truce?"

"And find Yugi-kun?" Mana nodded, looking glumly at Anzu. "I'm sorry. It's just..."

"Just what?" Anzu asked.

Mana looked apologetic as she continued. "Well, I was so lonely in the other realmn, and when I first saw Yugi-kun there...it felt like I was close to someone. Then I came here, and I could touch him, talk to him..."

"Yeah, but he needs space. He is human, after all."

"I see that now. But we should find him."

Anzu nodded, but as she looked around, she asked "Where did everybody go anyway?"

Mana didn't reply.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Erm, why were we fighting again?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
After a long while of walking, the gang starts to get tired... the Envoy catches his breath, "M...Master Jououchi! Im afraid we wont be able to walk for much longer! We need to find some place to rest!"

Jou shakes his head, "Nah... what we need is a car! But where we gonna get one?" he looks around.. and finds a far conviently parked along the sidewalk! "AH COOL! A THUNDERBIRD!!! Man, Id kill for one of those!!!"

He rushes toward the Thunderbird... and finds the keys to it conviently on the seat! "SWEET!!!" he grabs the keys.... but then thinks for a second... "Uh...does any of you know how ta drive?"

"Nope!" Honda replied. "Im afraid not Master Jououchi," the Envoy answered. Chaos Emperor Dragon shaked his head. "Sorry, Jou!" Yugi replied.

I do. said..... THE PHAROH??!!! "Uh.. Yami? How could you know to drive?" Yugi asked, "You lived before cars were even invented! And while you were with me, we've never driven in our lives!!

Oh please, Ive been drag-racing in your grandpa's Pinto for weeks while you were asleep!

"YOU WHAT?!" Yugi flipped out, but his puzzle started to glow.. and you know what happens next!

YU-GI-OOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!

Yami runs a finger through one of his golden hairs and grins, "Get in, everybody!" Jou hands him the keys and the gang jumps in the car and fastens their seatbelts. C.E.D, however, could barely even squeeze in the back of the tiny-ass car!

"IS EVERYBODY READY?!" Yami shouts! The gang nods... but C.E.D. just shrugs. "I'll take that as a yes! Now.." Yami puts the keys the ignition, starts the car, and shifts to Drive! "LET'S SEE HOW FAST THIS SUMBITCH CAN GO!!!!!"

---VRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM!!!!!!!!!!---
They zoom across the road at about 200mph!

About a mile away, a naked Kaiba is in the middle of the road shivering with a huge sign covering his privates that reads: "NOT CRAZY. NEED TO ESCAPE! PLEASE HELP!!!!"

When he sees a certain Thunderbird coming his way, he shouts, "OVER HERE!!! SOMEBODY!!! OVER HERE!!!!!!!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The Fast and the Pharohest

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
For a brief second, the car appeared as it was going to pass Kaiba. The blood was already beginning to drain from his face when thankfully, it stopped directly in front of him.

"So, who wants to say hello?" Jounouchi asked. The Envoy opened the door and stepped out as a response.

"Everyone stay here. This will not take long."

When the car stopped, Kaiba was relieved slightly, hoping that whoever was inside could take him away from the nightmare he barely escaped. But when the door was opened, Kaiba wished he had stayed with the Mystic Elf.

"Seto Kaiba," the Envoy began in a deep, demanding voice as he raised his sword into the air, "It is time to pay your debt."

Kaiba's eyes widened. Wasting no time, he began running as fast as he could away from the car. Yami, seeing this, moved the car directly in front of him to prevent any escape.

"Do any of you feel bad for Kaiba?" Everyone in the car shook their heads.

With nowhere left to run, Kaiba resorted to begging to save himself.

"Please! Don't kill me! I...I'm sorry!"

"It started with you, and it ends with you," the Envoy replied. "This is the only way to save the realms!"

Another split second and Kaiba's head would have to travel to visit his body. But a sudden rumbling shook the Envoy from his position, giving him time to escape.

Unfortunately, Kaiba wasn't able to get very far, as he ran right into the foot of...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Judgement

choices: The crew try to fix up the puzzle...
Yami or no Yami, they gotta finish the mission!!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
His lovely, humongous, and overprotective master: the Mysic Elf! And this time, Kaiba is VERY happy to see her!! Today just wasnt rich boy's day... the great unphazable Seto Kaiba.. resorted to begging for his life. At least with the Mystic Elf, she dare not kill him!

She looks down at him and smiles, "Ok little toy! You've had your fun with your little friends, it's time to go home now!"

After looking back at his old "friends" that want him dead, he just looks up and her and says, "Sigh... yes ma'am!" She just picks him up, holds him tight, and walks off... in the direction of the car!!

"Uh...everybody out!!!" Yami commands while the gang does what theyre told! Unfortunatly, C.E.D. couldnt sqeeze out of the car no matter how hard he tried!!! It looks the end for him....

..No it isnt! Because she missed it completely... however... Yami looked up that the gigantic sandal coming down his way... with no time to move out of the way, he could only stare up at it in shock...

*SSSSSTTTTTTOOOOOOMMMMMMMPPPPP!!!!!* The Mystic Elf careless steps on poor little Yami and walks off!

The gang couldnt believe their eyes, "NOOO!!! YUGI!!!" Jou screams! Honda drops to the ground, "No.. Yugi...!!" C.E.D. starts to tear up. The Envoy tries to look unemotional, however a tear drops down his eyes...

"It's ok guys! Im fine!" Out of the cloud of dust came little Yugi! He's totally dirty from head to toe, but other than that, he's fine! "Luckily my puzzle shielded my body from getting crushed against the giant foot!"

The gang breathes a sigh of relief and gets back in the car. Although they failed to accomplish their mission, theyre just glad their spikey-haired friend is allright!

Yugi just smiles, "Whew... that was a close one, huh Yami? .......Yami?" He couldnt pick up a response from the Pharoh! He checked his puzzle to be sure, "...OH NO!! The puzzle's been chipped! I cant contact the Pharoh like this!!!!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: YU-GI-OH-HELL-NO!!!

choices: They make it to 42nd without a problem
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Guys, we can't go! I need to fix the puzzle first!"

"There is no time for that!" the Black Luster Soldier yelled. "Kaiba is being taken to a secure location even as we speak, and there is no way for us to catch him if we delay!"

"Dat's right!" Jou yelled. "Come on. I'll drive!"

Everyone readied to crowd into the car once again, except for Yugi, who still didn't move a muscle.

"Come on Yugi!"

"Go on without me. I can't leave without Yami."

"That's not an option," the Envoy replied. "In this environment, any mortal left alone is practically begging to become a sacrifice! Look up in the sky."

Yugi did so, and saw several silver jet fighters flying in formation above the sky.

"The Gradius class Vic Viper one man air superiority fighter. They're swarming over the entire city, and that means something big is going down."

"But what if I..."

"As much as it pains me to admit, you are my charge, and I can't let you get hurt!"

"B...but..."

"Fix it in the car!" the Envoy yelled as he threw Yugi in the back seat. Getting inside, he shouted to Jou "42nd street! Step on it!"

Jou nodded and hit the accelerator, but not before asking "What's on 42nd street?"

"That's probably where Kaiba was headed, according to those road signs. All I need is one good shot and it will be the end of this nightmare."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: No time to wait

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
And with that, Jou started the car and got ready to drive off! However... something was wrong! They werent going anywhere! "Guys! Something's wrong!" he tells the others, "We're not moving!!!!! We cant go anywhere like this!!!"

Honda looks down at Jou's foot on a pedal, "..Uh.. that's cause your foot's on the BRAKE PEDAL!!!"

"Huh?" Jou looks down.. and grins like an idiot, "Oh! uh.. heheh... I was just uh.. teasing y'all!" (Dont worry pal! It happens to the best of us!:D) He put on his foot on the gas pedal and drove as fast as he could!
"We must hurry!" the Soldier warns him, "If Vic Viper spots us, we're as good as dead!!" However, a while after driving... the car hits a humongous yet soft 'wall'... that wall... IS A GIANT FOOT!!

"Uh..guys.." Jou turns to the others, "This time we're REALLY not moving!!"

**Meanwhile... with Yami**

"Wha...where am I?" he looks around... clouds everywhere, stars not far beyond his reach, angelic choirs, and a humongous golden gate...

Yami figures out where he's at! "I dont believe this... Im in...."

"Oh! FINALLY! A soul's here!! I thought that bitch, Horakhti took them all!!"

What the? Who said that?! Yami turned around... oh damn... he looks WAAAAYYYY up... at a giant woman staring down at him!

A woman with long blonde hair, glasses over her sky-blue eyes, wearing a long black robe, wings sprouting out of her back, and carrying a huge book in her hands!

She looks down at him and smiles, "Hello mortal! Welcome to the Gates of Heaven! Im Cassandra the Gate-Keeper! I am also the keeper of the list that decides who goes into Heaven... and who suffers for eternity! What is your name, little one?"

"Uh....um..." Yami thinks for a while, "I uh... dont know. My memory was erased thousands of years ago!" Cassandra just rolls her eyes and sighs, "Sigh... GREAT!! Um... do you go by any aliases?"

"Yeah. Yami."

Cassandra opens her book and looks through it, "Yami... Yami... AH! Here it is!
Name: Pharoh 'Yami' Anakhnamkannen
Age: 5017
Cause of Death: Puzzle that seals his soul was crushed like a bug. Link into living realm was cut.
Acceptance into Heaven: ......hmm....."

There was a long stall... Yami started getting worried. I mean, he WAS a good Pharoh, wasnt he? But then again, seeing as though he has no memory of his past... maybe he really WASNT... will Yami be going to Heaven.... or the other place?

"Ok! Acceptance into Heaven: .........."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Yami's fate!

choices: He arrives back in the puzzle
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"According to this, you're going to hell?"

"What?!" Yami yelled. "Why?!"

"Murder of close to 500 people. That answer your question?"

"B...but..."

"Sorry," Cassandra replied as she pulled on a nearby lever. "But rules are rules!"

"NO! WAIT!" Yami yelled as he fell from heaven.

*********************************************************

When Yami finally awoke, he found himself floating somewhere that resembles neither the traditional heaven nor hell. He was in a void of what looked like space, with nothing around him but...

"Yami. Yami!"

A voice.

"What? Who said that?"

"I..." the voice replied, "am beyond your understanding. I do go by many names, though. I have summoned you here for a purpose..."

"Nobody summons the Pharoah!"

"Then it pleases me to be the first," the voice smugly replied.

"State your buisness," Yami began in an authoritarian tone. It was a tone he, as the Pharoah, used to command respect, but here it came off as ultimately childish.

"I need you to return to Earth, to free the souls that are being bound by the malevolent entity."

"Why should I?" Yami replied. "What's in it for me?"

"Your barganing posture is highly dubious, but very well. I will restore you to life on Earth and allow you to start with a clean slate?"

"And?"

"AND NOTHING!" the voice harshly replied. "You belong to me now."

"What?!" Yami yelled. "I don't belong to anyone! Not Yugi, and definetely not you!"

"Very well," the voice replied. "Proceed, on your way to oblivion."

Untold pain began filling Yami's entire existence, causing him to yell in agony. "OK fine! I accept! I accept!"

"Excellent," the voice simply replied.

And before Yami knew what happened, he was lost in the void, suddenly aware that his conversation resembled a movie Yugi once saw.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: This conversation reminds me of a movie...

choices: Now would be a good time to contact Yugi!!!!
...what did the gang run into earlier???
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Suddenly the darkness of this void starts to fade... and the next thing Yami knows, he's in that gigantic room with millions of doors, millions of stairs, lot of twists and turns... yep... his puzzle!!

Yami sighs, "WHEW...." then laughs, "HAHA! Suck on THAT, Cassandra!!"

"Suck on WHAT, now?"

Uh oh! Yami turns around... "Wha...what the?! Cassandra?! What are YOU doing here???"

Cassandra just smiled, "Orders from the Big Man. Since there wont be anyone coming by the gates anytime soon, he left me in charge of YOU!"

"Wait a minute.... WHY?" Yami immediately jumps back when he sees her pull out a scythe from her robe, "To make sure you dont screw it up!!

Damn... and the Pharoh was so used to privacy in his little puzzle of his..... "UMM!! What are you standing around for?! Youre a man! Why dont you show a lady around your place????!!!!"

Not wanting to argue with a demanding woman with a sharp sickle, he does what he's told!

"So...an ex-Pharoh, eh?" Cassandra asks him. "Uh.. yep!" he answers.

"I used to be like you. I was once Queen of Knaronia.. you ever heard of the 'Solid-Edged Angel'?"

Yami thinks... he might have heard that name once in Yugi's old history books.... oh crap! Queen Cassandra I! The Solid-Edged Angel of Knaronia! Known for taking pleasure in mutilating anything that disagrees with her! Whatever kingdom that stood against her and fallen, she personally chopped off the ruler's head with her personal scythe! ...She was even afraid of going through the pains of childbirth, so she castrated all her suitors! And all her husbands that even THOUGHT about leaving her....HAAAWWAAUUUKKK!!!

"Y...y...youre THAT Cassandra???!!!!"

She smiled and raised her hand, "Hi!"

"But how come youre not.... you know? Suffering for eternity?"

"Oh, I had to do a few certain oddjobs to redeem myself. Sorta like what youre doing now!" She then wrapped an arm around Yami's shoulder... NOT making him feel any better about who he's stuck with!

"So...uh... where's the lovely royal bed in this place?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The perfect couple... sorta.. ok maybe not!

choices: Focus on Yugi and the girls
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jou was lucky. He had barely hit the brakes in time, so he didn't crash the car into the foot in front of him. Knowing better than to honk the horn, he stared straight up to see who the foot belonged to.

"Jounouchi! You're Yugi's friend, right? Have you seen him?"

"Still hung up on Yugi, huh?"

"I'm worried!"

Jou retreated back into the car with a groan. "Yugi...it's your two girlfriends."

Honda grimaced. "Tell them he's not here. No way am I gonna let Yugi get left alone with two women. I don't care how big they are."

"I suggest that you leave Yugi in the care of the women for now," interrupted the Black Luster Soldier.

"Whyzat? So he can get TLC or some crap?"

"Because we need to move now! LOOK!"

Honda, Jou, and Yugi all looked behind and gasped. The squadron of Vic Vipers that were flying overhead were closing right in on the car! Wasting no time, The Black Luster Soldier opened the door, dropped off Yugi at the feet of Mana and Anzu, and had Jounouchi drive off.

Yugi's confusion was interrupted when Mana gripped in him in a warm and secure hug right against her plush bosom.

"Oh Yugi-kun! I was so worried! Anzu and I got into an argument, but I didn't mean to!"

"Jeez, give him some space," replied Anzu. "Besides...I want to hold him."

"Oh, of course," Mana replied as she handed Yugi to Anzu.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Car chase!

choices: Mana and Anzu overhear Yugi talking!!
The three plot a way to escape the giants!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Well, once again, poor little Yugi's stuck between two gigantic lovers... all alone... with noone to turn to... not even the Pharoh... as Anzu and Mana start having a little conversation about taking turns with Yugi, the little guy just worries to himself!

Yugi just lays his head down and sighs, "..sigh... I wish Yami were here.."

Hey...Yugi? ....YUGI!!!

"What?" he heard a certain voice comming from his puzzle, "...Yami? is that you?"

Of course it's me!! Hell itself couldnt stop me from getting to you!

Yugi smiles, "Oh wow! For a moment there, I thought you were a goner!"

Hey! I am a survivor after all!

Yami, who are you talking to? That little kid that looks like you?

Yugi heard ANOTHER voice coming from inside his puzzle, "What the? Who was that?"

Oh, that's uh... Cassandra.

"Who's Cassandra?"

Nice to meet you, Yugi! Im here to help you recover the missing souls that didnt descend into the afterlife!

"The afterlife?" Yugi thinks... and remembers that temple where people were being pushed into and sucked up a huge ray of light in the sky! "...Oh. OOHHH!!! Oh, oh oh.... oh man! This is bad."

Yes. Cassandra's gonna be with us for a while... Hope you dont mind?

"Not at all!" Yugi says with a smile, "The more the merrier!"

Say Yami... was there ever a 'Mrs. Pharoh'?

......Uh... the sooner the better, Yug!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: If there's always room for Jello...

choices: Buisness before pleasure (We have to save the city!)
Pleasure before buisness (The others can handle it, let's play with Yugi!)
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Yugi?"

Dammit, they heard us.

No, this is actually good Cassandra replied.

Good?! How is this good?

Yugi, I think we can use your two girlfriends...

"They're not..."

Oh come off it Yugi! We both know you've wanted Anzu ever since

"AHEM!"

Look Yugi Cassandra began matter-of-factly,just say what I say, and we'll get the girls to help us.

"OK. Uh, Anzu? Mana?"

"Yes?" Anzu replied.

"Aren't you concerned about where everyone went?"

"I found that strange," Mana replied. "Do you know where everyone is?"

"I know Kaiba has something to do with it, and it might be catastrophic. That's why Jou and the Envoys were in the car."

"But I just saw Riga."

"The Dragon's in the trunk. Anyway, I need you girls to help me find Kaiba, so we can save the city!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Buisness or pleasure?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Anzu and Mana just looked at eachother for a few seconds... then both shaked their heads and said "NAAAAHH!!"

Yugi's pupils minimize! "Wha...WHAT?! B...BUT..."

"Im sure the others can handle it!" Anzu tells him, "That just gives us more time to play with you!"

"Yeah!" Mana's eyes widen while staring at Yugi, "In the meantime, WE'LL keep you safe from any harm!!"

Yugi drops his head and sighs...

Let ME take over, Yugi!

"Huh? What?"

Let me take over your body for a while. I'LL convince them to let you go!

---

"Wait a minute!" Yami looks at Cassandra, "What exactly are you gonna do?!"

Cassandra just shines her scythe and smiles a girlish smile, "Oh, just talk. Nothing more!"

Yami then looks up to the ceiling and talks to Yugi, "Yugi, I need you to think hard about this decision! I simply cant let a total stranger-not to mention a total psycho-take over your body.... that's MY job!"

---

"Hmmm......"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Oh there WILL be pleasure, allright!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"I'll figure this out on my own," Yugi replied. "I mean, they obviously...like me, right? They should see reason...I hope."

*********************************************************

About two blocks away, the sounds of a 2001 Toyota Camry speeding through the streets would have been extremely easy to hear, had it not been drowned out by the sound of several roaring jet engines. The squadron of fifteen Vic Vipers pursued the car like a shadow, despite Jounouchi's best attempts at elusion.

VISIBLE TARGET- 2001 TOYOTA CAMRY LE CARRYING FOUR PASSENGERS. TWO HUMANS- ID'S UNKNOWN. ONE DUEL MONSTER- ID- BLACK LUSTER SOLDIER. ONE UKNOWN LIFEFORM OUT OF VISUAL RANGE.

PRIMARY TARGET IS NOT ON BOARD VEHICLE. RECCOMENDATION- DESTROY VEHICLE AND INTERROGATE SURVIVING PASSENGERS TO OBTAIN WHEARABOUTS OF PRIMARY TARGET.

LOCK ON TARGET AND ATTACK.

The squadron of jets began opening fire on the vehicle with a variety of lasers and missles, including an odd circular shaped beam that melted the concrete on the road.

"What the hell is that!?" Jou yelled as he swerved the car out of the way.

"Didn't you ever play Gradius?" Honda asked.

"No."

"Those fighters are from that game! That's where all the crazy weapons came from!"

"Who's bright idea was it to put a video game fighter in Duel Monsters?!" Jou asked.

"They appeared around the same time Konami went and bought out Industial Industries," the Envoy replied as he cracked open the back window, crawling out by the trunk. "Enough of this. These mindless machines will rue the day they crossed the Envoys! Isn't that right, Chaos Emperor Dragon?"

The Dragon only groaned.

"What do you mean you're mad at me about leaving you in the trunk? That was the spiky haired kid's idea!"

More groaning met the Envoy even as missles careened by the car.

"OK, fine. After this...I'll go get you some ice cream. Now hurry!"

The trunk cover melted as a bright flash emerged from the trunk, annilhating more than half the squadron. Soon only three jets remained.

SECONDARY TARGET- CHAOS EMPEROR DRAGON. RECCOMENDATION- MODE CHANGE.

As the others looked on, the three jet fighters began to fold out parts of their wings, creating a new appearance, a sleek robot with bladed feet, hovering over the cars.

"It can turn into a robot?!" Jou shouted.

"Didn't you ever play Zone of the Enders?" replied Honda.

"Cut the game trivia! How do we kill it?!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Blame it on Konami

choices: How will they deal with the ninja?!
Who was that stranger Riga met?!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The Black Luster Soldier and Chaos Emperor Dragon stand in front of Jou and Honda. "We'll handle this abomination!" the Envoy tells them, "you go search for Kaiba! AND HURRY!"

Without even saying goodbye, Honda and Jou drive off in their Camry, one of the best cars Toyota has ever made! The Envoy and Dragon stare up at the robot! "Say hi to your mistress for me!" the Envoy says!

"Oh? But Riga... wouldnt you rather tell her YOURSELF?!" ...a shadowy figure emerges from the shadows... Riga recognizes this person.. and glares at the sight of him!! "....YOU!!!!"

--Meanwhile with Jou and Honda--

Jou steps hard on the gas as they drive off in the direction of the mystic elf! However they still have plenty of time to chat with one another!

"Aw lord, dis is just GREAT!!" Jou sneers, "First we get Gradius fighters on our asses, then we get attacked by some Zone of the Enders robot! What OTHER Konami crap's gonna pop out?! Mystical Ninja Goemon?!"

---SSCCCRRREEEECCCCHHH!!--- Suddenly, a huge slice appears in the front window!

"Whoa.." Honda's jaw drops, "what was that?" Jou hits the brakes and stops the car. Only to-

---SSSSLLLLLLAAAASSSSHHH!!!!!--- Oh crap! The car split in half!! The guys jumped out of the scrapped Camry only to come face to face with the person that did this!

A female ninja... with long green hair and a purple ninja outfit and sandals!

"Hey wait a sec!" Honda recognizes her, "That's Yae! From Mystical Ninja Goemon!" Yae draws her blade and slowly approaches the two!

Jou shrugs, "...God how I hate Konami!"
You and me both, pal!
"WHO SAID THAT?!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: War Children... it's just a shot away!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
In front of Riga quickly appeared another robot, a long, slender machine with the oddly shaped cockpit right in front of him, opened to reveal a man covered in wires and machinery.

"So, you've come here, haven't you Gofer?"

The man laughed at the reply. "Yes. The whole being banished thing was a bit...infuriating at first, but I've gotten used to it. By the way, how do you like Anubis?"

"I hate all mechanical monsters," Riga replied. "Machines were not meant for war. That is the job of soldiers like myself. And I assume you're working with..."

"Sort of," interrupted Gofer, "but truth be told, it's mostly a power play. I intend to wreak havoc on this world and the dark world, but I need to eliminate several people before I can do that. Now...where is the boy?"

"What boy?"

Gofer laughed. "You were never a very good liar, Riga. Now, where is the keeper of the Millenium Puzzle?"

"I don't know", Riga replied, "and if I did..."

"Cut the heroic crap. I suppose I can just find him myself. Withdraw!"

The cockpit closed, and before Riga could do anything, Anubis, along with its pilot, vanished. The Vic Vipers flew off in the air, back to jet mode.

"He always was a coward. Ever since he entered the dark world. Come, Dragon. We need to AARGH!"

The Envoy was driven back several feet by a powerful cannon blast. When he looked ahead, Riga saw where it came from. Several Barrel Dragons and other mechanical creatures.

"I hate robots."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Man in the machine

choices: ...uh... about Honda and Jou's ninja problem..
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The little Vic Vipers flew toward their next target, led by the Anubis and the artificially-intelligent warlord, Gofer!

However, during half-way to their target, a tiny little ghost appeared in front of Gofer! The ghost resembled a young boy with red hair, bloodred eyes, wearing a holy-white noble uniform.

"Greetings, Sir Gofer!" the tiny ghost replied in a light English accent.

"Sigh.. what do you want, Sadri?" Gofer asks.
"It's not what I want," Sadri replies, "It's what Lady Horakhti wants!"

"Allright fine," Gofer grins, "What does that power hungry whore want now?!"
Sadri just stares at Gofer showing no emotion and replies, "She wishes to give you... assistance in stopping the 'Evil One'!"

"Wow... I feel so blessed! The great one is actually getting off her high horse to help someone as low and unworthy as ME!" he replies in a sarcastic tone!

"You should feel blessed," Sadri says, "Because she's giving you... her children!"

Gofer's sarcastic smile drops... he is now all ears at this point, "..HER CHILDREN??!! ...YOU MEAN THE GOD CARDS?!!!"

Sadri grins and waves his hand... and makes the 3 god cards appear in Gofer's hand!!!

Gofer looks down at them and smiles, "...COOL!"

"Release the light of her sacred children... and bind the darkness of the 'Evil One' and his cursed puzzle!"

"You got it, shorty!" Gofer replies! And with that, Sadri disappears... just moments later, he gets a call from the intercomm..

"ATTENTION MASTER GOFER... THIS IS VIC VIPER GRADIUS IV OF UNIT #22! WE HAVE LOCATED THE 'EVIL ONE' PROTECTED BY THE DARK MAGICIAN GIRL AND HER OVERGROWN HUMAN SLAVE... YOUR ORDERS?"

Gofer just stares at the god cards with a wicked grin... and replies... "....Attack!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Terror comes in trios!

choices: They find a means of escape
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
If there was one thing that humans feared more than wild animals or monsters, it was ninjas. And as Jou and Honda ran through the lifeless streets, the endless supply of ninjas running after them instilled this fear.

"I hate ninjas! Hate em!" Honda yelled as he ran for cover behind a dumpster.

Between his stammering, Jou replied "Yeah, yeah I know!"

The ninjas were relentless. Whever the two hid, the ninjas found them. And they didn't stop for anything.

"Why couldn't we be killed by a sexy ninja? Like Taki?" Honda asked. Jou just stared at him, chalking it up to more video game gibberish and ran.

"But I don't wanna die! I don't care how sexy the killer is!"

"What do you think we should do then?" Honda questioned, even as he dodged several shurikens.

"Hope there's another KFC?"

Honda shook his head as he continued running. "You're so hopeless!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Night of a million zillion ninjas!

choices: ...FINALLY the ninjas give up and leave...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jou thought a bit while he was running for his life, "...ok ok! I thought of ANOTHER idea!"

Honda just sighs, "...NOW what?"

"Ninjas perfer the dark, right?"

"Uh..yeah."

"And ninjas never step into the light, right?"

"Yeah. What's your point!"

Jou grins, "That's it! Ninjas HATE light!"

Honda just looks at him weird, "Um...what?"

"Think about it!" Jou taps his forehead, "Ninjas only hang out in the darkness! They NEVER step into the light! Ergo, ninjas hate light!"

"UGGGHHH!!" Honda moans and starts to get a headache from listening to Jou talk! "Look! Just trust me on this, ok?" Jou says.

What luck! They find a bright store called "Ted's Light, Lamp, & Chandelier Emporium"! A super-bright light store! Jou grabs Honda's arm and pulls him in the store...

Jou points outside, "Watch..."

The army of ninjas stop in place in front of the store! NONE of them enter!

"What the?" Honda looks at them weirdly, "They aint coming in!"

The ninjas talk to eachother in their own little exotic language...
/Um...shouldnt we go in there and get them?/
/No way! It's too bright! It hurts my eyes!/
/Curse them! They found our one true weakness!!!/
/How are we ever gonna get them now?!/

But one ninja just steps in front of the rest and grins wickedly... /We just wait... they cant remain in their precious light forever!!/

..and so they wait...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Blinded by the Light

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jou and Honda thought that the light had saved them. The ninjas would go home, and everything would be OK.

Then Jou saw one of the ninjas by the power lines, sword in hand.

"Oh hell."

The lights went out instanteously, and the ninjas began heading inside. Honda was already starting to panic

"Crap crap crap! Get a flashlight!"

Both of them hurried towards where the flashlights were, but they did little to stem the onslaught of ninjas. Almost instantly, two shurikens landed in the lights.

"We're dead!"

Both Jou and Honda waited for the inevitable end at the hands of the ninjas. The sounds of ninja death cries were already upon them.

When they opened their eyes, however, the lights were on, and the ninjas were laid to waste upon the floors, tables, and chairs, unconscious.

"Who...who did that?" Honda asked. Jou didn't reply, he just turned to the face of his savior.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Saved?  But by who?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Oh my god... it IS Chuck Norris!! Oh wait... no... it's actually a cardboard cutout of him with his special Workout DVD in his hand and a speech bubble that says "BUY MY WORKOUT VIDEO!" Yes that's right, ladies and gentlemen... Chuck Norris IS in fact so strong that you can easily get your ass kicked by his cardboard cutouts!

Anyway, Honda and Jou just stare at eachother for a few minutes, "Uh...I wont tell if you wont!"

"Whoa... amazing! It seems you didnt need my help after all!!"

Jou and Honda turned their heads to see their favorite Black Luster Soldier back again!

"Aw man! It's good to see ya again!" Jou says with relief, "Howd you deal with those Gradius planes?"

Riga sighs, "I didnt... in fact.. we were surrounded by those damned machines! They captured my dragon companion but I managed to escape!"

"They got Chaos?!" Honda sweats, "We gotta go get him back!!!"

"But what about Yugi?" Jou asks, "...Or Kaiba?"

"Kaiba wont be going anywhere!" the Envoy exclaims, "But Yugi... and my comrad... we need to rescue them!! But which one?"

"I vote Yugi!" Jou says.

"I am for rescuing Chaos Emperor Dragon first!" Riga says...

"Well, it's tied so far, Honda! Who are we gonna go save first?!"

"Uh....."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Angels sang... an emaculate chorus...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"We should go get Yugi," Honda replied.

"Very well," replied the Envoy. "I will go secure us a new method of transportation."

"How are you gonna do that?"

"The skills of the Envoy, of course."

Jou and Honda looked outside, watching as Riga demonstrated his Envoy skills, which consisted of smashing open a window and hotwiring a car for them to drive.

"I didn't know they taught monsters how to do that," Jou scoffed.

*********************************************************

The streets were empty, with the jet fighters from earlier having left the skies, and no sign of any monsters of the ground. This meant that the group could move as fast as they could towards their objective.

"You think Yugi'll be alright?" asked Jou.

"I don't know," Riga replied. "The man after him is cunning, mysterious, and definetely very powerful."

"Yeah, but Yugi's got two big girls protecting him, and they kicked your ass!" Honda replied. Riga said nothing, but sped the car up.

"OK, fine! Don't get touchy! But..."

"But what?"

"They're...getting bigger."

"So?!"

"Didn't Mana say that she got stronger the bigger she got?" Jou asked.

"Hmmph. Against Gofer, her power is nothing."

"It was enough to kick your ass," Honda teased.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Yeah, but does he need help?!

choices: No time for talk! Here come the Vipers!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
After hearing Honda's smartass comment, Riga turned his head to him and said, "Uh... you have a little on your face?"

"Huh?" Honda starts looking in the mirror, "What is it?"

*PPPPUUUUUUNNNNNCCCCCHHHH!!!!!*

"My fist," Riga grinned after socking Honda knocking him out! Jou reaches over to the front seat to check if Honda was ok (Not really, he was just trying to steal his wallet!)

"Honda...are you ok? Oh no...this is bad... the cheapass only has a five!" Jou stuffs it in his pocket!

Anyway, the Envoy drove back in the direction to the same place they left Yugi... they hope he's still there... and he's still allright!

But when they arrive, they notice Yugi's fine... but both Anzu and Mana seemed to be lying on the ground knocked out cold!
Jou stepped toward Yugi and asked, "Hey Yugi, what happened here? ....uh....Yugi?"

Yugi looked... DIFFERENT... a slightly taller, longer haired, bigger chested female Yugi with a scythe in 'her' hands!

She smiled at Jou and raised her hand, "Hiya!"

This better not be permanent, Cassandra!!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Yu-SHE-Oh??!!!!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
All three of them stared at the female Yugi, not uttering a word for more than a minute. Finally, Jou broke the silence.

"Yugi...what did you do?"

Yugi, or whoever the hell this was, couldn't answer the question as bullets and lasers began to fly past their position. Riga already knew what this meant, and what to do.

"Everyone in the car! Now!"

"But what about Anzu?" Honda asked.

"Bros before hoes!" Jou yelled as he shoved Honda into the backseat. And with that, the car took off.

It wasn't long before the car was caught up to by a group of jet fighters and a very large robot.

"Gofer," Riga growled as he looked in the rearview mirror. "Everyone hold on tight!"

The car zigged and zagged through the streets, but to no avail as their pursuers got closer and closer, soon close enough that one could touch the jet if he got out of the vehicle.

"We need a new plan!" Honda yelled.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: No time for small talk

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
As the Vipers were heading SOOOOO closely together... a quick thought came into Yugi/Cassandra's head! "GUYS! STOP THE CAR!"

"What? Why?"

"Just trust me on this! Stop the car!!"

The gang hoped Yu-she knew what she was doing! Jou stepped hard on the brakes.... causing the incoming jets to collide into eachother!

Not being able to stop in time, the rest of the jets followed along! They each crashed into eachother and blew up!! *Crash crash crash*! *Boom boom boom*!

Nothing left of the Vic Vipers but Viper debris and scrap all over!

The gang jumped out of the car and checked for any more incoming jets!

"Hmm...it looks like that's the last of them!" Riga sigh with relief!

Jou looked at 'Yugi' and said, "Whoa! Good thinking, Yug!" But she stared at him with a glare... right before punching him REAAAALLLLYYY hard in the stomach! Jou fell to the ground writhing in pain!

"...'BROS BEFORE HOES'?!!!" Cassandra was obviously offended by that negative slang towards women!

Just then, the gang hears a LOUD megaphone voice, "Heheheh...so the Vics are gone... aw well! Still got plenty more where that came from!!"

They forgot about the certain giant robot still stalking them!

"Uh...w...who is THAT?" Honda pointed.

"....GOFER!" Riga grits his teeth!

"Nice to see you too, Riga ol' buddy!" Gofer grinned, "Just in time to check my brand spankin' new GOD CARDS!!!"

The gang all shouted in unison, "GOD CARDS???!!!"

"Yep! ....How's about we test 'em out? Hmm.. who should I start off with... AH! I KNOW!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: And not a moment too soon...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Obelisk, the tormentor!"

"Uh, Riga, can you take an Egyptian God?"

"HELL NO!" Riga shouted. "People think I'm overpowered, compared to Obelisk, I'd get thrown!"

Honda looked on worried. "So that means..."

"Back in the car!"

Everyone, including the still limping Jounouchi, piled into the car as Riga hit the accelerator. Obelisk, obviously annoyed, gave chase, its powerful legs quickly bringing it next to the vehicle. Honda was all-too-familar with the situation.

"Crap! Not this again!"

"Any ideas this time Yug?" Jou asked. Before she could answer, Riga quickly moved the car in a beeline towards where they just left.

"Hey! Isn't this towards?"

"We have two very big girls not doing much of anything right now," Riga explained. "They'll probably get killed, but at the very least, they'll buy us enough time to find Kaiba!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: God vs mortals

choices: Aww...how could she resist Yami's charm?
There's no reasoning with that woman!!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
After finding these cowardly men would leave such poor defenseless women for dead, Cassandra immediately reacted... by pointing her scythe to Riga's throat!!

"Turn around... NOW!" she ordered! Riga immediately let go of the wheel and backed away from the blade to his seat!

"Y...Yugi?! What are you-"

"Do as I say! TURN AROUND!!!" Cassandra demanded!

"Yugi? What's gotten into you?!" Honda asks him.

------

The ghost of Yami tries to restrain Cassandra! "C...Cassandra! Calm down! Dont do this!"

But she just shakes her head, "Sorry love! But Im not gonna stand around and let this chauventistic pigs ditch those poor gigantic women in distress!!"

Little Yugi tries to reason with her as well, "Wait Cassandra! We're not ditching them! It's just that they're not safe with us!"

Cassandra turns her head and stares at him, "Um.. what do you mean?"

Yami explains, "It's not them Obelisk is after... it's us! If we brought them with us, we'd only be putting them in danger! So please my lady... let Riga go!"

Cassandra thinks, "Hmmm...."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Girl Power!

choices: Mana and Anzu are on their own!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Cassandra wouldn't back down. "You just can't leave them alone with Obelisk! Even if they are coming after us, Riga doesn't care! We have to help!

"I hope you know what you're doing," Yami sighed.

*********************************************************

"Turn around!"

Riga sighed and did what he was told, but not before adding, "we're all going to get killed!"

"You keep saying that all you want, just drive!"

*********************************************************

Mana and Anzu were still unconscious as Obelisk approached. Both girls, nearly 700 feet tall, didn't stir even as forceful quakes approached them. In both girl's cases, their focus was still as single-minded as ever, Yugi.

"Oh Yugi-kun, come closer," Mana muttered in her unconsciousness. "Please Yugi-kun, you're all mine."

Unfortunately, their dreams were quickly interrupted as Obelisk approached them. Seeing the two as mere obstacles, it ran towards them, preparing to obliterate them. This, thankfully, was enough to wake up the two girls.

"What the?"

Mana looked on terrified as she leapt out of the way. "Obelisk!" The Egyptian God only replied with a growl.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Logic?  What's that?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"LEAVE HER ALONE, BIG BLUE!!" Jou screamed to Obelisk! The gang showed up just in time!

Obelisk turned his head at them and growled, "GRRRRR!!!! ...PHA....ROH!!!"

Mana smiled, "YUGI-KUN!" but then her smile dropped, "..wait a minute! Youre not Yugi-kun! Youre that crazy she-Yugi with a scythe!"

Cassandra smiled and waved, "Hello again! I hope you finally realized you can keep Yugi, but Yami's mine!"

"Um... I hate to break up this little reunion," Riga interrupted, "BUT WHAT ABOUT OBELISK??!!!"

---

"That's right!" the ghost of Yami looks toward Cassandra, "What should we do to stop him?"

But Cassandra just grins and blushes nervously, "Oh...uh... um... heheheh... I uh... guess I didnt that far ahead! Heheh!"

"WHAT?!" Yugi flipped out, "YOU MADE US GO BACK TO CONFRONT AN EGYPTIAN GOD, AND YOU DONT EVEN HAVE A PLAN TO STOP HIM?!!!"

Cassandra lowers her head in shame, "Oh... the Boss is gonna kill me!"

Yami just sighs, "...Guess it's all up to me... AS USUAL!!!"
---

YU-GI-OOOOOOOOOOHHHHH!!!

Yugi morphs into Yami-Form! "Allright Obelisk! How's about the two of us have a little duel? If I win, you go back in that card where you belong! If I lose, I will personally jump into that bright light in the sky and sacrifice myself to Horakhti!"

Honda flips out, "Yugi! Dont!" but Mana cheers him on! "YEAH!! TAKE HIM OUT, YUGI-KUN!" Obelisk just growls... and nods his head.

"Good!" Yami pulls off his jacket revealing a duel-disk on his arm! "Let's duel!"

Obelisk snaps his massive fingers and a giant duel disk appears on his humongous arm!

Riga just stares in silence, "...You gotta be friggin kidding me..."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Wasnt it about time they did it?!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yami looked at his deck intently, and quickly made the first move.

"I summon the Celtic Guardian with one card face down!"

While the others looked on, Riga headed towards the car. No one, except for Honda, noticed.

"What are you doing?"

"Leaving while the distraction is in place. Do you really think a simple card game is going to end the problems that we face?"

Honda fumbled for an answer. "I never liked Duel Monsters much, but..."

"Now, while those idiots are playing the games teenage nerds get beat up for playing, we can escape and find Seto Kaiba. Then, we can kill him."

Honda nodded, getting in the driver's seat. Riga quickly followed in the passenger's seat, and the two bolted off.

"What makes you sure they won't find us?" Honda asked.

"When duels occur, no one notices anything else going on," replied Riga. "We can use that against Obelisk. He may be powerful, but he's not the smartest apple in the bush."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Card games cannot solve life's problems Part I

choices: And so they go in search of them...
Where did Riga and Hoda end up?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
After summoning the Celtic Guardian and placing a face-down, Yami passed his turn onto Obelisk...

"VORSE...RAIDER...ATTACK MODE!!!" He roared as he summoned the Vorse Raider.... in attack mode. Obelisk then called the attack.... BUT...

"ACTIVATE TRAP! 'HUMBLE BEGINNINGS'!" Yami turned the card to reveal 'Humble Beginnings'! "At the cost of half of both our Life Points, we have to discard all our cards on the field and in our hands and draw 5 new cards!"

Their life points dropped to 2000, and all their cards on the field and their hands went to the graveyard... they eached drew 5 new cards!

Yami looked down at his hand... and grinned, "Heh... take a guess what I have in my hand NOW?" Obelisk just raised an eyebrow, "...HMM?!"

Yami turned his hard and showed him... the 5 Exodia pieces! "BEHOLD!! EXODIA, THE FORBIDDEN ONE!!!"
The gigantic buff Pharoh beast appeared on the field... "EXODIA....OBLITERATE!!!" And blasted the hell out of Obelisk, giving Yami an automatic win!

Obelisk let out a roar in pain, "NOOOOOOOOOOAAARRRGGGHHHH!!!!!" and zapped back into a god-card! Yami picked up the card and put it in his deck, "One down... two to go!"

"YEAH!!! GO YUGI!!!" Jou cheered him on!
Mana clapped her hands and smiled "Yay!!! My Yugi won!"....but that smile quickly dropped when she sensed Cassandra's ghost giving her a wicked glare!!

"Hey... where's Riga and Honda?" Yami asked. Jou looked around, "Hey... the car's gone too! THOSE PUNKS!!! THEY TOOK OFF WITHOUT US!!!!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Part II: Yes they can!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Half a city away, Honda stopped the car, noticing an all too familiar sight.

"It's her."

"Then let us end this nightmare," Riga replied, exiting the car and drawing his sword. "All I need is one good shot."

"You said that last time," Honda joked. "Remember?"

"I'd rather not. Let us be done with this before reinforcements arrive!"

Riga saw his target, currently being toyed with by the Mystic Elf in ways that a child would use a doll. It was pathetic, he thought, that a creature bred for battle could act so...immature. Even more so, becoming infatuated with a coward like Kaiba.

"Now, stand back!"

Honda did so, and saw as Riga raised his sword into the air, an odd blue glow surrounding the blade.

"Seto Kaiba, you're already dead!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Catching up

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Riga aimed his blade at Kaiba and carefully readied his shot... A huge burst of light shot out of his blade and headed STRAIGHT to Kaiba....

..Just then, a claw stopped it! A huge, red familiar claw!!

The claw belonged to an extremely long red winged dragon with two mouths... one mouth on top of another!! Honda and Riga knew EXACTLY who THIS creature was... the 2nd God Card!

"SLIFER!!!!!"

The bottom mouth spoke,"So... YOURE the followers of the Pharoh. The one our mother desperately wants dead."{/b}

The second mouth spoke too! "Im afraid we cannot let you harm Kaiba. He is benefitial to our plan!"

The two said nothing.... they just stared at the humongous dragon for almost a minute before finally...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The NEXT one...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Normally, both Honda and Riga would have ran as fast as they could back to the car. This time, however, Riga stood firm, and only Honda ran back to the car, only to look at the dashboard with dread.

"Oh crap! The tank's empty!"

"We can't keep running away!" Riga shouted, facing Silfer head on. "Kaiba is right there, and we need to kill him!"

"But you'll get killed!"

"Maybe. But I can buy you enough time to go kill Kaiba!" Tossing Honda a knife, he continued.

"Go and find Kaiba and finish him off! I will hold back Silfer as long as I can!"

Honda nodded dumbfounded, watching as Riga leapt into the air, swinging his sword at Silfer. He knew the fight wouldn't last long, but on the other hand, if he killed Kaiba, the nightmare would end. So he ran as fast as he could.

Riga panted, his inital parry being blocked by a powerful swipe of Silfer's claw. Raising his sword into the air, he decided a new tactic was in order.

"Kings Flash!" A bright flash of light emerged, and with that, Riga was gone. Silfer growled, then decided to look for his quarry
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Out of gas...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"PANT...PANT...PANT!!!!" Honda ran as fast as he could trying to catch up with Kaiba and the Mystical Elf! "C'MON!.....JUST....A LITTLE....FURTHER!!!" Honda starts running out of breath!! It looks like he wont be able to catch up with them at this point!

"MUST....KEEP....GOING.... MUST....SAVE....WORLD.... MUST...STOP-aw screw it!" Honda drops to the ground nearly passing out!

He takes a break trying to catch his breath and wipes the sweat from his forehead, "Whew! I gotta find the others! But it seems all my energy is sapped up...."

"...There's the next one!!! Ready him to meet our lady!!"

"WHAT?!" Honda raises his head after hearing someone elses voice! He turns his head and sees a group of cultist in white robes wearing white masks... one of them looks familiar... the dragon one in a cult suit...

"CHAOS?!" Honda screams! C.E.D. just steps toward him as if he's in some kind of a trance! Normally Honda would run, but when he turned back around... a humonous bright glowing figure descended upon him!!! A certain golden winged dragon!!

"R..R...R....RA!!!!"

"Is THIS one of the heretics that dare oppose Mother?" It asked in a thunderous lenient voice!

C.E.D. just stares in a trance and nods his head...

"Take him to the Great Pillar!" Ra ordered, "So that he may answer to her in person! I shall locate the other heretics!"

"Right away my lord," one of the cultists bows. Cornered, Honda had no choice but to let himself get grabbed by the masked cultists! They quickly dragged him for what seemed to be miles while Honda let out a scream, "NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!! YUUUUUUGGGGGGIIIIII!!!!!!!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: ...And the devil makes three!

choices: Unfortunately for Riga, Yugi's friends are right behind him
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Riga looked around for any potential targets. His little trick worked better than he had hoped, and that left him safe for the moment.

Unfortunately, Kaiba and the Mystic Elf were nowhere in sight either. They must have left while he was waiting. This of course, meant that he had to start his journey ALL over again, something that did not sit well with him in the least.

"Ugh. And with my luck, Honda was captured or killed by now. But I can't defeat the Egyptian Gods. I need...a plan!"

"Hey! Riga!"

Riga grinned as he looked in back of him. "A plan, or bait..."

Yugi ran up to Riga with an expression of worry. Luckily, he was alone. "Where's Honda?"

"Captured I'm afraid. And you're still alive?"

"I beat Obelisk."

"Can you handle Silfer?"

Yugi looked on confused. "Huh?"

"We've got two more God cards guarding Kaiba and not a lot of time. Now I need you to go find Silfer and duel him like you did Obelisk."

"That sounds easy enough."

"Then do it!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Three blocks later...

choices: It looks like Yami has to take over...
He got himself in this mess...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Sadly enough, Yugi falls for it... he rushes in carrying his new God Card with him, "Here's hoping THIS will come in handy!"

Riga just looks back at Yugi and grins, "Great!! Now that THAT'S out of the way..."

--Meanwhile with Yugi--

"SLIFER!!!!!" Yugi screams! "COME ON OUT!!!!! IT'S TIME FOR US TO DUEL!!!!"

In a heart beat, a humongously long serpent tail flew right by him!!! Then it flew right by him again! And again! And again!! Unbeknownst to little Yugi, it's starting to coil around Yugi!!!!!

"Huh? What the- AAAHHH!!!!" It sqeezes him tightly!! Gasping for breath Yugi looks up and notices the creature choking him to death!! "S...S...SLIFER!!!"

"Hmm? Who is this human?! And how does it know our name?" the bottom mouth asks.
"Wait a minute...." the top mouth suggests, "I recognize that hair... THAT'S THE PHAROH!!! The one Mother warned us about!"

"Tha....that's right!!" Yugi struggled, "I challenge you to a duel! Youre no match my new improved deck!"

But Slifer just looks at him strangely, "De...ck? Is that some kind of ancient weapon designed to destroy the evil tainting this world?" "No, I believe he's referring to a deck of cards..."

"That's right!" Yugi smiles shows Slifer no fear, "Ive put my heart and soul in my deck... NOW LET'S DUEL!"

Slifer just stares at him with a strange look in his eyes, "...DUEL?!...With CARDS?! The Pharoh must have sacrificed his brain cells to come back to this world!"

Yugi's smile quickly disappears, "W...What?"

"We do not play stupid childish GAMES!! En Guard, human!!!" and opens it's upper mouth wide about to blast him with it's special ability!!

Yugi freezes in place and turns white in fear then starts talking to Yami, "Uh...Y....Yami.... what do I do now?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: You dont use cards to duel Ol' Red!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Well, it's up to me...AGAIN

A bright flash of light appeared from Yugi, one that blinded Silfer long enough for the dragon to drop its prey. When it could see once again, it saw Yami running away as fast as it possibly could.

Get back here you cretin!

Yami didn't bother replying to that. Physically, he was no match for an Egyptian God. But mentally, he at least had a chance out outsmarting him.

"This way!" he yelled, running towards a group of abandoned buildings. Silfer, enraged, flew into the air and let loose a powerful energy bolt that incinerated the buildings, leaving only dust. Yami's eyes turned wide at the spectacle.

Now, prepare yourself Pharoah.

There was nowhere left to run or hide in the concrete surroundings. No place except...

Looking to his left, Yami found an open manhole cover, obviously blown open by Silfer's earlier blast. With no other choice, he covered his nose and dove inside.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Bottom feeding

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yami landed on the watery sewer-ground with a splash! Although a little disgusted, he still had to run for his life down the long tunnel!

Unfortunately for him, Slifer gave chase!! His big head and LOOOOONNNNGG neck could easily slide through the tunnels!!

He....he's gaining on us! Yugi shouts in terror! "Just hang in there!" Yami tells him, "IM the one running for my life!!"
The tunnel gets smaller and smaller the further Yami and Slifer go....

Oh no! Cassandra points ahead, Dead end! She's right! A big brick wall is in the way. And there's no way around!

"Dammit!" he bangs on the wall, "We're trapped!" And to make matters worse, Slifer's gaining on him!!! He quickly slithers closer and closer to poor Yami!

Out of ideas, he closes his eyes and awaits his fate with the big red dragon.....

...Hmm?! What's taking Yami's untimely end so long?! He opens his eyes... and see's Slifer's head wedge between two tightly-spaced walls!

{color:red}Grrr!!! We....we cant move!!
{color:blue}NO!!! We're stuck!! We were SO close too!!

"Awww....youre stuck? What a shame!"

The Slifer heads notice something a little different about Yami... he's slightly taller, much more feminine voice, has boobs, and a much more bloodthirsty attitude! ...UH OH!

She grins wickedly and pulls out a nice, long scythe!!

{color:red}Uh... do you notice anything different about the Pharoh?
{color:blue}Yes... the Pharoh is HOT!

However, that quickly changes to absolute fear for the Slifer heads as she raises her scythe high in the air right over between Slifer's eyes.....and....

---SSSSSLLLLLLAAAASSSSHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!---

Two down... one to go!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Cornered beasts are the most dangerous

choices: He's taken right to the target!  (Mystic Elf and Kaiba)
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Riga was good at fighting and escaping. What he unfortunately wasn't anywhere near as good at was finding where he needed to go without help. That task fell to the Chaos Emperor Dragon. But with him gone, and no one around to pick up the slack, he was lost.

And lost he was! Journeying through the dark city, there was no sign of life or anything even remotely resembling life anywhere by him. Riga sighed.

"Damn those Egyptian Gods! If I could only find Seto Kaiba and KILL him, this would be finished! But where is he?"

No one answered him of course, since apart from the occasional jet flying overhead, he was isolated from the world. Then again...

An idea formed, and almost immediately, Riga leapt from building to building, finding his way directly undearneath the fighter jet, hanging on as it flew over the city.

I'm a genius! Riga thought. All I have to do is wait for the jet to fly right over to Kaiba and then he's all mine! This'll be a snap!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Maybe he should ask for directions...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Hitching a ride on one of the Vipers was a good idea... however, it was gonna work the way he thought it would...

As the jet gets off the ground and flies off... another jet below it starts gaining ahead of it and starts flying a LITTLE too close!!

*PPPOOOOOOSSSSHHH!!!* The jet from below flies too close, hitting Riga!!! He loses his grip on the top jet and falls and lands on the glass of the bottom jet!!

"WWWWWWHHHHHHAAAA!!!!!!!!!!" Riga screams as he's being pressed against the glass going about 500mph!

The pilot notices a certain knight stuck on his windshield! "Grrr!! Damn knight! GET THE HELL OFF MY PLANE!!!" He then turns the steering wheel hard causing the jet to turn over! With nothing to grab on to, Riga fell....

"aaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-OOF!" he land face-first onto the ground! Luckily, his unbreakable body armor broke his fall so he didnt break anything other than his pride!

"....huh? Are you ok?"

"Yeah Im fine, tha-" Riga lifted his head up off the ground... and grinned at who he saw!! "Kaiba! What luck to see you again!"

Kaiba recognizes him! The same damn guy that tried to kill him before! "Y..y.y...YOU?! N...n..n...NO!!!"

Riga gets up off the ground and pulls out his blade! "It is time you finally paid for your selfish crimes!!!"
