1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: ...Well it still worked, didnt it??!!!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"HEY! DON'T HURT MY TOY!"

Riga sighed, knowing exactly who the voice belonged to. Grabbing Kaiba, he leapt for a rooftop avoiding the angry foot stomp of the even angrier Mystic Elf. Putting his sword to Kaiba's throat, he began yelling.

"Back off, or else he dies!"

The Elf looked on at Riga with a look of pure hatred, but stood still. However, another voice interrupted before she could speak.

"HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! WHERE'S YUGI-KUN?"

Riga groaned, knowing that Mana was there. Still, maybe he could use this to his advantage. After all, he had Kaiba now, there was no way he was letting him escape!

"You have to let me kill Kaiba! Millions of lives depend on it!"

"NO!" the Mystic Elf shouted. "DON'T HURT MY TOY!"

"He's the key to this entire nightmare! Yugi is in danger every second Kaiba breathes!"

"You're just saying that because you're mean! You always were mean, and you're still a big meanie!"

"Liar! You're just too obsessed with this idiot to see the truth!"

Back and forth the two went for several minutes with Mana unsure of whose side to take. But eventually, she made her choice.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Choices...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Mana thought for a while... if Kaiba dies, millions of lives would be saved. One life for millions of others... For the sake of the world, it had to be done! Besides, it's not like anyone liked Kaiba in the first place!

Mana sighed, "Sorry Kaiba... but Im afraid we have no choice."
"WHAT??!!!" Kaiba screamed in shock! Mystical Elf started worrying about losing her little toy, "NO!!! PLEASE DONT!!!"

Riga on the other hand grins at Kaiba, raises his blade in the air and swings it at Kaiba's neck....

*KIIIINNNKKK!!!* The sword broke in half!! It couldnt penetrate Kaiba!!

"What the hell?! My sword!!"

Kaiba opens his eyes and realizes he aint dead! "W...Wha... Im still alive!!! IM STILL ALIVE!!"

Mystical Elf breathes a sigh of relief. Mana on the other hand, had a BAD feeling about this....

And to make matters worse...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: It's NEVER that easy!

choices: Ra is there to block any pursuit!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The loud roar of an engine emerged from behind Kaiba as a mechanical hand reached out to grab him. Before anyone could react, the a sight too familiar to Riga hovered in the air.

"Anubis. But that means."

"Yes, that's right!" the voice interrupted. "It's me, Gofer, your arch-enemy, yadda yadda. And I can't let you kill Kaiba. That's why I went out of my way to save him!"

Everything quickly fell into place. Riga's sword breaking wasn't luck, it was Gofer's doing with that machine of his.

"Now I'm going to take Kaiba somewhere safe, away from you."

"NO! GIVE ME BACK MY TOY!" interrupted the Mystic Elf. Gofer only replied with a quick "Silence!" before a powerful energy blast from the mecha knocked her into a building, leaving her unconscious.

"So, you're going to run like a coward?" Riga sneered. The mechanical head of Anubis nodded.

"No hard feelings! Later!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Insurance

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"DAMMIT!! GET BACK HERE!!" Riga roared. But the mechanical Anubis just flew off into the sky and did not look back...

"ArrrrrRRRGGGGHHH!!" out of anger, Riga started punching the cold hard ground as hard as possible. It didnt really help him in any way other than making his fist hurt.

Just then, the moment he raises his head off the ground, he sees a group of white-robed cultists... some of which look familiar!!

"What the? Honda? Is that you?" he asks the leader.

But Honda just responses as if he's in some kind of trance, "....LONG....LIVE....LADY...HORAKHTI!!"

"What the hell?" Riga stares into Honda's pupils... and notices they arent there! "Oh hell! They took your soul?!!"

"...GRRR.....RRAAAARRRR....HORR.....KKK...TTTIII..."

Riga recognizes that roar trying to speak in English! He turns to the strange shaped cultist with a tail sticking out and shouts, "CHAOS!! THEY GOT TO YOU TOO?!!!"

"RARRR...HORR....KKK....TII....."

"The Pharoh! WHERE IS HE?!"

Just then, Riga hears a loud almost god-like thunderous voice coming from the sky! When he looks up, he sees a certain giant golden colored dragon falling from the sky!!! He knew EXACTLY who that was!

In a heartbeat, he rushed up to Mana's unconscious body and tries to wake her up!

"Mana? Mana! Wake up! We need to get outta here now!! MANA?!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The Last God Still Standing...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Try as he might, he couldn't wake the two girls who were knocked unconscious by Anubis' energy blast. All this while a group of deranged cultists was approaching his position gave Riga one option.

He turned and ran. Ran as far as humanely possible. He figured they'd kill the girls which would buy him a bit of time, allowing him to find out exactly where Kaiba was taken. This would have been easier if he wasn't competely surrounded.

"Crap!"

The crowds were emerging from all sides, approaching like zombies. And with no weapon, Riga had no way of stopping them.

Oh how he wished Honda had kept that Chuck Norris cutout!

"Back away you mindless freaks!" Riga yelled, pushing the cultists aside with fists and feet. Unfortunately, they were too numerous, too crowded, and too forceful. There was nowhere left to go to. He was about to be overrun!

"HELP! SOMEONE! I CAN'T DIE HERE! PLEASE!"

Mana and the Mystic Elf remained in their unconsicous slumber, unable to hear Riga's pleas. This didn't sit well with him.

"Fine! You leave me one option!" he yelled, focusing on a ball of energy in his hand.

"When this energy ball explodes, we all go right to hell!" Riga yelled, hoping that it would deter the creatures.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Spur of the moment

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"WAAAIIITTTT!!! SSTTTOOOOOOPPPP!!!"

"Huh?!" Riga turns his head to whoever shouting, causing the energy ball to disappear from lack of concentration!

It's Yami! Rushing in to save the day!!!

Ra flies toward Riga and Yami, and growls "Grrr... if it isnt the Pharoh! I will take much pleasure in destroying you once and for all!!"

But Yami just grins a wicked grin, "Heh... I believe your brothers would say differently!!" and pulls out the Slifer and Obelisk god cards out of his pocket!

This only infuriated Ra even more! "NO!!! BROTHERS!!! GRRRAAARRRRR!! YOU'LL PAY FOR THAT!!! SEIZE THEM MY SERVANTS!!!"

The hundreds of cultist/zombies starting crowding around Yami! They grabbed his arms and legs!! He struggles to break free, but he cant! The mass piles on more and more... Riga tries to focus another energy ball, but unfortunately his hands are restrained by a couple more of the trancees!!

"Heheheh ha!!! And to think that mother assumed you'd be a much greater threat... TAKE THEM TO THE GREAT PILLAR!! May they serve our lady well...."

*VVVVRRRROOOOOOOMMMMMM!!!!!!!* Just then, the loud sound of an engine roaring echoed throughout the town! And to top that, a big Pinto started driving around hitting and running every single cultist slave it passes!!

The Pinto comes to a screeching halt and stops RIIIIGGGHHHTT in front of Yami and Riga! A familar face pops out of the window!

"QUICK! GET IN! DERE'S ONLY A QUARTER TANK LEFT!!!"

Riga smiled and bowed a humble bow to him, "Master Jounouchi!" But Yami just grabs his hand and pulls him to the car! Then quickly jump in, slam the doors shut, and put on their seatbelts!

Yami then notices this Pinto looks familiar, "Um... Jou... how did you get Yugi's grandpa's car?!"

"Eh, picked da lock with a coat hanger!" Jou answers, "Now c'mon! Let's get outta here!!!" and with that he crams his foot on the gas....
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The show just sucks without him!

choices: They make a run for it
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Joey hit the accelrator and watched as the Pinto moved ahead.

Well, actually, crawled ahead would be more accurate. The old Pinto's engine chugged along, barely outdistancing the running cultists.

"Jou, what the hell?"

"I dunno! It wasn't built for speed!"

The words weren't comforting to either Yugi or Honda. What it was ended up being a perfect opportunity for Ra to scoop the car in its grip and carry it off into the air!

"CRAP!"

The car was lifted higher and higher off the ground, out of the reach of the mad cultists, but also without any way of landing. There didn't seem to be any escape.

"We're screwed!" Jou yelled. Yugi however, stood still.

"Your friend isn't very good in tight spots, is he?" Riga asked.

"Nah, he's coming up with a plan! I hope..."

*******************************************************

Sigh...time for me to save these boys AGAIN!

*******************************************************

"So, uh...Yugi?!"

In the backseat was no longer the regular Yugi, or even Yami Yugi. Instead, it was the scythe-wielding girl Yugi, who cut a hole in the Pinto's roof without any hesistation.

"Damn!"

"Come!" she ordered. "We must go now!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Not as fast as he'd like...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Just then, an idea popped in Cassandra's mind! "STOP THE CAR!!!" she shouted.

"Are you kidding?!" Jou shouted, "Do you even know what's going on around us!"
"Just trust me!" she ordered, "Stop the car, so I can take out Ra?"

W w wait!! TAKE OUT RA?!! the ghost of little Yugi blurted out!

"Yep!" Cassandra grins, "He's the only god left standing! The other two werent much of a problem so-"

NOT MUCH OF A PROBLEM?!! Yami freaks out, We were chased into a piss-soaked sewer by a giant dragon that stretched over a mile long!!!!

Cassandra just shrugs, "Geez, and men complain about how WE nag!!!"

Sigh... ok ok! But how exactly are we gonna defeat Ra in the first place?!

"Uh... are you forgetting?" she reaches into her pocket... and pulls out the god cards Slifer and Obelisk!!

...T..THOSE?!

"Yep! Here goes.... SLIFER!!! OBELISK!!! I SUMMON YOU!!!"

..question is... are they obedient to their new master?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A BIG advantage!!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yami drew the two God cards, hoping that they would emerge from their cardboard prisons. Sure enough, the two monsters did emerge, directly in front of Ra.

"ATTACK!"

The two monsters began charging orbs of energy similar to the one Riga was using earlier, but on a far grander scale. Ra, not about to be outdone, responded in kind.

"This is gonna get messy, huh?" Jou asked worriedly.

All three monsters let loose their energies at the same, answering Jou's question with a thunderous KABOOM!

"AHHHHH!"

The explosion was powerful enough to rip apart the streets and sewers, along with Ra. Luckily, the force of the explosion pushed Yugi and the others far enough away, back onto the debries of the streets.

*********************************************************

Yugi awakened in control of his own body once more, concluding that the shock of the explosion must have knocked out both Yami and Cassandra. That would give him some privacy, at least for a short while.

What was more disconerting was the amount of damage that had been caused. Although Ra was no more, his card standing alongside the two others in the sewer, his dad's car, as well as an entire city block, were vaporized in the explosion.

"I...saved you."

Turning to the source of the voice, Yugi found Riga in pain, clutching his side.

"I was able to move us out of the way with a burst of energy. The force of the explosion did the rest, which is why we're bruised instead of burnt."

"Are you alright?"

"Fine, but now..."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Big explosion!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"We need to-"

"Be torn to shreds by a gigantic war-machine? I think I can help you with that!!"

Oh damn... Riga was interrupted by a familiar voice! He and Yugi look up toward the sky and see the Anbuis hovering above them!!

"Sigh... why do you even bother, Gofer?!" Riga shouts up to the robot, "You've allready seen what we did to the godcards!!"

They could hear Gofer's laughs through the interrcom! "Hahahaha! THOSE?! Eh, I dont really care much for letting others do my job!"

And with that, the robotic arm fires a lazer about a couple feet away from Yugi and Riga!!! "IT'S MUCH MORE FUN THAT WAY!!!"

Yugi starts to quiver in fear... without the Pharoh or the Solid-Edged Angel to aid him at this moment, Yugi felt alone in this crisis situation!!

"R..r...Riga!" Yugi stuttered, "That... THING'S lazer will blow us all to bits!! What should we do?!"

Riga just looked down at him with a grin, "Simple... we're gonna slice our way into that damned mechanical abomination!!"

Out of sheer terror, all Yugi could spout out was...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Can you feel it in the air tonight, oh lord?!

choices: Yami has a plan to win the game
He's nuts!  Someone stops the insanity
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?!"

Riga shook his head. "We have no choice!"

"Actually we do," replied another voice. This didn't make sense to Riga at first, but when he looked over, he saw the taller male Yugi walk forward, looking directly at the cockpit of Anubis.

"Just like the pharoah to be so reckless."

"Gofer!" yelled Yami at the cockpit. "I have a proposition for you."

"A proposition?" laughed the voice on the other end of a speaker. "What kind of proposition?"

"A game. Shoot the kid."

"I can do that now!" Gofer yelled as Anibus' weapon arm pointed right at Yami.

"I thought your master would want to get me out of the picture. The rules are simple. One shot. I won't move. All you have to do is hit me. It's just like the old days."

The robot backed up several feet and then raised its weapon arm into the air. "It's your funeral Pharoah!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The game is target practice

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Although it seemed a little TOO easy, Gofer didnt mind at all! He just pointed Anubis's blaster at Yami and fired!

*BBBBZZZZZZEEEEEOOOOMMMMM!!!!!!!*

When the smoke clears.. Yami is gone... no wait! Yami appeared on the Anubis! "Wow.. your aim is terrible."

"Wha...WHAT?! YOU SAID YOU WOULDNT MOVE!" Gofer growled. Yami just smiled, "I didnt! It must have been YOU have moved. Or are you just a really bad shot?"

After growling for a few seconds, Gofer turned the Anubis around, and fired at Yami again!

*BZZZZZZZEEEEOOOOMMMMM!!!!*

"Heh... and just like the old days, you still continue to shoot blanks!"

AGAIN Gofer missed! This time, Yami appears atop a tall building! Still, Gofer fires once more at Yami!

*BZZZZEEEEOOOMMM!!!* Yami aint there! *BZZEEEEOOOMMM!!!* He aint THERE either! *BZZZEEEEEOOOOMMMMM!!!!!* Nope! *BZZZEEEEOOOMMM!!!!*

Unknown to Gofer, Yami casted a mind trick on him to confuse the mechanical bounty hunter! There IS no Yami! He's STILL in the Millenium Puzzle!

"ARRRRGGGHHHH!!! WHERE ARE YOU???!!!!" Gofer yells... then looks down at Yugi, "YOU!!! ...YOURE doing this, arent you??!!"

Poor little Yugi could only look back in confusion, "What? Me? What are you talking about?"

"...That's it!" Gofer grins wickedly, "The wearer of the Puzzle! Youre the one giving Yami his power! I destory YOU and there'll be no Yami!!"

"WHAT?!! NO!! DONT!!!"

But just as Gofer points his blaster at Yugi... the Puzzle begins to glow... a strange eerie light...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: You cant see me....IIII O_O 0IIII0 O_O IIII

choices: Back to work!  This city isn't gonna save itself!
What IS Cassandra planning to do with Gofer anyway?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The puzzle glowed eerily in the artifical lights of the robot. As the group looked on, the robot went dead, crashing to the ground with a thud. Running over to the cockpit, Riga was shocked to find Anubis was completely gone.

"He vanished? Where in the bloody world is he?"

Jounouchi just stared on. "Canada?"

*********************************************************

"Where the hell am I?

Wherever Gofer was, it was an unfamiliar place. Stairs were placed forwards and backwards, moving in endless places. He was standing on a flat surface, alone with...

*BOOM!*

"So you were stealing souls!"

Gofer gulped as he looked up in the air. A blonde women with a pair of glasses and the biggest scythe he had even seen was towering over him as if he were an ant. On her shoulder, an uneasy Yami rested, looking down.

"Hey! Can't we talk this out?"

"Well, we could," grinned Cassandra as she began moving her scythe, "but personally, this is much more fun!"

*******************************************************

"Which Yugi is it?"

"Well, it looks like a guy, and he's short. I think it's the regular one."

Yugi groaned as he got up to his feet, looking around. "Where am I?"

"The street," interrupted Riga as he walked up to the dazed boy. "You, or should I say the Pharoah, showed great courage and blatant disregard for your lives as you fought Gofer.

"That explains the noise in the puzzle," Yugi replied.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Vengance upon thee...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
In an instant, Yugi can sense Yami's presence again!
Yugi. Are you ok?

"Yami?! ...YAMI! YOURE OK!! Uh... what happened to that Gofer guy?"
That punk wont be bothering us any longer!

"Allright," Jou smile, "We defeated the God Cards AND got rid of that freaky guy in a Megazord! We're on a roll!"
"Be that as it may, Master Jounouichi," Riga says, "we still have to save the rest of the city.."

Yugi nods, "Right! The other guys are in danger! We gotta save them!"
Hmm... but where should we start

"EEEEEEEEKKKKKKK!!!!!!!"

Uh oh! That sounded like a woman's shriek! The three of them lift their heads up in the air to see where that shriek came from...
A red-haired man in a white coat hovering in the air with a knife to a woman's throat... wait a second! That woman... she looks familiar!

NO!!! CASSANDRA!!!
"Huh? Cassandra?"

Jou just whistled, "Whew! THAT'S Cassandra? She is HOT... oh! I mean... NO! LET HER GO!"

The man just stared into their souls with his blood-red eyes and spoke in a calm yet eerie voice, "So... the hired assassin failed. What a shame. Thank God he never joined the Union!"

Riga stared up at this man, "Who are you?! ANSWER ME!"

"I am Sadri H'Thiara! The messenger of the Mistress. I serve the will of the Creator of Light... and she is displeased by your actions!" Sadri begins to tighten the grip around Cassandra's neck!
"Urrggghh!! ..Y...Yami!...Run!"

LET HER GO! NOW!!!! Although Yami wasnt in control of Yugi's body, Sadri could still hear his voice.
"Absolutely," Sadri says, "However, for that, we require a favor."

"What do you want, Sadri?" Yugi demanded.

"...The one that aided us," Sadri answered, "In our quest for purificating the planet: SETO KAIBA!!"
"W w wait! Rich Boy?" Jou asks, "Why HIM?"
"Lady H needs him... as the ultimate sacrifice for bringing her into this world! Give us the Sacrifice, and I shall give you the maiden!"

Cassandra continues to struggle, "N...NO!!! DONT DO IT!! FORGET ABOUT ME... AHH!!" Sadri then puts the knife in her mouth! "We did not give you permission to speak out of term! Be silent, or we will cut that disobedient tounge of yours out!!"

DONT YOU LAY A FINGER ON HER!!!
"Whoa.. Yami?" Yugi notices the Pharoh's sudden interest in her, "Wow, I didnt actually think you'd feel that way about anybody before!"
Uh.. I dont! No! Of course not! I, the Great Pharoh, do not need to sully my hands for a WOMAN! It's just.... uh... um.... that is...

"You have 24 hours!" Sadri interrupts, "If youre not at the Great Pillar with the Sacrifice ready by then... God will be weeping over yet ANOTHER angel lost! Adieu!"

----BBBZZZZEEEEEEEOOOMMMM!!!!----
In a blast of shining bright light, Sadri and Cassandra are gone.

Riga starts punching the ground, "Damn damn damn DAMN DAAAAMMMNN!!! First Gofer and the Gods, now THIS!"
"Where are we gonna find Kaiba?" Yugi wonders, "That Gofer guy never said where he left him!"
"Grrr... man dis is REALLY startin to piss me off!" Jou roars. Out of anger, he punches a trash can as hard as he can!

"OOWWWWW!!!"

That 'Ow' didnt come from Jou. It came from that trash can!! "...Huh? Yugi, Riga! Did any of ya hear that?"
"Hmmm..." the three stare at the can in total silence... they both whisper on the count of three.. and lift the top right off the can!!!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: An Allmighty Hostage Negotiation...

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The can was opened, revealing a shivering, pathetic figure that suddenly lashed out at Riga, jumping up.

"Kaiba. We meet again," Riga nonchalantly declared.

Kaiba sneered at the group in front of him, even as Yami began approaching him.

"You realize what's happening, right?"

"Yeah, I do," Kaiba replied. "I'm leaving. This city is a big deathtrap!"

"Hey!" Honda yelled. "This crap is all your fault! You can't just..."

"I can and I will. And if you don't like it, kiss my..."

Kaiba's taunting was met with a forceful slap from Riga, who stared at the cocky industrialist with cold eyes.

"What?" Kaiba asked, unimpressed.

"You are needed to aid us. Whether you want to or not!" Naturally Kaiba didn't take well to this, but in his already annoyed state of mind, he simply went inside a building.

"I'm going to figure out the nearest exit to this city. No one else comes in!" he shouted.

"Or else what?" replied Jou.

Laughing at the group, Kaiba placed a rather familiar cardboard cutout near the door of the darkened rooms. "Or else you'll deal with Chuck Norris."

Yugi, Honda, and Jounouchi just stared, worried about Kaiba's mental health in the face of all this pressure. But Riga showed no concern.

"You're coming with us whether you want to or not!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: One piece of the puzzle

choices: You heard him! He wont cheat!
Screw the rules, he has money!
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Honda, Jou, and Riga prepared to plow through the little cut out.. however... just the glare on Chuck Norris' face caused them to freeze in terror...

"Uh...g...guys?" Jou looked at the others, "F...for some reason, I REALLY dont wanna be near that thing!"
"So it is true," Riga sighed, "about the awesome of the Great Chuck Norris. It seems we will never be able to pass."

Yami couldnt help but just stare in disgust and Yugi's friends are frozen stiff by the stare of a cardboard cut-out, "Um... theyre joking, right?"

Yugi on the other hand, was well aware of the threat the Norris could bring. Nevertheless, he slowly approached it and swallowed hard.
"Um... Mr. Norris," Yugi looked at the cut-out, "look, I know youre supposed to protect Kaiba, but... cant you see the whole world is in danger? A great threat is going to rise up and dominate mankind! Youre a goodguy! I know you cant let that happen! Which is why we need Seto to help us."
"...What the hell are you doing?"
"SSHHH!!!" Yugi shushed the Pharoh, "So, please Mr. Norris... we need your help... let me cross so that I can talk to him."
There was a moment of silence....

*WOOOSSHHH!!!* Suddenly, a strange gust of wind blew Chuck away from the door, allowing Yugi to pass.
"Gee! Thanks Mr. Norris!" Yugi smiled and walked in.
The others were about to step in as well, but...
*WOOOSSHH!!* Another gust of wind blew Chuck back in the way of the door blocking them out!

"Hey! What happened?" Honda wondered.
"It appears the Norris wants Yugi to deal with Kaiba alone," Riga said.

As for Yugi... he finally caught up with that conceited punk, Kaiba! "KAIBA!!! STOP!!!"

"What the?!" Seto turned his head shocked to see Yugi, "But...but how did you get past-"
The short guy just sighed, "Look, Kaiba... whether you like it or not, youre a part of this! So please, come with us to stop Horakhti..."
YU-GI-OOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHH!!!!
"Or we'll hand her your corpse!!" Yami threatened, obviously only scaring the rich snob even more!
********
After reverting back to regular Yugi, he whispered to the Pharoh, "No, Yami! Ive got this one!"
B...but Yugi...

The short guy stared into Seto's eyes... and had an idea! He knew EXACTLY what this punk wanted! And he was just about to give it to him!
"...How's about we duel? If I win, you come with us whether you like it or not!"

No matter what hell he's been through, what creatures kicked his ass, what giant blue chicks chased after his pure naked body... in the end, Seto Kaiba just CANT resist a duel with his greatest rival!

"You know what? ...You got yourself a deal! But if I win, you declare ME the King of Games, you officially retire from Duel Monsters, AND... you leave me the hell alone!"

Yugi nodded, "Deal. But only on the condition that you dont cheat this time!"
Seto just shook his head, "I was an arrogant fool to resort to narrow-handed tactics to try and beat my greatest rival! No... this time it's gonna be an honorable duel! You have my word that it'll be a fair fight!"

....he doesnt cheat, does he?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The Rival battle to end all Rival battles

choices: She's going to make something happen to Kaiba's cards
She's going to make something happen to him.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Kaiba quickly drew his deck, as he had done thousands of times before. This time however, he had decided on a less traceable insurance policy, legal cards hidden under his sleeves and inside his duel disk.

The rich boy knew what he had said to Yugi, and to be frank, could care less. He wanted to win at any cost, even if that meant cheating to do so. So with the idiot King of Games having naively accepted Kaiba's promise, he drew the requisite five cards from his deck.

One Blue Eyes, and a few burner cards. Perfect.

"I summon Berserk Gorilla in attack mode!" Kaiba shouted, as the 2000ATK creature made its way to the field. As he looked at his duel disk, Kaiba smiled at the card that he kept underneath the holding slot.

Yugi stared intently, waiting to make his next move. It made sense that Kaiba would try to mount a strong offense immediately to prevent Yugi from chaining cards, but...

He's cheating again.

Cassandra?

Kaiba has cards under his duel disk, and up his sleeve. The little punk is cheating again!

How can you...

Honey, I've judged the best con artists and slickest salesmen in history. Your obnoxious friend is easy to read.

What do we do? You're not going to help me cheat are you?

Of course not. But I think I CAN throw a little wrench into Kaiba's plan.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Cheaters never learn...and never prosper either

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Kaiba points at Yugi and calls out to his monster, "Now Bezerk Gorilla! Activate your special ability!"
However the big ape responds in kind... by turning his head to Seto and growling at him!

"What are you doing?!" Kaiba questions him, "I am your master! I summoned you! Now do as I say!"

"GRRROOORRRWWWWW!!!!!!" with one loud angry growl, Bezerk Gorilla picks the rich cheater off the ground!!
"Grr!! Let go of me!!" Seto shouts, "I despised being touched by people who dont have money!"
"RROOAARR!! CHHH...EAAAATTTER!!!"

Yugi stares at it strangely, "Uh.. did it just say 'cheater'?"
Judging by the gorilla's next actions... it probably did! The big thing held Seto upside down and shook him for a while until cards started falling out of his pockets and jacket!

Yugi took a look at all these cards that fell out.. "What? Harpie's Feather Duster? Raigeki? Trap Hole? What were they doing in your pockets?"
"Uh... I um... have way too many cards.. you know, being so rich and powerful that I am, that I cant fit them all into my deck!"

That's when Yugi found THE cheater card on the ground... "...BRAIN SCRAMBLE!! That card's what got us in this mess in the first place!! You were gonna cheat AGAIN, werent you?!"

That's right, Yugi! He was! Luckily, Cassandra was able to expose the fraud that he is!
"Cassandra? She's here? But I thought-"
Yeah, it's me, Yugi! Listen, I cant hold contact forever! You gotta get Seto to the Pillar and-
Who are you talking to?!

Uh oh... little Yugi heard yet ANOTHER voice in his head... Sadri's!
Yugi could almost hear Cassandra starting to shiver in fear of this person...
W w w wait...It's... It's not what it looks like! I was just-
Trying to cheat? The damsel in distress is not allowed to come in contact with the brave knight! We do not tolerate cheating...
Wait, no, I-WAAAAAHHHH!
Pharoh. You were supposed to fetch us the sacrifice on your own. But because of your lass' interfering, you now only have TWELVE hours to save her! If it happens again, you'll only get the opportunity to save her disfigured torso!

Aw, damn Seto! If he wasnt such a damn cheater, Yugi would still have plenty of time to save Cassandra! But now that his time limit's cut in half, he's gonna have to rush Kaiba!

Speaking of which, the Bezerk Gorilla is still gripping the punk in anger!
"RARRRRRR!! CHHEEATTTERR!!! BAD!!!!"

Yugi just grips his fists tightly and stomps toward Kaiba, "That is IT! Ive had ENOUGH of this!! Seto, I am sick and tired of your little attitude! Because of YOU, someone's life in danger right now! I am not gonna ask again! Come with us NOW!! Dont make me get Yami on you!!!"

Seto just looks back at the little while still in the grip of the Bezerk Gorilla... "...Who the hell's 'Yami'?"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Crime and Punishment

choices: The two are able to have a calm discussion about what's happening
Kaiba needs to be carried out kicking and screaming
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Kaiba groaned, having been found out. Yugi didn't really know what to say, whether or not he should have been glad that Cassandra risked her neck to contact him from her captured location. And with time running out, he had little idea of what to do.

"Look, I have a better idea Yugi. I plan to cut my losses!"

"What?" Yugi asked confused even as the big ape held him aloft.

"Look, I need to get to my office downtown. From there, I have a plan to end all this crap."

"What plan?" Yugi asked.

"Well, you know how the city's power grid is set up?"

This cannot end well...{/I]

"I was thinking, I can hack into the city's power grid and cause an explosion that will wipe the entire city off the map! Goodbye giant duel monster girls, goodbye people trying to kill us!"

Yugi stared on dumbfounded. Of all the cowardly, overblown plans to save his ass...

It was enough to force an enraged Yami out.

"YOU DON'T GET IT, DO YOU YOU SELFISH LITTLE TWAT?!" the furious Yami yelled. "NO MATTER HOW MUCH PROPERTY YOU DESTROY, CARDS YOU USE TO CHEAT, OR CARDBOARD CUTOUTS YOU HAVE FOR PROTECTION, YOU'RE NOT GOING TO ESCAPE THE FACT THIS IS YOUR DAMN FAULT!"

Kaiba stared at the yelling Yami, unsure of what to say.

"I..."

"Look, if it wasn't for you, Mana wouldn't be here. And if Mana didn't show up, none of the other crap would have happened either. This is your fault, whether you want to admit it or not."

Kaiba still remained silent, looking out the window for a few moments before finally replying.

"I don't want to die. I'm too young," he replied in a soft, almost apologetic tone.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: That's REALLY excessive!

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Strange. This isnt the way a punk like Seto normally acts... Perhaps maybe just a brief talk with the little-Yugi might calm everything down.

Yugi just breathes heavily and tries to have a civilized talk with the man that's necessary to save a friend's life. "Look! I know youre scared. We all are. But-"

"They took Mokuba," Kaiba interrupted, "the only family I had... and I knew they were gonna come after me to!"
And with that, Kaiba has a flashback...

**************

Hours ago, after trying to escape from that gigantic blue bitch I saw a shining bright in the horizon. I had a feeling it had something to do with what going on in this city, so I went and checked it out!
There were hundred of weirdos in black robes gathering around a huge pillar... my brother was at the top of that pillar! Grabbed by some other weirdo with wires sticking out of his body!

"I wont ask you again," I heard him say to my brother, "WHERE IS HE?!!" Mokuba just looked him in the eye and said "I'll never you my brother is!! And once he finds out what youre doing to me, he's gonna make you pay!"
The man just grinned, "Oh... we got ways of making you talk, little boy!"
"...Dont bother," I saw a red-haired man speak up, "It's obvious he wont cooperate. And if he's not good for spilling the beans... he's only good for one thing!"

That's when I saw the punk toss my brother into that bright light! I could hear his scream "BIG BROOOOOTTTHHHEERRRR!!!" echo in my head!
"MOKUBA!!" I shouted back.. but unfortunately, the weirdos in black spotted me!

I saw that red-head point to my direction and shout, "THERE! THERE HE IS!"

**************

"I ran... ran like a coward.. unable to save his only brother.." Seto lowered his head in shame. The Bezerk Gorilla sniffed a little and wiped a tear from his eye.

So.. it seems rich-boy DOES have a heart after all. Like my own personal belief, he's just a coward unable to accept his role in life... ESPECIALLY when family's involved!

Yugi pats him on the back, "Well, think about your brother. Would he just want you to roll over and die?"
"..Huh..?"
"C'mon Kaiba!" Yugi tells him, "Dont you even remember Duelist Kingdom?"
"Well yeah, but-"
"That's the thing! Mokuba's got high faith in you! He knows youre not the type to just run away with your tail between your legs. Youre the type to look danger straight in the eye and kick it's ass!"

Seto remains silent for a few moments as Yugi continues, "You know these creeps dont deserve to get their way! Come with me, fellow Champion! Together we'll make 'em pay! So what do you say? Let's do it for your brother?"

Sure enough, that motivation is JUST Kaiba needs to lift his spirits! Although he hates to admit it, Yugi's right! This isnt the kind of thing Kaiba does! He's arrogant, stubborn, pig-headed, cold-hearted, rude, bitter, absurd, a cheater, stupid, ugly... but no matter what, he is NO coward!!!

Seto, trying to retain his cool genre, quickly changes the sad expression on his face into an angry impatient glare! "...What the hell are we doing standing around with thumbs up our asses?! We got a job to do, dont we?!"
Yugi smiles and nods his head, "That we do, Seto! That we do..."
"...Who said you of all people have earned the right to call me by my birth-name?!"

Uh...ANYWAY, the two Champs followed by their monkey-friend march out of that building...
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The OTHER side of a spoiled brat

choices: Switch back to Anzu and Mana
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Ripping the outfit he wore to shreds as he ran, the powerful Black Luster Soldier swore viciously as he raced away from the giantesses.

"This isn't right! If the Envoys aren't allowed to keep the balance between the worlds, then the natural order is upset! I've got to remedy this...but how?"

The question that had been bothering him was, why hadn't Kaiba's machine worked? If he could fix its flaw, then he could enlist an ally to keep these girls under control.

Returning to the Kaibacorp lab, he looked over the settings Kaiba had created to open the rift between the worlds. Everything seemed in order...why hadn't the Dragon been able to emerge?

He did a simple term check for any information on his beastly counterpart. There were several files, but one caught his eye: Banned/Forbidden List.

Of course! The Chaos Emperor Dragon card was deemed too powerful by Industrial Illusions, and was banned from play in major tournaments. That's why it hadn't been summoned with Kaiba's machine: the arena wasn't allowed to let that creature on the field. The whole had been opened, though, and the Mystical Elf was able to come out.

"Well, then, all I need is to find a monster from this machine's memory files, and bring it to this world to aid me. But it must be a creature I could control, or bargin with. What other duels have been had in this arena?"

He brought up the files:

REX RAPTOR v. WEEVIL UNDERWOOD

"Hmmm...no, that won't do. Dinosaurs are mindless beasts, and insects aren't much better."

ESPA ROBA v. MAKO TSUNAMI

"Robots are easy to outwit, and fish are worthless on dry land...next..."

RYOU BAKURA v. MAI VALENTINE

"Ha! As though Necrofear and her ghosts are to be trusted. But...the Harpie Lady Sisters? Perfect; three for the price of one!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Fighting Fire with Feathers

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Reworking the machinery controls, the Black Luster Soldier began looking through the dueling information as he prepared to contact the Harpies. For curiosity's sake, he also looked at the Banned/Restricted List.

"All the good ones. No wonder so many of these monsters have been left idle lately."

Eventually, after a few minutes, he had reprogrammed the machine to its exact specifications as before, with one exception. No other monsters were on the field other than the Harpies.

"This has to work! If the ultimate technique of the Envoys cannot damage these monsters, I am left with only this option!"

Wasting no time, he flipped the switch, praying for success.

Unfortunately, when he looked into the hole that formed, the monster emerging was not the Harpy Lady Sisters. No, in fact the creature was something else altogether.

"Impossible! My calcuations were perfect! How could something have gone wrong?!"

Looking around, the once-feared Black Luster Soldier had come to one conclusion. Without another monster on the Harpy's side, the balance of the previous warp had been thrown off, resulting in a random monster emerging.

"No, this cannot be!"

Unknown to all the major players in our little story, they were all being watched from the deepest, foulest reaches of the other realm, a place where all but the mightiest monsters feared to tread, and where only one would make his home.

The Five God Dragon, the final guardian of the passegway between the human and shadow realms, and the superior of the Envoys themselves. All five of his heads viewed all the events as they unfolded.

"Madness!" began the first head. "If left there, those soul-equipped Duel Monsters may achieve power exceeding our own!"

"It already seems that our faith in the Envoys was misplaced," added the second head.

"I warned you about Riga," added the fourth head. "All bark and no bite. He's been turned into the personal plaything of renegades from our world."

The third head quickly shot back. "This process was unknown to even the Egyptian Gods. Now is not the time for idle bickering!"

All four heads nodded as the fifth spoke. "We may soon be required to break the commandment Pharoah gave us before his soul went to rest. We may have to stop them ourselves."

"This requires heavy debate," began the first head. All the others agreed.

**************************************************

Riga was unaware of this, and even if he did know, he was too worried about what was in front of him to focus on it. The enormous Injection Fairy Lily had revealed her trademark needle and began poking him with it.

"OW! STOP THAT!"

"You used to be such a big bully to everyone!" replied Lily as she continued to poke him. "You wouldn't let anyone look at this world and you acted like a jerk just because you guarded a portal. Well now you're just a little bug!"

"Bug, am I?" angrily replied Riga as he stood to his feet, however, the quick drop of Lily's boot took the fight out of him completely.

"A tiny mean bug! So now I'm gonna do something you never let me do before!"

"What's that?"

Grinning, she raised her needle and approached Riga. "We're gonna play 'Doctor.'"

Riga gulped in fear.

The three girls left the building to begin searching for Jououchi and Kaiba, but they hadn't walked a block from Kaibaland when an onslaught of helicopters, cars, and vans came to meet them.

"The cops?" asked Anzu, worried.

"Nope," replied Mana. "The press. The same ones I ran into this morning."

The three girls could only stare in confusion as reporters from just about every major news station in the country, and even some belonging to cable networks, went up to them and started asking questions.

"Lenny McGulk, Channel 10! How did you girls get like this?"

"Brenda Starr, Channel 5! Don't you believe that this is a bit extreme?"

"Bill O' Riley, Fox News! What do you say to people that think giant girls are the number #1 cause of idencency in the world today! I've got the numbers to prove it!"

The entire group sweatdropped.

From beyond the army of reporters, Kaiba and Jououchi grinned.

"Now what Mr. Informant?"

"We watch the fireworks. Consider it payback for them playing dress-up with us."

Lily began giggling. The once mighty bully Riga had been turned into her personal plaything. And now she was about to put him in her place.

Riga on the other hand, had been devestated, with huge holes in his body courtesy of Lily's giant needle.

But just as she reached for him, another round of lightning bolts surrounded the area, as the previous times a Duel Monster was summoned. But this monster wasn't human.

Although still paralyzed, Riga silently praised his rescuer.

"WHO DARES TO LEAVE THE REALM OF DARKNESS?!"

Lily, despite her new size and power, was terrified of the gigantic Five God Dragon. At over 1000 feet tall, the beast possessed power unfathomable to the other monsters.

Lily did the only thing she could. She backed into a corner at the threat.

The five heads all began looking around the arena. The heads of flame, light, dark, steel, and electricity all began scouring the area. The head of steel noticed the limp and lifeless Riga.

"You failed to protect the gates between realms! You have failed us, and you have failed the Pharoah. For that, you shall die!"

Riga struggled, but it was no use. Immediately, the steel head fired a powerful blue laser from its mouth, which immediately vaporized him the second it came in contact with him.

With the task of punishing the failed Envoy, the five heads now turned to Lily. Standing in the corner, Lily had noticed a few things, among them the ease of Riga's destruction, and the fact that somehow, she had grown since she first arrived in the mortal realm.

"I will spare your life, child, if you tell me everything about what happened here today."

The head of flame arose, and opened its mouth towards the roof, burning a hole large enough for it to escape from. Taking flight, the body lifted off from Kaibaland while Lily held on for dear life.

In the middle of the now chocolate city, Mana, Shizuki, and Anzu were eating their fill of chocolate buildings, people, and vehicles. Yugi and Honda could only watch astonished as the gargantuan girls devoured what was once a bustling metropolis. Oddly enough, the girls weren't getting fatter, but rather taller, and to a certain degree, curvier.

"Is there anything you can't do?" asked Anzu as she began snacking on a chocolate skyscraper.

Mana shook her head. "Actually, I couldn't do any of these things until I came into your world. The same energy that's making me so big has also amplified my powers. And I'm only getting stronger."

Yugi on the other hand, was competely in awe by the appetities of the three giantesses. "You girls sure can eat..."

"Oh, jealous that we're not paying attention to you?" cooed Mana as she picked Yugi up and licked him, covering the duelist in her saliva. "Don't worry, you taste good too."

"Much worse."

Landing in the empty streets, the 1000 foot tall dragon stood its ground as Lily hurriedly ran off to fufill her objective. The girls all stood still, unsure of what to do or say.

After about another hour of playing with the galaxy, the girls decided it would be high time to return everything to normal. So with a simple wave of a hand, they had all returned to Earth normal sized, it, along with the rest of the solar system, returned to normal.

Nearly all of the devoured people shrugged off the events as a hallucination and went about their lives, while Kaiba and Jououchi landed in the Kaibaland building with the others, still in their doll clothes.

"Please don't tell anyone what happened today," began Kaiba. "I'll give you a lot of money if you don't."

The next day, school had started for Yugi, and he was sitting in his world history class, looking over some notes. The giant Dark Magician Girl had left town according to the papers, but Yugi knew better.

Into the door walked a very familiar woman, dressed in a seductive skirt and suit. Yugi grinned.

"The most powerful being in the world, and she couldn't come up with anything more original?"

"Hello everyone. I'm your new teacher, Mana Cireku." Walking up to Yugi, she whispered "You didn't think I'd just leave you alone, now did you?"

"I'm not original enough eh? Just wait till after class, hehehe..."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The end

"Well," began Lily as she finished the last bite of the chocolate sun, "that was fun."

"Yeah, but it's kinda impersonal," replied Anzu. "We should head back."

The others nodded, and with a wave of a hand, everyone was back on Earth in the Kaibaland building, with all the buildings and such restored. Even Kaiba and Jououchi had returned, although still in their ridiculous outfits from earlier.

"So we can grow as big as we want?" asked Lily. Mana nodded.

"The whole universe is our dollhouse now."

"Heheh, so, you girls wanna get together tomorrow?" asked Shizuka. The others all nodded.

"What about us?" asked a worried Jououchi.

"Oh, you don't think we'd let our dolls out of the fun, now would we?" replied Anzu.

The guys all gulped.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Not the end

choices: Lily plays Doctor with Jououchi and Kaiba
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Anzu, Shizuki, Mana and Lily all walked off in seperate directions to get some sleep. Yugi went with Mana. Anzu was miffed at that, but decided not to fight with her fellow goddess. Jououchi was taken by Lily, as was Kaiba. Shizuki took the Chaos Emperor Dragon, who no longer tried to take off the bow off its head. All four girls slept outside of the city.
Mana was sleeping by the lake that she had taken a bath in that morning. Anzu found a nice abandoned farm to sleep at. At least...she thought it was abanadoned. A teenage boy came out of the barn to look at the giant Anzu.
"Hello there" said Anzu.
"Ermm...Hi" said the teenager nervously. He looked to be around 15 or 17. He had short red hair and fair skin, and dark blue eyes. He wore what looked like rags.
"Who are you and why are you dressed like that?" asked Anzu.
"I'm Kevin McGivers" said the teenager. "I'm a tourist from America. And I'm wearing these clothes because...I ran out of money. Who are you?"
"I'm Anzu" said Anzu.
Kevin's eyes grew wide.
"Hold it...weren't you one of the giant girls?" asked Kevin. Anzu smiled and nodded. She then picked up Kevin and hugged him.
"Looks like I got a new doll" said Anzu. Kevin winced when he was called a doll, but decided not to argue with a 200-foot-tall woman.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A new doll

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Of all the characters in this story, it was incredibly obvious that Kaiba and Jououchi took the news of the girls becoming all-powerful goddesses the worst. This came to a head when instead of being able to go home, they were taken by the gigantic Lily to a spot outside the city. Kaiba was enraged at the idea of being considered a mere toy, while Jououchi was more peeved that Yugi and the Chaos Emperor Dragon had taken the affection of the goddesses.

Either way, it sucked. And as soon as Lily led them to an empty clearing where she planned to sleep for the night, it only got worse.

"Who wants to play 'Doctor' before we go to sleep?" playfully asked Lily as she raised her hand. Kaiba went to object, only to find that somehow, a piece of tape was on his mouth.

"No objections? OK! Let's start!"

With speed disproportionate to her size, Lily lifted up both Kaiba and Jou and stripped them down to their boxers. They both winced as Lily ran her huge finger over their bodies.

"Oooh, you boys look nice and healthy, except..."

"Except?" asked Jououchi.

"I think you two need a shot." Raising up her huge needle, both of them grimaced.

Jou sighed, realizing that the girls were pretty much in charge from here on out.

"I wonder how the others are doing. I hope they're not having fun."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Lily's operation

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yugi was looking into Mana's gigantic eyes. He couldn't believe that was she a goddess now, but he couldn't deny it. Mana was examining Yugi's puzzle around his neck.
"This looks familiar" said Mana. "Oh! You always wore it whenever you dueled. And...the Pharoah is in the puzzle"
"Got it on the first try" said Yugi.
"Of course I did" said Mana. "for I am an all-knowing, all-seeing goddess now. You can't hide nothing from me, my little Yugi-kun"
"So...now that you're a goddess, what are you gonna do?" asked Yugi.
"Have fun" said Mana. "maybe demand worshippers" she giggled.
"Wait a minute" said Yugi. "there should be five of you"
"What?"
"Well...when you defeated the Five God Dragon, you turned into a Goddess. So...where is the other goddess?" asked Yugi.
"I see what you mean" said Mana. "maybe there's a fifth goddess...I think she would be in my world, whoever she is"
"Probably right..." said Yugi.
"Now" said Mana. "you're wondering why we don't gain weight when we eat food. Well, us Goddess's have to keep our girlish figure!"
"How..?"
"I told you, little Yugi-kun" said Mana. "I'm a goddess now. I can read your mind...or should I say minds in your case..and every mortal's mind. There are 15 billion people making love now, 2,800 robberies taking place, 500,000 are...well, you get the point. Now, it's time for me to have more fun with my little Yugi-kun!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A fifth goddess

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Life has a way of balancing itself out.

When the Five God Dragon fell to the attack of Mana and her friends, the energies of each head, now free from their constraints, found new vessels to carry and use their awesome power. The first four entered the bodies of Mana, Lily, Shizuki, and Anzu, turning them from normal Duel Monsters and a mortal to all-powerful goddesses.

But the energies of the Head of Flame did not follow the other four. It went out, trapped between worlds, looking for a suitable host. Once again, the issue of balance played itself out, as its former host was masculine, its new host would be feminine in nature.

Finally, after a short while of looking, it found a host, and entered her body.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The fifth goddess revealed

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content: Finding its target in the mortal realm, the energies of the head left its existence between space, and entered the vessel it had targeted. The fifth goddess would soon be born.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A selection chapter this late?  Oh noes!

choices: What does Mai do with her 'toy'?
See how Lily's operation is going
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Mai Valentine was driving her car down the road beside a beach when it happened. It struck the duelist like a bolt of lightning. Mai felt a tingle in her head. At first, it was far too faint for her to feel. Then, the tingle grew stronger and stronger, until Mai felt the throbbing pain. Then, the pain turned into power. Mai felt more stronger, more smarter and more....bigger. Indeed, she was 5 inches taller than she had been earlier. She decided to pull over and got out of her car. That's when Mai really felt the energy surge through her. Suddenly, she knew what everybody was doing in the world. She knew every thought, every emotion, everything was an open book to her now.
"What..is happening to me?" asked Mai.
Just then, a teenage boy came up to her from the beach. Mai attracted teenage boys quite easily, seeing as Mai was a beautiful woman.
"Hey, babe" said the teenager.
"Leave me alone" said Mai. Then, the teenager vanished into thin air. Mai blinked, not believing what had just happened. Where had the teenager went? Mai had sent the teenager back to where he came from. Mai realized this a minute later. She was now 15 feet tall, her clothes grew with her.
Mai got a wicked grin on her face. She didn't knew how, but she was now a Goddess. And she wasn't alone. There were 4 other girls blessed with the power of a goddess. Mai summoned back the teenager that had called her babe. The teenager looked confused, then he noticed the 20-foot tall Mai.
"Hiya" said the teenager nervously.
"Hi yourself" said Mai. "how would you like to be my toy?"
"Err.." said the teenager.
Mai picked up the teenager and brought him to her beautiful face.
"It's not like you have a choice here" said Mai.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Mai the Goddess

choices: Everyone meets up in the morning
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Kaiba groaned, while Jououchi moaned in pain. During the past 30 minutes, Lily had examined the two, injected them with something that had kept them from moving without her approval, and finally, she tested their reflexes, by placing them underfoot and adding pressure. According to Lily, this was to make sure the boys were healthy for what promised to be a rough day of play with the four goddesses in the morning, but Kaiba knew better. It was torture because he wasn't cute like Yugi.

"Let it end, please..." moaned Jououchi.

"Oh, but we're not done yet," replied Lily. "You're not dressed for bed yet."

Kaiba would have shot back with a long list of swear words had his mouth not been taped shut. But he was still horrified by the sight of two blue children's pajamas, complete with foot stockings.

"Time to get my dolls are dressed up for bed!"

"Is there a point to this?" asked Jououchi.

"My patients have to be well dressed for the occasion."

The both groaned, but were powerless to stop Lily as she changed them into the pajamas.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The operation was a success

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Mai wondered what to do with her new 'toy'. The teenager in her hand wore an expression that was mixed with fear and excitement. Mai had grown to 100 feet by now.
"You look like a little doll to me" said Mai. "I just love to dress my dolls" with that, Mai summoned up a sailor suit. The teenager struggled uselessly as Mai ripped his clothes off, and dressed him in the sailor suit. The teenager felt embrassed for looking like Donald Duck.
"There, that's better" said Mai. "you look handsome"
Mai looked down to her tiny car that looked like a toy also. She picked up her own car. Her purse was in the car. She pointed to her purse, which grew. The purse grew so that it would be a normal size purse for a 100-foot-tall person.
"How..are you doing all this?" asked the teenager.
"I am a Goddess" said Mai.
"G-Goddess?" asked the teenager in awe.
"That's right" said Mai, putting her car in her now enlarged purse.
"Should I worship you?" asked the teenager faintly.
"Only if you want to" said Mai. "Now, it's getting late. You better sleep in here" Mai placed her little sailor inside her purse.
Mai walked down the beach, continuing to grow.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Sailor

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Day finally broke over the city, although the reactions were mixed as some awoke. Yugi and Mana clearly enjoyed their night together and didn't want to awaken, but finally arose from their resting place in order to get washed up. Honda, who thought he had it bad, was actually enjoying his night with the affectionate Shizkui, who had made sure both he and the Chaos Emperor Dragon were comftorable before kissing them goodnight. Anzu was getting to know her new doll better, but although she liked him, he was no subsitute for Yugi. As for Kaiba and Jououchi, well, the less said about them, the better.

Eventually, however, day broke, and after washing up and eating a morning meal, the four girls met back at Kaibaland. At this point the press was convinced they were tourist attractions for Seto Kaiba, and after reporters who harrased them reported hallucinating being turned into chocolate and eaten, left the girls to their fun.

Mana happily stretched her body as she entered the building. "Oh, I've never slept that well in my life!"

"Me either," added Yugi, giggling.

Anzu, trying to hold back a hint of jealousy, showed the group her new doll.

"This is Kevin, my new doll. He's nice, but I think he needs new clothes."

Shizuka and Lily both "oohed at the sight while they showed off their playmates and described their nights.

"This realmn is so much more peaceful and serene than the realmn of shadow," began Shizuki. "I'm going to enjoy staying here."

"Same here," added Lily, holding up the still pajama clad Kaiba and Jououchi. Both the other guys and girls couldn't help but laugh out loud.

"You think they'll ever let up?" asked a desperate Kaiba.

"For both our sakes, I hope so."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Good morning...or not so good morning

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Suddenly, the ground shook. Anzu and the other 3 goddess's looked up to see a 200-foot-tall Mai coming towards them.
"Hey Mai" said Anzu. "I see that you're a goddess as well"
"Of course" said Mai. "what happened?"
Anzu, Shizuki, Lily and Mana told Mai of how they became goddess's. Mai's eyes grew wide as Anzu told her that she ate the chocolate world.
"So..it wasn't a dream I had" said Mai.
The 5 Goddess's each showed thier dolls to each other. Anzu summoned jester's clothes for Kevin.
"Kaiba..." laughed Mai when he saw the tiny owner of Kaibaland. "you look so cute, I could eat you up!"
"So, what should we do today?" asked Shizuki.
"I don't know" said Mana. "what could top eating the solar system?"
"Eating the universe!" said Lily. Everybody laughed.
While the 5 goddess's were discussing on what to do, nobody noticed a shadowy figure watching. Not even the new goddess's noticed the figure, which was highly unusual.
Kevin struggled as Anzu put on his jester's outfit.
"Well, I have a good idea" said Mai. "why not hold a duel monster tournament. The winner gets to be our new doll"
"Good idea" said Mana. "only...the winner gets to be eaten by one of us"
"What a prize.." muttered Kaiba.
"Cool" said Shizuki. "that way, WE'LL be giving orders instead of the boys"
Mana giggled.
The 5 women annouced the tournament to the city at large. Of course, they left out what the 'prize' was for winning the tournament.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Goddess Tournament

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The news of the death of the Five God Dragon shook the other guardians of the Shadow Realm to its core. Not only had quite possibly their most powerful champion been defeated (indeed, the Dragon was more powerful than the entire group of Pharoah's guardians combined) but his nearly infinite power had fallen into the hands of three Duel Monsters and two mortals, whose power quite possibly outpaced that of not only the Guardians, but just about any other monster in existence. Even the three Egyptian Gods worried that the living souls of the girls combined with the powers of the Five God Dragon possessed power exceeding their own.

After fierce debate, the Guardians selected a champion to assess the threat. The choice was a highly ironic one, as it was Mana's old teacher, the Dark Magician. He was trusted with finding out just how powerful the girls were, and their intentions.

So far he didn't like his chances. Although he had a soul, the Dark Magician's soul had been tainted by the dark when he became a guardian of the gateway. His soul couldn't absorb essence the way the pure souls of the other girls could.

And even so, the power of the Five God Dragon themselves made the girls more than a match for even the Egyptian Gods.

But as powerful as they were, Mana's teacher had two advantages, stealth and cunning. He cast a spell to wander the Earth undetected by their power, and was finishing his inital observations. Although he didn't want to harm Mana, his obligations came first. He could only hope that whatever they found could be used to defeat the girls.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: A spy among them

choices: The Dark Magician joins the tournament
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Every duelist in the city came to the tournament. Weevil Underwood and Rex Raptor arrived together. Those two seemed to have become friends the last time Anzu saw them. Mako Tsunami also came, along with Espa Rova and several other top duelist. Yugi, Kaiba and Jououchi were allowed to enter the tournament. Kevin joined too. When all the duelist had arrived, Mai explained the rules of the tournament.

"Okay, listen up" said Mai. "welcome to our duel monster tournament. Your duels will be totally random, so you won't know who you are going to duel with before the duel begins. Each duelist shall begin with 8000 Life Points. When you ran out of Life Points, you'll lose the duel..." 'and get eaten by one of us' Silently added Shizuki.
"We 5 girls are in the tournament too" said Mai. "the tournament begins in 1 hour...so you better get ready!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The Rules

choices: See one of the girls duel
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Observing from the background, the Dark Magician formed a plan. If he could enter the tournament, he would be able to get much closer to the girls otherwise. And once they let their guard down, he would use it.

Looking in his hand, he pocketed the ring given to him by the guardians. It was a weapon of last resort, with enough power to destroy even a god. The problem was that using it serverely drained even the most powerful magician. If he had to use it five times consecutively, he would most certainly die.

No matter. He was a servant of the Pharoah, and that was all that mattered. In the shadows, he took the form of a teenage duelist and went to a booth where people were signing up.

"Name?"

"Ron. Ron Torro."

"Sign here, and list the names of your cards."

"Of course."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Back entrance

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
"Well, it's time to start the tournament," Anzu announced. "So, let's begin! There are ten competitors: Yugi, Kaiba, Jounocohi, Kevin, Weevil, Espa Roba, Rex Raptor, Mako Tsunami, Rebecca Hawkins and...Ron Torro."

"Wait a second," Weevil spoke up. "You said you would be competiting too!"

"We will," Lily replied. "But you have to earn the right to face us. See, we'll pair you up into five matches and each match will be overseen by a Goddess. The winner of the match gets to face the Goddess in the second round. The winner of that match, whether it's a Goddess or a mortal, moves on to the finals. Understand?"

"Well, what do we get if we win?" Rex asked.

"The top five mortal finalists recieve a boon, a magical favor. The nature of this favor will be decided by us," Mana explained.

Rex looked at Lily and blushed. "Can the boon be a date?"

"We'll talk about that if you win," Mai replied.

Then clearly I must make it to the finals, 'Ron' thought to hiself.

"All right, the first match is mine," Anzu announced. "Mako Tsunami versus Seto Kaiba. You'll be dueling in my Broadway arena for the right to face me. Let's begin!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: The Goddess Championship Begins!

choices: Mako manages to hold his own
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Cracking his knuckles as he got onto the arena, Kaiba grinned. After two days of being treated as a mere plaything, it was going to be nice to get out his frusturations by beating inferior opponents in duels. Hell, if he won the tournament, he just might be able to bargain for his freedom. Luckily for him and his rep, Lily had allowed both he and Jounocohi to wear their normal outfits for the duration of the tournament.

No such cynicism rested in Mako's mind however. He joined the tournament out of sheer curiosity when the five goddesses announced it. The idea of a favor of any sort being available to him was definetely a promising one. He could buy a new boat, no, a yacht!

Sitting down on an enormous throne where a referee's seat would normally be, Anzu watched the duel with interest.

"Are you boys ready?"

"Please!" shouted Kaiba. "I'll beat this low-class duelist faster than it takes to grill a fish."

"Don't underestimate me Kaiba! My deck has improved significantly since Battle City!"

"As far as I'm concerned," replied Kaiba as he drew five cards, "you're just a stepping stone towards my freedom."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Back in buisness

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
The first five minutes of the duel, Anzu thought that Kaiba would win the duel in another five minutes. But this wasn't the case. Mako's deck had improved by 100 fold. The two duelist were merciless to each other, taking life points from each other as often as they could.
"I summon Lord of Dragons!" said Kaiba. "Lord of Dragons has the power to summon any dragon I have in my hand to the field. So, I'll use him to summon Blue-Eyes White Dragon! And I'll place two cards face-down...and now, attack Mako's Legendary Fisherman with white lightning!"
"I activate Mirror Force!"
"Oh, sh~!"
The attack bounced off of the Legendary Fisherman and was coming back to the Blue-Eyes White Dragon.
"Activate Guidance Armor!" yelled Kaiba. "when this piece of armor is on a monster, the attack will go to it like a magnet! I attach Guidance Armor to the Legendary Fisherman!"
The Legendary Fisherman was no more.
"That's the end of my turn" said Kaiba.
Mako drew a card.
"I summon 7-Colored Fish in defense mode, and one card face down" said Mako.
"Is that all?" mocked Kaiba as he drew a card. "I play one card face down. Destory the 7-Colored Fish with White Lightning!" Mako smiled.
"Activate trap card!" yelled Mako as the attack hit his fish. The attack bounced off the fish and killed the Lord Of Dragons.
"What?!" asked Kaiba.
"I played Mirror Wall" said Mako. "as long as Mirror Wall is on the field, all of your attacks will reflect back to you!"
'Grrr...' thought Kaiba. 'I can't lose to this mermaid wanna be'
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Mako hold his own

choices: What's Anzu going to do to the loser?
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Luck had not been on Kaiba's side all week. If he lost to Mako here...

No, no, don't get mad, he thought, "get sadistic." Mako probably wanted to rile Kaiba up with a few lucky moves in an attempt to make the irritable champion play sloppily. Anyone with half a brain could tell that a fuming duelist couldn't compete with a calm and collected one.

"I'll start by playing a face down trap card, Rite of Spirit," began Kaiba. "That will destroy effectively eliminating that expensive Mirror Wall."

"Then I'll summon Enraged Battle Ox and combine him with Axe of Despair, creating a 2700 attack monster that can trample through your pathetic defense!"

Mako grimaced. He knew where this was heading.

"Now Battle Ox, destroy his 7 Colored Fish while Blue Eyes attacks directly!"

Mako braced himself, but it was no use. He just took 4900 damage.

"And I'll finish by playing Anti-Spell Fragrance. Any trap or magic card used from here on out has to be set before being drawn."

Kaiba grinned. Now this was him at his best, the Seto Kaiba that won duels with ease. He'd defeat the goddesses and win his freedom easily, and even settle things with Yugi if time allowed.

Mako was far from conceding defeat, although low on Life Points. Looking to his deck, he tried to see any card that would work. Any magic would be delayed by one turn, so it was useless right away. Plus there was the matter of his trampling monster.

His hand however, revealed no solution. No matter what, on the next turn, he would be beaten. Grumbing, he placed his hand on the card.

"I concede defeat Seto Kaiba."

"It was a nice try," replied Kaiba. "Keep practicing, and you just might beat me...in a few years!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Turning the duel around

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Anzu thought about what to do with Mako, the loser. She could turn him into chocolate and eat him, but that seemed boring now. Being a goddess, she could do anything to Mako...and not kill him. Anzu didn't want to hurt anybody.
"My fate are in your hands, mighty goddess" said Mako. This made Anzu smile.
Mako simply vanished. Kaiba didn't care what happened to that loser, so he walked away.
Anzu then summoned her deck of cards. Anzu wasn't good at duel monsters, but she was getting better at it. She was no Seto Kaiba, but she could outduel Honda...sometimes. Anzu had bought a few new cards when she and Yugi went on that date....or rather, the date with the Pharoah.
"Since you lost, Mako, you'll be my new dueling monster for the duration of the tournament" said Anzu.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Mako; Deul monster?

choices: Weevil is able to make it interesting
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
After a short while of dueling, several duelists went on to face the respective goddesses that were supervising the perliminary match. Unfortunately for him, Weevil Underwood got Mai.

Having been a goddess for less than 24 hours, the talented yet admittedly shallow Mai had wasted no time in using her powers in creative ways. For starters, she entered the dueling arena with elaborate jewerly all over her gigantic body, and replaced her casual outfit with a loose fitting dress that seemed to shine in the light, not to mention show off all of her body's curves.

And after Weevil defeated Espa Roba in the first round in a close fought duel, Mai had him turned into an ornate decaration for her new necklace.

Now turning her attention to the tiny Weevil, Mai wasted no time messing with her diminutive opponent.

"Weevil Underwood, known in dueling circles as Insector Haga, strongest card the powerful yet ugly Ultimate Queen Moth, uses bugs because he grew to like them when he found his sister couldn't stand them.

"You can't beat me," angrily shouted back Weevil. "I already beat Esper, and if he couldn't read my mind, neither could you!"

"You're comparing a two-bit psychic to a full-fledged goddess? For shame!" Mai laughed at his comparison, then added, "compared to my deck, your puny bugs are just waiting to be squashed!"

"I don't care how big you've gotten Mai, I've always been a better duelist than you and I'll prove it right now!"

"My my," continued Mai as she taunted Weevil, "a lot of spark for such a little man. I'll let you go first."
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Outclassed?

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Weevil was no pushover. He was an expert duelist, and expert with insects. The duel started out okay, with Mai summoning her Harpy Lady. Harpy Lady was wearing the same dress as Mai was wearing, although the Harpy Lady was normal sized. Pretty soon, Mai was able to get three more Harpy Ladies. The Four Harpy Sisters was merciless, attacking Weevil's insects.
Weevil tried to do his best, but was no match for a goddess. As a goddess, Mai knew what cards Weevil had in his hands. The duel took 45 minutes, and the last 10 minutes of it was exciting.

Mai - 3400 LP
Weevil - 2100 LP

It was all over when Mai summoned Harpy's pet dragon. The dragon was powerful itself, but the dragon gained 500 attack points for each Harpy lady on the field.
"Harpy's Pet Dragon, attack his Insect Queen!" said Mai.
Needless to say, Weevil's Life Points dropped to 0 when his Insect Queen was defeated.
"Good duel" said Mai. "you lost, though"
With that, Weevil turned into a round ruby. Mai attached it to her necklace.
"I love being a goddess" giggled Mai.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: No match for a goddess

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Yugi was happy to be dueling again. Not having picked up a card since Saturday, he was worried he'd be getting out of practice. And what better way to improve her skill than to compete in a tournament?

Yugi already knew what he wanted if he won, but he wasn't going to mention it to anyone.

"So, Rebecca," began the voice of Yami, "I see you're still dueling in Japan."

Rebecca nodded. "The best duelists in the world are here. Why should I go back to America? They're still several card packs behind?"

Smiling, Yami drew five cards as did Rebecca.

"Don't think I'm going to go easy on my darling!"

From her high vantage point above the duel, Mana heard the words "Darling" with a bit of annoyance.

"Does this little girl think she take my Yugi-kun?" she thought "She's way too young for him!"

"I summon Drillroid!" began Rebecca. "And I play one card face down."

"Good opening move, but I counter with Cold Wave, stopping all use of Magic and Traps till my next turn, and play the Skilled Dark Magician, with 1900 attack!"

Rebecca nodded at Yugi's new card, which promptly destroyed her Drillroid. She had hoped her skill was developing past Yugi's, but he was as sharp as ever.

"Nice touch Yugi, but don't count me out just yet!"
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Back and forth

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Jououchi and Kaiba glared at one another. Neither of the two liked each other very much, and everyone else was dueling. Kevin had just lost a duel to Shizuki. Poor Kevin was turned into chocolate and eaten by Shizuki. Shizuki then turned to Jououchi and Kaiba.
"Duel, you two" said Shizuki.
"Alright" said Kaiba. "this shouldn't take long"
"Aw, go stick it where the sun don't shine!" said Jououchi.
"What a good idea" said Shizuki. Jou and Kaiba each looked at Shizuki, who grinned. Jou and Kaiba sighed and started the duel.
Rex Raptor and Mai was dueling also. Rex had saw what had happened to Weevil, and he wasn't going to end like him.
"Oh, you wanna be a part of my necklace?" asked Mai.
"I'm not gonna be a part of anything, because I'm gonna defeat you" said Rex.
"Big words from a little pipsqueak" said Mai.
"I'M NO PIPSQUEAK!" yelled Rex.
"You better not argue with me" said Mai. "not smart to argue with a goddess"
"Come on, let's just duel!" said Rex.
"As you wish, necklace" said Mai.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Jou VS. Kaiba  and  Mai Vs. Rex

1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
As hard as Rex tried, he fell to Mai's deck rather easily.

It looked like Rex was able to make the duel interesting at first, as he quickly drew a powerful Beserk Gorilla to start the duel. Rex had figured that if his non-tribute monsters overpowered Mai's harpies, he could win easily.

Unfortunately, he didn't count on Mai's Ultimate offering going on the field right away. After an initial Harpy was destroyed, Mai was able to play the Harpy Sisters in a swarm, combined with the powerful Amazonian armor.

Two turns later, after seeing the combo Rex was trying to set up with his Monarch cards, Mai had interrupted it with a trap card destroying the monster he intended to use. It was all downhill from there.

Rex lost the duel 6750-0. Looking up at the gigantic Mai, he cringed.

"Now what?"

"I want something for my pretty fingers," replied Mai. Before Rex could do anything, his body had been turned into a gold ring, which Mai placed upon her index finger.

Laughing at the fact that the champion duelists were now mere jewelry, Mai then thought that the only problem with her new look was that she was too small. In in instant, she grew another 50 feet, standing as a 250 foot tall goddess with elaborate jewerly and a revealing dress.

"Who's next?" she asked in a seductive tone.
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.title: Rex the ring

The Time Wizard caused 1000 years to pass on the field, leaving the three-headed Blue-Eyes White Dragon a fossil and crumbled to dust.
"1000-year Dragon, attack rich boy directly!" yelled Jououchi.
"I activate Mirror Force" said Kaiba. "so your attack is reflected back to your dragon!"
The 1000-year dragon was no more. Shizuki was watching over the duel. She noticed that Mai grew 50 more feet, and had two new pieces of jewelry.
The duel lasted 20 minutes, and Kaiba had won of course.
"HA!" said Kaiba. Then he walked away for the next duel.
Jououchi turned to Shizuki. Shizuki smiled and turned Jou into a necklace.

choices: What does Mana plan to do to Rebecca?
Go to one of the other girls
1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Rebecca felt overwhelmed by Yugi's skill. True, she had tried her best, but every move she threw out had been countered by a superior one from Yugi. She had no idea his skill would improved so dramatically since the last time they fought.

Yugi wasn't too worried about it however, as he was looking for the finishing move. Sure enough, he found it.

"Dark Paladin, destroy her Millenium Shield!"

The final blow struck, Rebecca sighed in defeat.

"I got lazy. I had no idea you've improved so much."

"It's not a problem," replied Yugi as he left the arena. "We all make mistakes. The important thing is that we learn from them."

"I will, and next time my darling, I won't lose!"

Smiling, Yami/Yugi left the arena, with the renewed Rebecca ready to leave. But before she could, the massive hand of the now 250 foot tall Mana stopped her.

"Oh no you don't you little piece of jailbait. You lost the duel, so that means you're under my power."

Rebecca looked stunned. "Huh?"

"Yugi-kun is mine, OK?"

Rebecca, although a genius by many other methods, was still a novice in the areas of love. She wouldn't stand for anyone claming who she thought was rightfully hers.

"Yugi is mine you overgrown bimbo!"

Rather than be insulted, Mana grinned evily.

"Do you think you can speak to a goddess that way, little speck?"

"I've always wanted a dog" said Mana as she picked up Rebecca.
Rebecca whined, not being able to talk.
"Too late to Apologize" said Mana. "Yugi-kun is MINE and you can't steal him away"
Mai was watching what was happening in mild interest. She looked at her new jewelry and smiled.
"Who else wants to end up as my jewelry?" asked Mai to the huge arena at large. No one came to Mai.
"Oh, it won't be so bad" said Mai. "you get to be on my lovely body for the duration of the tournament...maybe even a little longer"
