1351222121121221112222211121222222111212.content:
Midway through the duel, when Mai was winning 7600-4200, Kaiba was ready to begin his standard ranting pattern, becoming enranged at the enormous woman in front of him. But then he decided that winning would take a more logical approach. Breathing heavily, he began to think.

"OK, think. Who have I dueled before that could see one...Pegasus! Of course! But Pegasus had a much wider variety of cards than Mai. Even at her size, she still lacks Pegasus' skill."

"Comparing me to an old man Seto?" asked Mai. "I can see more than just what's in your hand, I can see your entire deck!"

Kaiba was about to respond, but then he realized she was bluffing. So he had one chance. Randomly play cards and hope his hand could support.

"One card face down."

Mai giggled. "Is that all you have to offer? Pathetic! Harpy sisters, deal with him!"

Kaiba smirked. "You guessed wrong. That was Deck Destruction Virus!"

"But..."

"You kept looking for my monster card that you never thought I wouldn't try to subvert your defenses!"

Mai shrieked. Had she been wrong?

Thanks to the effects of Deck Destruction Virus, Mai's Harpy Ladies fell like dominoes. Seeing as her deck focused primarily on the low-power Harpy monsters, Kaiba was free to send in heavier-hittting monsters to win the Duel.

Kaiba won, 4200-0, after several turns of direct attacking with his monsters. Mai couldn't believe it.

"Oh, don't worry too much about it. Maybe there's no brain in that overgrown melon of yours..."

1352.content:
In interactives, there comes a trap that befalls many a potential reader. Endless "Show X or other" chapters.

So to partially fix this problem, we'll divide this section into two choices, mainstream anime and not so mainstream anime.

Mainstream anime is pretty much the stuff that's been on TV, and has left some last impression on the general public's mind, or is still airing. DBZ, Samurai Champloo, and Cowboy Bebop come to mind.

Cult anime is anime with some following (because let's face it, if no one's heard of it, it won't be here) but isn't as well known as what's on Cartoon Network. It's become popular through endless fansubs or unusually strong word-of-mouth leading to DVD sales. Love Hina, Chobits, and GaoGaiGar are excellent examples of shows like this.

Well, the choice is yours.
1352.title: Avoiding the "endless" other trap.

1421122.content:
(Before fighter07 decides to change this, I want to point out that Dren DID get killed before. And if an Anime Characters die, who do you think they'd run into? I'll tell you, either Soul Reapers or Hollows.)

Start the chapter!
_______________________________________________________

Rukia was about to kill the bug when a voice got both her and Ichigo's attention.

When he saw who it was, Ichigo moaned

OF ALL PEOPLE IT HAD TO BE HIM!?!?

Dren the Cyniclon, in his gigai. He was wearing a simple black shirt and jeans with sneakers

His short hair was black and his ears were human-looking, but his eyes, voice and skin tone were unchanged.

Rukia had met him after some gut called 'Deep Blue' killed him; Dren had been trying to become a hollow by messing with the hole in his ghost's chest so he could protect someone.

The result would have been a half-Soul Reaper half-hollow.

Rukia had stopped him and it was true love at first sight for them both. But he was resurrected and Rukia couldn’t see him because of her Soul Reaper duties until Ichigo had taken her powers and she came across him in their respective gigai bodies, they had almost had their first kiss with Ichigo had shouted to get a room if they were going to be making out at the two of them. After Rukia had introduced them, Dren had burst out laughing, just what he found funny was made in the brief conversation after he’d calmed down, and it was something Ichigo would have struck a deal with Grand Fisher to wipe from his mind.
________________________________________________________________________
Flashback

Dren: That’s your name? Ichigo?

Ichigo: Yeah (Ichigo starts walking away from Dren and Rukia)

Dren: Doesn’t that translate into the word “Strawberry”?

Ichigo(dismissively): Shut up

Dren (grinning): OK, see ya later…Strawberry!

Ichigo (Edward-being-called-‘short’-class temper): DON’T CALL ME STRAWBERRY!

End Flashback
________________________________________________________________________
Ichigo had been so mad he’d attacked Dren, Dren knocked him out and Ichigo and woken up with Orihime wrapping his head in bandages. After that, Dren had always referred to Ichigo as “Strawberry” and pulled jokes like giving him putting strawberries in Ichigo’s food and giving him strawberry-flavored things at lunch without Ichigo noticing, then when Ichigo had noticed the taste of strawberries (He always made a face like he’d chugged ten gallons of sewer water when he realized he tasted strawberries), Dren would leap from his seat, point at Ichigo, and shout “CANNIBLE!” in a prankster’s tone.

HE DROVE ICHIGO CRAZY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

But the worst parts were that Rukia was always inviting Dren over and The Soul Society expected him to help deal with hollows. Because of what he was doing when he met Rukia, Dren had gained a few powers that interested the Soul Society. So much so that the Soul Society had taken his real body and given him a gigai and would only give him his real body back if he joined the Soul Society permanently, instead of freelance hollow-fighting despite the fact that he ALWAYS showed up and fought the hollows whenever one showed up.

The first being his Hollow-sense, it worked so well He was already were the hollow was attacking before the Soul Society even knew a hollow was around.

Next was his Hollow-Threat Level detector. Depending on the Type of hollow (Single Identity-class, Menos-class, Gillian-class, Adjuchas-class, Vasto lorde-class) , an image appeared in Dren’s mind that was as if one generated ripples on a pond without throwing a stone. One ripple was Single Identity-class, two ripples were Menos-class, three ripples were Gillian-class, four ripples were Adjuchas-class, and five ripples were Vasto lorde-class. Being able to tell how powerful the hollows were made him invaluable enough

But lastly, and unluckily for Ichigo, Dren had the power to put Hollows into gigais of their monstrous forms so anyone could what a hollow was and the people screaming and running away made it easy as hell for any Soul Reapers to find the hollow and kill it.

“Say Rukia, what are you doing?” Dren asked. “I’m trying to kill this stupid bug.” Rukia answered

“Well…if your busy, I could just come back…but I was wondering…if…you know…you’d like to go out with me today Rukia.” Dren said

“Are you saying that you want to take me out on a date?” Rukia asked with a blush.

“Only if you’d like. It’ll be a relief to go with you without Strawberry fallowing us everywhere…speaking of Strawberry, were is he?”

“Don’t know, but I know he hates bugs, but maybe he won’t notice it, like you said we could use a date without Ichigo spying on us or tagging along to ruin our time together.”

Ichigo couldn’t believe this. But he COULD go with them and try to ruin the date until Rukia changed him back, unless of course, Rukia squashed him before going with Dren…

14311.content:
Tohru walks away wiping her brow with the sleeve of her shirt. Kyo hear's her tinkering around in the kitchen.
Desperate, he hear's her let out a loud yelp. She's caught her blouse on the nail sticking out of the old cupboard door beneath the sink. The loud rip from the tear reminds him that Tohru keeps a small sewing kit under the sofa.
He darts over and finds one of the drawers open. He pulls himself up and sees a loose sewing needle proped along the edge.
He pulls himself in and wraps the small amount of thread around his waist and ties it off. The drawer is too slippery for him to climb back out, so he finds an empty bobin and pushes to the edge.
He steps out and drops down to the floor with the sewing needle balancing in the lip. Stepping sideways, he gives it a yank and it falls to the floor with a thud against the shag carpet.
He hears Tohru coming back into the room. Dragging the needle behind him, Tohru has sat down on the sofa with a glass of water. Kyo pulls the needle through the carpet until he's next to her feet.
He struggles with the needle until he's positioned it on his shoulder, like he ready to poll vault and rams the tip into her bare foot.
"Damn", she yelled, pulling her foot to her knee.
What she saw next caused her to let out another scream; the sewing needle still hanging from the side of her foot with a miniature Kyo dangling from the tiny thread limp and gasping for breath.
"Get...me...off...this...threeeeead!" he said as he was trying to pull himself upright.
Tohru was speechless.

It was a warm day in Tokyo as Sora jogged her way to the tennis court in her tennis attire. seconds before she entered the court, Sora grew 50 feet, her clothes (Which included white Adidas sneakers with pink stripes and hot pink socks) had survived the growth. Sora began hearing foot steps and saw another tennis player. Momo was running to Sora. "Oh My!" said Momo, "We grew to 50 feet!" said Sora who looked at Momo's ubercute attire which included a pink long sleeve shirt, pink skirt, Pink Reebok sneakers and white and pink striped socks. the 2 tennis princesses had not met before this. Momo saw someone next to her Reeboks.
Who is next to Momo and Sora
155.title: two giant tennis Princesses (Digimon, P.J.)

info.brief_description: Anime and Videogame girls become huge.
info.description:
Yes, yet another one of these stories. To make up for making ANOTHER anime and videogame story, I'm going to try my best to keep this one quality controlled. So hopefully anyone adding onto this will help by following some of the rules to make this story fun to read.

-No quick/short chapters. As in, no 1-2 sentence chapters and random endings. Try to make at least a decent amount of writing per chapter, so the story can keep going on well.

-Try to keep the characters almost microscopic to the female characters.

-Decent grammar and spelling. You don't have to do it well, I'm not the greatest at English either. But try at least not to type so you have to translate the text from engilsh to English.

-On girls can become giants. For shrinking, girls can shrink, but its preferred that the guy shrinks.

-Nothing overly sexual. There can be some sexual things, but nothing extreme.

-No gay stuff.

-Characters can go out of character if you want. You can make good people go evil, and such. Just give the option to keep the character normal before you change the personality.

-Over 52,000 views, please help to keep it growing.

-Thanks to everyone who has added.
